headline: Zimbabwe neGermany Dzoronga Kuumba Komisheni Inoona nezveKusimbaradza Hukama
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakasangana neChipiri negurukota rekuGermany rinoona nezvekudyidzana munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nebudiriro, VaGerd Muller, vakabvumirana kuumba komisheni ichaone nezvekusimbaradza hukama nekudyidzana pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure memusangano wavo, VaChinamasa vakati vafara kushanyirwa naVaMuller. Vakati vatura nyaya dzakawanda dzinosanganisira kudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi, chikwereti cheZimbabwe kuGermany, zvirango zvehupfumi pamwe nekuti Zimbabwe itange zvekare kuwana rutsigiro rwemari nehunyanzvi kubva kuGermany. Vakatiwo vakazeya zvimwe zvingaitwe neZimbabwe kuti ikwanise kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kune dzimwe nyika nemasangano epasi rose pamwe nekuti igadziridze hukama hwayo nenyika dzepasi rose. VaChinaamasa vakati vakabvumiranawo kushanda pamwe chete panyaya yekudzidzisa vanhu zvidzidzo zvemabasa emaoko kana kuti vocational training nechinangwa chekuti vanhu vakwanise kuzvishandira pamwe nekupinza vamwe mabasa. Zimbabwe yakatarirwa zvirango zvehupfumi nenyika dzekumavirira dzakaita seAmerica, Australia nenyika dzekuEurope nekuda kwehutongi hwehudzvanyiriri, kutyora kodzeo dzevanhu pamwe nekuita sarudzo dzisina kujeka. VaMuller vakati vakafara kuuya kuZimbabwe mushure mekunge Zimbabwe yagadza mutungamiriri mutsva zvichitevera sarudzo dzemwedzi wapfuura idzo dzakazosimbiswawo nedare repamusororo munyika. Vakati zvakakosha kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaite zvakavimbisa kuita zvekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu kusanganisira mapato anopikisa pamwe nekuremekedza nekutevedza mitongo yematare edzimhosva. VaMuller vakati Germany nedunhu rese reEurope vanoda runyaro muZimbabwe ndosaka vachida kuti VaMnangagwa vaite zvavakavimbisa. Vakatiwo Germany inoda kuona hupenyu nehupfumi hwevanhu vekumaruwa huchisimudzirwa ndosaka iri kuda kushanda neZimbabwe mukusimudzira ruzivo rwevanhu pamabasa emaoko. Vakatiwo Joint Commission yavachaumba neZimbabwe ichazeya zvese zvingaitwe uye kuti Germany ingabatsirei sei vanhu vemuZimbabwe kuti vabudirire. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti kunyange hazvo makurukota aVaMnangagwa ari kuramba achiita basa rawo, ari kuita izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo sezvo mutemo uchiti zvigaro zvavo zvinopera panogadzwa mutungamiri wenyika mushure mesarudzopapera. Izvi zviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika pasi paSection 108 (1) (c). VaMnangagwa vakagadzwa kuve mutungamiriri wenyika nesvondo uye havasati vadoma dare remakurukota avo. No media source currently available

headline: Ongororo Yakaitwa neHofisi yaAmai Chiri Inoti Makanzuru Ari Kutadza Kuita Mabasa Awo neMazvo
text: Mukuru wehofisi yaComptroller and Auditor- General, Amai Mildred Chiri, vanoti makanzuru emaguta nemadhorobha akawanda munyika haasi kuita basa nemazvo akaita sekutakura marara nekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena. Gwaro rakaburitswa nehofisi iyi rinoratidza kuti makunzuru akawanda munyika ari kuita basa asingatevedze mitemo inobata mashandiro emakanzuru aya. Gwaro iri rinoitwo pamusoro pekusatevedza mitemo, makanzuru aya ari kutadza kuita basa nemazvo. GWaro iri rinoti kanzuru yeChitungwiza iri kungopa vanhu nzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba nemabhizimisi pasina mvura, migwagwa nezvimwe zvinodiwa kuvepo nzvimbo isati yavakwa. Kanzuru yeMasvingo inonzi inogaya 30 megalitres dzemvura pazuva asi guta iri richida 48 mega litres pazuva. Kanzuru yeMutare inonzi haiendesi kubhanga mari yese yainowana uye kuGweru makanzura anonzi haasati abhadhara masitendi aakapihwa nemutengo uri pasi pasi kunyange hazvo aisungirwa kunge akabhadhara masitendi aya. Zvimwewo zvakawonekwa inyaya yekuti midziyo inenge yatengwa nemakunzuru inotora gore kana kudarika isati yaendeswa kumakanzuru aya. Sachigaro weUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe, zvakarre vari meya veGweru, VaJosiah Makombe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanobvumirana nemaonero aAuditor-General, asi vakati zvimwe zvacho zvakatogadziriswa. Asi VaMakombe vati nyaya yekupa vanhu mvura yakakwana nekutakura marara inonetsa kugadzirisa nekuti havasi kuwana rutsigro rwakakwana kubva kuhurumende. Vati mafuta emotokari dzekutakura marara anotengeswa nemari yekunze asi ivo vachibhadharisa mitero nemari yemunyika. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo vakapihwa mvumo yekuti vagari vanoda vabhadhare mitero nemari yekunze, hakuna vari kuita izvi nekuti simba remari yekunze rakadzikira mumabhanga kana zvichienzaniswa nepamukoto. Vati nekuda kwaizvo vanhu vanochinja mari yavo pamukoto vobhadhara mitero kumakunzuru nemari yema RTGS. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano rinomirira vagari vemuMasvingo, Amai Rumbidzao Mugurupira, vaudza Studio 7 kuti gwaro raAG raburitsa pachena zvavanogaro taura kuti hapana chinobatika chiri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo kuratidza kuti vari kubhadhara mitero. Sachigrao veHarare Metropolitan Residents Forum, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vatiwo hurumende inofanira kuvandudza bumbiro remitemo yenyika kuitira kuti makanzuru akwanise kushanda akasanunguka. Vati pari zvino pane kupindira kunoitwa nehurumencde uko kunokanganisa makunzuru aya. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vange vasiri kudaira nhare mbozha yavo. Vachitaura mushure mekutambira mabhajeti emakanzuru aya gore rino vasina kuaderedza, VaMoyo vakati vainge vaita izvi nekuti vaida kuti makanzuru aya awane mari yekuti akwanise kuita mabasa akaita sekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena nekutakura marara nguva dzose. VaMoyo vakatiwo vanotarisira kuti makanzuru achashandisa mari dzekuvandudzwa kwematunhu kana kuti Devolution kusimudzira magariro evanhu. Asi VaMakombe vati makanzuru akatomirira mari idzi nemaziso matsvuku kubva kuhurumende, sezvo asati apihwa mari idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Gweta raDiego Maradona Rinoti Harisi Kufara neMafiro Aakaita
text: Gweta reshasha yenhabvu yakashaya neChitatu Diego Maradona, VaMatias Morla mumashoko kuvatori venhau neChina vakati panofanira kuongororwa mafiro ake nekuti zvakatora maminetsi makumi matatu kuti ambulance iuye kuzomubatsira mushure mekurwara nemoyo. Gweta iri rinoti Maradona aifanira kuve aine vachengeti panguva dzose sezvo ainge achangobva kuvhiyiwa muhuropi munonzi mainge muine ropa rainge ragwamba asi anonzi ainge asina aimutarisa kwemaawa gumi nemaviri. Argentina nemusi weChina yakatara mazuva matatu ekuchema Maradona uye ari kuchemerwa kumuzinda wemutungamiri wenyika uko kune zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zviri kuonekana nemutumbi wake. Maradona akatungamira Argentina mukusimudza mukombe weWorld Cup muna 1986 uye vamwe vanoti panyaya dzenhabvu hapana aisvika paari.

headline: Transform Zimbabwe Yoda Kuti Zuva reSarudzo dzeBy-Election Rive Zororo
text: Bato rinopikisa reTransform Zimbabwe rinoti ringangoenda kudare repamusorosoro reConstitutional Court kuti dare iri rimanikidze mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kutara zuva resarudzo dze by-election, remusi wa 10 Chikumi sezororo kuitira kuti vashandi vakwanisewo kuenda kunovhota vakasununguka. Munyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muTransform Zimbabwe, Doctor Sungai Mazando, vanoti bato ravo rakanyorera VaMugabe tsamba richisvitsa chinyunyuto chavo ichi vachivapa mazuva manomwe ekuti vapindure. Asi mazuva aya akatodarika neMuvhuro. Bato iri riri kutsigirwawo nerimwe bato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, iro rinotiwo rinofunga kuti VaMugabe vakatara zuva iri vaine chikiribidi chavari kuitira. Mutauriri weNCA, VaMadock Chivasa, vanoti VaMugabe vanofanirwa kuendesa zuva iri mukupera kwesvondo kana vatadza kuti riitwe zororo. VaMugabe vakatara musi wa 10 Chikumi sezuva richaitwa sarudzo dzekutsiva nhengo dzeMDC Renewal Team dzakadzingwa mudare reparamende mumatunhu gumi nemana, kozotiwo kudunhu reHwedza North chigaro chakasiiwa nenhengo yeZanu PF, VaSimon Musanhu, avo vakashaya kutanga kwegore rino. Sarudzo dzichaitwawo kuHurungwe West kuMashonaland West neHeadlands kutsiva vaive nhengo dzeZanu PF vakadzingwa vanoti VaTemba Mliswa naVaDidymus Mutasa. Mapato ezvematongerwo enyika masere pamwe nevakazvimirira ndivo vachapinda musarudzo idzi, idzo dzakarambwa nemapato ose eMDC achida kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo itange yagadziriswa. Doctor Mazando vanoti chimwe chichemo chavachasvitsa kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission ndechemapepa avo ekutsvaga rutsigiro ayo vanoti ari kubvarurwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu PF. Vanotiwo vatsigiri vavo vari kushungurudzwawo zvekuti mumwe akatorohwa akakuwara zvekupinda muchipatara mumusha weGlen View. Asi VaChivasa vanoti nhengo dzavo hadzisati dzashungurudzwa kusvika pari zvino sezvo dziri kukwanisa kutsvaga rutsigiro dzakasununguka. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Mhofu anoita’
text: VARAIRIDZI vakasiyana vezvikwata zvinokwikwidza muCastle Premiership vanoti vatsigiri venhabvu kana vaongorori vemutambo uyu vanofanirwa kupa Sunday “Mhofu” Chidzambwa rukudzo nekuti kubudirira kuenda kumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations harisi dambe.   Izvi zvinotevera kushoropodzwa kwakaitwa Mhofu nevamwe vatsigiri venhabvu apo maWarriors akakundwa neEgypt 1-0 mumutambo wekutanga weAfcon kuEgypt nemusi weChishanu svondo rapera.   Asi, vamwe varairidzi vezvikwata zvenhabvu vanoti Mhofu anofanirwa kurumbidzwa nekuve murairidzi wekutanga wemuZimbabwe kuenda nechikwata chenyika ichi kumakwikwi aya kaviri.   Murairidzi weManica Diamonds — Luke “Vahombe”  Masomere — anoti kushoropodza kunoitwa nevamwe vatsigiri venhabvu hakubatsire chinhu asi kunodzikisira mutambo uyu.   Anoti Mhofu ndiye muridzi webasa iri uye vatambi vaanenge asarudza kuti vatambe ane zvikonzero zvaanenge avasarudzira.   “MuAfrica muno mune nyika dzakawanda chaizvo asi zhinji dzacho hadziko kuAfcon, isu tiriko saka chinhu chikuru ichocho. Saka tikaenda kuAfcon tikanokundwa zvinoreva kuti takundwa nezvimwe zvikwata zviri pamberi pedu nekudaro ngatimbomire zvekutaura zvisina basa titsigire Mhofu nevakomana vedu.   “Munhu asingazive zvenhabvu ndiye anomhanya pamberi kutaurisa zvaasingazive. Ngatimbomire kutaurisa tipe rutsigiro kuvakoma vedu uye nemutyairi wedu Mhofu kuti vabate basa.   “Kukundwa kunotarisirwa munhabvu, kana vakaburitswa mumutambo uyu tongovatambira kuti ndizvo zvaitika, vodzoka votanga patsva kugadzirira makwishu anotevera kuti vagodzokera ikoko vave pane chimwe chidanho. Vakomana vedu vakatamba zvinonwisa mvura asi kungoti vakasangana nevamwe vatambi vepamusoro, asi pabhora chairo vaitamba zvaidadisa,” anodaro Masomere.   Murairidzi weChicken Inn, Joey “Mafero” Antipas, anoti ino inguva yekuti vatsigiri venhabvu vabatane vachitsigira Mhofu nemaWarriors.   “Munhabvu kana chikwata chako chaunorairidza chikahwina unopembedzwa asi kana chikakundwa unoshoropodzwa zvikuru wonzi ngaadzingwe basa. Asi, izvi zvakashata chose uye kana pane pakanganisika ngatidzidze kusimudzirana kwete kungoshoropodza.   “Mhofu vari kuita basa rakanaka chose saka ngativape rutsigiro rwakakosha kunyangwe vakakundwa. Isu tinomira navo nekuti basa iri vanorinzwisisa.   “Ngatibatane pane zvinenge zvangoitika uye zvinenge zvangoitikawo, asi ini semurairidzi ndinoziva kuti zvakakosha sei kutungamira nyika yako kuenda kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations. Hakuendeki zvekumhanya saka Mhofu vakatobata basa guru kuendako nemaWarriors,” anodaro Mafero.   Rosemary Mugadza – uyo aimbove murairidzi wemaMighty Warriors – anoti Mhofu ari kuita basa rakanakisa chose asi mitambo mikuru yakadai seAfcon isati yasvika anofanirwa kupihwa nguva yakakura yekugadzirira nechikwata chake.   Mugadza anoti kazhinji Mhofu haasi kumbopihwa nguva yakakura yekuita gadziriro nevatambi vake.   “Mhofu vari kuita basa rakanaka, kana mitambo yemaWarriors yandaona yekuAfcon chikwata chaitamba zvinonwisa mvura asi nguva yakakwana yekunyatsogadzirira mitambo iyi havasi kuipihwa, ichi ndicho chokwadi.   “Kana vachipinda mumutambo mikuru inenge iyi, vanofanirwa kupinda mukembi kwenguva ndefu nechikwata chavo vonyatsoshanda nacho vochibika uye votamba mitambo yakawanda yehushamwari. Asi, handizvo zviri kuitika. Kazhinji panguva yemitambo yehushamwari pakarenda reFifa maWarriors edu haaungane kutamba, ndipo ipapo Mhofu anofanirwa kunge ane chikwata chake achichiongorora achitarisa vamwe vatambi achigadzirira mitambo mikuru yakaita seAfcon,” anodaro Mugadza.   MaWarriors kuAfcon ari muboka rimwechete reGroup A rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Egypt, Uganda neDemocratic Republic of Congo (DRC).

headline: Vamwe Vagari vekwaMutoko Vonyunyuta neKushaya Cheuviri Kubva muMatombo Anocherwa Mudunhu Mavo
text: Vamwe vagari vekwamutoko vakapinda mumusangano wakaitwa paMutoko Centre neVOA yakabatana neMedia Centre neChitatu chapfuura vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti itore matanho ekusimudzira mararamiro avo. Vagari ava vakaisawo mibvunzo kune mumwe akapindawo mumusangano uyu, VaShame Kativhu, avo vaimbove kanzura, vachida kunzwisisa kuti makanzura anombotaurawo here pamusoro pematambudziko avanosangana nawo mudunhu ravo pavanoita misangano yavo. Vazhinji vevanhu ava vaidawo kunzwisisa mafambisirwo emari dzinobva mukucherwa kwematombo kana kuti black granite mudunhu mavo, vachiti madzishe namasabhuku vanifanirwa kuona kuti vabata nyaya idzi zvine hungwaru. Chirongwa ichi chaikokerwa nemukuru weMedia Centre VaErnest Mudzengi, uye chakanga chakatsigirwa nemuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: VaGumbo Vopomerwa Dzimwe Mhosva neZaac
text: Gurukota muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, Va Joram Gumbo, vanonzi havana kumiswa pamberi pedare redzimhosva sezvange zvakatarisirwa zvichitevera kusungwa kwavakaitwa neMuvhuro neZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission, Zaac. Asi VaGumbo vambosvika havo kumatare edzimhosva kwechinguva, ndokubva vadzoserwa zvakare kumahofisi eZaac. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kugweta raVaGumbo, VaSelby Hwacha, kuti nyaya iyi iri kufamba seyi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika muZaac vaudza Studio7 kuti VaGumbo vari kupomerwa dzimwe mhosva pamusoro pemhosva dzavakasungirwa neMuvhuro. Vatiwo ichokwadi kuti VaGumbo havana kumiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva sezvo pamuka dzimwe mhosva dzavari kupomerwa. VaGumbo vakasungwa neZaac vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori panguva iyo vaive gurukota rezvekufambiswa kwezvinhu munyika. VaGumbo vanonzi vakaita zvehuori apo vakashandisa imba yehanzvadzi yavo, Mavis Gumbo, kuti ishandiswe semahofisi ekambani yeZimbabwe Airways, iyo vanonzi vakaita kuti iumbwe muna 2012 apo vaive gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. VaGumbo vanonziwo vakanyorera bhanga guru renyika musi wa 10 Nyamavhuvhu 2017 vachiriudza kuti rikweretese kambani yeZimbabwe Airways mari inoita miriyoni imwe chete yemadhora ekuAmerica. Musi wa 21 Nyamavhuvhu 2017, VaGumbo vanonzi vakazivisa kuti mari yakanga yabva kubhanga guru renyika ishandiswe mukubhadhara rendi yemba yaMuzvare Gumbo, uye imwe yacho kuti ishandiswe mukuvakiridza imba iyi. Hurumende inoti zvakare musi wa 12 Gunyana 2017, kambani yeZimbabwe Airways yakaisa mari inoita miriyoni imwe chete yemadhora ekuAmerica mubhanga rekambani yeMaclaten Holdings, inova kambani yemwanasikana waMuzvare Mavis Moyo, Clara Rachel Mudzami. Hurumende inoti zvakaitwa naVaGumbo zvaive kunze kwemutemo, uye zvisingatarisirwe kuitwa nemunhu mukuru muhurumende.

headline: Varwere vePfungwa paNgomahuru Vogeza Mudziva Rine Ngwena Nekushaya Mvura
text: Dzimwe hama dzevarwere vepfungwa vari pachipatara cheNgomahuru kuMasvingo dzinoti dziri kutyira kuti vanogona kurumwa nemakarwe kana kunyura mumvura apo vanenge vachigeza murwizi sezvo chipatara ichi chaita dambudziko guru rekushaya mvura kubva zvafa pombi dzemvura. Vakuru vepachipatara apa vanoti vave kusvika mwedzi miviri vasina mvura sezvo Zimbabwe National Water Authority(ZINWA) isiri kugadzira muchina unopomba mvura. Mukuru wepachipatara apa, Dr Parirenyatwa Maramba, vati varwere vanofanira kugeza zuva nezuva nekudaro vanotoenda kurwizi rweMagwangwadza, urwo runopinda mudhamu reTugwi Mukosi rine makarwe anorura. Asi izvi hazvisi kufadza hama dzevarwere ava dzinoti dzave kugara dzakabatira hura mumaoko dzichityira kuti vanogona kubatwa nemakarwe kana kunyura mumadziva sezvo pfungwa dzavo dzisinganyatsoita zvakanaka. VaSimbarashe Dhauzi, vane mwana wavo pachipatara apa vanoti vave nenguva vachishungurudzika nekutyira hupenyu hwemwana wavo. Amai Anna Magwaza, vekwa Madamombe, kwaChivi, vane hanzvadzi yavo inogara pachipatara apa vanoti kunze kwekutyira makarwe, hama dzavo dzinogona kutiza vashandi vepachipatara apa pavonobuda muwaya vachienda kurwizi vakazoshaikwa zvachose votetereka nenyika. Vanoona nezvekushanda neveruzhinji pachipatara cheNgomahuru, VaMorgan Manzunzu, vanoti vanotairisa kuti dambudziko iri richagadziriswa nekukurumidza, uye vari kutora matanho kuti varwere vasanyura kana kubatwa nemakarwe. Vaenderera mberi vachiti mvura yekunwa nekubikira varwere vanotora pachibhorani asi yekugeza inodiwa yakawanda nekuwandawo kwakaita varwere ndosaka vachienda kurwizi. Mutauriri weZINWA, Amai Marjorie Munyonga, vati dambudziko riri kugadziriswa uye vanotarisira kutanga kupomba mvura zvakanaka mangwana(Chipriri 16). Chipatara cheNgomahuru chine varwere vepfungwa vanosvika zana nemakumi matatu nevashanu. Varume vari zana negumi uye vakadzi vari makumi maviri nevashanu. Chipatara ichi ndicho choga chevarwere vepfungwa mudunhu reMasvingo uye chiri chimwe chezvishoma munyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: VaMasisi Vosimbaradza Kuti Zvirango Zvibviswe, America Ichiti VaMnangagwa Ngavamire Kutonga neDemo
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeBotswana VaMokgweetsi Masisi vanoti vari kuda kutaura nehurumende yeAmerica kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagw nevamwe vavo nehurumende yeAmerica zvibviswe. Asi hurumende yeAmerica inoti kana vatungamiri venyika vakaramba vachityora kodzero dzevanhu zvirango hazvisi kuzobviswa Vachitaura nevatori venhau vachangosvika panhandare yendege yeSir Seretse Khama International Airport iyo iri muguta guru renyika iyi reGaborone nhasi mangwanani, VaMasisi vati vakazvipira kuita mutongi gava maenzanise pakati peZimbabwe neAmerica munyaya yezvirango. VaMasisi vavimbisa kuti vachaita zvose zvavanogona kuona kuti izwi rekuramba zvirango raita maungira pasi rose. VaMnangagwa vadzokawo munyika nhasi kubva kumusangano weUnited Nations uye vati vari kufara kuti vakawana rutsigiro rwevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica kuti zvirango zvibiswe. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru mudare remakurukota uye vari vari mutauriri wemtungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba vaudza Studio7 kuti zvave pachema semhanza yembudzi kuti nyika zhinji kunyanya idzo dziri mudunhu reSADC dzoramba dzakamira neZimbabwe semusambangwena panyaya yezvirango. Asi vachipindura mashoko ekuti zvirango zvibviswe, mumiriri weAmerica muSouth Africa VaReuben E Brigety vakaudza vatori venhau veNews24 kuti America haisi kuzobvisa zvirango izvi nekuti haitendi kuti ndizvo zvaondonga hupfumi hweZimbabwe. Vanoti zvirango izvi zvakatemerwa vatungamiri vari kupomerwa mhosva dzekutonga nedemo uye hazvinei nevanhuwo zvavo. VaBrigety vati vatungamiri veZimbabwe vakatendeuka nekumira kutyora kodzero dzevanhu zvirango izvi zvinoswera zvabviswa. Mutauriri webato rinopikisa munyika reCitizens Coalition for Change, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vatiwo nyaya yekutadza kutungamira ndiyo yapa kuti Zimbabwe iite seyakageza negoka munyama Mashoko aMuzvare Mahere atsinhirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvemagariro evanhu, VaTendai Mbofana avo vati kubviswa kwezvirango hakungapedze nhamo yadai kupfunya chisero munyika nokuda kwehuori. America yakatanga kutemera vakuru muhurumende nevavanodyidzana navo zvirango muna 2001. Vatungamiri venyika yeAmerica kutanga kuna VaGeorge Bush, VaBarack Obama, VaDonald Trump naVaJoe Biden vari kuramba vachizviwedzera gore roga roga hupenyu hwezvirango izvi vachiti vakuru vehurumende vari kuenderera mberi nekutyora kodzero dzevanhu zvokonzera kusagadzikana mudunhu rese rekuchamhembe kweAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vashoma Vanopinda Musarudzo dze By Elections
text: Vanhu vavhota neChitatu musarudzo dzema by-elections mu Harare vazhinji vachiti vaswera vagere zvavo kudzimba dzavo. No media source currently available Pasvika Studio 7 panga pachivhoterwa pachikoro che Courtney Selous chiri ku Greendale mu Harare East, panga pavhota vanhu vatanhatu nenguva dza 10 mangwanani. Pa Chemhanza ku Dzivarasekwa kwanga kwavhota vanhu makumi matanhatu nemumwe chete nenguva dza 1 masikati uye mitsetse yanga iri mupfupi zvikuru. Vanga vachiona nezvkufambiswa kwesarudzo munzvimbo dzakawanda dzanga dzichivhoterwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane vanhu vakati wandei vadzorwa mushure mekunge vauya vasina zvitupa uye vamwe vanonzi vanga vaenda kunzvimbo dzisiridzo dzavakanyoresa kuti vagovhotera. Mumwe wevanhu vavhota ku Dzivarasekwa uyo ati anonzi Muzvare Nancy Mawire vati kuvhota hakuna kumbomutorera nguva yakareba kana zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe sarudzo dzakamboitwa. Asi ruzhinji rwevanhu vakaita saVa Benedict Shambare vanogara ku Dzivarasekwa vanoti vawona zvakakodzera kuti vasaende kunovhota vachiti zvakafanana nekuwona bhora rakatambwa kare. Izvi zvatsinhirwa naVa Martin Musinami vanogarawo mu Dzivarasekwa makare. Va Gibson Chiurai vanogara mu Kambuzuma vatiwo kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi kwaita kuti vaswere vachitengesa zvavo kuitira kuti mhuri yavo iwane cheuviri. Nhengo yeboka revechidiki reMDC-T, Va Clifford Hlatshwayo, vati kusabuda kwaita vanhu vazhinji kunovhota kunoratidza kuti ruzhinji rwakateerera kurudziro yakaitwa nemutungamiri webato ravo, Va Morgan Tsvangirai, avo vakatenderera munzvimbo dzakawanda dzanga dzichiitwa sarudzo vachikurudzira kuti vanhu vasaende kunovhota kudzamara kwavandudzwa mitemo yose inobata mafambisirwo esarudzo munyika. Ku Headlands, nhengo iri kukwikwidza yakazvimirira ikoko, Va Albert Mukaratirwa, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vatsigiri vavo vaswera vachityisidzirwa nenhengo dze Zanu PF pavanga vachienda kunovhota. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVa Christopher Chingosho avo vari kukwikwidza vakamirira Zanu PF ku Headlands kwakare sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Sarudzo idzi dzaitwa mumatunhu gumi nematanhatu, ayo anosanganisira Hurungwe West, Tsholotsho North, Chikanga Dangamvura nemamwe. Zvichabuda musarudzo idzi zvakatarisirwa kuziviswa mangwana.

headline: Dare Rinombosendeka Mutongo Waro paChikumbiro chaVaHlalo Vakadzingwa muMDC-T
text: Asi munyori mukuru weMDC-T, uye vari gweta riri kumirira bato iri munyaya yaVaHlalo, VaDouglas Mwonzora, varamba mashoko aVaHlalo vachiti bato reMDC-T rine mitemo yakajeka inotevedzerwa nenhengo dzose dzinenge dzine zvichemo. Mumwe mutongi wedare reHigh Court muBulawayo anoti achazivisa munguva inotevera mutongo wake pachikumbiro chakasvitswa kudare iri naVaMatson Hlalo, avo vakadzingwa mubato reMDC-T pamwe nekubviswa pachigaro chekuve seneta weMzilikazi anomirira bato iri. Mushure mekunzwa neChishanu kubva kumagweta aVaHlalo pamwe neMDC-T, mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Nokhuthula Moyo, vati vachazozivisa mutongo wavo munguva pfupi iri kutevera. VaHlalo vakakwidza chikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi kana kuti Urgent Application kudare reHigh Court munguva pfupi yapfuura vachida kuti dare iri rimbosendeka parutivi nyaya yekudzingwa kwavo kuve nhengo yedare reseneti uyewo kudzingwa kwavo kuve nhengo yeMDC-T. Muchikumbiro chavo VaHlalo vakatiwo vanoda kuti dare rimbomisa bato reMDC-T kudoma mumwe munhu achavatsiva pahuseneta kusvika nyaya yavo yapera kunzwikwa nedare. VaHlalo, avo vari kumiririrwa naVaGodfrey Nyoni, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotarisira kuti dare richatambira chikumbiro chavo. Pavabvunzwa kuti havafunge here kuti hazvina zvazvinonyanyobatsira kuti vaendese nyaya iri pakati pavo nebato ravo kumatare, VaHlalo vati zvakakosha kuti bato rakaita seMDC-T iro rinoti rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, riremekedzee mutemo. VaHlalo vati bato reMDC-T harina kutevedzera gwara rebumbiro remitemo yaro pakuvadzinga kwavakaita. Asi munyori mukuru weMDC-T, uye vari gweta riri kumirira bato iri munyaya yaVaHlalo, VaDouglas Mwonzora, varamba mashoko aVaHlalo vachiti bato reMDC-T rine mitemo yakajeka inotevedzerwa nenhengo dzose dzinenge dzine zvichemo. VaMwonzora vati VaHlalo vakapiwa mikana yose yange iripo yekuti vagadzirise nhunha dzavo vachitevedzera gwara rebato reMDC-T asi vakaramba kuita izvi, vachitiwo bato reMDC-T rinotarisra kuti nhengo dzaro dzitevedzere gwara remusangano. VaMwonzora vati kunyange zvavo vasingakwanise kutaurira dare zvekuita, nyaya yaVaHlalo haifanirwe kutemesa dare musoro nekuti kune nyaya dzakawanda dzakaitika dzakafanana naidzodzo vachipa muenzaniso wekudzingwa muparamende kwevaimbove munyoro mukuru webato reMDC-T, VaTendai Biti, nevamwe vane chitsama mushure mekunge vadzingwa mubato reMDC-T. Kusawirirana pakati paVaHlalo nebato reMDC-T kwakatanga mushure mekunge VaHlalo vaenda kumatare vachitsvaga kuti VaGift Banda vabviswe pakuve sachigaro weMDC-T weBulawayo Province, vachiti sarudzo dzehusachigaro idzi dzaive dzisina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Asi bato reMDC-T rakatsigira kusarudzwa kwaVaBanda rikati VaHlalo vaifanirwa kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo vachishandisa gwara rebato reMDC-T kwete kuenda kumatare edzimhosva. VaHlalo vachiri kupikisa kusarudzwa kwaVaBanda mumatare. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti kunetsana kuri kuitika pakati paVaHlalo neMDC-T kuri kukonzerwa nekurwira masimba kuri kuitika mubato iri mudunhu reBulawayo. VaHlalo vanonzi havadiwi nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri we MDC-T, Muzvare Thokozane Khupe, avo vanonzi vari kutsigira Va Banda. VaHlalo vanonzi vari kutsigirwa nevamwe vakuru vebato muBulawayo, avo vanonzi hvasi kutsigira zviri kuitwa naMuzvare Khupe. No media source currently available

headline: Koshesai vatambi: Bunjira
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu ichitambira CAPS United nechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors – Alois ‘Gazza’ Bunjira – anoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti nhorowondo yevatambi vakaita mukurumbira munhabvu ichengetedzwe zvakanaka uye pave nehomwe inovabatsira kutanga mabhizimisi apo vanenge vasendeka shangu dzavo dzemutambo uyu.   Gore rino, nyika yarasikirwa nenyanzvi dzakaita mukurumbira munhabvu dzakawanda dzinosanganisira David ‘Yogi’ Mandigora, Misheck ‘Scania’ Chidzambwa, Joe ‘Kode’ Mugabe, Ernest ‘Maphepa’ Sibanda naSimon Sachiti.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Gazza sezita raBunjira remadunhurirwa, anoti chekutanga chakakosha kuti pane nenhorowondo yevatambi vose vakatamba nhabvu kare.   Anoti nhorowondo iyi inofanirwa kuchengetedzwa kuitira kuti vechidiki vagokura vachiifundiswa vazive kwakatangira nhabvu yemuno uye vatambi vakaita mukurumbira.   “Zvinosuwisa zvikuru kuti iye zvino ukabvunza vechidiki vari kukura nezvenhorowondo yevatambi vekune dzimwe nyika vanokuudza kuti Pele ndiani uye akatanga kutamba bhora rinhi nezvose zvaakahwina paaitamba nhabvu. Asi ukavabvunza nezvenyanzvi dzakaita mukurumbira muno sanaMandigora vanogona kutadza kutoziva kuti Mandigora wacho ndiani.   “Saka zvakakosha kuti tichengetedze nhorowondo yevatambi vedu vose kusanganisira mavhidhiyo ponyorwa nemabhuku evatambi vedu nekwakabva nhabvu yedu, zvogara zvichirakidzwa munhu wese kuitira kuti tigokwanisa kuyemura kwatakabva nekuti vatambi ava vose vakaunza mufaro kwatiri kwenguva ndefu,” anodaro Bunjira.   Chechipiri, anodaro Bunjira, panofanirwa kuumbwa homwe inobatsira vatambi venhabvu vanenge vasendeka shangu dzavo dzemutambo uyu kuitira kuti vakwanise kutanga mabhindauko akasiyana-siyana anovararamisa.   Anoti kutengera munhu chikafu hakubatsire nekuti chikapera mangwana anodzoka futi achida kutengerwa chimwe.   “Tinoona kazhinji kana mutambi akangosendeka shangu dzake dzenhabvu anobva atokanganikwa kazhinji kacho zvekuti dzimwe dzenguva anozorangarirwa kana achinzi ave kurwara kana kuti asangana nedambudziko muhupenyu hwake.   Saka ngapaumbwe homwe yekuti mwedzi wega-wega anoda kukanda kana $0,50c anongokanda. Mari iyi isazove yekunzi totengera vanhu chikafu, kwete, asi ngaive yekutangisa mabhindauko vatambi vedu vowana zvekuita vari kudzimba dzavo.   “Vakaita mabhindauko hatizombonzwe zvichinzi nhingi arohwa nenhamo, kwete, nekuti ane zvaanenge achiita isuwo tichimutsigira pabasa rake,” anodaro.   Bunjira anoenderera mberi achiti, “Asi chinonetsa manje mafungiro edu atinoita ndiwo akashata nekuti tikaona yaimboive shasha ichitengesa mazai kana matomatisi totanga kumuseka tichiti ari kutambudzika asi isu tichienda muzvitoro zvikuru kunotenga mazai iwayo nematomatisi. Ko kutsigira hama yepedyo kuti asimukirewo pasina kutaura zvakawanda zvakaipei?”

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kukabatwa neCovid-19 Huri Kuramba Huchikwira
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kuramba vachibatwa neCovid-19 hwakakwirira zvichitevera kubatwa kwevamwe makumi matatu nevaviri, kana kuti 32, vaine chirwere ichi, pavanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 929 vakavhenekwa. Vese vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vanhu vagara vari munyika vasina nhoroondo yekubuda kunze. Aka ndekekutanga mukati memazuva anodarika masvondo maviri kuti huwandu hwevanhu vane chirwere ichi hudarike makumi matatu. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose hwakwira kusvika pazviuru zvinomwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemumwe, kana kuti 7 951. Vanhu vakanga vapona kubva kuCovid-19 kusvika nemusi weChina vakanga vave zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana mana ane makumi mana nevatanhatu, kana kuti 6 446, izvo zvakasaiyawo vanhu chiuru nemazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevatanhatu, kana kuti 1 276, vachiri kurwara. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa hwakaramba huri pamazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 229, sezvo pasina munhu akashaya pazuva iri. Matunhu akawanikwa vanhu vane chirwere ichi anoti Bulawayo iine vapfumbamwe,Harare iine gumi, Mashonaland East iine vatanhatu neMashonaland West iine vanhu vanomwe. Dunhu reMashonaland Central ndiro chete dunhu rakanga risina kana munhu mumwechete airwara nechirwere ichi, kuchitiwo dunhu reHarare riri iro rine vanhu vakawandisa vanosvika chiuru nezana nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 1 129 vari kurwara. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachidzidzisa paNottingham Trent University kuBritain, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti kukwira kwehuwanda hwevakabatwa vaine chirwere ichi kunoratidza kuti chirwere chichakadzika midzi munyika. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti hurumende inofarnirwa kusimbisa hurongwa hwekuvheneka vanhu mumatunhu ose, sezvo chirwere ichi chave kukwaisa kupararira kubva pakanyevenutswa mutemo wairambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu. Vanotiwo veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vachitevedzera mitemo inodzvirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere ichi, yakaita sekugeza maoko, kuvhara miromo nemhino, kusiya mikaha pakati pavo, uyewo kusabatana maoko pamwe nekuungana. Zvichakadaro, Johns Hopkins University inoti pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nematanhatu nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nezvinomwe, kana kuuti 36,577 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nrzviuru makumi matanhatu nezviviri, kana kuti 1,062 000, vafa nacho. MuAmerica, umo mune vanhu vakawandisa pasi rose vabatwa neCovid-19, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mazana matanhatu nezvipfumbamwe, kana 7, 609 000 vabatwa nacho, uye vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri negumi nezviviri, kana kuti 212 000, vafa nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Zim yochema Shaya
text: SHASHA dzakambonetsa munhabvu, varairidzi nevatsigiri vemutambo uyu vochema zvikuru zvichitevera kushaika kwakaita George “Mastermind” Shaya nemusi weChipiri svondo rino.   Shaya, uyo ange ave nemakore 77 okuberekwa, ange ave nenguva ndefu achisimbirwa nemuviri wake izvo zvakaona achidamburwa gumbo rekurudyi mugore ra2019 mushure mekutambudzwa nechirwere chepasi petsoka chinozivikanwa nekuti “gangrene”.   Achinyora paFacebook, aimbove mubati wepagedhi weDynamos FC — Japhet “Shortcat” Mparutsa — anoti akawaniswa mukana wekutamba muchikwata chimwechete naShaya uyo waakaona hunyanzvi hwake kunyangwe hazvo panguva iyi Shaya ange ave pedyo nekusendeka shangu dzake dzekutamba nhabvu.   “Ndaive nemakore 18 pandakabva kuHarare Hospital Football Club ndichienda kuDynamos mugore ra1981. Panguva iyi, Mudhara George, sekumushevedza kwataimuita, ange ave pedyo nekusiya nhabvu. Vatambi vekumutsiva vange vatotsvagwa avo vaive Steve Kwashi pamwechete naJuly “Jujuju” Sharara. “Vaviri ava vaive neshangu huru dzekupfeka. Vakaedzawo zvavo asi kutaura chokwadi kwaingova naGeorge Shaya mumwechete. Murume uyu aidadisa uye ange asingatsivike. Hakuna mumwe aitamba saye,” anodaro Mparutsa.   Imwe shasha yakambotambira Dynamos zvekare — Taurai Mangwiro — anoti nyika yarasikirwa zvikuru nekushaika kwaShaya uyo akaita kuti vatambi vazhinji vade nhabvu. “Ndichikura ndaiziva kuti kuna George Shaya uye hakuna munhu aisingamuzive nekuti mudhara tarenda vaive naro uye vaigona zvikuru.   “Tarwadziswa zvikuru nekusiiwa kwataitwa namudhara wedu. Zororai murugare mudhara Shaya,” anodaro Mangwiro.   Mutambi wenhabvu, Hardlife Zvirekwi, anoti rufu rwaShaya rwamubata sezvo aidzidza zvakawanda kubva kwaari.   “Nhoroondo yenhabvu yemuZimbabwe hatikwanise kutaura nezvayo tichisiya zita raShaya. Kana munhu ukakwanisa kuhwinwa mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kashanu, zvinofanirwa kurumbidzwa zvikuru nekuti panenge pabatwa basa. Ini ndakahwinawo mubairo uyu kamwechete uye ndoziva kuti kuuhwina unenge washanda nesimba chaizvo. Manje Shaya akauhwina kashanu izvo zvinotaridza hunyanzvi hwaaive naho mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Zvirekwi.   Achinyorawo paFacebook, shasha yekutsigira nhabvu ine mukurumbira — Chris “Romario” Musekiwa — anoti nyika yose yarasikirwa zvikuru nekushaika kwaShaya.   “Kuti azopihwa zita rekuti Mastermind yange iri nyaya yehunyanzvi hwake hwaaiita munhabvu, akaita kuti vatambi vazhinji vade mutambo uyu uye ndiye ega mutambi akakwanisa kuhwina mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kashanu.   “Tine hurombo kumhuri yake, madzisahwira ake uye vatsigiri venhabvu vose nekurasikirwa kwataita naShaya.   “Tinoda kuti mhuri yake izive kuti tiri kuchema nayo panguva ino inorwadza,” anodaro Romario. Zvakadai, chikwata cheDynamos FC chakanyorera kuZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) chichikumbira kuti Shaya apihwe chiremerera chekuva gamba renyika.   Pachinyorwa chakaiswa padandemutande reDeMbare, chikwata ichi chinoti Shaya anokodzera kuve gamba renyika kuburikidza nebasa guru raakabata mumutambo wenhabvu.

headline: Zimbabwe Youmba Komiti Inotsvaka Nzira Dzekushandisa Kubhdhara Zvikwereti
text: Hurumende yaumba komiti ichaona kuti Zimbabwe yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvinosvika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanoti komiti iyi ichange iine vakuru kubva kubazi rezvehupfumi, African Development Bank, World Bank ne International Monetary Fund, IMF. Zimbabwe iri kuda zvimwe zvikwereti kuti igadzirise hupfumi asi hapana ari kuda kusungirira mari pagumbo rengwe sezvo kubhadhara zvikwereti izvi kuri kunetsa. Gore rapera mukuru wezvirongwa zveIMF muZimbabwe, VaDominique Fanezzi, vakati Zimbabwe haisi kuzopihwa zvimwe zvikwereti uye hapana kutsukunyuka padanho iri. Zvikwereti izvi zviri kuboka rinonzi Paris Club rinosanganisira Germany, France, Britain, Japan neAmerica. Kune zvikweretiwo kuIMF, African Development Bank neWorld Bank. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongwero enyika dzinoti chikwereti cheZimbabwe ndicho chimwe chikonzero chiri kutadzisa nyika kuti ibudirire. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vanoti Zimbabwe ikakwanisa kubhadhara chikwereti chayo, inenge yokwanisa kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi.

headline: VaPsychology Maziwisa Vanosungwa neNyaya dzeHuwori kuZESA
text: Zimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, inosunga mumiriri weHighfield West muparamende uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaPsychology Maziwisa nenyaya dzine chekuita nehuwori kukambani yemhando dzemoto yeZESA. Mumwe komishina weZACC, VaGoodson Nguni, nezuro usiku vakaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMaziwisa vakasungwa pamwechete nemumwe wavo mukambani yavo yekushambadzana, yeFruitful Communications, uye ari mushandi weZBC, Oscar Pambuka. VaNguni vakati vaviri ava varara kukamba yemapurisa yeAvondale Police Station, uye VaNguni vakati vaviri ava vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare. Vaviri ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukama kambani yemhando dzemoto iyi zviuru zvemadhora kuburikidza nemari dzinonzi dzaibhadharwa kukambani yavo neZESA zvine huwori mukati. Nhengo yesangano reZimbabwe Citizens Initiative, VaPromise Sande vanoti vanotambira nerufaro danho riri kutorwa neZACC iri, kunyange hazvo vari kuti panofanirwa kunge pachisungwa munhu wese, kusanganisira vari muhurumende, kwete kungosunga vanofungidzirwa kuti ndeve kuchikwata cheG40 chete. Vaive gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaSamuel Undenge vakatosungwa vakamiswa pamberi pedare nenyaya dzine chekuita nehuwori hunonzi hwaiitika muZESA. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inotara Coronavirus seDambudziko Guru Rakatarisana neNyika
text: Hurumende yatara chirwere cheCoronavirus sedambudziko guru rabata nyika yose, kana kuti National Disaster, uye ndokukanzura zvirongwa zvakawanda zvinosangana vanhu vakawanda senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau kuState House, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati vaona zvakakodzera kutora matanho aya nekuti nyika inogona kuwirwa nedambudziko reCoronavirus sezvo ratove munyika dzakavakidzana nayo dzakaita seSouth Africa. Vati kutara Coronavirus sedambudziko renyika yese kunoita kuti nyika ikwanise kuunganidza mari, nezvimwe zvinodiwa kurwisana nechirwere ichi. Vati hurongwa uhwu huchange huchitungamirrwa nebazi rezvehutano. VaMnangagwa vati zvipatara zvese munyika zvave kutarisirwa kugara zvakagadzirira kuongorora pamwe nekurapa chirwere ichi. Vatiwo hurumende iri kugadzira nzvimbo dzakawanda dzekuchengetera vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane hutachiwana hweCoronavirus. VaMnangagwa vati vese vari kuronga kuenda kunyika dzine chirwere ichi vanofanira kumbomira nzendo dzavo kudzamara zvinhu zvadzikama. Vatiwo hurumende yambomisa zvirongwa zvinounganidza vanhu vakawanda zvakaita seZimbabwe International Trade Fair nemhemberero dzekucherechedza zuva rekuwana kuzvitonga idzo dzange dzichifanirwa kuitwa mwedzi unouya. Zimbabwe yakanzurawo mitambo pamwe nekukurudzira kusaungana kwevanhu pamichato pamwe nedzisvondo kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. VaMnangagwa vati hurumende ichazoongorora danho iri mukati memazuva makumi matanhatu ari kutevera. Panyaya yezvikoro, VaMnangagwa vati sezvo pasina kana mumwe chete abatwa nechirwere ichi, zvikoro zvicharamba zvakavhurwa sezvo zvave pedyo nekuvhara asi vakati hurumende ichaongorora danho iri kana pane zvinenge zvaitika. Vatiwo mahofisi ese ehurumende anofanira kuchitanga kuongorora kuti vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane hutachiwana hweCoronavirus. Vati kunyange vatora matanho aya nzvimbo dzese dzekupinda nadzo munyika dzicharamba dzakavhurwa asi vakati vachasimbaradza nzira dzekuongorora vanhu vanobva kune dzimwe nyika zvikuru sei kunyika dzine hutachiwana uhwu. Vati vanhu vanofanira kuchinja maitiro nekuregedza kuita zvimwe zvinhu senzira yekuzvidzivirira kubva kuCoronavirus. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo pasina ati abatwa nechirwere ichi, chave kutokanganisa nyaya dzehupfumi munyika zvekuti nyika inogona kutadza kubata zviga zvayo zveVision 2030. Chirwere cheCoronavirus chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvinomwe nekubata vanodarika zana nemakumi masere ezviuru pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari veBuhera South Voranga Kuramba Kubhadhara Mitero kuKanzuru Yavo
text: Vagari pamwe nevemabhizimusi vekuBirchenough Bridge kudunhu reBuhera South, kuManicaland, vari kunyunyuta nekushaya budiriro kwenzvimbo yavo kunyange hazvo vachiti vari kubhadhara mari dzemitero kukanzuru yavo. Vagari ava vanoti vava nechisungo chekuti vasabvisa mari dzemitero kudzamara vagutsikana nezvavari kuitirwa nekanzuru. Vagari ava vanoti kubva pakatarwa kuti Birchenough Bridge yave imwe dzenzvimbo dzichange dziri kuzosimudzirwa kuitwa madhorobha maduku makore anoda kupfuura makumi maviri adarika, hapana chinobatika pabudiriro chakaitwa nekanzuru. Venharaunda iyi vanoti Birchenough Bridge pamwechete neMurambinda Growth Point zvakatangirana pamwechete pakupiwa chidanho chekuti zvive mizinda yebudiriro kumaruwa asi Birchenough Growth Point yakasarira kwazvo. Amai Mercy Saize Mtsveta mumiriri wavana muzvinabhizinesi paBirchenough Growth Point. Amai Mtsveta vanoti kunyangwe vachiziva kuti nzvimbo yavo yakatangwa kudomwa kuti ichange ichizova ichisimukira, hapana chiri kufamba asi uku ivo vachibvisa mari kukanzuru yavo yeBuhera Rural District Council. “Kuno kuBirchenough, kuBuhera South takasungwa neCouncil nendaa yeGrowth Point ino zvichinzi tinoda maDevelopment Levy but maDevelopment Levy acho anoshandi chinyi asi imo muno muri mudondo? Vanotora mari dzedu muno vachinodzishandisa kwaMurambinda, izvozvi Murambinda yava taundi, but Murambinda isecond pamaGrowth points emuno muBuhera, Birchenough ndiyo growth point yekutanga. Nyangwe mukanozvitarisa pakubvisa mari dzemarates isusu kuno veBirchenough tiri number one pakubvisa uye nemitero yacho yemashops, but hapana kana chimwechete chatakaitirwa chinotaridza kuti mari dzedu pane chedzinoshanda.” Muzvinabhizinesi ava vanoti nekuda kwenyunyuto dzevagari, varovera mwoyo kudombo kuti vave kumbomira kubvisa mari dzemitero kukanzuru yavo. Amai ava vanoti paifanirwa kunge paine musika wemabhazi hapana kana nechimbuzi chekuti vanhu vazvibatsire, asi kanzuru iri kungovabvisisa mari kwemakore nemakore. VaFrancis Magaa ndivo sachigaro vevagari vekuBirchenough Bridge Growth point. VaMagaa vanoti vanogarochema nekanzuru yavo pamusoro pekusarira kuri kuita nharaunda yavo mune zvebudiriro. “Zviri kutitambudza ndaa yekuti growth point yedu iyi zvatinobhadhara zvinoenda kunotorwa zvoenda kwaMurambinda, Murambinda waakutokura isusu kuno takafa asi apo panga pagadzirwa zvakanaka asi patofazve. Handizivi kuti Murambinda chii achitora zvinhu zvedu kuendesa ikoko; kuti ndiko kune mahofisi edistrict here hameno? Isusu tinoda kuti panapa pakure pasimukirewo growth point yedu isumukire, pano pachigara pakafa! Hatichazivi kuti tochemera kupi,” vadaro VaMagaa. VaMagaa vanoti musika wange wovakwa nekanzuru yavo wakaregwa makore gumi apfuura pasina chikonzero chakapihwa asi vagari nevemabhizinesi vachibvisa mari mwedzi wega wega. Vanoti mugwagwa unobva paBirchenough wakananga kwaMurambinda haugadziriswe nenguva izvo zvinoita kuti usafambike; uye chikoro chekanzuru cheBirchenough Bridge Primary hachina makamuri ekudzidzira akakwana. Vemabhizinesi vanotarisirwa kubvisa madhora zana nemakumi maviri pagore, vane misha muGrowth Point vachibvisawo madhora makumi matanhatu. VaZodai Chamutsa mumwe mugari wekuBirchenough. VaChamutsa vanochema nerekuti nzvimbo yavo haina migwagwa yetara zvichienzaniswa neyave kwaMurambinda, uye hakuna magetsi emumigwagwa kanawo ma tower lights, anoita kuti vakwanise kufamba usiku, uye kuderedza njodzi dzekubatwa kwiyo kana kubhinywa. Kanzuru iyi iri kuyambira zvakare vane masitendi munzvimbo iyi ayo vasiri kusimudzira kana kuvaka kuti vachazoatorerwa achitengeserwa vamwe vari kuda zvavo kuvaka nenguva. Studio7 hainda kukwanisa kutaura naMudzviti weBuhera VaChris Mavhisa sezvo vanzi vange vari mumusangano. No media source currently available

headline: Dzimwe Nhengo dzeParamende Dzinoti Hurumende Ngaibude Pachena paRubatsiro rweCovid-19
text: Apo huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nehutachiwana weCoronavirus huri kuramba huchikwira munyika, dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende muHarare dzinoti dzinodawo kuva nechekuita nehurongwa hwehurumende hwekudzivirira chirwere ichi pamwe nekuona kuti rubatsiro rwuri kupihwa nyika pamusoro peCoronavirus rwuri kufambiswa sei. Nhengo dzeparamende nemakanzura emuHarare dzinoti dzinofanira kuva nechekuita nemabasa ehurumende ekudzivirira chirwere cheCoronavirus. Mumiriri weGlen Norah muNational Assembly, VaWellingotn Chikombo, vati izvi zvakakosha nekuti vanongonzwa kuti pane zviri kuitwa nehurumende, asi kunzvimbo dzavanomirira kusina chiri kuitika. Asi VaChikombo vati kunyange hazvo paramande yakavharwa, inofanirwa kuvhura sezvakaita paramende yekuAmerica kuitira kuti izeye nyaya dzakakosha dzinobata Covid-19. Mumiriri weWarren Park, VaShakespear Hamauswa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti muhurongwwa hwayo hurumende ishande nenhengo dzeparamende mukudzivirira Coronavirus. Vatiwo vanongonzwa kuti hurumende iri kuwana zvinhu zvekushandisa kudzviririra Coronavirus asi havasi kuona zvinhu izvi munzvimbo yavanomirira. VaHamauswa vatiwo kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti zvikoro zvepamusoro zviri kugadzira mamasiki nemasanitaiza, zvinhu izvi hazvisati zvave kuwanikwa mumisha inogara vazhinji uye zvakakosha kuti hurumende ishande nemadzimai ane makirabhu ekokusona mumisha iyi pakugadzira zvinhu izvi. Kanzura weWard 16 muHarare, VaDenford Ngadziore, vaudza Studio7 kuti havasati vatanga kuwana maSanitiser and maMask vachiti vari kuwana zvinhu izvi kubva kumasangano anoshanda kazvimirira, asi zvishoma. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubazi rezvehutano kana kugurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reHarare, VaOliver Chidhau, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira mbozhanhare yavo. Asi mumashoko avo, sachigaro weTaskforce inoona nezvechirwere cheCoronavirus, zvakare vari mumwe wevatevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, vazivisa kuti nyika ichawedzera huwandu hwevanhu vari kuongororwa zvichiteverwa kuvhurwa kweimwe nzvimbo inoita ongororo yechirwere cheCoronavirus kuBulawayo. Vatiwo pane dzimwe nzvimbo dzekuongorora chirwere ichi dzichavhurwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera. Asi VaMohadi vati Taskforce yavo yakaita misangano mumatunhu ese munyika ichinzwa pfungwa kubva kunhengo dzeparamende pamwe nevakuru vakuru mumatunhu aya uye ichashandisa zvakabuda mumisangano iyi kusimbaradza chirongwa chayo chekudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vabatwa neCoronavirus Vosvika Mazana Matatu neMakumi Masere neManomwe
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus munyika yose hwasvika pamazana matatu nemakumi masere nemanomwe kana kuti 387. Vanhu vafa vachiri vana uye vapora vave makumi mashanu nevana kana kuti 54. Vanhu vavhenekwa kusvika parizvino vadarika zviuru zvishanu nemakumi mapfumbabwe kana kuti 59, 000. Vanhu vakawanda vobatwa nechirwere ichi vari kubva kuSouth Africa. Vanhu vose vari kubva kune dzimwe nyika vari kumbonzi vagare vakachengetedzwa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe kuti vasatapurirwa vamwe chirwere kana vainacho. Asi vamwe vanhu vave kutiza kunzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanhu vachiti hadzina kushambidzika. Izvi zvapa kuti vamwe vakaita sekambani yePerch Media vari kufamba vachidzidzisa vanhu vapindewo mumaruva vachikurudzira vanhu kuti vamhan’arire vanhu vanenge vatiza ava. Mukuzeya nyaya iyi, Blessing Zulu weStudio 7 abata mukuru wePerch Media VaCollen Magobeya. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemaviri kana kuti 242,000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muafrica. Vashaya vadarika zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana maviri nemakumi mana nemana kana kuti 6,244. Vapora vanodarika zviuru zana nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 109,000 Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru zvipfumbamwe kana kuti kuti 7,9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zviuru mazana mana nemakumi matatu nemana kana kuti 434, 000.  Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zvinomwe kana kuti 3, 7 million.

headline: Mitambo yePSL yamiswa
text: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League razivisa kuti mitambo yose yePSL ye”match day two” iyo yange ichitambwa svondo rino yambomiswa zvichitevera kusauya kwaita varidzi vepembe kuzoridza mune mimwe mitambo yange ichifanirwa kutambwa nhasi.   Pachinyorwa chabva kuPSL, chamangwiza wePSL, Kennedy Ndebele, anoti kusabatika kwaita varidzi vepembe mumitambo yanhasi kwavatuma kumisa mitambo yose ye”match day two” nechinangwa chekuedza kuita tsvakurudzo kuti zvafamba sei.   “Tinoziva kumiswa kwemitambo yose yematch day two izvo zvakonzerwa nekusauya kubasa kwaita varidzi vepembe kumitambo yakasiyana.   “Asi kune vamwe vaenda kunhandare vachida kunoridza asi havana kuzokwanisa kuenderera mberi sezvo vamwe vazongoregedza mitambo yave kuda kutanga.   “Tamboedza kuita hurukuro neZIFA Referees Committee kuti tinzwisise kuti zviri kufamba sei, asi hapana chabuda.   “Tinovimba kuti zvichagadzirika nekukasika,” anodaro Ndebele.   Kusabatika kwevaridzi vepembe kumitambo yanhasi vamwe vanoti zvakonzerwa nekumbomiswa kwaita basa bhodhi reZIFA nhasi neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC).

headline: Amai Holland naVaNcube Vofanobata Matomu mu United MDC
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVa Welshman Ncube yabatana neChitatu zviri pamutemo neMDC Renewal Team mukuumbwa kwebato idzva riri kudaidzwa kuti United MDC. Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvakapandukira MDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai mushure mekutadza kuwirirana mune zvakawanda. Vachitaura pakusainwa kwaitwa gwaro rekubatana kwemapato aya, Amai Sekai Holland, avo vanga vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato mu MDC Renewal Team, vati vaona zvakakodzera kuti mapato avo abatane senzira yekuedza kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nezvizvarwa zve Zimbabwe. Amai Holland ndivo mumwe wevatungamiri achafanobata matomu mu United MDC. Vanga vachitungamirawo chimwe chipoka che MDC, Va Welshman Ncube, ndivo vacgange vakabatawo matomu pamwe naAmai Holland. VaNcube vanoti vaona zvakakodzera kuti vabatane ne MDC Renewal Team kuitira kuti vadzokere mugwara rekuzadzisa zvavakawirirana nevamwe pakavambwa bato re MDC muna 1999. Va Ncube vakabuda mu MDC isati yatsemuka muna 2005 zvichitevera kusawirirana naVa Tsvangirai panyaya yekukwikwidza musarudzo itsva dzedare reseneti. Ukuwo vaimbove munyori mukuru weMDC-T, Va Tendai Biti, nevamwe vavo vakadzingwa mubato iri, vakaumba chikwata chinozviti MDC Renewal Team muna Kubvumbi vachiti pave kuda hutungamiri hutsva hune pfungwa itsva. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, Va Sidney Masamvu, vanoti mapato ese ari munyika anopikisa Zanu PF anofanira kushanda pamwe chete kuitira kuti awedzere mukana wawo wekukunda musarudzo dzakatarisirwa muna 2018 pakatariswa nyaya dzekusawirirana kuri mu Zanu PF pari zvino. Pakubatana kwaita MDC inotungamirwa naVa Ncube ne Renewal Team kwaitwa pane vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira pamwe nevamiriri vedzimwe nyika. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti hadzisi kushamiswa nekubatana kwaitika nhasi nokuti vamwe vevanhu vazhinji kudivi reMDC Renewal Team vakambosiya VaTsvangirai pakapatsanuka bato iri muna Gumiguru 2005 vakaenda naVaNcube. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti vanhu ava vakazodzoka kuna VaTsvangirai vachiti vakanga vabatana naVaNcube vasingazive tsoro yaivepo yainge yakarongwa. No media source currently available

headline: World Cup: Makochi 7 varova pasi
text: VARAIRIDZI venhabvu vanomwe venyika dzakabuda mumakwikwi eFIFA Qatar 2022 World Cup vakatosiya basa zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaitwa zvikwata zvavo.   Apo mitambo yeWorld Cup yegore rino yasvika pamasemi-final iyo ichaona zvikwata zvinoti Argentina ichisangana neCroatia uye France ichitamba neMorocco, varairidzi vanomwe vaive kumutambo uyu vakatosiya basa nezvikonzero zvakasiyana zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaita zvikwata zvavo kuQatar.   Murairidzi weMexico – Gerardo “Tata” Martino – ndiye akaita wekutanga “kurova pasi” pakaburitswa chikwata chake icho chakatadza kubuda muboka racho muGroup C umo maive nezvikwata zvinoti Argentina, Poland neSaudi Arabia.   Argentina bedzi ndiyo yasara muGroup C.   Martino akateverwa naRoberto Martinez uyo airairidza Belgium akasiyawo basa kuchikwata chemaRed Devils apo chakatadza kubuda muboka racho reGroup F umo maive nezvikwata zvinoti Morocco, Croatia neCanada.   Morocco neCroatia dzichirimo kubva muGroup F.    Roberto Martinez   Belgium ichienda kumutambo weWorld Cup, chikwata ichi pasi rose chaive chakagara pachidanho chechipiri panyika dzinotamba nhabvu, asi kuWorld Cup yakangokwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwe, ikakundwa mumwe 2-0 neMorocco ndokuzoita mangange 0-0 neCroatia izvo zvakaona ichidzokera kumusha. Pakapera mutambo weCroatia, Martinez akazivisa kuti haasi kuzoenderera mberi ari murairidzi wenyika iyi.   Aive murairidzi weGhana – Otto Addo – akaita murairidzi wechitatu kusiya basa rake zvichitevera kutadza kubudirira kwakaita maBlack Stars kubuda muboka ravo muGroup H.    Otto Addo   Ado akataura kuti ari kusiya basa iri kuti adzokere kuGermany kunoshanda basa rake iro ange achiita kuchikwata cheBorussia Dortmund sa“talent coach”.   Ado akataura achiti aive ane chitsidzo chekuti World Cup painopera aizosiya basa rekurairidza Ghana kunyangwe ikasimudza mukombe uyu.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaita Korea Republic muRound of 16 neBrazil mumutambo uyo yakakundwa 4-1, murairidzi weKorea Republic, Paulo Bento akabva akandawo mapfumo pasi.    Paulo Bento   Paulo Bento achisiya basa, Luis Enrique akabva amutevera uyo akadzingwa neSpain zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaita La Roja neMorocco.   La Roja yakaburitswa nemaAtlas Lions mumapena sezvo mutambo wezvikwata zviviri wainge wapera uri mangange 0-0.   Enrique akabva atsiviwa naLuis de la Fuente uyo ange achirairidza chikwata cheSpain Under-21.    Luis Enique   Enrique achingodzingwa, akabva ateverwa naTite weBrazil uyo akasiya basa maawa maviri chikwata chake chaburitswa muquarter-final yemutambo weWorld Cup neCroatia.   Chikwata chemaSamba Boys chaitarisirwa zvakawanda kuQatar sezvo change chizere nevatambi vane mukurumbira, asi chakadzorerwa kumusha neCroatia izvo zvakatuma Tite kusiya basa.    Tite   Murairidzi wechinomwe kusiya basa ndiLouis van Gaal uyo ange achiraidza Netherlands.    Louis van Gaal   Van Gaal akasiya mushure mekunge chikwata chake chaburitswa muquarter-final neArgentina uye akabva atotsiviwa naRonald Koeman uyo akamborairidza chikwata ichi kare.

headline: Varairidzi Vanoti Vanoda Kutambiriswa Madhora ekuAmerica
text:
Varairidzi vakawanda vanoti mari yavapihwa nhasi nehurumende yekuti vayamurike ishoma zvikuru vachiti chavari kuda imari yavaitambira iri yemadhora ekuAmerica. Mumwe mudzidzisi wekwaChiendambuya kwaRusape, VaFambayi Fambayi, vati mari iyi ishoma zvikuru sezvo pasina zvainokwanisa kutenga.

Sachigaro werimwe sangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vati kunyange mari iyi ikabatanidzwa nemari dzemihoro yavo haidarike madhora zviuru zvishanu zvinodiwa kuti mhuri yevanhu vashanu vararame pamwedzi.

Munyori mukuru weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaRaymond Majongwe, vati wochiri kunetsa ndechekuti mari iyi haina kubuda munhaurirano uye ishoma zvekuti hairaramise vadzidzisi vari
kukwangwaya nenhamo. Mukuru weZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaSifiso Ndlovu, vati mari yawedzerwa yakafanana nemutero wembwa. Vati vadzidzisi vanofanirwa kuwedzerwa mari kuti idarike madhora zviuru gumi nezvishanu kuti vararame sevanhu.

Hurumende inoti yafanopa vadzidzisi mari iyi kuti vafanobatsirikana apo vanenge vachiita nhaurirano munyaya dzemari yemihoro. Mune imwewo nyaya, vadzidzi vakawanda vapfekedzwa nguwani dzedzidzo vari kumba kana kuti virtual nekuda kwekutyirwa kuti vakaungana pachikoro cheChinhoyi University of Technology sezvavanogaroita makore ese, vano paradzira chirwere cheCovid-19. Mumwe aswera akapfeka nhumbi dzedzidzo nhasi ari kumba ndiMuzvare Vimbainashe Chitauro avo vati vaishuwira kupemberera zuva ranhasi vari kuchikoro nevamwe. Muzvare Chitauro vati vatadza kuona zvanga zvichiitwa kuchikoro sezvo vanga vasina mabhanduru ekuvhura madandemutande.  Asi mumwe wevakanzi vange vari pachikoro nhasi nekuti vakaita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro, VaIgnatius Sakala, vati mufaro wavo mushoma sezvo vamwe vavakadzidza navo vatadza kunge vari pachikoro. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vapfekedza vadzidzi vakapedza zvidzidzo zvavo vanosvika zviuru zviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, asi vazvinji vavo vanga vari kudzimba dzavo vachiona zvanga nzvichiitika padandemutande. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Votarisirwa Kusangana neVamiriri veHurumende Kuzeya Gakava reMihoro
text: Vamiriri vevashandi vehurumende vari pasi pesangano reApex Council vari kutarisirwa kusangana zvakare mangwanani ano nevamiriri vehurumende pamusangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council, uyo unotarisirwa kugadzirisa gakava renyaya dzemihoro. Mapoka maviri aya akasangana zvakare svondo rapera neChishanu, asi musangano uyu unonzi hauna chawakaburitsa mushure mekunge vashandi varamba kutambira zvakanga zvaiswa patafura nehurumende, izvo zvinonzi zvaizosiya mushandi anotambira muhoro wepasi achitambira mihoro iri pakati pemadhora zviuru zviviri nemazana maviri nezviuru zvitatu nemazana mashanu zvemadhora emunyika pamwedzi. Munyori mukuru musangano reApex Council VaDavid Dzatsunga vanoti vanotarisira kuti musangano weMuvhuro uyu uchagadzirisa zvichemo pamwe nekutambura kwevashandi vehurumende. VaDzatsunga, avo vasina kuda kubuda pachena kuti hurumende yakanga yakapfumateyi pavakasangana svondo rapera, vanoti hurumende yakanga yadzoka yakwidza zvishoma zvayaive nazvo kubva pamusangano wavakanga vamboita asi vakada kutanga vambonzwa kubva kunhengo dzavo vasati vaita zvemusoro wavo. Chimwe chinonzi chakatadza kuwiriranwa yaive nyaya yekuti mari idzi dzotambiriswa vashandi kubva mwedzi upi sezvo hurumende ichinzi yaida kuti itange kupa vashandi vayo mihoro mitsva iyi muna Kukadzai, asi vashandi vachida kuti vatange kutambiriswa mari idzi mwedzi uno waNdira. Pari zvino vashandi vehurumende havasi kuenda kumabasa mazuva ose, vachiti havachakwanisa kuti vange vachiwana mari dzekufambisa. Mwedzi wapera hurumende yakavapa mari dzekubatsirikana dzaisvika kumadhora mazana manomwe, asi VaDzatsunga vanoti hadzina zvikuru zvadzakavabatsira nazvo sezvo vashandi vagara vanyura mumadhaka nekuda kwenhamo. Vashandi vehurumende vagara gore negore vachinetsana nemushandirwi kuti vawedzerwe mihoro inoita kuti vakwanise kurarama, ukuwo hurumende ichiti homwe dzayo dzakabooka. No media source currently available

headline: Vaimbove Mutungamiri weHurumende yeJapan, VaShinzo Abe, Vanourayiwa
text: Vaimbove mutungamiri wehurumende yeJapan, VaShinzo Abe, vapfurwa ndokufa apo vanga vachitaura pamusangano wekutsvagira bato ravo rutsigiro kumawirira kweJapan. VaAbe, avo vanga vave nemakore makumi matanhatu nemanomwe ekuberekwa, vashaya vari mune chimwe chipatara muNara, umo vanga vachirapwa vari zvichitevera kupfurwa kwavaitwa nepfuti inenge yakagadzirwa kumba. Vanga vachitaura vari panokwirirwa zvitima muguta reNara, kumabvazuva kweOsaka, apo vasvikira nekugotsi kwavo nemurume anga aine pfuti uyo avapfura. Mavhidhiyo ari kutenderera pamadandemutande anoratidza kuti vanga vachiona zvanga zvichiitika vamboedza kuvabatsira. VaAbe vakapinda muhofisi muna 2006 vakatonga kwegore vachizodzoka zvakare muna 2012 kusvika muna 2020 apo vakazosiya chigaro nekuda kwehutano hwavo.

headline: Bazi rezveHutano Rinoti neSvondo Hakuna Akafa neCovid-19 Uye Vatanhatu Chete Ndivo Vakabatwa neChirwere Ichi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vatanhatu chete ndivo vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose pavanhu vanodarika mazana matanhatu nevaviri kana 602 vavhenekwa uye hapana kana mumwe chete akafa. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 ava vose havana nhoroondo yekumboshanya kunze kwenyika. Izvi zvave kureva kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pazviuri zvitanhatu zvine mazana mana negumi nevaviri kana kuti 6,412. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika huchiri pazana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 196. Vanhu vapora vanosvika zviuru zvishanu zvine makumi matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 5, 061 zvichitevera kupora kwevanhu vashanu kuMashonaland East. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano nehama dzevafi dzinoti vamwe vanhu vari kufa vangadai vasiri kufa dai vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vasiri kuramwa mabasa. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga vari kukurudzira vashandi ava kuti vadzokere kumabasa zvichemo zvavo zvichizeyiwa asi zvinenge zvakona n’anga murapwa achida. Sachigaro weHealth Services Board Dr Paulinus Sikosana vatendawo kuStudio 7 kuti hapana chati chafamba muhurongwa hwekuti vashandi mubazi rezvehutano vadzoke kumabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti havasi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika zvichemo zvavo zvagadziriswa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 1, 2 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vafa vasvika zviuru zviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemazana mana nemakumi matatu kana kuti 29, 430. Vapora vave kuda kusvika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe zvine makumi matanhau nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 969, 000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti 25 million.  Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana ne makumi masere nemaviri kana kuti 182,000. Vafa pasi rose vachidarika zviuru mazana masere zvine makumi mana nematatu kana kuti 843, 000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu nezviuru mazana mana kana kuti 16, 4 million.

headline: ZACC Yovimbisa Kuvhura Mamwe Mahofisi Matatu Kuitira Kurerutsa Mabasa Ayo
text: Komisheni inorwisana nehuwori munyika, yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, inoti iri kutarisira kunge yave nemahofisi anoshanda mumatunhu matanhatu emunyika mukupera kwegore rino senzira yekuedza kurerutsa mashandiro ayo. Mashoko aya, ayo ataurwa nemumwe wemakomishina uye vari mutauriri weZACC, VaJohn Makamure, anotevera nyunyuto yabuda muvanhu vanga vari pamusangano waitwa maMutare wekuzeya mashandiro akanaka ekomisheni iyi, kana kuti Draft National Anti-Corruption Strategy. VaTakashinga Mashayahanya mumwe wevagari vemaMutare vange vari pamusangano uyu. VaMashayahanya vanoti sangano reZACC rinosungirwa kuwanzira mimwe yemisangano yaro kumaruwa kune vanhu vakawanda uye nekune mamwe maguta, kwete kungorambira vari kuguta guru reHarare. "Tinoziva kuti ZACC iri kuedza kuita basa rakanaka asi inofanirwa kuonekwa kuti yambosungawo vamwe vanhu vachipika here kwete kungoti kune ZACC pasina asungwa. Tinoda kuti ZACC iwonekwe kwese kumisha, kumaruwa ichiita basa kuti vanambuya nevana vechikoro vazive nezvebasa rayo, kwete kuwandira mumaguta makuru chete." Mumwe wevanga vari pamusangano, VaFarai Matebvu vanoti ZACC iri kuita basa rayo zvakanaka, asi kuti vanovimba kuti kumhan’arwa nekuferefetwa kwedzimhosva kuitwe kwaaawanda, kwete mumaguta makuru chete. "Kumaruwa kunosungirwa kunge kuchisvikwawo nekuti kune nyaya dzehuwori dziri kuitwa ikoko vanhu vasingazivi kwekuenda, saka misangano yekuzivisa vagari zvekuita panenge paitwa huwori ikodzero yemunhu wose kuti ange aine zivo. Misangano yavo veZACC ngaiparadzirwe kwakawanda munyika yose." Asi VaMakamure vanoti itarisiro yavo kuti panopera gore rino ZACC inge yave nemamwe mahofisi mumatunhu anoti Mutare, Masvingo uye Marondera kuwedzera pane mamwe ari MUHarare, Bulawayo nekuGweru. "Tinofanirwa kunge tavhura ma-offices edu kumaprovinces ose emuZimbabwe, gore rino tinovhura anokwanisa kuita six, asi izvezvi tine three aripo, Harare, Gweru neBulawayo, saka ZACC inenge yave mamwe maregions six muZimbabwe kuti vanhu vakwanise kuzouya kurepota nyaya dzehuwolri, kana corruption nekunzwa mamwe maprogram edu atinoita ane chekuita necorruption," VaMakamure vanodaro. VaMakamure vanoti chimwe chechiri kunonotsa kuvepo kwemahofisi aya ndechekushaikwa kwemari yakakwana uye zvishandisiro zvinosanganisira vashandi vakadzidzira mabasa sezvo vachida kubhadharwa zvakaringana nemabasa avo. "Chatinoda kuti tiite ndechekuti mahofisi atiri kuzovhura aya munofanirwa kunge muine nayanzvi ma-officers arimo achikwanisa kupindura nekugadzirisa zvichemo zvekotapusheni; tinenge tichida kuti chinangwa chekuvhura mahofisi aya chinge chichozadzikiswa, by 2021 tinofanirwa kunge tatove kuna-districts akawanda emunyika kujti tipedze huwori." VaMakamure vanoti komisheni yavo iri kugadzirawo zviverengwa zvevanhu vasingaone zveBraille nevamwe vanoshandisa mutauro wemaoko, kana kuti sign language. Musangano wanhasi wapindwa nevemapoka ehurumende akasiyanasiyana uye vemapoka anoshanda akazvimirira akaita seTransparency International Zimbabwe nemamwe. No media source currently available

headline: FC Platinum Yotatsurana neEsperance muCaf Champions League
text: Vatsigiri venhabvu munyika vane mukana wekuona chikwata chine mukurumbira muAfrica uye chine mukombe weCAF Champions league cheEsperance icho chiri kutamba neFC Platinum mangwana kuBarbourfields Stadium kuBulawayo. Esperance yakasimudzamukombe weCAF Champions katatu uku FC Platinum yakapinda mumini League kekutanga iri kutatarika zvakasimba ichikwanisa kungoita mapoinzi maviri chete pamitambo mishanu zvichireva kuti ndiyo iri pasi muGroup B. Esperance ndiyo iri pamusoro mugungano iine mapoinzi gumi nerimwe. FC Platinum yakatobuda mumakwikwi aya kare zvekuti changosara kungobudawo nechiremera nekukunda chikwata chine mukurumbira ichi. Pamusoro pemikombe mitatu yeCaf Champions League, Esperance yakambotora zvekare mukombe weAfrica Super Cup pamwe neweCaf Confederation Cup. Payakapedzisira kutamba mumakundano aya kuSouth Africa, FC Platinum yakaita rombo rakaipa apo yakakandwa chibodzwa, mutambo wave kupera vakatungamira 2-1, mutambo uyu ndokupera uri mangange Mumwe muteveri wechikwata ichi Muzvare Olivia Mushipe vanoti FC Platinum ikatamba sezvayakaita neOrlando Pirates kuOrlando Stadium masvondo maviri apfuura inokwanisa kudonhedza gomo guru remuAfrica iri. Imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association VaObert Masvotore vanoti FC Platinum haifanire kuvhundutsirwa nemazita nekuti zvikwata zvakaita seEsperance zvinoroveka. Mumwe muteveri wechikwata ichi vaMaxwell Mufandaedza vanoti vachitarisa matambiro avakaita kuTunisia, negadziriro yavaita ikozvino, varikuona chikwata chavo chichikunda, vachitiurira zvibodzwa. Asi FC Platinum inennge isina vatambi vatatu mumutambo uyu nekuda kwemacards avakapihwa, vatatu ava vanoti Gift Bello, Elvis Moyo naKelvin Madzongwe. Pavakatambira kuTunis, FC Platinum yakarohwa 2-0 mumutambo uyo vakatambisa mikana yakawandisa. UEFA Champions Mune mamwe makwikwi ange akatarisirwa nevakawanda eUEFA Champions league, draw yemaquater finals yemutambo uyu yakamira yakadai Ajax vs Juventus Liverpool vs Porto Tottenham vs Manchester City Manchester United vs Barcelona No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reMagamba VaMugabe Vachishora Vanopikisa
text: Zimbabwe yakacherechedza zuva remagamba nemusi weMuvhuro mutungamiriri wenyika,VaRobert Mugabe vachishora zvakaitwa nemasoja zvekurova mapurisa nguva pfupi yapfuura vachiti izvi zvinokanganisa mabasa ekuchengetedza nyika. Vachitaura pamarinda eHeroes Acre, VaMugabe vakati vakataura nevakuru-vakuru vemasoja vakavaudza kuti izvi hazvifaniri kuitika zvakare. VaMugabe vatiwo vanoda runyararo sezvo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dzegore rinouya. Mukuru webato re Multi Racial Christian Democracts, VaMathias Guchutu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mashoko aVaMugabe akanaka chose sezvo nyika ichifanira kuva nerunyararo. VaMugabe vakashorawo vamwe varimi vechitema avo vati vave kushanda nevamwe varimi vechichena avo vakambenge vatiza munyika. Mutungamiri wenyika akashorawo vamwe vanhu vemuZimbabwe avo vati vanotsigira zvirango zvehupfumi zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzakaita seBritain. Vakaenderera mberi vachitiwo hazvigoni kuti nhengo dzebato rinopikisa dziradzikwe panzvimbo inovigwa magamba yeHeroes Acre. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaJonstone Chirwai vaudza Studio 7 kuti zuva remagamba rakakosha chose uye vanhu vemuZimbabwe vano remekedza magamba kunyange hazvo vasiri kufara nemaitiro emamwe magamba akaita semutungamiriri wenyika VaMugabe. Vatiwo zuva remagamba izuva ravanonyanyorangarira magamba aya asina kudzoka kubva huhondo. Mukuru webato rinopikisa reFreezim Congress, VaJoseph Busha vati zuva remagamba rakakosha chose uye magamba ose anofanira kuchengetedzwa nehurumende. Mumashoko avo pazuva remagamba, mutungamiriri webato guru rinopikisa reMovement for Democractic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vati zuva riri rakakosha chose uyewo zvinofadza kuti vakarwa muhondo yerusununguko vave kuonawo kuti vakarwira munhu mumwe chete nemhuri yake. Vakaendera mberi vachiti magamba akarwisa hurumende yehudzvanyiriri yeRhodesia asi hapana kana mutsauko uripo pakati payo nehurumende yaVaMugabe. VaTsvangirai vati vanhu vese vanofanira kunyoresa kuti vavhote musarudzo dzegore rinouya kuitira kuti vachengetedze rusununguko rwavo. Vatiwo vechidiki havafanire kubatwa kumeso naVaMugabe pamisangano yavari kuita mumatunhu akasiyana siyana, vachiti vechidiki ava vanofanira kuziva kuti remangwana renyika riri mumaoko mavo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoshanyira Glen View Yanetseka neKorera
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vashanyira musha weGlen View uko kwapararira chirwere chekorera panguya iyo hurumende ichiti iri kuda mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora achashandiswa mukurwisa nechirwere ichi. VaMnangagwa vatambirwa nemufaro mukuru nevatsigiri veZanu PF vanga vaungana pachipatara pamwe nevana vechikoro vanga vachibva kuchikoro pavaenda kunoona vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere chekorera mumusha unogara veruzhinji muGlen View. Vachitaura pazvitoro zveTichagarika zviri mumusha weGlen View mushure mekushanyira chipatara cheGlen View Polyclinic uko kuri kurapwa vanhu vakati kuti vari kurwara nechirwere chekorera, VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yavo ichabatsira kanzuru yeHarare mukutakurwa kwemarara, kugadzirwa kwepombi dzinotakura tsvina pamwe nekuwanisa vagari mvura yakachena kuitira kuti chirwere chekorera chipere muHarare uye chisarambe chichipararira kune dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kunze kweHarare. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo kuti veruzhinji vagare vakashambidzika pose pavari kuti vasatapurirane chirwere ichi. Meya weguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, avo vanga varipowo pashanywa naVaMnangagwa, vati sekanzuru vari kuedza pose pavanogona napo kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira. VaGomba vati pane zvibhorani zviviri zvavatovhrara zviri muGlen View zvange zvave kukonzera kupararira kwechirwere chekorera. Mugari wekuGlen View, Amai Mascelyn Chibweya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara zvikuru kuti kanzuru iri kugadzira pombi idzo dzanga dzave kusanganisa mvura yekunwa pamwe netsvina kana kuti masuweji. Mumwe mugari wemuGlen View, VaJoe Kadzviti, vati zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvingadai zvakafa dai pasina kumhanyidzana kuri kuitwa nevemasangano akazvimirira, vemabhizimusi, kanzuru pamwe nehurumende mukurwisana nechirwere ichi icho chapfunya chisero muHarare. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vaparura homwe yavari kukumbira kuti izadzwe nemari neveruzhinji yakanangana nekurrwisa chirwere chekorera. VaNcube vati hurumende iri kuda mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhati emadhora ichashandiswa mukurwisa chirwere chekorera. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vanoti pane vanhu makumi matatu nevaviri vafa nechirwere chekorera kusvika pari nhasi uye huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi hwave kudzikira. Chirwere chekorera chakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina muna 2008. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Voomerwa neHupenyu Sezvo Vanotengesa Mishonga Vovhara Zvitoro
text: Zvimwe zvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga kana kuti mapharmacies zviri kuvharwa kune dzimwe nzvimbo nekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Sangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights (ZADHR) rinoti bazi rezvehutano riri panguva yakaoma nemamirirro akaita zvinhu munyika. Mutungamiri we sangano rePharmaceutical Society of Zimbabwe (PSZ), Amai Portia Mwendera vanoti kushaikwa kwemari yekuti vatenge mishonga nezvinodiwa kugadzira mishonga munyika ndizvo zvauraya basa revanotengesa nekugadzira mishonga. Sangano reZimbabwe Diabetes Association, rinotungamirirwa nevave mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Doctor John Chamunorwa mangwiro rinoti riri kushingirira kutsvaga nzira dzekubatsira nadzo varwere veshuga kuti vawane mishonga pachena senzira yekubatsira varwere munyika. Doctor mangwiro vati vakabatikana uye havakwanisi kutaura zvizhinji maerrano nekushaikwa kwemishonga munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemishonga vachishanda nekambani yeAfro Pham Pharmacies, VaMartin Chinembiri vanoti kana bhanga guru renyika re RBZ rikasagadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika kuti vemakambani nezvitoro vagone kuwana mari dze kuAmerica dzinodiwa kuti vahodhe zvakanaka, hapana chinofamba. Vanotiwo izvi zviri kusiya varwere vakaomerwa ne hupenyu. No media source currently available

headline: Kupokana Pakati peHurumende neVarairidzi Koenderera Mberi
text: Bazi rezvedzidzo yepasi riri kushora zvikuru mamwe masangano evarairidzi nekuramwa mabasa kwaari kuita panguva yekunyora bvunzo. Mutauriri mubazi rezvedzidzo, VaTaungana Ndoro, vari kushora zvikuru sangano reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe (ARTUZ) nekukuridzira varairidzi kuramwa mabasa vana vechikoro vatarisana nekunyora bvunzo dze “O Level” ne “A Level kutanga Muvhuro uno. Mamwe masangano anomirira varairidzi, anosanganisa reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (PTUZ), ARTUZ, Zimbabwe National Teachers Union ne Educators Union of Zimbabwe azivisa kuti nhengo dzawo hadzisi kuzonyoresa bvunzo idzi kana hurumende isingavabhadhari kuita basa iri. \n\nAsi rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi ava, reZimbabwe Teachers’ Association rati richapinda mumusangano nehurumende rigoona kuti nhengo dzaro dzinganyoresa bvunzo idzi here. Ukuwo, sangano reARTUZ rinoti harisi kuzopinda mumusangano washeedzwa neNatolnal Joint Negotiating Council (NJNC) uyu, richiti kanzuru iyi inorwira zvido zvehurumende, kwete zvevashandi. Munyori mukuru weARTUZ, VaRobson Chere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru yeNJNC haisi pamutemo kana zvichitariswa mubumbiro remutemo ra2013. VaChere vanoti chimwe chiri kushorwa nesangano ravo ndechekuti vamwe vamiriri vevashandi havana kusheedzwa kumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yosangana neChishanu neSouth Africa Murwendo rweMakwikwi e2022 World Cup
text: Chikwata chenhabvu chenyika chinoti chinovimba zvikuru kuti chichakunda South Africa mangwana mumutambo we2022 World Cup kunyange hazvo chasangana nematambudziko makukutu munzira yemutambo uyu. Chikwata chemaWarriors, icho chiri kupinda munhandare mangwana chisina vatambi vacho vanomwe vari kutambira kuEngland, chinoti chine mukana mukuru wekubuda nemapoinzi ose ari matatu apo chichasangana neSouth Africa muNational Sports Stadium. azvo vasina vamwe vatambi. Vatambi vanomwe vanotamba kuEngland kusanganisira Marvelous Nakamba weAston Villa havana kuuya kumutambo uyu nemhaka yemitemo yeCovid 19 iri munyika iyi. Vamwe vaviri vakabva kuSouth Africa, Knox Mutizwa naButholezwe Ncube, havasi kutamba zvekare mushure mekunge vaonekwa vaine chirwere cheCovid 19 pakaitwa ongororo yechirwere ichi pagadziriro yavo. Asi vatambi varipo havasi kutarisa zvese izvi mubati wepagedhe, Washington Arubi, achiti vakatomirira kupinda munhandare. Arubi anoti zvakakosha kuti vabude nemapoinzi ese matatu mumutambo uyu. Maneja wechikwata cheZimbabwe,VaWellington Mpandate, vanoti hapana chimwechavari kutarisira kunze kwekukunda mumutambo uyu. South Africa, iyo ine murairidzi mutsva, Hugo Broos wekuBelgium, ine vatambi vaviri vamiswawo zvekare kutamba mutambo uyu nemhaka ye Covid 19 iyi. Asi Zimbabwe yaunganidza vamwe vatambi vayo vane mukurumbira kusanganisira Knowledge Musona, Tino Kadewere, Marshall Munetsi, naKhama Billiat. Godknows Murwira, uyo akashevedzwa mushure mekunge vatambi vekuEngland vatadza kuuya, anoti mukamba meZimbabwe mune tarenda nekubatana zvekuti Bafana Bafana haimire. Kunze kweSouth Africa neZimbabwe zvimwe zvikwata zviri mugungano iri iGhana neEthiopia idzo dziri kusangana muAccra mangwana zvekare. Chikwata chinopedza chiri pamusoro soro mugungano iri ndicho chinoenderera mberi nemakundano aya. MaWarriors ari kusangana neEthiopia muAddis Ababa neMuvhuro. No media source currently available

headline: ZimRights Yoendesa Hurumende kuMatare Ichida Kuti Pajekeswe Hurongwa hweKurwisa Covid-19
text:
Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika reZimbabwe Human Rights
Association, ZimRights, raendesa hurumende kudare repamusoro kuitira kuti imanikidzwe kuzivisa veruzhinji hurongwa hwekubayiwa kwenhomba yeCovid-19 munyika yose. Mukuru weZimRights, VaDzikamai Bere, vanoti vakafunga zvekutora danho rekuendesa hurumende kumatare edzimhosva sezvo veruzhinji vasiri kuziva
nezvehurongwa hwehurumende.

VaBere vanoti ibasa rehurumende kuti vanhu vawane zvose zvinoita kuti
vave nehutano hwakanaka pamwe nekudzivirirwa kwezvirwere zvinogona
kuvauraya.

Patabvunza kuti vave papi nenyaya yavakanyorera hurumende svondo
rapera mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers fir Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti havana mhinduro yavakawana nokudaro magweta avo azoyamura sangano reZimRights kuti risvitse nyaya iyi kumatare edzimhosva. VaMafunda vanoti svondo rakapera vakangonyora tsamba kuhurumende kuti izivise vanhu nezvechirwere cheCovid-19 uye kuti ndeapi matanho airi kutora kuzivisa veruzhinji nemitauro yavanonzwisisa.

Zimbabwe iri kuwana mushonga wenhomba kubva kuChina iyo inoti
mushonga uri kuuya muno wavepo wangomirira kutumirwa kuno. Mimwe mishonga ichapihwa Zimbabwe pasi pechirongwa cheCOVAX iyo ichaona vanoshaya mamiriyoni matanhatu vachibayiwa nhomba iyi. Dzimwe nyika dzakaita seKenya, Botswana, Ghana, Rwanda neSouth Africa dzakatozivisa nhomba dzadzakatenga pamwe nemari dzadzakachengetera kutenga nhomba yechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi Zimbabwe, kuburikidza nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ichatengawo mishona nemari inoita zana remamiriyoni emadhora, kunyange hazvo paine mutauro wekuti hurumende haisati yapihwa mvumo yekushandisa mari iyi kutenga nhomba sezvo pasina mari yekuita izvi mubhajeti rayo ra 2021. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inotadza Kuwirirrana neVashandi Vayo
text: Hurumende yatadza kuwirirana nevashandi vayo panyaya yemari dzemihoro zvichitevera musangangano waitwa nhasi pasi pegungano reNational Joint Negotiating Council, NJNC. Musangano waitwa uyu hauna chawabuda nacho sezvo vashandi varamba kutambira zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvavanga vapihwa nehurumende vachiti zvikamu izvi idonhwe mugungwa. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru muApex Council, VaGibson Mushangu, vaudza Studio 7 mushure memusangano uyu kuti paita gakava rakakomba pakati pavo nehurumende mumusangano uyu. VaMushangu vati hurumende yanga yavapawo mari inoita mamiyoni zana nemakumi matanhatu emadhora ekuti vagovane sevashandi kubva muna Kurume kusvika muna Zvita wegore rino. VaMushangu vati vachagara pasi mangwana semasangano ese anomirira vashandi vehurumende voona kuti votora gwara ripi vachiti vacharamwa mabasa kana mazuva akatarwa pamutemo kuti vazivise mushandirwi nezvekuda kuramwa mabasa akwana. Vanga vachitungamira chikwata chehurumende, VaSimon Masanga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti homwe yehurumende yakabooka zvekuti havakwanise kubhadhara vashandi vehurumende nemadhora ekuAmerica sezvavari kuda. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vadzidzisi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vati hurumende iri kuita dambe nevashandi vayo zvichitevera zvaiswa patafura nehurumende.
