Vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, VaJuly Moyo, pamwechete negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vanga vasiko kumusangano weNJNC uyu uye nharembozha dzavo dzanga dzsingapindi pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

headline: MaGems otarira mberi
text: MUTUNGAMIRI wevatambi vechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems, Felisitus Kwangwa, anoti gadziriro dzekuenda kuWorld Cup gore rinotevera dzinotanga iko zvino sezvo vanoda kunorwa semvumba kumutambo uyu.   MaGems akadadisa nyika zvekare svondo radarika zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita tikiti rekuenda kuNetball World Cup 2023 iyo ichatambirwa kuSouth Africa.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chiri kudzokera kumakwishu aya uko chakamboenda mugore ra2019 kuLiverpool, kuEngland.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Kwangwa anoti zvinhu zvinofadza kutungamirira nyika yake kumutambo mukuru uyu.   “Ndinonzwa manyukunyuku kupihwa chiremerera ichi chekutungamira nyika yangu kumutambo mukuru uyu.   “2019 ndaivepo zvekare ndiri mutevedzeri waPerpetua Siyachitema saka kupihwa mukana wekutungamirira nyika yangu chiremerera chikuru uye ndinotenda.   “Sechikwata, ndinovimba kuti tichanotamba zvinonwisa mvura kuWorld Cup nekuti takambokuenda uye tave kuziva zvinodiwa kuti tigohwina,” anodaro.   Kwangwa, uyo anotambira chikwata cheSurrey Storm kuEngland, anoti murwendo rwavo kuenda kuWorld Cup vanoda kutamba mitambo yehushamwari yakawanda sezvo ichibatsira zvakanyanya mugadziriro dzavo.   “Kutanga iko zvino tinofanirwa kutamba mitambo yehushamwari yakawanda yekugadzirira iyo ichatibatsira zvikuru patichaenda kuSouth Africa.   “Mitambo yehushamwari yakakosha, ndiyo yega nzira ichatibatsira mugadziriro dzedu,” anodaro Kwangwa.   MaGems akabudirira kuenda kuWorld Cup zvichitevera kupedza kwaakaita ari pechitatu mumitambo yeAfrica Qualifiers yakatambirwa kuSouth Africa svondo radarika.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chakapedza chiri kumashure kweSouth Africa neMalawi.   Kumitambo iyi, maGems akatamba mitanhatu ndokuhwina mina uye akakundwa miviri neSouth Africa neMalawi ndokuhwina menduru yebhuronzi.   Dunhu reAfrica kuWorld Cup richange rakamirirwa neZimbabwe, South Africa neMalawi.

headline: Sangano reFamily Aids Caring Trust Rosvitsa Makore Makumi Matatu
text: Sangano reFamily Aids Caring Trust, FACT rapemberera kusvitsa kwaro makore makumi matatu raumbwa richipa vagari vekwaMutare mukana wekuvhenekwa pachena zvirwere zvakasiyana-siyana zvinosanganisira gomarara, HIV, kuchecheudzwa nezvimwewo. Vanhu vakawanda vemaMutare vafara zvikuru mushure mekubatsirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzehutano pahurongwa hwekucherechedza mabasa anoitwa neFACT. Mumwe wevabatsirwa ndiAmai Bekiwe Mazuru avo vane gomarara. Amai Mazuru vati vafara nekubatsirwa kwavaita sezvo vasina mari yekuti vavhenekwe zvirwere. Studio 7 yataura nevabatsirwa avo vange vachirumbidza zvaitika izvi. Mumwe mugari wemuguta iri, VaAleck Matega, vafara zvikuru sezvo ivo nemhuri yavo, vabatsirwa pasina muripo. VaSolomon Makina, avo vanoshanda nesangano reFACT, vanoti chiitiko ichi chimwe chezvironga zvavari kuita mumatunhu akawanda munyika. Sangano reFACT rakatanga kwaMutare ndokuzopinda mumatunhu anoti Masvingo, Midlands, Mashonaland East neMashonaland Central. Chirongwa cheFACT, icho chapoindwa nevanhu vanosvika zviuru zviviri, change chichitsigirwa nemasangano anoti National Aids Council, UK-Aid, US Aid, Eco-Sure, Nyaradzo Funeral Service nemamwe, uye vaimbi, Killer T, Sir Calaz naHwindi President. No media source currently available

headline: Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovaxin Konetsa Vanhu Vakawanda muZimbabwe
text: Vanhu vakawanda vakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovaxin vanoti vari kumiswa kwenguva yakareba kuti vabayiwe nhomba yepiri. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kukonzerwa nekuti kabhodhoro kamwe chete kenhomba iyi, kanofanirwa kushandiswa kubaya vanhu gumi kana kachinge kavhurwa. Izvi zvabuda mutsvagiridzo yaitwa neStudio7 mushure mekunge yanzwa kuti pave nedambudziko guru rekuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba yepiri yeCovaxin. Izvi zviri kuitika munzvimbo zhinji munyika yose. Mumwe wevanhu vakamirira kubayiwa nhomba yepiri yeCovaxin, Amai Simbiso Sinyoro,vati vaifanirwa kubayiwa nhomba iyi musi wa30 Chikumi, asi izvi hazvisati zvaitika. Amai Sinyoro vati kunyange hazvo vakawana kune nhomba iyi kuchipatara kuMbare vakaudzwa kunzi vanofanirwa kumirira kuti vanhu vatange vasvika gumi kuti vabayiwe nhomba iyi. Mumwe mukoti anobaya nhomba ataura neStudio 7 asina kuda kubuda pamhepo atiwo nhomba yavanayo yeCovaxin haigoni kuvhurwa kana pasina vanhu vakakwana vekubaya nhomba iyi. Mukoti uyu ati vanonyora mazita evanhu vozovazivisa kuti vauye kuzobayiwa musi wakati kana vanhu ava vakwana gumiAtsanangurawo kuti vanonyora vanhu mazita vozovazivisa kana vakwana gumi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano uye vachimiririra Chinhoyi mudare reNational Assembly, VaPeter Mataruse, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kumboshaikwa kwemishonga uku kunogona kuzokanganisa mashandiro akanaka enhomba. VaMataruse vatiwo zvekudzosera vanhu vambouya kuzobaiwa vasina kuwana nhomba zvinokonzerawo kuti vamwe vaore moyo vobva varega zvachose kubayiwa nhomba iyi. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati pan homba dzakadai, zvipatara zvinofanirwa kuzivisa veruzhinji mazuva ekuenda kunobayiwa nhomba kuitira kuti vagare vakagadzirira. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bazi ravo ranga risati rawana zvinyunyuto zvekuti vari kuda nhomba yeCovaxin vari kumiswa kwenguva yakareba vasati vabayiwa nhomba iyi. Zimbabwe yakatanga kutambira nhomba dzeCovaxin zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu, 35 000, kubva kuIndia muna Chivabvu, uye yakava nyika yemuAfria kutanga kushandisa nhomba iyi. Zimbabwe ine mhando ina dzenhomba yeCovid-19 dzinoti Sinovax, Sinopharm, Sputnik V neCovaxin. Hurumende inoti vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga kusvika nezuro vakanga vava zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvivatu nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe 793,077, uye vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vava zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nezvisere nezana nemakumi matatu nevatatu, 568,133. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu vari munyika. Hurumende yakazivisawo nezuro kuti vanhu gumi nevapfumbamwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro, uye vanhu mazana masere nevapfumbamwe, 809, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava chiuru nemazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevasere (1878) . Vanhu vabatwa neCovid -19 munyika yose vava zviuru makumi mashanu nezvina nemazana mana ane nemakumi manomwe nevana, 54, 474. Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichizivisa zvayawana nhasi. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vekuBikita Votambira neMufaro Kupindira kweZACC muKuferefeta Huwori muKanzuru Yavo
text: Vamwe vagari vekuBikita mudunhu reMasvingo vanoti vari kutambira nemufaro mashoko ekuti komisheni inorwisana nehuwori yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, (ZACC), yakatanga kuferefeta nyaya dzehuwori hungadai hwakaitika mukanzuru yavo. Vagari ava vanoti nyaya idzi dzinosanganisira kutengwa kwezvikakarara zvemotokari dzevakuru vakuru apo vagari vasiri kuwana zvakakwana. Vamwe vagari vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vari kufara kuti eZACC yakatopinda mudunhu ravo kuti itarisise nezvehuori uhu honotsoropodzwa nevagari avo vari kuchema-chemawo nekusafambiswa zvakanaka kwemabasa mukanzuru iyi. Mutauriri wesangano revagari reBikita Residents and Rate Payers Association kana kuti Birra, VaMark Mutengani ,vanoti vanotenda nekuuya kweZACC vachiti inofanira kubudisa pachena huori huri kuitwa mukanzuru iyi. ZACC ino uya apo sangano reBIRRA rakanyora gwaro renyunyuto kwairi pamwe nekudare reParamende mwedzi mitatu yapfuura. Mugwaro iri, vagari vainyuyuta kuti kanzuru yakatengera vakakuru vayo zvikakarara zvemotakari dzema GD 6 nhanhatu dzichiita mari inosvika zviuru makumi mana emadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti US$40 000 pamotokari imwechete. Kanzuru inonzi yakatengazve chikarara chemotokari yerudzi rweLand Cruiser yemunyori wekanzuru, VaPeter Chibi, yaiita zviuru zana nemakumi mana zvemadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti US$140 000. Motokari dzese idzi dzinonzi dzakaita zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi masere zvemadhora ekuAmerica $380 000. Mumwe mugari wemuBikita, VaStruggle Nyahunda, vati vanotarisira kuti ZACC ichaita basa rayo nemazvo. Mutauriri weZACC, Commissioner Thandiwe Mlobane, vatenda kuti vakatotanga kuferefeta kanzuru yeBikita asi vati vange vasingakwanisi kutipa zvizere sezvo vange vari parufu. Munyori wekanzuru yeBikita, VaChibi, vatenda kuti ZACC yakauya kubasa kwavo vachiferefeta nyaya iyi vachiti asi ivo hapana huwori hwavakaita sezvo zvose zvakaitwa pamutemo. Vanoongorora nezvekutongwa kwematunhu vakazvimirira muMasvingo, VaArchibold Madida, vanoti ZACC inofanira kupinda mumakanzuru akawanda mudunhu reMasvingo sezvo muine huwori hwakanyanya. Kunze kweZACC, kanzuru yeBikita iri kuferefetwawo negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, avo vakati zvakaitwa izvi hazvisi pamutemo. Vachitaura nebepanhau reMasvingo Mirror, VaMoyo vakati bazi ravo rakatotanga kuferefetawo nyaya iyi vakavimbisa kuti anenge abatwa nemhosva anosangana nemutongo wake zviri pamutemo. Kanzuru iyi iri kupomwerwawo huwori hwekucheresa zvibhorani zvina nemari inosvika madhora ekuAmerica zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu, kana kuti US$36,000.00. Kanzuru iyi yakacheresa chibhorani chimwe nemari inotangira pazviuru zvitanhatu kusvika pazviuru zvipfumbamwe zvemadhora ekuAmerica US$6 000.00 ne US$9,000.00 apo kucheresa chibhorani chimwe chete chakadzika mamita makumi mana kuchiwanzoita chiuru chimwe chete nemazana maviri emadhora ekuAmarica, kana kuti US$1, 200.00. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kuwedzera maWar Veterans Mari dzeMudyandigere
text: Hurumende yazivisa kuti ichawedzera mari yemudyandigere yevakarwa hondo yerusunguko pamwe nekuvabhadharira mari kuzvipatara pamwe neparufu. Hurumende inoti chinangwa chayo ndechekuona kuti vanhu vakarwira rusununguko rwenyika vagara zvakanaka munyika yavakasungura. Izvi zviri mubhiri riri kuda kuvandudza mitemo inobata vaimbove varwiri verusununguko. Munyori mubazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika pamwe nevakarwa hondo yerusununguko, Ambassador Mark Grey Marongwe, vazivisa komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemukati nekudzivirirwa kwenyika kuti hurongwa uhwu huri mubhiri rekushandura mutemo weWar Veterans Act iro riri kunyorwa nebazi ravo. VaMarongwe, avo vaonovewo munhu aive murwiri wehondo yerusunguko vachizivikanwa nerekuti Tichatonga, vati maWar Veterans ari kutambura uye anotarisirwa pasi neveruzhinji izvo zviri kupa kuti bazi ravo ritore matanho ekugadzirisa chimiro chevanhu ava kuitira kuti vakwanise kugarawo zvakanaka. Vati hurumende iri kuronga kuwedzera mari yemudyandigere yemaWar Veterans kubva pamadhora mazana matatu negumi nemashanu emaRTGS - kusvika pamari inotambirwa nemusoja ane chinzvimbo chameja muchiuto. Meja muchiuto anotambira mari iri pakati pemazana mashanu nemazana matanhatu emadhora zvichienderana nemakore aanawo ari pachinzvimbo ichi. Vatiwo vari kuronga kuti maWar Vets avewo neMedical Aid kuti akwanise kurapwa kana achinge aburitsa kadhi rinoratidza kuti aive murwi wehondo yerusununguko. Asi vati pari zvino vanhu ava vari kurapwa kusvika vapora kana vachinge vapinda muzvipatara zvehurumende. VaMarongwe, avo vakamboshanda semumwe wevakuru vakuru vezvirongwa zveZBC, vaenderera mberi vachiti vanodawo kuti maWar Veterans achengetedzwe zvakanakwa kana achinge ashaya nekudaro vari kuronga neimwe kambani inoviga vanhu kuti pese panoshaya murwiri wehondo yehondo rerusunguko, achengetedzwa zvine chiremerera. Vazivisawo kuti pane maWar Veterans ari pakati pemazana mashanu nemazana matanhatu anoshaya gore rega. Vati pari zvino pane maWar Veterans zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu munyika. Vati vamwe vavo vakawanda munyika havana kunyoreswa uye chirongwa chekuita izvi chiri kuenderera mberi nechinangwa chekuti vese vanokodzera vawane mari yemudya ndigere pamwe nekubatsirwa kupinza vana zvikoro. Vati bazi ravo richapinza basa maDistrict War Veterans Officers makumi matanhatu nematanhatu mumatunhu ese munyika kuti agadzirise nyaya dzavo mumatunhu ese munyika. Dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzakaita saAmai Angeline Chipato vati kunyange hazvo chiri chinhu chakanaka kuchetengedza maWar Veterans, zvakakoshawo kuti hurumende ione zvaingaite pamusoro pana chimbwido nana mujibha avo vavati vakaitawo basa guru. Asi VaMarongwe vati mutemo uri kutosandurwa kuti vana chimbwido nana mujiba varemekedzewo pamwe nekupihwa mari dzemudyandigere sezviri kuitwa maWar Veterans. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Manyanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo pasina chakaipa pakuchetenegedza varwi vehondo yerusununguko, vanoona sekuti danho iri riri kuda kutorwa richavhiringa hupfumi sezvakaitika muna 1997. Vati vanhu havafaniri kuve nemweya wekuda kungomora chete vasingatarisi kuti remangwana renyika richange rakamira sei. Kuma 80s hurumende yakadzika mitemo yeWar Veterans Act ne War Victims Compensation Fund iyo inosungira kuti vese vakarwira hondo yerusununguko vapihwe mari yemudyandigere pamwe nekubatsirwa panyaya dzehutano nedzidzo. Muna 1997 sangano rinomirira varwi ava, reZimbabwe Liberation War Veterans Association, rakamanikdza hurumende kuti vapihwe zviuru makumi mashanu zvemadhora pamunhu mumwe izvo zvakadonhedza dhora remunyika nekukanganisa hupfumi wenyika. Asi VaMarongwe vati rwendo runo havasi kuda kuti hurumende itore danho rinokanganisa hupfumi nekuda kwemaWar Veterans vachiti vachaumbawo Trust ichange ichiita mabhizimisi anotsvaga mari yekubatsira maWar Veterans. No media source currently available

headline: Kambani yeKwese TV Inopihwa Rezenisi Kuti Itepfenyure paDandemutande
text: Sangano reZimbabwe Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe rinoti rinotambira nemufaro kupihwa kwemarezenisi matatu ekutepfenyura padandemutande kuKwese TV neBroadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe asi richiti chinodihwa kusunungura masaisai kuti vanhu vakwanise kutepfenyura mateverevhizheni pamwe nemaredhiyoemumatunhu. Kambani yeEconet, muridzi weKwese TV, yakazivisa neChina kuti yainge yapihwa marezenisi matatu ekutepfeunyura padandemutande. Nhengo yebhodhi remaTrustees eMISA Zimbabwe, VaChris Chinaka, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vachitambire zvose zvinovandzudza kufambiswa kwemashoko, BAZ haisati yatanga kuburitsa marezenisi avanonyanyoda. Mukuru weMISA Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati marezenisi apihwa Kwese TV ndeemakambani anoita zvemabhizimisi uye ivo vanoda marezenisi eFrequency Modulation ayo anoita kuti veruzhinji vawane mashoko nemutengo uri pasi. Vatiwo ivo marezenisi apihwa Kwese TV anodhura zvakanyaya sezvo achiita madhora zviuru makumi mashanu pagore uye rezenesi racho rinoti zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvemari inenge yawanikwa nekambani yacho, zviendeswe kuBAZ pagore rega rega. VaMoyo vati chinodiwa kusunungura mitemo yezvekutepfenyura kuti pavhurwe mateverevhizheni nemaredhiyo akawanda munyika. VaChinaka vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende ivandudzwe mabasa enhau nekutepfenyura vachiti izvi ndizvo zvisumudzira mabasa ebudiriro munyika. Vatiwo hurumende haifaniri kuona sekuti iri kuitira vatapi venhau dzvene vachiti ibasa rehurumende kuona kuti vanhu vawana mashoko nenhau dzavanoda. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reEconet panyaya iyi sezvo vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu pataenda pamhepo. Hatinawo kunzwa kubva kune vBAZ kuti makambani mangani akanyorera kuti apihwe marezenisi akaita seakapihwa kuKwese TV. No media source currently available

headline: Electoral Court Yotarisirwa Kupa Mutongo paNyaya Yekuti Ndiani Akakunda kuChegutu West
text: Dare rinotonga nyaya dzine chekuita nesarudzo, reElectoral Court, riri kutarisirwa neMuvhuro kupa mutongo waro panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare iri nevaimirira MDC Alliance musarudzo yemumiriri weChegutu West mudare reparamende, VaGift Konjana, avo vari kupikisa kugadzwa kwaVaDexter Nduna veZanu PF semumiriri wedunhu iri. VaKonjana vari kupikisa danho iri vachiti ndivo vakakunda musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru asi Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, iyo yakati VaNduna ndivo vakakunda, yakavhiringidza manhamba akabuda musarudzo iyi. ZEC yakazivisa kuti VaNduna vakakunda VaKonjana mushure mekuwana mavhoti anoita 10 932, VaKonjana vachiwana navhoti anoita 10 828. ZEC inonzi yakabvuma kuti yakakanganisa manhamba ayakazvisa, asi yakakurudzira VaKonjana kuti vakwire kudare resarudzo iri kuti nyaya yavo iongororwe. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata VaNduna kana magweta avo kanawo ZEC kuti tinzwe mativi avo. VaKonjana vanoti vanoda kuti dare ritonge kuti ndivo vakakunda uye kuti vagadzwe senhengo yeparamende inomirira Chegutu West muparamende, kwete VaNduna. Asi VaNduna vanonzi vari kutiwo dare iri harina masimba ekushandura zvinenge zvaitwa neZEC, uye kudoma mumwe munhu kuti ndiye akakunda. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Mashanu Obatwa neCoronavirus
text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti pane mapurisa mashanu akabatwa nechirwere cheCovid19 nemusi weMuvhuro. VaMangwana havana kutaura kuti mapurisa aya akatapurirwa chirwere ichi sei. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano vachiita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro kuBritain, Dr Edgar Munatsi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti kubatwa kwemapurisa aya nechirwere ichi hakusi kuvashamisa nekuti vanofamba vari mumarori vasingatevedzere mitemo yekuti vasatapurirwe chirwere ichi. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus munyika hwakwira kusvika pamazana mashanu nemakumo mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 591. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa nechirwere ichi kwevamwe vanhu gumi nevanomwe nezuro. Pavanhu ava pane gumi nevatatu vakabva kuSouth Africa, vatatu vakatapurirwa munyika uye mumwe chete kubva kuBotswana. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vanosvika zana nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri kana kuti 162. Vanhu vafa vachiri vanomwe. Kuwedzera kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi huri kuuya apo vashandi vemuzvipatara vakawanda kusanganisira vanachiremba nevakoti vari kuramwa mabasa vachiti havasi kufara nemari dzavari kutambira. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo sesvo vasati vapindura mashoko atakavatumira nezvenyaya yekuramwa Mabasa kwevashandi vehurumende. Mumashoko kuvashandi vose vehurumende, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakati vainge vawedzera vashandi mari zvakapetwa zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana uye kuti vaizovapa mamwe madhora manomwe nemashanu ekubatsirikana. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 383,000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica. Vashaya vadarika zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 9,691. Vapora vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi masere nevatatu kana kuti 183,000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni gumi nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 10,3 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi ichiteverwa neBrazil. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nemanomwe kana kuti 127, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vachidarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu, 2,6 million. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemasere kana kuti 508,000.  \nVapora vachidarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 5,2 million.

headline: Mamwe Mapato Anopikisa Oshoropdzawo MDC Alliance neNyaya yeZvirango
text: Danho rakatorwa nechikwata chaipa humbowo hwemamiriro akaita zvinhu muzimbabwe kudare reSeneti remu America yekuti zvinhu zvirambe zvakamira sezvazviri panyaya dzezvirango zvinonzi zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe yasimudza mutauro mukuru muvana veZimbabwe nevamwe vekunze vari kutevera zviri kuitika munyika. Vamwe vanhu vakawanda vari kundokodzera bato reMDC-T nekwavari kuti kukumbira kuti zvirango zvirambe zviripo. Vamwewo ndivo vari kuti chikwata cheMDC Alliance chakatumwa nemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai ichi chaive nekodzero yekuti chiudze America kuti kana zvinhu zvisina kushanduka muZimbabwe zvinhu zvirambe zvakamira sezvazviri. Izvi zvinotevera kupa humbowo kwaVaTendai Biti vakanga vakamirira MDC Alliance, VaDewa Mavhinga vanove gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda neHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, pamwe naPeter Godwin, anove mutori wenhau ari muno muAmerica asi ari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe. Kunyange hazvo munhu wese aine kodzero yekutaura pfungwa dzake, vamwe vari kuti zvakaitwa nevana veZimbabwe ava zvinhu zvavakanga vasingatarisire kuti zvingaitike. Vakawanda kusanganisira mapato anopikisa, vari kupomera mhosva vatatu ava yekukumbira kuti America isabvise zvirango, izvo zvinogarochemwa nazvo neZanu PF kuti ndizvo zvakonzeresa matambudziko ari munyika. Rimwe remapato ari kushoropodza danho rakatorwa nemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance rekuenda kuAmerica kunomira pamberi pedare rekongiresi, ibato reNCA rinotungamirirwa naProfessor Lovemore Madhuku. Mutairiri weNCA, VaMadock Chivasa vanoti sebato rinomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe haringatsigiri kushupika kwevana veZimbabwe kusvika pakukumbira zvirango, izvo vanoti zviri kuuraya vanhu. VaChivasa vanoti zvaifanirwa kuitwa nemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance kutanga yatsvaga nhaurirano nehurumende yavepo, kwete kumhanyira kukwira ndege kuenda kuAmerica. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vanoramba mashoko ekuti bato ravo rakaenda kunokumbira kuti zvirango zvisabviswa, vachiti naivovo sebato havatodi kuti pakurudzirwe zvirango zvinozonetsa vana veZimbabwe. “Zvirango izvi zvinotambudza varombo nekuti vane mari dzavo vanonorapwa kunanaSingapore. MDC-T haife yakakokera muchetura unourayisa vana veZimabwe,” VaGutu vanodaro VaGutu vanoti vanotonetsekanawo pamusoro pezvirango izvi, vachiti bato ravo harina simba rekubvisa kana kuwedzeresa zvirango sezvo izvi zvichiitwa chete nekongiresi yeAmerica. Asi VaChivasa vanoti vana veZimbabwe havafanirwi kuvhotera vanhu vari kukumbira zvirango izvi, avo vanoti vatengesi. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeZINASU Nhanhatu Dzinosungwa kuMasvingo
text: Nhengo nhanhatu dzesangano revadzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusorosoro, reZimbabwe National Students Union, ZINASU, dzinonzi dzasungwa mangwanani eMugovera kuMasvingo uko dzanga dzichiita musangano wadzo weGeneral Council pane imwe hotera. Vadzidzi vanonzi vasungwa vanoti mutungamiri weZINASU, VaTakudzwa Ngadziore, mutungamiri wevadzidzi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe, VaLennox Machoko, Muzvare Paidamoyo Masaraure, Muzvare Nancy Njenge, VaAllan Chipoyi pamwe nemumwe mudzidzi angonzi Calvin. Sachigaro weZINASU paMidlands State University, VaBoris Muguti, vanoti musangano wavo wanga wakatanga zvakanaka chose, asi vazokanganiswa pakutanga nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori vapinda mavanga vachiitira musangano wavo. Vanoti pashure vazonzwa kuti mapurisa anodzivirira mhirizhonga anga ave munzira kunoparadza musangano uyu, izvo zvaita kuti vamwe vevadzidzi ava vatize vachinozvivharira mudzimba dzekurara, vamwe vachizosungwa pasvika mapurisa aya, ayo anonzi anga achimanikidza vashandi vepahotera iyi kuvhura magonhi kuti vasunge vadzidzi ava. Vasungwa ava vanonzi vaendeswa kukamba yemapurisa yeMasvingo Central uye pataenda pamhepo tanga tisati tanzwa kuti vari kupomerwa mhosva ipi. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mapurisa epaMasvingo Central kanawo mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyati kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Asi VaMuguti vanoti vanofunga kuti kusungwa kwenhengo dzesangano ravo kuda kungoshungurudza vadzidzi chete sezvo vanga vachitevedzera mitemo yose yekudzivirira Covid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu-PF Yogadzirira Conference Paine Kukandirana Makobvu neMatete
text: Bato reZanu-PF neMuvhuro rakatanga kuita musangano waro wePolitburo sehwaro hwekutanga hweconference yepagore yegumi nenhanhatu iri kuitwa kuVictoria Falls. Bato iri richaitawo musangano weCentral committee risati raenda kuVictoria Falls mukupera kwesvondo. Asi zviri kubuda mubato iri murwendo rwekuenda kuconference iyi zviri kuratidza kuti zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo. Matunhu anosvika mashanu pari zvino ati ari kuda kuti bato ridzokokere pabumbiro remitemo rakare rinoti mumwe wevatevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika anofanira kunge ari mudzimai. Matunhu anoti Harare, Mashonaland East, Mashonaland Central, Mashonaland West ne Bulawayo anoti ari kuda kuti bumbiro rechinjwe kuti mudzimai aone chigaro chepamusoro. Dunhu reMidlands neMasvingo anonzi ari kutsigira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, anoti ari kuda kuti komiti yeNational Disciplinary Committee iyo iri kudzinga vanonzi nhubu mubato, inofanira kuvandudzwa. Komiti iyi ine nhengo dzinosanganisira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, uye mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, amai Grace Mugabe, avo vave kupomerwa mhosva yekuti vari kudzinga mubato vanofungidzirwa kuti vanotsigira VaMnangagwa. Paitawo kukandirana makobvu nematate pakati pemunyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, negurukota rinoona nezvevarwi vehondo yerusununguko, VaChris Mutsvangwa. VaKasukuwere vari kuti VaMutsvangwa ngavadzingwe mubato vachivapomera mhosva yehuori. Asi VaMutsvangwa vari kutiwo VaKasukuwere ngavabviswe pachigaro ichi sezvo vasina nhoroondo yehondo yechimurenga. Makakatanwa aya anoratidza kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mubato. Asi vachitaura neStudio 7, mutauriri weZanu-PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vanoti conference yavo ichasimbisa nyaya yehupfumi vakatarisa chirongwa cheZIMASSET. Vatiwo iyi haisi congress nekudaro hapatarisirwe kudomwa mamwe makurukota matsva. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaBlessing Vava vanoti VaMugabe vakasadoma achavatsiva zvinoreva kuti mubato munoramba muine bata murefu bata mupfupi muZanu-PF.

headline: World Bank Inoti Kuda Kutanga Bhizimisi muZimbabwe Kuchiri Kunetsa
text: Gwaro reWorld Bank rinoratidza mamiriro ezvinhu munyika dzepasi rose panyaya dzekuita bhizimisi munyika idzi rinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe ichiri pachinhano chepasi, zvisinei nechinangwa chehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa chekuda kuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nemaitirwo ebhizimisi munyika. Mugwaro iri, iro rinonzi “Doing business” regore ra2019, Zimbabwe iri pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu neshanu. Mugore rino ra2018 Zimbabwe yange iri pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu nepfumbamwe. Chipangamazano musangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe Doctor Propser Chitambara avo vanovewo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vanoti dambudziko guru panyaya yekuvandudza hupfumi pamwe nemaitirwo ebhizimisi munyika inyaya yekuti hurumende inotaura zvinhu zvaisingaite. Mauritius iyo iri pachinhano chemakumi maviri ndiyo nyika iri pachinhano chepamusoro-soro panyika dzemuAfrica ichiteverwa neRwanda iyo iri pachinhano chemakumi maviri nepfumbamwe. Panyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica South Africa iri pachinhano chemakumi masere nepiri (82) Botswana iri pachinhano chemakumi masere netanhatu (86). Zambia iri pachinzvimbo chemakumi masere nenomwe (87) kozotiwo Namibia iri pachinzvimbo chezana nenomwe (107). Gwaro iri rinotarisa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira kuti zvinotora nguva yakareba sei kuti munhu akwanise kutanga bhizimisi, zviri nyore here kuwana magetsi, nezvimwe zvakadaro. VaReginald Shoko vanove mukuru wesangano reAffirmative Action mudunhu reMatabeleland vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutora muenzaniso wenyika yeRwanda iyo yakabvisa mitemo yakawanda pakuvhura mabhizimisi munyika iyi. VaButler Tambo muongorori wezve budiriro anoshanda akazvimirira vanoti rimwe dambudziko guru rinokanganisa kuvandudzwa kwehupfumi pamwe nekuitwa kwebhizimisi munyika inyaya yemitemo isina kujeka. VaTambo vanotiwo nyaya yekuti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi iri kupa kuti hurumende ingovimbisa zvaisiri kukwanisa kuita. Vati hurumende inofanira kuzvipira kurwisa huori uho huri kukanganisa nyaya yebudiriro kana kukwezva vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi. VaChitambara vanobvumiranawo nemaonero aya. Mugwaro ra2019 nyika yeDjibouti ndeimwe yenyika dzakasimukira zvikuru kubva pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu neina kusvika pachinhano chemakumi mapfumbamwe nepfumbamwe. Gwaro iri rinoti nyika iyi yakkwanisa kuita izvi nekuvandudza mitemo yayo kusanganisira kuita kuti vanhu vakwanise kunyoresa mabhizimisi avo munguva pfupi. Bhanga reWorld Bank rinoburitsa gwaro re”Doing Business” gore rega rega. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi, asi ivo nemutungangamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pasi pedingidzira ravo rekuti Zimbabwe Yakavhura Magonhi ekuita bhizimisi kana kuti "Zimbabwe Is Open for Business" vanotaura nyaya yekurerutsa kuita mabhizimisi munyika sechinhu chavanonyanya kukoshesa.

headline: MDC Alliance Inoti Zanu-PF Iri Kurova Vatsigiri Vayo
text: Bato reMDC Alliance rinoti nhengo yaro yevechidiki, ye Youth Assembly National Executive, Takunda Madzana, ari kurwara zvakaipisisa muchipatara mushure mekurohwa nevanhu vasingazivikanwi vanonzi vakange vakapakata pfuti, avo vanonzi vakamupisa nemoto wemagetsi. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo rinopomera bato reZanu-PF mhosva yekupamba nekurova Takunda Madzana, vachiti imwezve nhengo yavo yakatoshaya ku Plumtree mushure mekurohwa nevavanoti vanhu ve Zanu-PF. No media source currently available Asi umwe wevakuru mubato reZanu-PF, Doctor Simba Mavaza, avo vati mapurisa nemasoja havasi veZanu-PF kana bato ripi zvaro rezvematongerwo enyika asi ndeve nyika nevanhu vose.Vati zvekare bato reMDC Alliance rapererwa nemazano nekusadiwa kwaro nevanhu, naizvozvo riri kutsvaka pekuwanda napo sezvo riri kutadza kuwana rutsigiro rwevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinorasa Mhosva Yanga Ichipomerwa Chin'ono
text: Dare repamusoro nhasi rarasa mhosva yanga ichipomerwa mutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, yekuburitsa mashoko emanyepo richiti mutemo wakashandiswa kusunga Chin’ono wakabviswa kare mumabhuku emitemo yenyika. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Jester Charewa, varasa mutongo wakaitwa nedare repasi wekuti Chin’ono ane nyaya uye anofanira kutongwa. Gweta raChin’ono, VaHarrison Nkomo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti Justice Charewa varasa mutongo wedare ramajisitiriti panyaya iyi vachiti mutemo wakashandiswa pana Chin’ono hausisiri mutemo munyika ino. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naChin’ono kuti tinzwe kuti ari kunzwa sei nemutongo wapihwa nedare. Asi VaNkomo vati Chin’ono afara chose nemutongo uyu ati zvese zvakaitika zvingadai zvisina kuitika dai mapurisa nevachuchusi vakange vamuterera paaitaura kuti mutemo wavaishandisa wainge waraswa nedare repamusorosoro kare. VaNkomo vati vachagara pasi naChin’ono kuti otora matanho apo zvichitevera mutongo waJustice Charewa. Vatiwo vari kuda kuti Chin’ono atange apihwa mari yechibatiso yaakabvisa panyaya iyi sezvo yaraswa nedare. Chin’ono akasungwa musi wa 8 Ndira achipomerwa mhosva yekutyora chikamu chemutemo weCriminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act mushure mekunyora padandemutande rake reTwitter kuti pane mwana mudiki ainge afa mushure mekurohwa nemapurisa. Akagara jeri reChikurubi mushure mekunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nedare ramajisitiriti uye akozipihwa mukana webhabhadhara mari yechibatiso musi wa 27 Ndira. Chin’ono akabvisa zviuru makumi maviri zvemadhora emaRTGS semari yechibatiso zvihitevera kusungwa kwaakaitwa muna Ndira. Asi achinyora paTwitter yake, Chin’ono ati ari kuda kusungisa hurumende nekumusunga kwayakaita, pamwe nekumuchengetedza uye nehutsinye hwayakaratidza paive muhusungwa iye asina mhosva yaakapara. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Fadzayi Mahere pamwe nemuriri weZengesa West, VaJob Sikhala, vari kupomerwawo mhosva yakafanana neyanga ichipomerwa Chino’ono. Mune imwewo nyaya, mukuru wevechidiki muMDC Alliance, Obey Sithole, avo vakasungwa nemusi Muvhuro vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvinhu zvinonyangadza kana kuti Criminal Nuisance amiswa pamberi pedare nhasi. Gweta rake, VaObey Shava, vakumbira dare kuti musungwa atongwe achibva kumba asi mutongi wedare, VaRichard Mangosi, vati vaudza VaShava kuti vachapa mutongo wavo pachikumbiro ichi mangwana. Mune imwewo nyaya mumiriri weHarare West muNational Assembly, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, nemumwe wavo Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri, vasvitsawo chikumbiro chekuti vapihwe mukana wekutongwa vachibva kudzimba dzavo mushure mekubhadhariswa mari yechibatiso. Aka ndekechina vaviri ava vachikumbira kuti vabviswe kuChikurubi Maximum Prison kwavakachengetedzwa. Mutongi wedare, VaTawanda Chitapi, vaudza gweta revaviri ava, VaAlec Muchadehama, kuti vachapa mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chaMuzvare Mamombe naMuzvare Chimbiri nemusi weChishanu. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veKanzuru yeChitungwiza Vovhiringwa neChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Kanzuru yeChitungwoza inoti vashandi vayo vanomwe vakabatwa neCovid-19, uye vamwe makumi maviri nemumwe vari pavo vega mushure mekusangana nevanhu vane chirwere ichi. Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori wekanzuru yeChitungwiza, Doctor Tonderai Kasu, vanoti izvi zvawedzera kuderera kwehuwandu hwevashandi veboka ravo rezvehutano zvekuti kanzuru yavo yamanikidzwa kuvhara kiriniki yayo yeSaint Mary’s. Dr Kasu vanoti mushandi mumwechete akatofa neCovid-19 mushure mekunge awanikwa aine chirwere ichi. Vashandi vekanzuru yeChitungwiza vaigara vachichemachema kuti havana zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwewre ichi zvakakwana, asi Doctor Kasu vanoti kanzuru yavo yanga ichiedza napose painogona napo kuti zvikwanisiro izvi zviwanikwe. Doctor Kasu vanoti kunyange hazvo vavhara kiriniki yeSaint Mary’s, ichange ichingobatsira varwere vanenge vachida kubatsirwa zvechimbichimbi chete, asi vamwe vose vanofanirwa kuenda kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzinenge dzakavhurwa vonobatsirwa ikoko. No media source currently available

headline: Nhabvu yadzoka zvakare
text: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League (PSL) rinoti riri kufara zvikuru nekupihwa kwavakaita mvumo yekuti mutambo weChibuku Super Cup uenderere mberi uye izvi zvinotevera kumiswa kwainge kwamboitwa mitambo yose nguva pfupi yadarika nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Chinyorwa chakatumirwa kubva kuSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) svondo rino chakazivisa kuti mitambo inoti nhabvu, cricket nerugby zvave kutenderwa kutambwa nechinangwa chekuzadzikisa mitambo yakasiyana apo zvikwata zvenyika zvichanokwikwidza kunze.   Mukushi wemashoko wePSL — Kudzai Bare — anoti havasi kugona nemufaro nekupihwa kwavakaitwa mvumo yekuti mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup ienderere mberi.    Kudzai Bare   “Tiri kufara kuti tave kuenderera mberi nenhabvu yedu. Tiri pakati pekuita hurukuro nezvikwata zvose tichivazivisa kuti vachitanga gadziriro dzavo dzekuti mutambo usimudzirwe pawange wasiirwa. “Toda kupa zvikwata zvose mukana wekuita gadziriro dzakakwana tobva tasimudzira mutambo uyu. “Hatisati tave nezuva rekuti ndiro rekusimudzira, asi mumazuva anotevera tichange tichizivisa nyika tapedza kuita hurukuro nezvikwata zvose,” anodaro Bare.   Shasha yekutsigira nhabvu ine mukurumbira, Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa, anoti anotenda zvikuru Hurumende nekutendera kuti mitambo ichitanga kutambwa zvakare.    Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa   “Nhabvu ibasa semamwe mabasa ose nekuti iri kuraramisa mhuri dzakawanda. Vakomana vedu kana vasingatambe vanenge vari panzara sezvo vachiraramiswa nemari dzavanowana kubva kunhabvu. “Naizvozvo ndinopa kutenda kuhutungamiri hwedu hweSRC neHurumende vakatendera kuti nhabvu ienderere mberi. Isu tinoda kuona vakomana vedu vachitamba uye zvikwata zvedu zvichihwina.   “Paye nhabvu payakambomiswa kwenguva ndefu kubva gore radarika, vakomana vazhinji vakambotambudzika zvikuru. Vamwe vange vave kutengesa pamusika chaipo kuti variritire mhuri dzavo zvinova zvinhu zvinosiririsa. Asi iye zvino nhabvu zvayadzoka tinoziva kuti hupenyu hwavo hwave kuchiendeka manje,” anodaro.   Apo chikwata chemaWarriors chiri kutanga gadziriro dzekuenda kumutambo weCosafa Cup uchatambirwa kuSouth Africa nekuzotanga kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumitambo yeQatar 2022 World Cup, Romario anoti kudzoka kwenhabvu kuchabatsira murairidzi wechikwata chenyika ichi, Zdravko ‘’Loga’’ Logarusic, kutarisa vatambi vakawanda vekuzosarudza.   “Takatarisana neCosafa kuSouth Africa mumasvondo anotevera saka kana nhabvu ichitambwa zvinobatsira zvikuru kuti Loga atarise vatambi vakawanda onyatsosarudza simbi dzebasa dzekutakura kuenda nadzo kumutambo uyu dzisingazononyadzise. Hatidi kunyadziswa kuSouth Africa kuCosafa nekuti tagara tichizivikanwa tichitamba zvinodadisa mumutambo uyu.   “Manje-manje tiri kufanira kusangana neSouth Africa mumutambo wekurwira kuenda kuWorld Sup saka kana nhabvu ichitambwa zvinotibatsira zvikuru kuumba chikwata chakasimba chinosimudzira mureza wenyika,” anodaro Musekiwa.   Maneja wemaWarriors — Wellington Mpandare — anoti vane mutoro mukuru pakusarudza vatambi vanopinda muchikwata chaLoga chichanokwikiwdza kumutambo weCosafa Cup.   Mutambo weCosafa Cup uchatanga musi wa7 Chikunguru uye maWarriors anofanirwa kutanga gadziriro dzavo svondo rino musi weSvondo apo vatambi vachasarudzwa naLoga vachapinda mukembi.   Mpandare anoti zviri kuremera Loga nevatevedzeri vake kuti vasarudze chikwata chinoenda kumutambo uyu nekuti pakamiswa mitambo akange asati awana nguva yekuona zvikwata zvose zvichikwikwidza. Loga anonzi akangokwanisa kuona mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup yakatambirwa uye ange achironga kuti aende Bulawayo Mutare neMidlands kunoona vatambi vezvimwe zvikwata apo pakabva pamiswa mitambo iyi.    Wellington Mpandare   Mpandare anoti kumiswa kwakaitwa nhabvu kwakabva kwadzorera basa rose kumashure.   “Cosafa Cup iri kutanga manje-manje saka tinofanirwa kunge tave kupinda mukembi nevatambi vatinenge tasarudza. Asi iye zvino zviri kutiomera nekuti hatina kuona mitambo yakawanda. Loga akangokwanisa kuona mitambo yemuHarare chete, haana kuzoenda kune mamwe mapurovhinzi achinoona mitambo yaitambwa ikoko,” anodaro Mpandare.   Kumutambo weCosafa, maWarriors akaiswa muboka rine zvikwata zvinosanganisira Senegal, Mozambique neNamibia.   Kusvika pari zvino, maWarriors ndiwo ari kutungamira pakuhwina mukombe uyu sezvo akwanisa kuuhwapura katanhatu.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chakapedzisira kutora mukombe uyu mugore ra2018 apo chairairidzwa naSunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa.

headline: Vashandi veKanzuru yeHarare Vanoti Havachakwanisa Kuramba Vachienda kuMabasa
text: Vashandi vakawanda vekanzuru yeguta reHarare vanoti vava kuomerwa nehupenyu zvekuti vachange votadza kuenda kumabasa avo nepamusana pekushaya mari inovakwanira. Izvi zviri kuuya panguva iyo vamwe vanamukoti vemuzvipatara zvekanzuru pamwe nemakiriniki vasiri kuenda kumabasa vachiti havana mari dzekufambisa, danho rinonzi rakanganisa kufambiswa kwezvehutano muguta iri. Sachigaro verimwe sangano revashandi vekanzuru, reHarare Municipality Workers Unoin, VaCosmas Bungu, vanoti vashandi vari pakati peGrade 5 neGrade 16 vanosanganisira vanamukoti, ndivo vari kunyanya kuomerwa nehupenyu. VaBungu vanoti vakasangana nevamiriri vekanzuru nemusi weMuvhuro asi havana kupedza nhaurirano, nekudaro vachasangana zvakare neMuvhuro neChipiri svondo rinouya. No media source currently available Meya veguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, vanoti kanzuru yavo inozviziva kuti vashandi vakaomerwa, uye iri kuedza napose painogona kuti igadzirise mashandiro avo. Asi VaGomba vanoti kuomerwa kwevashandi kwakangofananawo nekuomerwa kwemakambani ari kushandirwa nevashandi ava, kusanganisirawo makanzuru, nekudaro vagari vanofanirwawo kuita pavo kuburikidza nekubhadhara zvikwereti zvavo kukanzuru. No media source currently available

headline: VaNzuwa Voradzikwa kuHeroes Acre VaMnangagwa Vachivimbisa Kugadzirisa Zvichemo zveVashandi
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti hurumende yavo yakazvipira kugadzirisa nyaya dzemari yemihoro yevashandi pamwe nezvose zvinodiwa mukuita basa ravo asi mamwe masangano anomirira vashandi anoti mashoko avo anofanira kuonekwa nebasa kwete kutaura chete. VaMnangagwa vakataura mashoko aya pakuradzikwa kwaVaMariyawanda Nzuwa nemusi weSvondo pamarinda anoradzikwa magamba enyika paHeroes Acre Mutungamiri wenyika akati vashandi vehurumende vanofanira kushanda zvakasimba sezvaiitwa naVaNzuwa kuitira kuti mabasa ehurumende afambire mberi. VaMnangagwa vakatwoi hurumende yavo yakazvipira kugadzirisa zvese zviri kunetsa kuvashandi zvikurusei panguva ino yechirwere cheCovid 19. Asi mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vadzidzisi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure vati hurumende yave nenguva ichingovimbisa vashandi mari asi pasina chiri kubuda. VaMnangagwa vakati VaNzuwa munhu akashanda zvikuru kutsvaga zvikwanisiro zvaivaida mukurwisa hutongi hwevechichena panguva yavaishanda semudzidisi pane imwe yunivhesiti kuAmerica vasati vadzoka kumusha pakawana nyika kuzvitonga kuzere. Ataura akamirira mhuri yekwa Nzuwa uye ari muzukuru wemufi, Amai Tendai Bare, vakati VaNzuwa munhu aive nerudo nemhuri pamwe nenyika yake uye munhu aida zvekurima zvikuru. VaNzuwa vakaberekwa musi 9 Chivabvu 1941 kuNharira kuChivhu vakadzidza kuDriefontein kwaChirumhanzu nekwaKutamba kwaZvimba vasati vaenda kuAmerica kuzvidzidzo zvavo zvepamusoro kwavakasangana nemudzimai wavo Janice Mary Stevenson. Vakapedza zvidzidzo zvavo kuAmerica vakazodzidzisa pane imwe yunivhesiti kunyika iyi vasati vadzoka kuZimbabwe payakawana kuzvitonga kuzere muna 1980 vachishanda mubazi rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Vakazove sachigaro wePublic Service Commission kubva muna 1992 kusvika muna2018 apo pavakazosiya basa iri vave kunorima kupurazi ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Harare Agricultural Show Inovhurwa Iine Vanhu Vashoma Gore Rino
text: Zviratidzwa zveHarare Agricultural Show zvatanga nhasi paine kurudziro yekuti varimi pamwe nevemakambani ezvicherwa, havafaniri kupokana asi kuti vanofanira kushanda pamwe chete mukusimudzira mabasa avo nehupfumi hwenyika. Vachitaura pamusangano waitwa kuHarare Agricultural Show wazeya kuti varimi nevemakambani ezvicherwa vangashandidzane sei, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekurima, VaVangelis Peter Haritatos, vati hapafaniri kuve nemakakatamwa pakati pevaviri ava asi kuti vanofanira kushanda pamwe chete. VaHaritatos vatiwo basa rekuchera zvicherwa rinofanira kuitwa pachitevedzwa mitemo yezvekuchengetedza nharaunda vachiti pari zvino pane vamwe vari kungochera pese pese vachiparadza masango nezvimwe zviwanikwa. Mukuru anoona nemabasa ezvemigodhi musangano reChamber of Mines of Zimbabwe, VaDavid Matyanga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyika ine mitemo yakajeka inotaura kuti mabasa ekurima nekuchera zvicherwa anofambiswa sei uye kupoka kuripo kunokonzerwa nekuti mitemo iyi haisi kutevedzwa. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvezvicherwa, VaPolite Kambamura, vatiwo mabasa ekurima pamwe nekuchera zvicherwa akakosha kunyika nekudaro anofanira kudyidzana mukusimbisa hupfumi hwenyika. Vati muzvicherwa munobva zvakawanda zvinoshandiswa pakugadzira zvinhu zvekurimisa nekudaro makambani ezvicherwa anofanira kutsigira mamabasa ekurima zvakasimba. VaKambamura vati zvinofadza kuti pane mamwe makambani ezvicherwa akaita seZimplats ave kutotsigira mabasa ekurima. Mwedzi wapfuura Zimplats yakaisa mamiriyoni gumi nemashanu emadhora ekuAmerica muchirongwa chekuchengeta mombe dzenyama nemukaka munyika yese. Vakambotungamira sangano reConferderation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vati zvakakosha kuti varimi nemakambani ezvicherwa vashande pamwe chete kuitirakuti nyika iwane chikafu chakakwana pamwe nekusimudzira hupfumi. Mukuru weZimbabwe Agricultural Soceity, Dr Andrew Matibiri, vati hurongwa hwavo hwegore rino hwatanga zvakanaka chose. Varimi zana kubva kumativi mana enyika pamwe nemakambani zana nemakumi mashanu nemanomwe ari kuratidzira paShow yegore rino iyo ichavhurwa zviri pamutemo nemusi weChina. Show yegore rino iri kuitwa pachitevedzwa nzira dzekudzivirira denda reCovid-19 uye vakabaiwa nhomba kana kuvhenekwa ndivo chete vari kubvumidzwa kupinda muShow. VaMatibiri vatiwo veruzhinji vanokwanisa kuona zvinenge zvichiitika kuShow pamadandemutande akaita seZoom nemamwe. No media source currently available

headline: Mbappe oshuvira Kante
text: Saint-Germain, Kylian Mbappe, anoti akaedza kukurudzira N’Golo Kante weChelsea kuti auye kuzotambira chikwata chekuLigue 1 apo vaviri ava vaive kumutambo weWorld Cup.   Mbappe, uyo ane makore 19 okuberekwa, akaudza muridzi wePSG Nasser Al-Khelaifi kuti atenge mutambi uyu kubva kuchikwata ichi chekuPremier League.   Kante, uyo akahwina mukombe wePremier League kaviri, ange achinzi ari kudiwa kuParc des Princes mwaka uno uye Mbappe ari kutsigira kutengwa kwemutambi uyu.   “Ndakaudza (Al-Khelaifi) zvakare kuti Kante anenge akatinakira mukamutenga auye kuchikwata chedu,” akaudza France Football.   “Ndakataura naN’Golo pataive kuWorld Cup asi ndisingamumanikidze nekuti ndinoziva zvinoitika kana zvikapinda mumusoro wako zvekuda kutengwa nezvimwe zvikwata.   “Pakupedzisira ndakangoisa mashoko mashoma muhomwe dzake zvandakanyora pakapepa, izvo zvandinoziva akazozviona adzokera kumba kwake.”   Mbappe naKante havasati vadzokera kuzvikwata zvavo zvichitevera kuhwina kwavakaita kumutambo weWorld Cup neFrance nguva pfupi ichangodarika. Vaviri ava vakabatsira Les Blues kuhwina mukombe weWorld Cup kechipiri munhorondo yechikwata ichi mushure memakore 20 zvichitevera kukunda kwavakaita Croatia 4-2 mufainari yemutambo uyu. —SportsMail Football

headline: Asamoah Gyan Ndiye Shasha yeKurova Mambure muAfrica Munhoroondo yeWorld Cup
text: Mutambi weGhana kana kuti Black Stars, Asamoah Gyan ndiye mutambi wemuAfrica akanwisa zvibodzwa zvakawandisa kudarika vamwe vatambi vose munhoroondo yemakwikwi eWorld Cup. Gyan akanwisa zvibodzwa zvitanhatu kumakwikwi aya. Munhoroondo yeGhana, Gyan ndiye akanwisawo zvibodzwa zvakawanda zvinova makumi mashanu nechimwe. Mutambio uyu akaberekwa kuGhana muna 1985 uye ari kutambira chikwata cheLegon Cities FC kuGhana.  Akatambira Ghana muWorld Cup yakaitwa 2006, 2010 na2014. Aakatanga kutambira maBlack Stars aine makore gumi nemanomwe. Zvibodzwa zcake kuWorld Cup akanwisa muna 2010 pamutambo neSerbia, Australia, United States. Muna 2014 kuWorld Cup akanwisa pamutambo neUnited States of America, akanwosawo chimwe chibodzwa pamutambo neGermany achibva aenzana naRoger Milla wekuCameroon pakugohwesa zvibodzwa zvishanu kuWorld Cup. Akazonwisa chibodzwa chechitanhatu pamutambo nePortugal chakamupinza munhoroondo pakunwisa zvibodzwa muAfrica.  Pane shasha dzekurova mambure kuWorld Cup kubva kuAfrica” Asamoah Gyan 6 (Ghana) Roger Milla 5 (Cameroon) Samuel Eto’0 3 (Cameroon) Papa Diop 3 (Senegal)

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVanomwe Vofa neCovid-19 Hurumende Ichikurudzirwa Kutevedzera Zvainotaura paNyaya yeKudzivirira Chirwere Ichi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu gumi nevanomwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemakamumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 4, 090. Vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi mana nevashanu kana kuti 345 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zana rezviuru negumi nepfumbamwe nemazana masere nemakumi mashanu nevatatu kana kuti 119, 853. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 581 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nematanhatu zvine mazana manomwe negumi nevatanhatu kana kuti 96, 716. Vanhu mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 2, 036, 299 vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kekutanga. Vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere zvine mazana matatu nemakumi masere nechimwe kana kuti 1, 198, 381 vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kechipiri. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti chirwere ichi hachichanyanye kupararira zvakanyanya munzvimbo dzange dzichinzi dziri munjodzi huru richiti izvi zvakakonzerwa nedzidziso iri kupihwa nezvechirwere ichi. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rapera vakawedzera nguva yekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba nemamwe mavhiki maviri vachiti kunyangwe huwandu hwevari kyabtwa nechirwere ichi have kudzikira, huwandu hwevari kufa huchiri hwakawandisa pane zvinotarisirwa. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, munyori anoona nezvehutano mubato reMDC Alliance Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti zvekungoti vanhu vagare mudzimba asi vamwe vachienderera mberi vachiunganidza vanhu vachiita zvematongerwo enyika hazvibatsire. Mamwe madzishe nebato reZanu-PF nevamwe vari mumubatanidzwa wemapato ari muPolitical Actors Dialogue kana kuti POLAD vari kuenderera mberi nekuita misangano kunyangwe veMDC Alliance nevamwe vasiri mugungano iri vari kurambidzwa kuita misangano yavo nemapurisa achiti ari kuda kumisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Matambiro eChevrons marwadzo’
text: HUTUNGAMIRI hweZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) hunoti hunoda kuona shanduko huru mumatambiro anoita chikwata chenyika chemaChevrons zvichitevera kusatamba zvinogutsa kwachange chichiita mumitambo yadarika.   Nguva pfupi yadarika, maChevrons akarakashwa (whitewash) pamusha neBangladesh mumitambo yeOne Day International, Twenty20 Series neTest Match uye izvi zvinotevera kukundwa kwakaitwa chikwata chenyika ichi zvekare nePakistan pamwe neAfghanistan gore rino.   Pamusangano wakaitwa svondo radarika, ZC yakapa basa kuna director of cricket, Hamilton Masakadza, kuti ave nehurongwa hwekumutsiridza chikwata ichi apo chiri kutarisirwa kunokwikwidza necheIreland uye neScotland mumitambo yeSuper League yekurwira kuenda kumutambo weICC 2023 World Cup kuIndia.   Muchinyorwa chakabva kuZC, mukushi wemashoko wesangano iri – Darlington Majonga – anoti Masakadza akapihwa basa rekuti agadzirise zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana maringe nemaChevrons. “Takabuda mumusangano tikawirirana kuti director of cricket auye nehurongwa hwekumutsiridza mutambo uyu uye kuti agadzirise nyaya nhatu dzinoti kusarudza vatambi, nyaya dzehunyanzvi hwevatambi uye kuongorora matambiro evatambi vacho.   “Hurongwa uhu hunofanira kunge hwavepo chikwata chenyika chisati chasimuka chakananga kuIreland uko chinofanira kunosangana neIreland chozosangana zvekare neScotland mumitambo yeSuper League,” anodaro Majonga.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, Majonga anoti chikwata chemaChevrons chiri kufanirwa kusimuka chakananga kuIreland mumazuva anotevera kunorwira tickiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup. Anoti nekuda kwekuti Zimbabwe iri kuonekwa senyika ine vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa neCovid-19, maChevrons ari kufanirwa kusimuka osvika ombogara pavo vega kwemazuva izvo zvinotarisirwa kuitwa nevanhu vanenge vashanya kune dzimwe nyika panguva ino apo pasi rese riri kurwisana nedenda reCovid-19,” anodaro Majonga.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Tiri pakati pekuita hurukuro maringe nemafambiro atichaita kuenda kuIreland neScotland kunotamba nezvikwata zviviri izvi. Patichafamba, tinofanira kusvika tombogara pedu toga nekuti ndizvo zvinotenderwa kuitwa panguva ino yatiri yekurwisana neCovid-19 sezvo denda iri riri kuuraya vanhu pasi rose.   “Mitambo yekuIreland neScotland yakatikoshera nekuti ndeyeSuper League yekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup saka tinotofanirwa kukwidziridza masokisi edu kuti tigohwina.”

headline: Mabhanga Maviri muZimbabwe Anobviswa paZvirango Zvakatemerwa neAmerica
text: Hurumende yeAmerica yabvisa mabhanga maviri anoti reAgribank nere International Development Bank of Zimbabwe pazvirango zvakatemerwa makambani nevamwe vari muhurumende yeZanu-PF kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Hurumende yeAmerica yabvisa mabhanga maviri anoti reAgribank nere International Development Bank of Zimbabwe pazvirango zvakatemerwa makambani nevamwe vari muhurumende yeZanu-PF kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Bazi rinona nezvemari muAmerica re U.S Treasury Department neChina rakati munhu anenge oda kuita bhizimisi nemabhanga maviri aya haachafanire kutanga akumbira rezinesi kuhurumende yeAmerica. America, ichatungamirwa naVaGoerge Walker Bush, yakatemera mamwe makambani nenhengo dzeZanu-PF zvirango muna 2003 ichivapomera mhosva yekutonga nedemo. Zvirango izvi zvinowedzerwa nguva gore rega, uye pakapinda VaBarack Obama mukutonga, vakaramba vachizvichengetedza vachiti zvichabviswa chete kana hurumende yeZanu PF yava kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nemitemo yenyika. Asi Zanu-PF inoti zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika mushure mekunge hurumende yagovera ivhu kuvatema. Hurumende yeAmerica yabvisawo zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvange zvakatemerwa zvirango kusanganisa nhengo dzeZanu-PF nhatu dzakashaya dzinosanganisa vaive sachigaro webato iri mudunhu reHarare, VaAmos Midzi, vaiva nhengo yePolitburo VaStanley Sakupwanya uye VaSikhanyiso Duke Ndlovu, vaive gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko. Mudzimai waVaNdlovu amai Rose Jaele Ndlovu uye vamwe vanonzi Amai Nalinee Taveeesin vekuThailand vakabviswawo pavanhu vainge vatemerwa zvirango mushure mekunyora tsamba vachizvichenura. Amai Nalinee vaive gurukota kuThailand vakatemerwa zvirango muna 2008 nekudyidzana kwavo naVaMugabe. Asi vairamba kuti vanodyidzana naVaMugabe vachiti vainge vozorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya vachiti vaingozivawo VaMugabe. Mutauriri weZanu-PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvirango izvi hazvisi pamutemo uye zvinofanira kubviswa zvose kwete muzvidimbu. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda neHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti America haifanire kubvisa ziso rayo pahurumende yeZimbabwe zvikuru panyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu.  No media source currently available

headline: Portugal yadzinga Santos wekunetsana naCR7
text: MURAIRIDZI wePortugal, Fernando Santos, aita wechisere kudzingwa basa kuWorld Cup zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaita nyika iyi mumutambo uyu neMorocco.   Chinyorwa chakabva kuFootball Association of Portugal chinoti: “Changa chiri chiremerera kuve nemurairidzi akaita saFernando Santos achirairidza nyika yedu.   “FPF inotenda Fernando Santos nechikwata chake nebasa ravakabata mumakore masere uye tine kutenda kwakadzika kunobva kuzvizvarwa zvePortugal. FPF yatanga basa rekutsvaga murairidzi mutsva wenyika yedu.”   Santos ange arairidza Portugal kwemakore masere uye akaita wekutanga kuhwina mukombe mukuru apo akatungamira Portugal kutora European Championship mugore ra2016.   Akazotungamira zvakare chikwata ichi kuhwina mukombe weUEFA Nations League muna2019.   Ari kuWorld Cup kuQatar, Santos anonzi akatsamwisana naCristiano Ronaldo izvo zvakamuona achisiya mutambi uyu mumutambo wavo weRound of 16 neSwitzerland uyo vakahwina 6-1.   Vamwe varairidzi vakadzingwa basa kana kusiya vachangobva kuWorld Cup vanosanganisira Gerardo ‘Tata’ Martino weMexico, Tite (Brazil), Luis Enrique (Spain), Otto Addo (Ghana), Roberto Martinez (Belgium), Louis van Gaal (Netherlands) naPaulo Bento (Korea Republic).

headline: ‘HAKUNA MAWARRIORS AKADARO’
text: CHIKWATA chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors chakaenda kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) egore rino ndicho chakatamba zvinonyadzisa kudarika zvimwe zvikwata zvose zvakamboenda kumutambo uyu makore adarika sezvo chakanwisa chibodzwa chimwechete pamitambo yacho mitatu yachakatamba.   Zvikuru zvaitarisirwa kubva kuchikwata ichi asi chakangodzoka ari maoko chete murwendo rwekuEgypt uko kwainge kuzere nemakakatanwa pakati pevatambi vemaWarriors – avo vairairidzwa naSunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzmbwa – nehutungamiri weZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) pamusoro penyaya yemari nezvimwe zvakasiyana.   Vatambi vemaWarriors pavaive kuEgypt vakamboranwa kutamba mitambo yavo vachiti vaida kubhadharwa mari yavo.   Kumakwishu aya — ayo ari kuenderera mberi kuEgypt —  maWarrrios akangonwisa kamwechete chinova chibodzwa chakanwiswa naKhama Billiat pamutambo wavo wechipiri uyo vakaita mangange 1-1 neUganda.   Mimwe mitambo miviri, maWarriors akakundwa 1-0 neEgypt kozoti 4-0 neDemocratic Republic of Congo.   Muongororo yakaitwa neKwayedza svondo rino, zvakaonekwa kuti pazvikwata zvina zvakaenda kumakwishu eAfcon zvichimirira Zimbabwe mumakore anoti 2006, 2004, 2017 ne2019 chegore rino ndicho chakatamba zvinonyadzisa.   Mugore ra2004 – iro raive rekutanga maWarriors achibudirira kuenda kumakwishu eAfcon ayo akaitirwa kuTunisia — chikwata chenyika ichi chairairidzwa naChidzambwa uye chaive muboka reGroup C nezvikwata zvinoti Egypt, Cameroon neAlgeria.   MaWarriors akakwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwechete apo akakunda Algeria 2-1 uye akazokundwa mimwe miviri apo akarohwa 2-1 neEgypt kozoti 5-3 neCameroon.   Kumakwishu aya, maWarriors akakwanisa kunwisa katanhatu iwo ndokunwiswa nezvimwe zvikwata kanokwana kasere.   Afcon yaitevera ya2006 yakaitirwa kuEgypt, maWarriors aitungamirwa naCharles Muhlauri uye aive muboka raive nezvikwata zvinoti Nigeria, Senegal neGhana.   Kumakwishu aya, maWarriors akakwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwechete apo akakunda Ghana 2-1 asi ndokukundwa mimwe miviri – 2-0 neSenegal kozoti 2-0 zvakare neNigeria.   Mugore ra2006 iri, chikwata chaMuhlauri chakakwanisa kunwisa kaviri mumitambo mitatu yachakatamba uye icho chikanwiswa kashanu nezvimwe zvikwata zvaive muboka rimwechete nacho.   MaWarriors akazombomira kukwikwidza kumakwishu aya ndokuzodzokera mugore ra2017 kuGabon apo airairidzwa naKalisto Pasuwa.   Chikwata chaPasuwa chaitungamirirwa naWillard Katsande ari kaputeni uye chaive muboka reGroup B rezvikwata zvaiti Senegal, Tunisia neAlgeria.   MaWarriors panguva iyi haana kumbohwinha mutambo mumwechete zvawo sezvo akaita mangange  2-2 neAlgeria mumutambo wawo wekutanga ndokuzokundwa mimwe miviri yaitevera, 2-0 neSenegal uye 4-2 neTunisia.  Gore iri, chikwata ichi chakakwanisa kunwisa kana icho ndokunwiswa kasere nezvimwe zvikwata zvaive muboka iri.   Chikwata cha2017 chaive nevamwe vatambi vanosanganisira Knowledge Musona, Billiat, Danny ‘Deco’ Phiri, Nyasha Mushekwi, Teenage Hadebe, Kudakwashe Mahachi, Evans Rusike, Lawrence Mhlanga naMarvelous Nakamba avo vanove vaive zvakare muchikwata chegore rino.   Vatsigiri venhabvu vakaita hurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino vari kudya magaka mambishi vachiti matambiro akaitwa nemaWarriors kuAfcon rwendo rwuno anonzwisa hasha.    Sunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa   Munyori mukuru wesangano reFriends of the Warriors — Zivanai Muwashu — anoti vatambi ava vakarakidza kuti havana nyika pamwoyo asi chavanongoda imari chete.   “Hatisi kufara nezvatakaona kuCairo, shuwa ndizvo zvavakaendera here ikoko kunonyadzisa nyika yese? Dai vange vasingade zvemaWarriros vasina kumbobvira vaenda vakagara kumusha, paitsvagwa vamwe vaienda.   “Shuwa kutishoresa zvakadaro, Khama Billiat mukatarisa aitamba ega nhabvu kumakwishu aya, vamwe vatinoti ndivo kaputeni wedu kupotsa ega gedhe, aiwa zvinonyadzisa izvi,” anodaro Muwashu.   Mutsigiri wenhabvu ane mukurumbira Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa anoti hazvina kunaka chose kuti vatambi vasvike pakuramba kutamba nhabvu nekuda kwemari.   Anoti mune ramangwana Zifa inofanirwa kugadzirisa nhau idzi kuti zvakaitika kuEgypt zvisadzokorodzwe.   “Hazvina kunaka zvakaitika kuti Zifa inozotanga kutsvaga mari nguva yapera yekupa kune vatambi vemaWarriors. Mari ngaitsvagwe nguva iripo kuti vatambi vasazorambe kutamba izvo zvakazoitika, iye zvino zvakazokanganisa murairidzi basa rake. Vanhu iye zvino vave kuti ngaadzingwe basa asi havachatarise zvimwe zvikonzero zviitika kumakwishu aya. Asi Zifa ndiyo inoziva kuti ichiri kumuda here kana kuti vomudzinga.   “Zvakaitika zvakatodarika saka ngatichitange kugadzirira mitambo inotevera tione kuti togadzirisa papi pakanganisika. Vakomana kutamba vakatamba zvavo asi kumberi uko hapana zvavaiita.   “DRC takaidherera ndiko saka takazozvamburwa, Elvis Chipezese (mubati wepagedhi wemaWarriors) hapana hake zvaaikwanisa kuita nekuti chikwata cheDRC chaiuya kunge nyuchi. Tinopa sando kuna Billiat akatamba zvinofadza mumitambo yose,” anodaro.

headline: MDC Yopemberera Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Maviri Yaumbwa
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti iri kuenderera mberi neMugovera nehurongwa hwavo hwekupemberera kusvitswa kaitwa makore makumi maviri kubva parakaumbwa muna Gunyana 1999. Bato iri rinoburitsa mashoko aya zvichitevera mashoko ari kutumirwa pa social media achiti hurongwa hweMugovera hwakanzurwa. Murongi wemisangano mubato iri, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti hapana chachinja pahurongwa hwavo. VaChibaya vanoti kune vanhu vari kuda kuti musangano wavo usabudirira izvo zviri kupa kuti vanhu ava vati VaChamisa vachange vari kurufu kwaVaMugabe neMugovera. VaChibaya vanoti VaChamisa ndivo vachange vari munyarikani mukuru pahurongwa hwavo, uye vari kutarisira madzisahwira achibva kunze kwenyika kunge ari muRufaro Stadium. Vaimbi vane mukurumbira munyika vachange vachivaraidza vanhu nemumhanzi. MDC yakamisa hurongwa hwayo uhwu musi wa Gunyana 14 ichipa mukana wekuti nyika icheme VaMugabe, avo vakashaya kuSingapore musi waGunyana 6. No media source currently available

headline: VaMagaya Vokonzera Mutauro muNyika neKuti Vawana Mushonga weHIV
text: Muporofita Walter Magaya vechicgi yeProphetic Healing Deliverance kana kuti PHD vakonzera mutauro munyika nezuro mushure mekunge vati ivo nevamwe vavari kushanda kubva kuIndia vachiti vawana mushonga wekurapa chirwere cheHIV. Aka hakasi kekutanga VaMagaya vachitaura mashoko akadai sezvo muna 2016 vakambotaura kwaMutare kuti mweya mutsvene kuburikidza nemavari unokwanisa kurapa chirwere ichi. Vakambotiwo vanorapa chirwere chegomarara. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMagaya kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi vakataura mashoko aya panhepfenyuro yavo yeYadar TV vachiti pane muti wavakawana unosanganiswa nemumwe unowanikwa kuMozambique. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vati vanhu vanofanira kuramba vachinwa mishonga yavo yemaARV kwete kurega vachiti kwaita mushonga unorapa chirwere ichi kusvika vanachiremba vaita ongororo izere.

headline: Vakaremara Vanoti Hurumende Ngaishanda neMakambani Kuti Ivabatsire neZvikwanisiro
text: Vamwe vakaremara vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti ishande pamwechete nemakambani nemasangano akazvimirira mukutsvaga nzira yekuti vawane zvekushandisa zvinoita kuti hupenyu hwavo hureruke. Pastor Thomas Muchadenyika, avo vanogara kuNew Marimba muHarare vakaremara makumbo ese uye vanoshandisa madondoro vanoti kushayikwa kwezvikwanisiro kuri kuita kuti vakaremara vakawanda mumadhorobha nekumaruwa vatadze kushanda mabasa avo akasiyana siyana nekuendawo kuzvikoro. “Pane zvekushandisa zvevakaremara hazvisi kutowanikwa munyika muno.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Hongu hurumende yakanga yati yabvisa mutero kana kuti duty pane zvinoshandiswa nevakaremara zvakaita semadondoro, ma wheel chair nezvinoshandiswa nematsi kana mahearing aids, asi kuti munhu aende kunze kwenyika kunozvitenga mari yacho anenge asina, nekuti haasi kunopihwa mahara.” Mukuru weZimbabwe Albino Association Mai Mercy Maunganidze Chimanga vanoti nyaya yekushayikwa kwezvekushandisa zvevakaremara yave nenguva yakareba isingagadziriswe, “Nyaya yema assistive technologies yakakoshera vanhu vakaremara muhupenyu hwavo,”vanodaro Amai Chimanga. Vanotiwo, “Kubva tichitanga organisation muna 1996 tanga tichichema nehurumende yeZimbabwe kuti dai ma sunscreen lotion aiswa pa essential drugs list sezvo anoshandiswa zuva nezuva. Taitaura takatarisa vanhu vari HIV positive vanotora ma ARVs. Ma assistive devices aya anodhura uye vazhinji vedu havakwanise kuatenga. Uye zvikashayikwa zvinokoresa disability yemunhu.” Mai Chimanga vanoti hurumende inofanira kupa rutsigiro kumakambani kuti zvikwanisiro zvevakaremara zvigadzirwe muZimbabwe. “Iye zvino mukazvitarisa vanhu vane mental health vane mapiritsi avo anoda kutorwa pamwedzi pega pega, ve epilepsy vanoda mishonga yavo zvekare asi havasi kuzokwanisa kuzviita.” Vaenderera mberi vachiti mamwe matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende akanangana nekurerutsira vakaremara haasi kushanda. VaShingirai Nyakupinda vekuSunningdale muHarare vanova nhengo yeTracy Nyakupinda Albino Foundation vanoti zvikoro zvepamusoro zvinofanira kunge zvichiita ongororo netsvagurudzo pamusoro pezvikwanisiro zvevakaremara. “Hakuna chati chaitwa in terms of research pane zvinhu zvinobatsira vanhu, tichizvigadzirira tega tisingamirire kupihwa nema donors,” vanodaro VaNyakupinda. Vanoenderera mberi vachitiwo, Mahigher educational institutions edu pane ma projects avanoita vanokwanisa kugadzira zvakawanda. Tikatarisa ma hearing aids kana ma white cane, zvinhu zvinokwanisa kugadzirwa muno pasina zvekuzombomira pa waiting list. Saka tanga tichitarisira kuti kupera kwegore rino kana kutanga kwerinouya zvinhu zvichashanduka mu Zimbabwe tikwanise kuve ne progress paku addressa zvinhu zvakadai.” VaNyakupinda vanoti masangano evakaremara ndiwo anofanira kutaurirana nezvikoro zvepamusoro kuti vabatsirane nehurumende kugadzira zvinoshandiswa nevakaremara. VaEvans Tarwirei Chigariro vanodzidzisa mechanical engineering paHarare Polytechnic vanoti vakaremara ndivo vanofanira kutungamirira hurongwa hwekugadzirwa kwezvikwanisiro zvavo muno, asi chekutanga vanofanira kupihwa mukana wekuzviita. VaChigariro vanoti chinhu chinobatsira vakaremara chinofanira kugadzirwa naivo varidzi nekuti ndivo vanoziva zvavanoda. “Asingagone kutaura asi achiona anodzidziswa language yacho iyoyo, zvinoita, asingaone anodzidziswa, asinganzwe anotichwa, “ vanodaro VaChigariro. Vatiwo, “ Tiri mubishi rekunyora mapepa ekuti pamwe President akazviona anozvipasisa zvopindawo muma colleges edu. Zvototanga kushanda mugore ratiri kupinda ra2020. Research yatiri kutaura iyi haiitwi nemunhu ari able-bodied nekuti haana disability maari. Zvinoda kuti tidzidzise ari disabled wacho iyeye topedzisira tave nema leaders anoziva zve disability.” Sangano World Health Organisation rinoti munhu mumwechete pagumi rega rega revanhu vakaremara ari kurarama asina zvikwanisiro nekuda kwekudhura kwazvo pamwe nekutadza kunzwisisa nyaya dzevakaremara nevatungamiri venyika dzose zvadzo. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Akapakata Zvombo Anorambidza Musangano weCitizens'Coalition for Change kuMarondera
text: Mapurisa nhasi arambidza mutungamiri weCitizens Coalition for Change, VaNelson Chamisa, kuita musangano nevatsigiri vavo kuMarondera ndokuvapa maminitsi mashomanana ekuti vaudze vatsigiri vavo kuti vaparare. Mapurisa anga akapakatira pfuti nezvamboko uye achifamba nembwa nhasi afumira kunovhara mikova yenhandare yenhabvu yeRudhaka Stadium kuMarondera umo manga muchifanira kuitwa musangano naVaChamisa nevatsigiri vavo. Zviuru nezviuru zvevatsigiri veCCC zvanga zvauya kumusangano uyu zvazoswera zvichiimba zviri panze penhandare iyi zvakamirira hutungamiri hwebato razvo hwanga hwaenda kumatare kuti nyaya iyi igadziriswe. Pavazopihwa mukana nemapurisa wekuti vaudze vatsigiri vavo kuti vaparare, VaChamisa vati hapana chabuda kumatare kwavanga vaenda. VaChamisa vati havadi zvemhirizhonga ndosaka vateerera kurambidzwa kwavaitwa nemapurisa vachiti kana bato ravo rikapinda mumasimba hapana mupurisa kana musoja achadzingwa basa vachiti mapurisa nemasoja vanofanira kushanda vasina divi ravakarerekera. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weCCC, VaOstallos Siziba vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuenderera mberi nemusangano wavo wekuDulibadzimu Stadium kuBeitbridge mangwana zvisineyi nezvaitika nhasi vachiti chinovashamisa ndechekuti Zanu PF iri kungoita misangano yayo pasina kana dambudziko. Mumwe mutsigiri weCCC anga auya kumusangano wanhasi warambidzwa nemapurisa uyu, Amai Jane Chikandwa, vati kunyange hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa yarambidza VaChamisa kuita musangano nevatsigiri vavo nhasi hapana chichazovamisa kuvhotera pavanoda. Tamboedza kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi asi vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Asi mamwe mapurisa anga achirambidza veCCC kuita musangano wavo anga achiti ari kutyira kuti chirwere cheCovid 19 chinogona kupararira kana musangano uyu wakabvumidzwa kuenderera mberi. Asi izvi zvanga zvichipikiswa nevatungamiri veCCC vanosanganisira VaCharlton Hwende naVaAmos Chibaya pavanga vachitaura nemapurisa aya vachiti kana Covid 19 iriko zvechokwadi bato reZanu PF rinofanirwawo kurambidzwa kuita misangano yaro. Vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzema by-elections dzekutsvaga mumiriri weMarondera Central muparamende ndiVaCaston Matewu veCCC, VaIgnatius Mateveke vari kumirira Zanu PF pamwe naVaWitness Muzavazi avo vari kumirira MDC Alliance. No media source currently available

headline: Vakaremara Votarisira Kuti VaNcube Vaise Mari yeKuvabatsira muBhajeti ra2022
text: Vakaremara vari kukurudzira gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, avo vari kuparura bhajeti rehurumende ra2022 nemusi weChina, kuti vawedzere mari dzekuvasimudzira sezvo vaomerwa nehupenyu zvakanyanya. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, vachirwirawo kodzero dzevakaremara uye vasingaone, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pari zvino vakaremara vari kupihwa madhora zviuru zvitatu zvemunyika pamwedzi. Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reUnited Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization, kana kuti UNESCO, yakaburitsa pachena kuti vakaremara ndivo vakanyanya kuomerwa nehupenyu munguva yeCovid-19 muZimbabwe sezvo vainge vokundikana kuzviitira mabasa emaoko kana kupemha. Vasikana vakaremara vanonzi vari kumbunyikidzwawo zvakanyanya munguva dzino dzekurwisa denda iri. Vakaremara vanonzi neongororo iyi vari kutadza kuenda kuchikoro kana kuzvipatara. VaKuchera vati zvakakosha kuti paiswe mari parutivi yekuti vakaremara vakwanise kurapwa nyore. No media source currently available

headline: Maonero eHurumende yeAmerica Mukudyidzana neChina.
text: Kwemakore akawanda, hurumende yeAmerica yange ichikumbira China mune zvakanaka kuti imire mabasa ehutsotsi, kumbunyikidza uye kusora muAmerica. Asi kwemakore ose aya China yange ichiramba kuteerera. Nenyaya yekuita hunhinhi uku, America yakazomanikidzwa kuvhara muzinda weChina kuHouston, Texas mushure mekunge China yayedza kutora zvisiri pamutemo hunyanzvi hwezvekugadzia mishonga uye kuda kupa chiokomuhomwe kune vanhu makumi mashanu vanoshanda pamakambani anogadzira mishonga aya kuti vapihwe magwaro akakosha ekugadzira mishonga nehumwe humhizha. China iri kuyedzawo kutyisidzira zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi zviri muAmerica zvinopikisa kuti zvidzokere kumusha. Zvakaitwa neChina kuHouston zvakapfurikidza zvakanyanya zvakasiya hurumende yeAmerica isina chimwe chekuita kunze kwekuvhara muzinda uyu. Iri rimwe danho rakaomarara ratorwa neAmerica kudzivisa China iyo yopinda nemwenje mudziva. Kwemakore, vamiriri veChina vange vachibatwa zvakanaka neAmerica asi ivo vachibata vamiriri veAmerica munyika yavo neseri kweruoko. Izvi handi zvinhu zvakanaka. Asi hamusi muAmerica chete umo vamiriri veChina vanozvidza nyika inovaremekedza. Kubiwa kwemagwaro enjere neChina rave dambudziko rakomba pasi rose. Mazuva mashoma adarika matare emuAmerica akawana zvimwe zvizvarwa zvekuChina zviviri Li Xiaoyu naDong Jiazhi zviine mhosva yekusora makambani emuAmerica nekuba zvakakosha pamacomputer. Vaviri ava vakange vapedza makore gumi vachisora nekuba magwaro akakosha ane humhizha hwepamusoro hwemaindustry kunyika dzinosanganisira United States, Australia, Belgium, Germany, Japan, Lithuania, the Netherlands, Spain, South Korea, Sweden, ne United Kingdom. Zvose izvi zvinoratidza kuti China inodya zvevapfupi nekureba mukuda kwayo kuti ive nyika ine hupfumi hwakasimba pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Pastor Mugadza Vanoti Zimbabwe Inoda Kutongwa neVanhu Vane Hunyanzvi
text: Mumwe mukuru wechechi yeRemnant kuKariba akasungwa muna Zvita achiratidzira ari ega kuVictoria Falls uko kwaiitirwa musangano wepagore weZanu PF, anoti Zimbabwe inoda kuti itongwe nevanhu vane hunyanzvi kuti ibude mumadhaka mairi. Pastor Patrick Mugadza vakazobuditswa mutirongo neChina mushure mekubhadhara mari yechibatiso inosvika madhora makumi mashanu. Pastor Mugadza vainge vambonzi namejastiriti mumwe chete iyeye, Amai Lindiwe Maphosa, vabhadhare madhora mazana mashanu ayo vavakatadza kubhadhara. VaMugadza vakasungwa musi wa 11 Zvita vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvemusarinya. No media source currently available Vaimirirwa mudare redzimhosva negweta, rinoshanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaThulani Nkala,. Pastor Mugadza vanoti vanoziva kuti zvavari kuita zvinogona kuvatsakatisa sezvakaita kumurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaItai Dzamara. Asi vanoti nyaya yekuti vane rudo nenyika yeZimbabwe uye kutiwo vamwe, kusanganisira Jesu, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, uye mushakabvu Joshua Nkomo, vakazvipira mukurwisa zvakaipa zvinovapa simba rekuti varambe vachirwa semusambangwena

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanorumbidza Mauto Vachiti Kune Vavengi Vari Kurwisa Zimbabwe
text: Zimbabwe yacherechedza zuva remauto, kana kuti Defence Forces Day, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachiti Zimbabwe iri kurwiswa nevavengi pachishandiswa zvirango zvehupfumi pamwe nemadandemutande eSocial Media. Mumashoko avo ekupemberera Defence Forces Day, VaMnangagwa varumbidza mauto vachiti ari kuita basa guru mukudzivirira nyika kubva kuvavangi. VaMnangagwa vatenda mauto nekuramba akabatana pamwe nekumisa kuratidzira zvine mhirizhonga kwainge kwarongwa nemapato anopikisa nemasangano akazvimirira achishanda nevavati vavengi vemuno nekunze. VaMnangagwa vatiwo mauto anobatsira zvikuru mumatambudziko vakapa semuenzaniso rubatsiro rwakapihwa nemauto apo pakaita dutumupengo reCylone Idai apo mauto akabatsira kupa vanhu chikafu, kuvaka migwagwa nemabhiriji zvainge dzaparadzwa nedutumupengo iri. VaMnangagwa vati vari muchiuto vari kubatwawo neCovid-19 vakati vakambove mukuru wemauto emuchadenga kwenguva yakareba, VaPerence Shiri, pamwe nevaive mutauriri wemauto, Colonel Overson Mugwisi, nevamwe, vakashaya nedenda iri. Bato guru rinopikisa munyika, reMDC Alliance, ratiwo rinoyemura basa guru range riri kuitwa nemauto mukati memakore makumi mana apfuura, munyika, muSADC neAfrica. Mutauriri webato iri, Advocate Fadzayi Mahare, varumbidza basa guru rakaitwa nemauto paCyclone Idai. Mutevedzeri waAdvocate Mahere, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo mauto achiita basa guru rekuchengetedza runyararo, pane pamwe paanoshandiswa kurova vanhu izvo zviri kunze kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti mauto agare zvakanaka achitambirawo mari dzinofadza. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaJohnstone Chirwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanobvumirana kuti mauto anoita basa guru asi vakati havafari kuti mauto emuZimbabwe ave kushanda akarerekera kune rimwe bato. Asi muhurukuro yavakaita nenhepfenyuro yeZBC TV pamusoro peDefence Forces Day neMuvhuro manheru, mukuru weZimbabwe Defence Force, General Philip Valerio Sibanda, vakati mauto ndeevanhu uye aripo pakudzvirira nyika nevanhu vese. Vakati hazvifadzi kuti pane vamwe vanoshora nekutuka mauto vachiti izvi zvinokonzerwa nevanhu vanonyora manyepo nezvimwe zvisina kunaka pamamusoro pemauto paSocial Media. Mhemberero dzanhasi dzaitwa vanhu vari mudzimba nekuda kweCovid-19 pasi pedingindira rekuti: “The ZDF: Celeberating 40 Years of Excellent Service to the People.” No media source currently available

headline: Hurumede Yoronga Mutemo Unoomesera Vari Kutengesa Mari paMukoto
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemutemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vanoti mutemo uri kuda kudzikwa nehurumende kudzivirira kufambiswa kwemari zvechikiribidi kana kuti Money Laundering wakanangana nekuzadzikisa zvisungo zvemitemo yepasi rino inodzivirira mabasa evanopfurikidza mwero. VaZiyambi vanoti vatotanga kunyora bhiri remutemo uyu sezvo mutemo uri kushandiswa parizvino wakadzikwa muna Mbudzi gore rapera uchishanda kwemwedzi mitanhatu chete nekuti ndewechimbi chimbi unoitwa nemutungamiri wenyika dare reparamende risati razeya. Mutemo uyu unonzi Presidential Powers (Temporary Measures) (Amendment of the Money Laundering and Proceeds of Crime Act and Exchange Control Act) Regulations. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo dzinotiwo hurumende inenge iri kudawo kushandisa mutemo uyu kusunga vari kuchinja mari pamukoto zvikuru dhora rekuAmerica nemaRTGS. VaZiyambi vanoti kuvhunduka chati kwatara hunge uine katuruke vakayambira vanotengesa mari pamukoto kuti vachakandwa mutirongo. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Take Money’ onosimbisa mbabvu kuSA
text: SHASHA yetsiva yeWorld Boxing Council Super Bantamweight – Kudakwashe Memory “Take Money” Chiwandire – ari kusimuka akananga kuSouth Africa nemusi weMuvhuro uko achanogara masvondo maviri achiita gadziriro dzemutambo wake naZulina Munoz wekuMexico uyo ari kuda bhande rake.   Vatambi vaviri ava vacharwira bhande iri reWBC nemusi wa27 mwedzi uno kuHarare International Conference Centre.   Maneja waChiwandire ari zvakare murairidzi wake, Clyde Musonda anoti mwedzi uno wakakosha zvikuru kuna Chiwandire pamwe nemhuri yose yeZimbabwe sezvo achiti achanyora nhoroondo nekukunda Munoz.   “Tiri kuenda kuSouth Africa kwemasvondo maviri uko tichanosimbaradza gadziriro dzedu dzekusangana naMunoz. Mwedzi watapinda uno waNyamavhuvhu mukuru kwatiri nekuti tiri kuda chaizvo kuti bhande iri rirambe riri muno uye tiri kuvimbisa kuti richaramba riri muno.   “KuSouth Africa tiri kunosimbaradza gadziriro dzedu sezvo pasara mavhiki mashoma kuti mutambo wedu naMunoz uchisvika. Saka tichanotamba mitambo yehushamwari yakawanda (sparring) nevatambi vekuSouth Africa iyo ichabatsira Take Money mugadziriro dzake,” anodaro Musonda.   Take Money akakwisa kuhwina mutambo uyu apo achasangana naMunoz, anobva apihwa mukana wekurwira bhande reWBC Super Bantamweight Gold iro rina Yamileth Mercado wekuMexico zvekare. Akahwinha bhande reWBC Super Bantamweight Interim mwedzi yadarika zvichitevera kukunda kwaakaita Catherine Phiri wekuZambia.   Kuhwina kwaakaita bhande iri kwave kumuzarurira mikana muupenyu hwake.

headline: ‘Nhabvu inoda vatsigiri vemari’
text: ZVIKWATA zvenhabvu zvinokwikwidza muCastle Lager Premiership zviri kukurudzirwa kuti zvitsvage vanozvitsigira nemari kana zvichida kuti zvirarame muPSL. Kurudziro iyi yakaitwa nemutariri wePremier Soccer League, Kudzai Bare, nemusi weMuvhuro uno apo pakaitwa draw reChibuku Super Cup semi-final muHarare. Achitaura neKwayedza, Bare anoti zvinozivikanwa kuti mari inohwiniswa zvikwata zvemuno ishoma, nekudaro zvikwata izvi zvinofanirwa kuzvitsvagira vatsigiri vanozozvibatsira nemari. “Igaroziva kuti mari inohwiniswa ishoma asi zvikwata zvinokwikwidza muno hazvifanirwe kutambira nhabvu zvichiti zviri kutambira mari iyoyo nekuti haitombokwani kuchengetedza chikwata kwemwaka mumwe chete. “Saka chikwata chipi nechipi chine basa guru rekuzvitsvagira vakotsveri vanodira mari kuti chigorarama uye chisimbe. Ndizvo chete zvinodiwa sezviri kuita zvimwe zvikwata zvakaita seChicken Inn,” anodaro Bare. Gore rapera, chikwata chakasimudza mukombe wePSL chakahwiniswa $100 000 kozoti chakahwina weChibuku Super Cup chikapihwa $75 000 asi gore rino kambani inotsigira aya, yeDelta Beverages, inoti ichawedzera mari iyi kakapetwa katatu. Bare anorumbidza Delta nekutsigira kwairi kuita mutambo wenhabvu. “Sekuziva kunoita munhu wose, Delta ikambani hombe zvikurusa uye mabhajeti avo anoitwa gore richitanga saka zvinonetsa kuti tivapemhe kuti wedzerai imwe mari. Izvi zvinorongwa gore richitanga uye hapana aiziva kuti zvinhu zvichazomira semamiriro azvaita,” anodaro Bare. Zvakadaro, semi-final yeChibuku Super Cup – iyo ichatambwa svondo rino – ichaona ZPC Kariba ichisangana neHighlanders kozoti Harare City kana kuti Triangle ichasangana neNgezi Platinum Stars. Chikwata chichahwinha pakati peHarare City neTriangle ndicho chichazosangana neNgezi Platinum.

headline: Bhajeti reKanzuru yeMasvingo Rinoramba Kutambirwa neVagari Vakawanda
