text:
Vagari vemuguta reMasvingo vari kuramba kutambira bhajeti rekanzuru yavo regore rinouya remadhora mabhiriyoni mana vachiti rakakurisa zvikuru uye vagari vazhinji vachatadza kubhadhara mitero nekuda kwekuoma kwakaita hupenyu munyika.

Vachitaura neStudio 7 mushure mekuitwa misangano yekunzwa dzevanhu pabhajeti iri, vagari ava vanoti ivo zvikamu mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvishanu kubva muzana zviri kuda kukwidzwa mitero zvakakurisa sezvo vanhu vakawanda vachatadza kubhadhara mitero iyi. Mumwe mugari, Amai Beatrice Hamdziripi, vemumusha we Runyararo West, vanoti ivo kukwidzwa kwemitero uku kunomesera vagari vazhinji avo vasiri kuwedzerwa mari kwavanoshanda nekudaro vanozonetseka kubhadara mari idzi kana dzikakwidzwa nekanzuru.

Mumwe mugari, VaHardlife Tangayi wekuHillside, vanoti zvakaoma kuti kanzuru iwedzere mitero nezvikamu zvakadaro panguva iyo ruzhinji rwevagari rwuri kuvharirwa mvura nekutadza kubhadhara mari iri kudiwa izvozvi, nekudaro gore rinouya dhorobha rose rinogona kuzotadza kubhadhara mvura kana mitero iyi ikakwidzwa.

Gore rino vagari vazhinji vari kubhadhara mari yemvura iri pakati pezviuru
zvitatu nezviuru zvitanhatu zvemadhora pamwedzi. Mari iyi ikakwidzwa gore rinouya, vagari vanenge vobhara mari inotangira pazviuru zvisere nemazana masere ane makumi mashanu emadhora kusvika pazviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana manomwe emadhora emaRTGS. Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti kanzuru yakatarisa
zvinhu zvakawanda isati yakwidza mitero iyi, zvinosanganisira kukwira
kwemafuta emotokari dzebasa nemitengo yemishonga yekuchenesa mvura iyo inotengwa kunze kwenyika nemari yekunze.

Asi sangano rinomirira vagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate
Payers Alliance (MURRA) rinoti kunyange zvinhu zvakakwidzwa mitengo semafuta edzimotokari chikamu chekanzuru chakangokurisa uye vagari vazhinji kwavanowana mari haina kukwidzwa nezvikamu zvakadaro. Anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai
Magurupira, vanoti kanzuru iri kuda kusiya mugari ari parumananzombe.

Vamwe vagari vanoti zve chinonyanya kuvarwadza ndechekuti
vanokwidzirwa mari asi mvura yacho ichinetsa kuuya mudzimba dzavo. Mvura inouya kwemaawa mashoma shoma makuseni oga oga yobva yaenda voswera vasina mvura izvo zvinozoita kuti vashandise zvibhorani zviri mumawadhi asi panouya mapepa emvura, mitengo inenge yakakwira zvikuru. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reAfrican Parliamentarian’s Network Against Corruption, APNAC, Rinoudzwa Kuti Panofanirwa Kuve neMafungiro Matsva eKurwisa Huwori
text:
Kunyange hazvo nyika ine mitemo nemapazi akasiyana-siyana anobatsira
kurwisa huwori, izvi zvinonzi hazvina kukwana nekuti
chinhu chikuru chinodiwa ndechekuti vanhu vave nemafungiro pamwe
nemaitiro matsva pakurwisa huwori uhu. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wekuzeya mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzekurwisa huwori, uri kuitwa nenhengo dzeparamende dziri pasi pesangano reAfrican Parliamentarian’s Network Against Corruption kana kuti APNAC. Vachitaura semunyarikani kuburikidza nepadandemutande pamusangano
wekuzeya nyaya yekurwisa huwori waitwa muBulawayo, Muzvinafundo
Patrick Lumumba vekuKenya, avo vane mukurumbira munyaya dzekurwisa huwori, vati
kunyange hazvo pane vamwe vane maonero ekuti huwori hauna kuwanda
sezvinotaurwa nevakawanda munyika dzemuAfrica uye kuti nyika
dzekumadokero dzinobatsira mukuita kuti huwori huvepo munyika idzi,
chokwadi ndechekuti huwori idambudziko guru ratekeshera munyika
dzakawanda muAfrica.

Vati pane zvinhu zvakawanda zvinoitwa nenyika dzakawanda kusanganisira
Zimbabwe zvinosungirwa kuitwa nevanhu vanoshanda muhurumende senzira
yekudzivirira huwori asi huwori hunoramba huchitekeshera

///Zvinhu zvinoshamisa nekurwadza kuti zvisinei nekuti vashandi
vehurumende nevezvematongerwo enyika munyika dzakawanda muAfrica ndivo
vanowana mihoro yakaderera, vanowanikwa vari ivo vamwe vevanhu vane
hupfumi hwakakura munyika idzi. Pari zvino munyika dzemuAfrica
dzakawanda kana uchida kuve munhu akapfuma asi usingashande unoita
zvematongerwo enyika kana kuti unopinda muchiuto kana kuwana basa
repamusoro muhurumende.///

Vati kunyange hazvo pane mitemo uye nemapazi akasiyana-siyana
anobatsira kurwisa huwori, huwori uhu hunopera chete kana vanhu vakave
nemafungiro pamwe netsika itsva dzekuita zvinhu.

"Yasvika zvino nguva yekuti tiongorore hunhu hwedu tibvume kuti tiri
kuita zvinhu zvisina kufanira; tiri kutadza zvikurusa uye tinofanirwa
kuti tigadzirise kutadza kwedu uku. Hapana mitemo ichatibatsira
pakugadzirisa izvi; hapana matare achatibatsira pakugadzirisa
izvi…tinofanirwa kungochinja hunhu hwedu."

VaTemba Mliswa, avo vanove sachigaro wechikamu chemuZimbabwe
cheAfrican Parliamentarian’s Network Agaiant Corruption, uye vari nhengo yeparamende yakazvimirira, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanobvumirana nemaonero aMuzvinafundo Lumumba. Vashora nyaya yekuti vamwe vakuru vakuru vehurumende nemapazi
ehurumende vane chekuita nekurwisa huwori vanotadza kuvepo pamisangano
yakadai, vakatsinhira kuti zvakakosha kuti munhu wose azvipire panyaya
yekurwisa huwori.

VaBrian Dube avo vanove sachigaro vekomiti inoona
nezvekushandiswa kwemari dzehurumende mudare reparamende, kana kuti Public Accounts Committee, vatiwo vanotsigira maonero aVaLumumba.

Muzvare Memory Mbondiah vanomirira dunhu reMidlands pasi
pehurongwa hwe proportional representation vatiwo zvakakosha kuti pave nedzidziso
yakasimba kuvanhu vose munyika kusanganisira muzvikoro pamusoro
pekuipa kwehuwori.

Asi VaKuziwa Murapa vanove mutevedzeri wasachigaro weZimbabwe
Anti-Corruption Commission, kana kuti ZACC, vaudza Studio 7 kuti
kunyange hazvo vachibvumirana nemaonero aVaLumumba pane mitemo inoda
kuvandudzwa kuti kurwisa huwori munyika kunyatsobudirira.

Sangano reAPNAC rinopindwa nenhengo dzeparamende nesenate nekuda kwadzo
senzira yekuratidza kuzvipira kwadzo mukurwisa huwori. Musangano wekuzeya kurwisa huwori uyu unopera neMugovera. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Yokurudzirwa Kufambisa Basa reKunyoresa Vavhoti
text: Sangano reZimbabwe Election Support Network (ZESN) rinoti komisheni yezvesarudzo, yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, rinofanira kudoma kambani ichanyoresa vanhu kuvhota nemhando yeBiometric Voter Registration(BVR). Asi nyanzvi dzinoti ZEC inogona kushandisa nzira yaishandiswa kare nekuda kwechinono chairi kuita. Sangano iri rinoti ZEC inofanira kudoma nechimbi chimbi kambani ichapihwa basa yekunyoresa vavhoti pachishandiswa BVR kuti itange basa sezvo sarudzo dza2018 dzave pedyo. Vachitaura pamusoro peBVR pachirongwa cheQuill Speak muHarare, mukuru weZESN, Amai Rindai Chipfunge –Vava, vakati ZEC inofanirawo kujekesa mitemo yekuti chirongwa ichi chichashandiswa sei, sezvo pasina ruzivo kumapato ezvematongerwo enyika pamwe neveruzhinji pamusoro pechirongwa ichi. Vati ongororo yavakaita yemichina yeBVR, yakaitwa nemakambani ari kuda kupihwa neZEC, yakaratidza kuti michina iyi inononaka. Vakatiwo zvakakosha kuti Zec ishandiswe vadzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusoro kuti vashande sevanhu vachange vachinyoresa vanhu pachirongwa cheBVR sezvakaitwa kuKenya. Amai Chipfunde- Vava vanoti zviri pachena kuti hurongwa hweBVR huri kufarirwa neveruzhinji uye huchapedza mamwe matambudziko ange achiwanikwa pagwaro revavhoti rekare. Mukuru weElections Resources Centre, VaTawanda Chimhini, vaudza Studio7 kuti zviri pachena kuti chirongwa cheBVR chinenge chiri nani kudarika nzira dzaishandiswa kare. ZEC yatove kumashure pahurongwa hwayo hwekunyoresa vavhoti hwayakatura kuparamende. Pahurongwa uhwu ZEC yaifanira kunge yakatanga kunyoresa vavhoti muna Kubvumbikusvika munaMbudzi. Asi kusvika nhasi haisati yatombodoma kana kambani yaichashanda nayo pabasa iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemutemo uye vachidzisa paKent University kuBritain,VaAlex Magaisa, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvese zviri kuitika izvi zvinofanira kusuwisa veruzhinji. Vati mutemo hauna kunyatsojeka, uye pane mukana mukuru wekuti vanhu vanogona kunyoreswa pachishandiswa nzira dzakare. VaMagaisa vanotiwo zviri pachena kuti ZEC haikwanisi kuzvimirira uye inotoita zvinodiwa nehurumende. Amai Chipfunde-Vava vanoti zvakakosha kuti chirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti chitange pachine nguva nekuti hapana ruzivo pamusoro pechirongwa ichi. VaChimhini vati sezvo BVR ichishandisa mitezo yemuviri yakaita sezvigunwe maziso nezvimwe pane vanhu vari kuudzwa manyepo nekutyityidzirwa uye izvi zvinogona kukanganisa zvichabuda musarudzo. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZEC panyaya iyi. Asi zvichitevera kuongorora kwavakaita michina yeBVR kubva kukambani yekuGermany neChina, veZEC vakatoendesa magwaro ekuti vanoda kushanda nekamabani ipi kune veState Procurement Board avo vane mvumo yekutora danho rekupedzesera panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Youth Development Foundation Trust Yopa Chiedza Kune Vanotambura Kumusha
text: Basa rekubatsira vanoshaya chinhu chinonzi nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri mudunhu reTexas muAmerica, Advocate James Bayanai, chiri muropa ravo. Kubva muna 2010, Advocate Bayanai kuburikidza nesangano ravo reZimbabwe Youth Development Foundation Trust, vari kubatsira vana vechikoro pamwe nemhuri dzinoshaya vari mumaruwa muZimbabwe kuburikidza nekuunganidza rubatsiro rwakasiyanasiyana rwunosanganisira mabhuku nezvimwe zvinodiwa mukudzidza. Advocate Bayanai vanoti kubva nguva yavakatanga sangano reZimbabwe Youth Development Foundation Trust iri, vakwanisa kubatsira zvikoro zvakawanda kwazvo zvemunharaunda yeChirumhanzu mudunhu reMidlands pamwe neHurungwe kuMashonaland West. Vanoti kuburikidza nesanganpo ravo, vana vezvikoro zvakawanda vanoitawo makwikwi ezviperengo, kana kuti Spelling Bee Competition, ayo anozoita kuti vanenge vabudirira vazonokwikwidzana nevamwe vana vanobva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana dzemuAfrica. Mwedzi wapera Advocate Bayanai nesangano ravo vakatambanudza rubatsiro rwavo vachi[inda mumajeri umo vakawanikwa vachipa rubatsiro rwechikafu pamwe ne wheelchair kuvasungwa vekujeri reChikurubi Maximum Security Prison. Vanoti vakaberekerwa kwaChirumhanzu vakadzidza kuzvikoro zveko pamwe neMutasa mumusha weHighfield, vachizodzokera zvakare kwaHama Secondary School kuChirumhanzu kunoita zvidzidzo zvesekendari, pashure vakazoenda kuUniversity of Zimbabwe kwavakanoita zvidzidzo zvehugweta. Muna 2015 Advocate Bayanai vakazobuda muZimbabwe vachienda kuAmerica kunoita zvidzidzo zvavo zvepamusorosoro zvehugweta paTulane University Law School kudunhu New Orleans, vakazonogara kuDallas mudunhu reTexas mushure mekupedza zvidzidzo zvavo. Advocate Bayanai ndemumwe wezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kubatsira kusimudzira hupenyu neraramo zvevanhu vari kumusha paine tarisiro yekuvapa ramangwana rakajeka. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa muBulawayo Vozeya reMangwana Ravo
text: Vamwe vanorarama nekutengesa muBulawayo vanoti vanoda kuti kanzuru iwedzere nguva yayakavapa yekuti vabve pane imwe nzvimbo yavari kutengesera kuitira kuti vawane nguva yakakwana yekuenda kunzvimbo itsva dzavanofanirwa kutengesera vari. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano waitwa nevamwe vevanotengesa paGodini. Vanhu ava vakapiwa kusvika pakupera kwemwedzi uno kuti vabve panzvimbo iyi apo pari kuda kuvakirwa nzvimbo inenge iine zvitoro nemahofisi ichange ichinzi EGodini Mall. Kambani inofanirwa kuvaka nzvimbo iyi inofanirwa kutanga basa musi wa 1 Kurume, svondo rinouya. Murongi wemabasa muBulawayo Upcoming Traders Association, VaVincent Donga, vanoti vaita musangano nekanzuru yeguta reBulawayo vachiiudza kuti vanoda kuwedzerwa mazuva. Mumwe wevanotengesa paGodini, Amai Sekai Ndlovu, vabvuma kuti kanzuru yaive yavaudza kuti vanofanirwa kubva panzvimbo iyi uye kuti vakaudzwa nzvimbo itsva kwavari kufanirwa kunotengesera vari. Asi vati vane kushushikana nekubva panzvimbo iyi nekuti vave nenguva vachitengesera ipapo uyewo havana chokwadi chekuti kwavanonzi vaende kwacho vachange vachiwana vanhu vanovatenga vakawanda here sevavaichiwana paGodini. Munyori mukuru weBulawayo Upcoming Traders Association, VaDumisani Ncube, vatsigira kuti vanotengesera paGodini vanoda kuwedzerwa nguva yekubva panzvimbo iyi nekuti vakanonoka kuudzwa kuti vanofanirwa kubva. Vati sezvo kutengesa kuri iko kunopa raramo kuvanhu ava, kubviswa kwavo hakufanirwe kuti kuitwe zvechimbi-chimbi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumutauriri wekanzuru, Amai Nesisa Mpofu, kana kubva kuna meya, VaMartin Moyo, sezvo vange vachinzi vari mumusangano. Asi kanzuru yakazivisa gore rakapera nezvekuvakwa kweGodini Mall uye kuti vanotengesa vari panzvimbo iyi vaizofanirwa kubva. Kana yapera kuvakwa EGodini Mall inonzi ichavewo nenzvimbo itsva yevanorarama nekutengesa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana. Nzvimbo yeEGodini Mall inotarisira kuvakwa nemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Yotanga Kunyoresa Vanhu Kuti Vavhote Ichienda Pedyo neMisha Yavo
text: Sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika reZimbabwe Electoral Commission ratanga chirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti munharaunda dzavagere. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti vanhu vashoma ndivo vange vachinyoresa kuvhota. Pakashanyirwa imwe yenzvimbo dziri kunyoresa vavhoti neStudio 7 paTown House muHarare kwemaawa maviri hakuna akanyoresa kuvhota uye munhu mumwe akuya akanga achida kutarisa kuti zita rakerange richiri mugwaro revavhoti. Mumwe wevechidiki akanyoresa kuvhota akangoda kuzivikanwa nekuti Rumbidzai ati zvamuitira nyore chose kunyoresa sezvo awana pasina vanhu. VaTawanda Magunje vakatiwo vaenda kunonyoresa kumusha weHighfield mushure mekunge vapihwa dzidziso nebato ravo reZanu PF. Mumwe anorarama nekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa asina kuda kudomwa nezita akatiwo haana chaange arikuziva nezvenyaya yechirongwa cheZEC chekufamba kunzvimbo dzinowanda vanhu vachinyoresa vavhoti. ZEC iri kuita chirongwa chekunyoresa kuvhota ichi nyika yese kusvika musi wa28 Kukadzi. Harare nemusi weChipiri yainge iine nzvimbo dzekunyoresa makumi matatu neimwe. Amai Fiona Kurima vanove mukuru weZEC mudunhu reHarare vakaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe hazvo vange vasina huwandu hwevakanyoresa, pazuva rekutanga kazhinni, vashoma ndivo vanoenda kunonyoresa. Vakatiwo ZEC yakatanga kudzidzisa vanhu nezvekuuya kwechirongwa ichi muHarare nemusi wa30 Ndira. Vakatiwo chirongwa ichi ndechekungonyoresa kuvhota pamwe neavo vanoda kuchinja kwekuvhotera uye havasi kubatsira vanoda kutarisa mazita avo kuti arimo here mugwaro revavhoti. Vatiwo veZEC vachange vachifamba nzvimbo dzakasiya siyana pamazuva akatarwa aya. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weZEC Amai Leticia Kazembe kuti tinzwe huwandu hwevanyoresa kuvhota muzuva rekutanga. Asi ZEC inoti vari kunyoresa ava havakwanisi kuvhota musarudzo dzemaby-elections muna Kurume asi vanokwanisa kuvhita muna 2023. No media source currently available

headline: PSL: Vanhu votaura
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya dzemhirizhonga dziri kuitika kumitambo yakasiyana izvo zvakazokonzeresa kuti Premier Soccer League itore danho rekumisa mitambo yose yeCastle Premiership.   Svondo radarika kunhandare yeBarbourfields, kuBulawayo pamutambo weDynamos neHighlanders, vatsigiri vakapinda munhandare ndokutanga kubvarura mambure epagedhi pamwe nekuda kudzura mapango acho uye vamwe vachinorwisa varidzi vepembe.   Mutambo uyu wakazomiswa usati wapera apo Bosso yaive yakatungamira 1-0 nekuda kwemhirizhonga iyi.   Izvi zvakaita kuti PSL itore danho rekumisa mitambo yose nemusi weMuvhuro uno.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu ane mukurumbira munyika, Chris “Romario” Musekiwa anoti danho rakatorwa nePSL rakanaka zvikuru sezvo mhirizhonga yange ichiitwa nevatsgiri vezvikwata zvakasiyana isiri kurakidza chimiro chakanaka chemutambo uyu.    Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa   Anoti nhabvu inofanirwa kubatanidza vanhu kwete kuita zvemhirizhonga nekudaro vose vanokonzera kusagadzikana mumutambo uyu vanofanirwa kurangwa maringe nemutemo.   “Danho rakatorwa nePSL takarigamuchira zvikuru nemaoko maviri kuti vambogadzirise nyaya dzemhirizhonga idzo dziri kukanganisa chimiro chenhabvu yedu. Munhabvu, hamuna nzvimbo yemhirizhonga saka isu sevatsigiri tiri kuti bodo mhirizhonga, taramba.   “Vari kuzviita tinoti ngavasungwe nekuti vari kukanganisa chimiro chemutambo wedu izvo zvave kudzinga vakotsveri vanenge vachida kudira mari mumutambo kuti usimukire,” anodaro Romario.   Kuchiti mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu ane mukurumbira, Adomsi Mukwasi, anotiwo PSL yakanonoka kutora danho iri sezvo mhirizhonga yave nenguva ichiitika.   Anoti zvikwata zvine vatsigiri vari kukonzera mhirizhonga ngazvibhadhariswe muripo unorwadza pamwe nekubvisirwa zvibodzwa.   Izvi, anodaro Mukwasi, zvinopa chidzidzo kune zvimwe zvikwata kuti zvifundise vatsigiri vazvo pamusoro pekuipa kwemhirizhonga munhandare.    Adomsi Mukwasi   “PSL inofanirwa kutobata basa sebasa mukugadzirisa nyaya dzemhirizhonga idzi. Ngaigare pasi nehutungamiri hwevatsigiri vezvikwata zvakasiyana voonesana kuti mhirizhonga yopera sei.   “Nhabvu isati yatanga, ngapaitwe zvirongwa zvekushambadza kuipa kwemhirizhonga, vatsigiri votaurwa navo kuti vasiyane nemhirizhonga uye kuti vaone nhabvu murugare,” anodaro Mukwasi.   Mutauriri weDynamos FC, Tinashe Farawo, anotiwo chikwata chavo chiri kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya yemhirizhonga, kunyanya yakaitika kunhandae yeBabourfields svondo radarika izvo zvakazokonzera kuti mutambo wavo umiswe.   Pachinyorwa icho chakatumirwa paTwitter, Farawo anoti, “Dynamos inosuwiswa zvikuru nenyaya yemhirizhonga yakaitika mumutambo wedu neHighlanders zvikazokonzera kuti mutambo umiswe panzira.   “Chikwata chedu chinoshora zvikuru mhirizhonga yose inoitika kunhandare dzakasiyana.   “SeDynamos, takazvipira mukukurudzira kupedza mhirizhonga munhabvu yedu sezvo ungori mutambo wemhuri uyo unofanirwa kutambwa munzvimbo yakasununguka. Pakupedzisira, tese tiri vanhu vamwe chete, tiri zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe wani tose.”

headline: VaRegai Tsunga Vanosungwa Vachipa Vanhu Chikafu
text: Mumiriri weMutasa South mudare reparamende, uye vari nhengo yeMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaRegai Tsunga, vasungwa nemapurisa pamwe nevamwe vavo vanopfuura gumi vachipomera mhosva yekugovera upfu zviri kunze kwemutemo. Asi VaTsunga nevamwe vavo vazobhadhariswa faindi yemadhora mazana mashanu pamunhu kuitira kuti varegedzwe vachienda kudzimba dzavo. VaTsunga vaudza Studio7 kuti vasungwa nhasi mangwanani pamwe nevamwe vavo gumi nemumwe, kusanganisira kanzura weWard 11, kuBordervaile, VaFarai Bhiza, apo vange vachipa vagari veko upfu. "Mangwani anhasi tange tiri paMacs business centre muno maMutare tiri kubatsira vanhu vange vari kuchema nekushaya chekudya kuburikidza nelockdown iripo saka tange tichida kutora mari kuti tivatsvagire chekudya asi mapurisa haana kuda kunzwisisa kuti tange tiri kubatsira vanhu vakatiendesa kuMutare Central police station," vadaro VaTsunga. VaTsunga vati vazobatsirwa nemagweta, ayo anosanganisira munyoi wezvemitemo mu MDC, VaInnocent Gonese, kuitirakuti vakwanise kubvisa faindi kuitira varegedzwe. "Tabatsirwa nemagweta VaInnocent Gonese naVaKabaya kuti tiregedzwe tikanzi bvisayi mari $500 iyi tiregedzwe kana kuti tiendeswe kudare totongwa. Asi sekuona kwangu pange pasina nyaya nekuti tiri kubatsira hurumende." VaTsunga vati mhosva yavapomerwa nayo ndeyekufamba famba zvisina mwero panguva iyo nyika yakavharwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCOVID-19. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumukuru wemapurisa mudunhu reMutare, Amai Florence Marume, sezvo nhare mbozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. Mune imwewo nyaya kanzuru yeguta reMutare yakaitira vagari hurongwa hwemisika inotengesa zvirimwa kuti ive pedyo nenzvimbo dzavoanogara senzira yekuderedza huwandu mukuungana kwevatengesi vezvirimwa nevatengi kunzvimbo yemusika weSakubva Misika iyi yakaiswa mumisha yeSakubva, Dangamvura neChikanga. Asi vatengesi nevatengi vave kunyunyuta vachiti zviri kutengeswa zvacho zviri kuvadhurira zvakanyanya. Vagari vanoti vanhu vari kuuya nezvirimwa izvi vanenge vatotengawo kumusika weSakubva kwete kuti ndivo varimi vanenge vachitarisirwa kuhodhesa. Mugari wemaMutare, VaHerbert Dzakatira, vanoti zvakanaka kuti musika wauya pedyo hawo asi uri kuvadhurira zvakanyanya. Mumwewo mugari wemuHobhouse, Ambuya Laiza Munandi, vatiwo vanofara nekuvepo kwemusika pedyo asi vanochema nekudhura kuri kuita zvinhu zviri kutengeswa zvacho. Vanhu vazhinji maMutare vari kutevedzera kurudziro yekugara mudzimba sezvakataurwa asi mune dzimwe nzvimbo kucherechedza uku kuchiri kunetsa vakawanda, kunyanya vanenge vari mumisika, kana mumutsete yezvitoro vachitenga nevanenge vachikwirawo mabhazi. No media source currently available

headline: Kutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu Kwopa Kuti Zimbabwe Inetsane neAmerica, France neDzimwe Nyika
text: Kunyangwe hazvo hurumende iri kuti kuratidzira kuri kuitwa munyika kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi, zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi zviri kuratidza kuti zvichatoenda kumawere sezvo nyika dzingabatsire Zimbabwe mumadhaka mairi dziri kuratidza kuti dzave kufunga kaviri. Kuhurumende yeZanu-PF, mudzimu wakupa ronda wati nhunzi dzikudye. Apo hurumende yange yoswedera pedyo nekunyorerana chibvumirano nenyika dzakabudirira kuti ibhadhare mari yemutero pazvikwereti kana kuti maarrears, munyika mabva matanga kuita kusagadzikana nekuratidzira. Zimbabwe iri kuda mari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete yakawedzerwa pazvikwereti zvayo kuti itange kukwereteswa mari. Pane kugadzirisa chapa kuti musoro uteme, hurumende irikupomerwa mhosva yekutumira mapurisa kunorova vanhu izvo zvasiya vanopa mari ava vasina mate mukanwa. Nyika dzinofanira kunge dzichibatsira dzakaita seAmerica, Britain, France dzinoti hadzisi kufara nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nehurumende dzichiti kudyidzana neZimbabwe kunouya chete kana yarega kutonga nedemo. Asi pane kuti hurumende itaure nenyika idzi inonzi iri kutodya magaka mambishi ichiti nyika dzakaita seAmerica neFrance ndidzo dziri kuita zvaana tinhai dzirwe dzichipesvedzera vanhu kuti varatidzire. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti havashamiswe nedanho rotorwa nenyika dzekunze rekuramba kubatsira Zimbabwe nechikwereti. Chimwe chiri kunetsa panyaya yekusagadzikana kuri munyika inyaya yekuti vekunze vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi havauye kana munyika musina kugadzikana. Mutevedzeri wesangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe VaCallisto Jokonya vanoti kusagadzikana kuri munyika hakuna kunaka. Nyaya yeZimbabwe inengewo yave yekuti mwana atsva dumbu mai vatsva musana. South Africa yakakwidzawo nyaya yekunetsana kwayo neZimbabwe kuSADC zvichitevera kudzikwa kwemutemo weStatutory Instrument 164 wa 2016. Mutemo uyu unorambidza kupinda munyika kwezvinhu zvakawanda zvinotengwa kuSouth Africa. Gurukota rinoona nezvemabhizimisi VaMike Bimha vanoti vakadzika mutemo uyu kuti vadzivirire mabhizimisi emunyika. Asi South Africa inoti uku kutyora zvibvumirano zveSADC neComesa zvinoita kuti nyika dzitengeserane pasina zvimhingamupinyi. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi vari mutungamiri webato rePeople’s Democratic Party VaTenda Biti vanoti statutory instrument iyi kupedza nguva kuteya nzou neriva. Musangano pakati peZimbabwe nebhodhi reIMF waifanira kuitwa mwedzi unouya asi zvinenge zvakona n’anga murapwa achida. Vamwe vakuru kuIMF vanoti vakagara vazviona kuti Zimbabwe yainge iri kuremerwa nekuruka zano rekubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo. Izvi zvave kureva kuti nzara yapfunya chisero munyika ichatowedzera sezvo Zimbabwe isina kumwe kwekuwana mari yekutanga kana kusimbaradza mabhizimisi ari kushanda asi asina mari. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotsvaga Rubatsiro rwe$188m Ichabatsira Vakawirwa neMatambudziko
text: Zimbabwe iri kutsvaga rubatsiro rwemariu inodarika zana nemakumi masere emamiriyoni emadhora. Mari iyi ndetekubatsira vanhu vakawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu emvura. Izvi zvaziviswa nevakasanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, pamusangano wavaita nevamiriri vedzimwe nyika. Musangano uyu wapindwawo nesangano reUnited Nations Development Program, vemabhangi pamwe nevemakambani akazvimirira VaMphoko vati vamiriri ava nemakambani aya vanoziva dambudziko rakawirwa neZimbabwe uye hurumende yavo iri kuda rubatsiro rwemhando yese. Vatiwo hurumende ichaedza nepainogona napo kuona kuti mari yese ichabviswa ichaenda kunobatsira vanhu vakawirwa nedambudziko iri. VaMphoko vati mari yese iri $188m yavari kutsvaga ichange ichibatwa neveReserve Bank of Zimbabwe uye vese vanenge vabvisa mari yavo vanogona kupihwa humbowo hwekuti mari yavo yakashanda sei. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vati hurumende ichiri kuongorora kuti mari iri kudiwa imarii, asi vati vakawana $188 million, mari iyi inogona kubatsira zvakanyanya. Vatiwo musangano weSouthern Africa Development Community uchangobva mukuitwa wakaratidza kuti mashafamu akaparadza zvinhu zvakawanda muZimbabwe kudarika zvakaitika munyika dziri mudunhu rese. Mukuru weUNDP muZimbabwe, VaBishaw Parajuli, vati vatambira chikumbiro chehurumende uye vari kushanda nehurumende yeZimbabwe mukubatsira vese vakawirwa nedambudziko iri. Vatiwo zvinofadza kuti pane rubatsiro rwave kutopinda munyika. Mumiriri weChina muZimbabwe, VaHuang Ping, vati chikamu cheRed Cross chekunyika kwavo chakabvisa rubatsiro rwezviuru zvishanu zvemadhora uyewo vashandi vemuZimbabwe vanobva kuChina vakabvisa zviuru gumi zvemadhora zvekubatsira vakawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu. Rumwe rubatsirwo rwematende, mishonga nezvimwe zvasvika munyika neMuvhuro kubva kuJapan. Namibia yazivisawo kuti iri kuunza rubatsirwo rwechikafu runosanganisira magaba ehove miriyoni. Mukutanga kwemwedzi kwaKurume, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakati dambudziko remafashamu idambudziko renyika yese izvo zvinoita kuti hurumende ikwanise kutsvaga rubatsiro kunze. Pane vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu vakatofa munyika yese uye nemafashamu, ukuwo mhuri dzinodarika zviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu dzakaparadzirwa misha yadzo, zvikoro, mabhiriji nemakirinika zvikaparadzwawo munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vopesana Pamusoro peDanho reMDC Alliance Ichipikisa Zvakabuda Musarudzo
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanoti MDC Alliance ine kodzero dzekupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo sezvo kodzero iyi ichichengetedzwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 muChinhoyi vanoti kuendeswa kwegwaro renyunyuto kudare repamusoro reConstitutional Court kwakaitwa neMDC Alliance, ikodzero yechizvarwa chose munyika kuita izvi. Mumwe mugari wemumusha weveruzhinji weChikonohono muChinhoyi, VaTendai Mushonga, vanoti uyo achaonekwa nematare kuti ndiye akakunda anofanirwa kugadzwa pasina kumwe kunyunyuta. VaMushonga vanoti gwaro renyunyuto reMDC Alliance rave mumatare rakanaka sezvo richiratidza kuti munyika mune hutongi hwejekerere. Mumwe mugari wekuKaroi, VaTravor Chiwanga, vanoti vanhu havachina chivimbo nematare edzimhosva kunyange hazvo vanhu vakawanda vari kutarisira kunaka kwezvinhu zvisinei nekuti ndiani akunda nekuda kwehutongi hwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. VaChiwanga vanoti vakawanda vari kumamisha vari kuda kuti VaMnangagwa vagadzwe semutungamiri wenyika, ukuwo vari mumadhorobha vachiti dai tsamba yenyunyuto yabudirira kuitira kuti VaNelson Chamisa vagadzwe semutungamiri wenyika kuitira kuti nyaya dzezvehupfumi dzigadzirisike. Asi mumwe mugari, VaClifford Khupheko, vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo vari kurwadziwa kutkupikisa kweMDC Alliance kwave kumisa kugadzwa kwaVaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika. VaKhupeko vashoropodza kunonoka kuenda kumatare kwakaitwa nemagweta aVaChamisa vachiti mucherochedzo wekuti havana hany'a nenyika yavo. Dare reConstitutional Court rinofanirwa kupa mutongo waro mukati memazuva gumi nemana. Panyaya iri mudare, pane zvinhu zvitatu zvinofanirwa kuitwa nedare iri. Chokutanga rinofanirwa kuona humbowo hwaiswa pamberi paro neMDC Alliance, uye rikagutsikana kuti humbowo uhu hwakawandisa, uye hunotsigira kuti VaChamisa vakabiridzirwa, rinogona kuti VaChamisa ndivo vakasarudzwa zviri pamutemo, kana kuti rinogona kuti sarudzo iyi idzokororwe. Kana dare rikatadza kugutswa nehumbowo hwarapihwa, dare iri rinopa mutongo wekuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda. Mutongo weConstitutional Court haupikiswe, uye anenge anzi ndiye akakunda, anofanirwa kugadzwa semutungamiri wenyika mukati memaawa makumi mana nemasere. No media source currently available

headline: Zifa yomirira Hurumende
text: SANGANO rinotungamirira nhabvu munyika muno reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinoti rakamirira kupihwa mvumo neHurumende kuti mitambo yePremier Soccer League (PSL) ichitanga kutambwa.   Gore rino, nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 hakuna kumbobvira kwatambwa nhabvu yePSL zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaita mitambo pasi rose senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri.   Zifa inoti yakanyorera kuHurumende ichikumbira mvumo yekuti mitambo yePSL irongwe uye pari zvino yakatenderwe kuti mitambo yezvikwata zvenyika zvinosanganisira maWarriors, Mighty Warriors nezvevechidiki zvemaUnder-10 itambwe apo zvimwe zvacho zviri kukwikwidza kumitambo yakasiyana inosanganisira Cosafa iyo yange ichitambwa kunyika yeSouth Africa.   Panhau yenhabvu yePSL, Zifa inoti yakangopihwa mvumo yekuti zvikwata zvose zvimbotarisa kuti vatambi vazvo havana here denda reCovid-19 uye zvochitanga kuita gadziriro chete.   Competitions manager weZifa — Xolisani Gwesela — uyo anove zvakare mukushi wemashoko wesangano iri, anoti pari zvino vakangopihwa mvumo neHurumende yekuti zvikwata zvePSL zviite gadziriro chete.   “Iye zvino tingori nemvumo yekuti zvikwata zvePSL zvingoita gadziriro chete,” anodaro Gwesela.   Kunyika dzinosanganisira South Africa, Zambia, Malawi neMozambique nhabvu yave kutambwa asi pasina vatsigiri munhandare senzira yekurwisa Covid-19.   Parizvino munyika muno nhabvu yangotambwa ndeyechikwata chemaWarriors icho chakatamba neAlgeria mumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuAfrica Cup of Nations 2021 iyo ichatambirwa kuCameroon kozoti yeCAF Champions League iyo yakaona shasha yemuZimbabwe — FC Platinum — ichisangana neCosta dol Sol yekuMozambique.   Gwesela anoti vari kuita zvose zvavanokwanisa kuti nhabvu ichidzoka.   “Sekutaura kwandaita, takangomirira mvumo kubva kuHurumende kuti mitambo yePSL ichitanga,” anodaro.   Gore rino rave kusvika pakupera uye richaita rekutanga munhoroondo yenyika ino kupera nhabvu yePSL isina kumbotambwa izvo zvakonzereswa nechirwere cheCovid-19.

headline: Mari yeMudyandigere yeNSSA Yowedzerwa Kusvika paMadhora Makumi Matatu ekuAmerica
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi nemagariro evanhu Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti kutanga mwedzi uno mari dziri kutambirwa nevari pamudyandigere dziri kuwedzerwa kusvika pamadhora makumi matatu ekuAmerica kana kuti US$30. VaMavima vati hurumende ine chido chekuti vari pamudyandigere vatambire mari inosvika makumi matanhatu emadhora kana kuti US$60 inokurudzirwa nesangano reInternational Labour Organization mukupera kwegore. No media source currently available Mari iri kuwedzerwa inenge ichipihwa vari pamudyandigere vaibhadhara mari kuNational Social Security Authority kana kuti NSSA nemadhora emunyika ichienzaniswa neyepamusika wemari weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe kana kuti RBZ foreign currency auction. Asi munyori mukuru wesangano reAssociation of National Social Security Retirees VaGideon Shoko vanoti mari iri kutambirwa iyi haikwane sezvo iri pasi zvakanyanya pamari yekuti mhuri irarame. Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency inoti mhuri ine vanhu vashanu inoda mari inodarika zviuru makumi maviri nemasere pamwedzi kana kuti ZW$28, 000. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Yoronga Kuratidzira muHarare Svondo Rinouya
text: Mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance unoti uri kuzoratidzira muHarare nemusi weChitatu svondo rinouya uchinyunyuta nemabatirwo awunoti ari kuitwa gadziriro yesarudzo nekomisheni yezvesarudzo ye Zimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC. Mubatanidzwa uyu unoti ZEC haisi kubuda pachena panyaya yegwaro remazita evavhoti uye nyaya yekudhindwa nekuchengetedzwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa. Asi ZEC inoti iri kungozorwa mafuta enguruve yaisina kudya ichiti zvimwe zviri kudiwa nemapato anopikisahazvikwanisike. Munyori mukuru weMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa VaGouglas Mwonzora, vanove zvakare munyori mukuru weMDC Alliance, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachafora kubva kuAfrica Unity Square kuenda kumahofisi eZEC nekudzoka. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nemunyori anoona nezvekurongwa kwemabasa muMDC-T VaAmos Chibaya avo vanoti chavari kungoda chete ndechekuti ZEC ivazivise kuti mapepa ekuvhotesa achadhindwa kupi uye achachengetedzwa kupi uye nani. VaChibaya vanoti hapana sarudzo dzinoitwa munyika kana pasina gwaro revavhoti rakachena uye pasina kugadziriswa nyaya yekuti mapepa ekuvhotesa achadhindwa nani. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa neCovid-19 Iyo Yapararira muZvikoro Kunyangwe Hurumende Iri Kuti Yakagadzira
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weSvondo kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika. Pavanhu ava, vaviri vakafira kuBulawayo mumwe chete kuMasvingo. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika vave mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevasere kana kuti 268 kubva zvachatanga kupararira muna Kurume. Vamwe vanhu makumi mana nevasere vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi nemusi weSvondo wakare zvichireva kuti vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga vave zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana maviri nemakumi maviri kana kuti 9,220. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zviuru zvisere nemazana maviri nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 8, 250 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu gumi nevashanu vapora nemusi weSvondo. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 702. Hurumende inengewo yave kutatarika zvakanyanya kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi muzvikoro, zvikoro zvakaita seJohn Tallach High School, Emakhandeni Primary School, Matopo High, Prince Edward, National University of Science and Technology, Chinhoyi University of Technology nezvimwe zvakazivisa kuti zvine vana nevarairidzi vainge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga vakayambira kuti chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvine hukasha sezvo vanhu vasisatevedzeri kurudziro dzekumisa kupararira kweCovid-19. NeMuvhuro chikoro cheChinhoyi High chinonzi change chichirambidza vamwe vana kupinda mushure mekunge mumwe mwana abatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera. Pasvika Studio 7 pachikoro ichi mangwanani vana vose vanodzidza vachibva kumba vange vachidzoserwa kudzimba. Vana vanga vachibvumirwa kupinda pachikoro vana vari kunyora bvunzo chete. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru webazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West Dr Gift Masoja vanoti vakakurudzira kuti vana vambomisa zvidzidzo nekutyira kuti chirwere ichi chinopararira pachikoro ichi. Dr Masoja vanoti vakabva vawongorora vamwe vana vanosvika makumi mashanu nevashanu vanodzidza nemusikana uyu pamwe nevadzidzisi gumi vakambodzidzisa vana ava svondo rapera. Patabvunza kuti matanho api avari kutora kuti vana vari kunyora vachibva kumba nevanogara pachikoro vasa tapurirane chirwere, mukuru webazi rezvedzidzo mudunhu reMashonaland West VaGabriel Mhuma vati vana vari kunyora bvunzo vanodzidza vachibva kumba nevanodzidza vachigara pachikoro vanonyora mumakamuri akasiyana. Mumwe mwana adzoserwa kumba uyo watisingakwanise kudoma nezita sezvo asati abvazera anoti vadzoserwa kumba vachinzi vazodzoka kuchikoro kupera kwemwedzi uno. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti vadzidzi vari pazvikoro zvine vana vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vanofanirwa kuwongororwa vose. No media source currently available Dzimwe nhengo dzedare reparamende dzakakurudzira hurumende kuti ivhare zvikoro sezvo chirwere cheCovid-19 chave kupararira asi vanotungamira mabasa ehurumende mudare iri vari gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakati hurumende yakagadzirira. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nevanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro avo vati zvikoro zvishoma ndizvo zvawirwa nedambudziko uye vari kukurudzira zvikoro kuti zvitevedzere kurudziro yavari kupa nebazi rezvehutano kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Votarisirwa Kutura Mashoko avo kuMhuri yeZimbabwe
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kutura mashoko avo kumhuri yeZimbabwe kana kuti State of The Nation Address, SONA, neChipiri masikati mudare reparamende. Asi bato guru rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rinoti nhengo dzaro dzeparamende dzichatora matanho ekuratidzira panguva iyo VaMnangagwa vachange vachitaura sezvo bato iri risinga vacherechedze semutungamiri wenyika. Mutauriri webato reMDC, VaDaniel Molokele vanoti bato ravo richiri kutsvaga nzira dzekuratidzira nadzo, sezvakamboita munguva dzapfuura apo mutungamiri wenyika vaitaura kuparamende, dzinosanganisira kubuda mudare. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF, vari mumiriri weBulilima West muparamende, VaDingimuzi Phuti, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kana nhengo dzeMDC dzakabuda muparamende VaMnangagwa vachitaura ndidzo dzinenge dzarasikirwa zvikuru. VaPhuti vati mutungamiri wenyika vari kutarisirwawo kuzivisa nyika pamusoro pematanho ari kutorwa nehurumende yavo ekugadzirisa nyaya dzezveupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, Vanosaina Bhiri Richaita Kuti Vanhu Vapiwe Rubatsiro Munguva yeCovid-19
text: Apo zvinhu zvanga zvoratida sekunge mamwe mapazi ehurumende yeAmerica achambovhara kutanga neChipiri nekuda kwekusavepo kwemari yekushandisa, mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaDonald Trump, neSvondo manheru vakasaina bhiri rinobvumidza kuvepo kwemari $2.3 trillion yekubatsira mapazi aya. Pmari yosei iyi, mazana mapfumbamwe emabhiriyoni emadhora, kana kuti $900 billion, ichabatsira vanhu munguva ino yecoronavirus, kuchiti imwe inoita $1.4 trillion ichashandiswa nemapazi ehurumende kusvika muna Gunyana wegore rinouya. Kunyange hazvo VaTrump vakasaina bhiri iri, vari kugunun’una zvikuru vachiti mari iri kupiwa vanhu kuti vabatsirikane munguva ino ye coronavirus ishoma zvikuru mushure mekunge matare eparamende nekongiresi apasisa bhiri iri svondo rapera. VaTrump vakati vakasaina bhiri iri sedanho rekudzora rubatsiro rwakanga rwuchipiwa vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi nemana vakanga varasikirwa nerubatsiro rwunipowa vasingashande pamwe nemhuri dzakavhiringwa nedenda reCovid-19, uyewo kuitira kupa mukana kune makambani ari kutatarika. Munhu mumwe nemumwe ari kutarisirwa kuwana mari inoita madhora mazana matanhatu kana kuti US$600.00 yekubatsirikana nayo munguva ino ye coronavirus, asi VaTrump vanoti munhu oga oga aifanirwa kupiwa madhora zviuru zviviri zvemadhora. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuSouth Carolina muno muAmerica, VaPromise Sande, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaTrump zvakanaka chose sezvo zvichibatsira hurumende pamwe nevanhu vari kutambura. "Zvinhu zvanga zvakatarisirwa uye kusaina kwavo kuchabatsira zvikuru vanhu vemuAmerica," VaSande vanodaro. Vanoti veruzhinji vanogona kutanga kutowana mari idzi mukupera kwemasvondo maviri. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi , Vashandirwi Vopesana paBhiri Richavandudza Mutemo weMabasa neVashandi
text: Gweta riri kumirira vashandi veZuva Petroleum vakadzingwa basa, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vanoti vanotambira nemaoko maviri bhiri rehurumende iro riri kuda kuvandudza mutemo wevashandi nemabasa. Bhiri iri riri kutarisirwa kununura vashandi vanodarika makumi maviri ezviuru avo vanonzi varasikirwa nemabasa kusvika pari nhasi zvichitevera mutongo wakapiwa nedare reSupreme Court mwedzi wapera. Bhiri iri riri kutarisirwa kupinda mudare reparamende nemusi we Chipiri, rozonzwikwazve mudare reseneti nemusi weChina. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanozotarisirwa kuisa runyoro rwavo pabhiri iri chero nguva kubva nemusi weChishanu kuti uve mutemo. Kana rave mutemo, bhiri iri rinotarisirwa kubatsira vashandi vakadzingwa mabasa vakaenda vasina chekupukutisa dikita, kuti vakwanise kupiwa mihoro yemasvondo maviri pamagore roga-roga ravakagara pabasa. Muzvinafundo Madhuku, avo vanotungamirawo bato reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, vanoti chakangoipa chete pabhiri iri ndechekuti riri kuda kuti vashandi vakamiswa mabasa vapiwe mari shoma kana pachitariswa zvavakaitira makambani akavamisa mabasa aya. “Mutemo wakanaka chose,” Muzvinafundo Madhuku vanodaro. “Ndizvo zvatagara tichifunga kuti mutemo wedu unofanirwa kuita.” No media source currently available Asi mukuru wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare, vanoti bhiri iri ramhanyiswa zvakanyanya pasina kutarisiswawo huipi hwaro, izvo zvichaita kuti vanoda kusima mari dzavo munyika vasauye. “Handizvo zvakataurwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaMugabe pazuva rekucherechedza magamba,” vanodaro VaMufukare. “Tinofunga kuti pane zvizhinji zvaifanirwa kutanga zvatariswa kuitira kukwezva vanoda kupinda munyika.” No media source currently available

headline: ‘Hupenyu hwevatambi hwoendeka’
text: MURAIRIDZI weTriangle United kana kuti Sugar Sugar Boys, Taurai Mangwiro, anoti kudzoka kwenhabvu kuri kuona hupenyu hwevatambi vakawanda huchitanga kuendeka sezvo vazhinji vange vakakanganisika nekugara kudzimba senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Nekuda kweCovid-19, gore ra2020 nhabvu yePremier Soccer League (PSL) haina kumbotambwa sezvo mitambo yose yakambomiswa.   Izvi zvakaona vamwe vatambi venhabvu vachikwangwaya sezvo vachirarama nemutambo uyu. Asi zvichitevera kudzoka kwenhabvu mwedzi wadarika, zvikwata zvemuPSL zviri kutatsurana mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup.   “Kugara kumba kwange kwakaoma uye hupenyu hwevatambi vazhinji hwakambokanganisika nekungogara nekuti mari yange isisauye.   “Mutambi wenhabvu kana akangogara mari haiuye, kune mari yakaita seyemabhonasi iyo inouya kana chikwata chahwina. Mari iyi inobatsira vatambi saka yaisauya sezvo nhabvu yange isiri kutambwa. “Asi kudzoka kwaita nhabvu kwave kusunungura zvakawanda uye hupenyu hwevatambi hwave kusimukira manje,” anodaro Mangwiro.   Mangwiro mumwe wevarairidzi vashoma vakakwanisa kuhwina mukombe weChibuku Super Cup uyo akahwapura mugore ra2018 izvo zvakazoona chikwata chake chichikwikwidza mumutambo weCAF Confederations Cup muna2019.   Mwaka uno, chikwata chake hachina kutanga zvakanaka mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup zvichitevera kukundwa kwachakaitwa mitambo miviri yekutanga 3-1 neNgezi Platinum Stars uye 2-1 neFC Platinum.   Mangwiro anoti vakatanga zvakashata asi vari kushanda nesimba kuti vadzoke mumutambo uyu uye vagohwina zvekare.   “Kuti uhwine mikombe yenhabvu inotoda kushandirwa zvakasimba saka isu tiri kushanda nesimba kuti tigohwina.   “Ndinobvuma kuti hatina kutanga zvakanaka asi chandinoziva ndechekuti tichiri nemimwe mitambo iyo ticharwa semvumba kuti tisabude mumutambo uyu.   Mitambo yedu yekutanga yakatirakidz kuti tange tichiri nengura. Asi, tine mimwe yatichatamba ndinoziva tichahwina uye togadzirisa pange pachikanganisika. Saka tiri kufanirwa kutokunya dzisimbe kuti tihwine,” anodaro Mangwiro.

headline: VaBiti Vanoti Kudzika Mutemo weKutara Mitengo Kunoratidza Kuti Njuga dzeHupfumi Dzoremera VaMthuli Ncube
text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, avo vakambove gurukota rezvemari, vanoti mutemo wechimbi chimbi wakadzikwa nehurumende wekutara mitengo yezvinhu munongedzo wekuti Zimbabwe yatadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Mashoko aya anopesana nezviri kutaurwa negurukota rezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, avo vakaudza vanoita zvekushanyirwa kwenyika svondo rapera kuti hupfumi hwagadzikana uye mutemo uyu unobatsira kuzvisimbaradza. Svondo rapera hurumende yakadzika mutemo wechimbi chimbi kana kuti Presidential Powers (Temporary Measures) (Financial Laws Amendment) Regulations 127 of 2021 unosungira vemabhizimisi vose kuti vatengese zvinhu nemutengo wedhora rekuAmerica wepamusika weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, Foreign Currency Auction kwete pamukoto. Asi mumashoko kuvatori venhau masangano anomirira vemabhizimisi akaita seZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries neEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe anoti mutemo uyu uri kuomesera vemabhizimisi vakawanda sezvo vasiri kukwanisa kuwana mari pamusika weRBZ uyu. VaBiti vanoti vanowiriranawo neveZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vakakwira kudare repamusoro nemusi weChina vachipikisa mutemo mutsva uyu vachiri unotyora bumbiro remutemo. No media source currently available Ko masimba ekuti mutungamiri wenyika adzike mitemo zvechimbi chimbi pasina kuenda kudare reparamende unoshanda sei chaizvo? Gweta VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka avo vanombomirira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, uye vakasarudzwawo nemusi weChina kuva sachigaro webhodhi rePetrotrade rinoona nezvemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari vanoti hapana chakaipa pamutemo uyu sezvo uchishandiswawo nenyika dzakawanda dzakaita seAmerica sezvo kuenda kudare reparamende kuchigona kutora nguva. No media source currently available  .

headline: Hurumende Yotatarika Kutenga Mafuta eKufambisa Motokari
text: Zvinhu munyika zvaita manyama amire nerongo sezvo makambani anotenga mafuta edzimotokari ari kuti ari kutadza kuwana mari kubva kubhanga guru renyika rereserve bank of Zimbabwe. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvemhando dzemoto VaPatson Mbiriri vanoti hurumende iri kuita chipatapa kuyedza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kuti munyika musaite dambudziko rekushomeka kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Izvi kumwana weZimbabwe inenge yave nhamo yechikwepa kuti uku chakarumwa uku chinotsva. Parizvino vanhu vari kuswera vakamira mumitsetse kutsvaga mari kumabhanga. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF inomirira Dangamvura-Chikanga mudare reparamende uye vaine mabhazi VaEsau Mupfumi vanoti vanhu vekuManicaland vanenge vange vogara havo vachienda kunotenga mafuta kuMozambique uko mutengo wacho wakaderera. VaMupfumi vati havo zvinonetsa kuziva kuti mafuta aya haakanganise here dzimotokari. Vatiwo vane chivimbo chekuti hurumende ichagadzirisa dambudziko iri risati rakomba. Mutungamiri weconfederation of Zimbabwe industries VaBusisa Moyo vanoti dambudziko iri rikasagadziriswa zvichaomera vemabhizmisi. Vatiwo pane makambani akawanda achatatarika sezvo achishandisawo mafuta aya. Vakawanda vari kushamisikawo kuti sei zimbabwe iri kutatarika nekushaya mafuta edzimotokari iyo iine kambani yemafuta enzimbe yeGreen Fuel? Vaimbova gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto VaElton Mangoma vave kutungamira bato reRDZ vanoti nyaya yehuori ndiyo yakanganisa chirongwa ichi. Ko chii chingaitwe nehurumende kuti dambudziko iri ripere? VaMangoma vanoti hurumende yaVaMugabe yaremerwa nemutoro wekutungamira nyika. Nyaya yekushomeka kwemafuta iyi hachisi chinhu chitsva muZimbabwe. Kubva muna 2000 pachine kambani yehurumende yenoczim zvinhu zvainetsa zvichikonzerwa kunnyaya nenyaya yehuori nekushomeka kwemari yekunze. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti dambudziko iri rikasagadzirwa nechimbichimbi hupfumi hwenyika hunogwadama.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vobatana neVatungamiri veAfrican Union Kushora Kupidigurwa kweHurumende neMauto
text: Vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vakawanda vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nekusagadzikana kwezvinhu munyika dzakawanda zvikuru kune hurumende dzakapidigurwa nemauto. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wemazuva maviri wepagore weAfrican Union wakaitirwa kumuzinda wesangano iri weAddis Ababa, Ethiopia ukapera neSvondo. Nyika dzine hurumende dzakapidigurwa nemauto dzinosanganisira Mali, Guinea, Burkina Faso neSudan. Nyika dzose idzi dzakatombomiswa kuve nhengo dzesangano reAfrican Union. Sachigaro weAfrica Union Commissionn VaMoussa Faki vakati vari kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya yekupidigurwa kwehurunde nemauto. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vange vari kumusangano uyu vakashorawo nyaya yekubvuta masimba nechisimba pachishandiswa mauto. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti VaMnangagwa ndemumwe akapidugurawo hurumende achishandisa mauto muna 2017. Nyaya yekuti Israel yova muongorori kana kuti observer here kuAfrica Union yakonzerawo mutauro nyika dzakaita sedzakawanda dzemuSADC, Nigeria, Algeria dzichiti hadzidi kuti Israel iri kunetsa nePalestine ipihwe chiremera ichi. Asi DRC, Morroco, DRC nedzimwe dziri kutsigira Israel. Nyaya iyi yakambonzi isendekwe parutivi yozozeyiwa gofre rinouya. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau neMugovera, Africa Union yakati mutungamiri wenyika yeSenegal VaMack Sall ndivo vainge vasarudzwa kuva sachigaro wegungano iri kusvika gore rinouya. Dingindira regore rino rakanangana nekusimbisa nyaya dzekurwisa nzara kuburikidza nekurima nekusimbaradza nyaya dzezvehutano nechinangwa chekusimudzira magariro evanhu kana kuti “Strengthening Resilience in Nutrition and Food Security on the African Continent: Strengthening Agro-Food Systems, Health and Social Protection Systems for the Acceleration of the Human, Social and Economic Development.” Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti dingindira iri rakanaka chose asi muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi. Vanoti vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vanofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuti pave ebudiriro.

headline: Tinosvika kure: fc Platinum
text: SHASHA yeCastle Premiership, FC Platinum, inoti shuviro yayo kuti ive chimwe chechikwata zvikuru muAfrica yese kuburikidza nekutamba nhabvu yepamusoro-soro.   Pure Platinum Play, sezita remadunhurirwa reFC Platinum, ndiyo iri kutungamira palog reCastle Premiership uye yasarirwa nemitambo 10 kuti ichengetedze mukombe wayo uyo yakahwinha mwaka wadarika.   Ikakwanisa kuzviita zvakare mwaka uno inobva yapinda muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti Dynamos, CAPS UNITED neHighlanders izvo zvakakwanisa kuchengetedza mukombe uyu mushure mekunge zvauhwinha kubva gore ra1980.   Kuhwina kwakaita Platinum mukombe uyu gore radarika, yakabva yaita chikwata chekutanga chisiri chemuHarare neBulawayo kutora mukombe uyu.   Mukushi wemashoko weFC Platinum, Chido Chizondo, anoti hurongwa hwavo ndewekurwira kuti vave shasha dzemuZimbabwe uye nekuvewo chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru muAfrica.

headline: Telecel Zimbabwe Yoronga Kuendesa Hurumende kuMatare eKunze
text: Kambani yeTelecel Zimbabwe yapa hurumende mwedzi mitanhatu yekugadzirisa nyaya yekukanzurirwa kwayo rezinesi nehurumende. Kambani iyi inoti izvi zvikakundikana inenge yokwira kudare re International Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes riri muWashington DC rine hukama hwakasimba neWorld Bank. Telecel Zimbabwe yakanyorera tsamba mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, gurukota rezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko, VaSupa MaMushowe, uye mukuru we Potraz, VaBaxton Sirewu. Telecel Zimbabwe yakakanzurirwa rezenisi ichipomerwa mhosva yekusatevedzera mutemo wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema unoti makambani ekunze anofanira kupa zvikamu makumi mashanu nechimwe kubva muzana kuvatema vemunyika. Izvi zvinonzi zvapawo kuti VaMandiwanzira vaite musangano nevamiriri vekune dzimwe nyika vachitsanangura mamiriro akaita zvinhu muTelecel Zimbabwe. Zimbabwe yave nenhoroondo yekuendeswa kumatare ekunze ichipomerwa mhosva dzekutyora zvibvumirano zvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye kutyora mitemo yayo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMandiwanzira kuti tinzwe zviri kuitika. Muzvibabhizimisi vachishanda nesangano reResource Exploitation Watch, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vanoti Telecel Zimbabwe haifanire kumhanyira kumatare ekunze isina kupedza emunyika. No media source currently available Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti vari kunetsekana zvikuru nenyaya yekuti vashandi vanogona kurasikirwa nemabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanoita Mabasa eMaoko Vochema Vachiti Havasi Kukosheswa neHurumende
text: Vanoita mabasa emaoko pamwe nekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa vanoti vari kuomerwa zvikuru kuti vawane mari yekunyoresa zviri pamutemo, kuitira kuti vatange kuita mabasa zvichitevera kumbomiswa kwavakaitwa nekuda kweCovid-19. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko emutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vakazivisa svondo rapera kuti vanozviitira mabasa avo emaoko kana kuti vari mu informal sector, vanofanira kugadzirira kushanda zvekare asi vachifanira kutanga vanyoreswa kuti vashande zviri pamutemo. Mabhizimisi mazhinji aya ange akavharwa kubva musi wa 30 Kurume apo hurumende yakasimbaradza kurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 ichiti vanhu vagare mudzimba. Munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Associations, VaWisbon Malaya, vanoti zvimwe zviri kudiwa kuti vatange mabasa zviri kuvanetsa kunyange vatotanga havo kuchenesa nzvimbo dzavanoshandira. Vanoti vari kuda kunzi vanyorese kumakanzura vopihwa marezinesi uye kuuya netsamba dzinoratidza kuti havasi kurwara. Izvi vanoti zvinoda mari yakawanda uye zviri kuvaremera sezvo vave nengiva vasiri kushanda. Asi meya weguta reHarare VaHerbert Gomba vanoti makanzuru ange orasikirwa nemari yakawanda nekuda kwevanhu vasingabhadhare mitero vachizviitira mabasa avo.Vati vanotengesa mumigwagwa vanofanira kubhadhara mitero kuti kanzuru ikwanisewo kuita mabasa anovabatsira akafanana nekuvawanisa mvura nekugadzira migwagwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanozviitira mabasa avo emaoko ava ndivo vakabata hupfumi hwenyika sezvo vaine mari yakawanda iri kutenderera. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nevanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vanoti vanozviitira mabasa emaoko ava vanosimudzirawo hupfumi nekuwanisa vanhu mabasa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paDurban University of Technology, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti kunyangwe vanozviitira zvemaoko vakakosha, hurumende haina zvinobatika zvairi kuvabatsira nazvo. VaMugano vanoti vanofanira kuvakirwa pakanaka pekushandira kuti vave nechidokwa dokwa chekubhadhara mitero. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende pahomwe yayakaumba yekubatsira vemabhizimisi inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemasere emadhora emunyika ibatsirewo vanozviitira mabasa emaoko ava. Pari zvino vakawanda vange vachibvumidzwa kushanda ndevaya vanoita mabasa ekutengesa zvirimwa pamisika mikuru munyika. Vamwe vakawanda vange vari kungoita hwakiti nagonzo nemapurisa. No media source currently available

headline: Nyakuda Kusunga VaMnangagwa, VaChiwenga naVaMohadi Omiswa Pamberi Pedare
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, reIdeal Party Zimbabwe, VaTinashe Jonasi, vamiswa pamberi pedare nhasi vachipomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pasi pemutemo weCriminal Law Codification Reform Act. Mapurisa anoti VaJonasi vakati VaMnangagwa vakambouraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu nekudaro hapana munhu anofanira kupa huchapupu achivatsigira padzimwe mhosva dzavanenge vachipomerwa. VaJonasi vanonziwo vainge vachironga kusunga VaMnangagwa, nevatevedzeri vavo, General Constantino Chiwenga naVaKembo Mohadi apo vakasungwa pa Jameson Hotel nemusi weMuvhuro. Asi vaJonasi vari kuramba mhosva idzi, vachitiwo pavainzi vakataura mashoko aya yainge iri nguva yesarudzo uye VaMnangagawa vainge vangori mutungamiri webato reZanu-PF chete kwete mutungamiri wenyika. Vanotiwo chikamu chavari kutongwa nacho hachisi pamutemo. Pavamira mberi pedare, VaJonasi vaudzwa nemutongi, Amai Rumbidzai Mugwagwa, kuti havasi kuzoregwa achienda kumba kusvika nyaya yavo yatongwa nedare. Gweta raVaJonasi, Amai Nontokozo Dube, vanoshanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vati vanenge vari kudare redzimhosva magwana mangwanani vachisvitsa mapepa echikumbiro chekuti VaJonasi vapiwe mukana wekubvisiswa mari yechibatiso. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaJonasi vari kuRemand Prison, muHarare. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi yeHutano hwePfungwa Yokurudzira Kutsigirwa kweVarwere vePfungwa neVehukama
text: Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano hwepfungwa inoti zvakakosha chose kuti vanhu vane dambudziko rehutano hwepfungwa vapiwe rutsigiro nevanhu vari pedyo navo kuitira kuvabatsira kuti vakwanise kurarama munharaunda dzavagere. Doctor William Guri, avo vanoshanda neboka rezvehutano hwepfungwa kuvana vadiki kuBritain, vanoti basa ravo ndere kupa rutsigiro muzvikoro, kuvana, kuvadzidzisi nekuvabereki, nechinangwa chekuti vana vakwanise kuwana rutsigiro vachiri vadiki kuitira kuti vazokura vakasimba muhutano hwavo hwepfungwa. Doctor Guri vanoti basa rehutano hwepfungwa rinogona kuonekwa nevamwe sebasa risina kukosha, asi ibasa rakaskosha kwazvo rinofanirwa kutsigirwa nedzihurumende pamwe neveruzhinji. Vanoti pane zvakawanda zvinokonzera kuti munhu arware nepfungwa, zvinosanganisira kuomerwa nehupenyu, hurwere hweshuramatongo hweHIV/AIDS, kana kushaya basa chaiko. Doctor Guri vanotiwo ongororo dzavari kusanganawo nadzo dziri kuratidza kuti chirwere chiriko iye zvino ichi che Covid-19, chiri kukonzerawo zvakare kuti vanhu vakanganiswe hutano hwepfungwa kuburikidza nekugara vanhu vakavharirwa mudzimba vasingasangane nevamwe kungava kumabasa, kunzvimbo dzekudyira, kana kumitambo. Vanotiwo murwere weCovid-19 kana akasashanyirwa kuchipatara nehama neshamwari, anogona kukanganisika pfungwa zvakare. No media source currently available

headline: Mhemberero dzeBlack History Month dzeGore Rino Dzovhiringidzwa neCovid-19
text: Gore roga-roga vanhu vemuAmerica vanocherechedza mwedzi uno waKukadzi semwedzi wekurangarira nhoroondo yevanhu vatema vari munyika iyi, kana kuti “Black History Month.” Izvi vanozviita kuburikidza nekuungana vachiita mitambo yakasiyanasiyana pamwe nekuridza mimhanzi yenyika dzakasiyanasiyana. Mumwe wevanhu vaimbopinda mumhemberero idzi mumakore ose adarika uye vari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaJonah Masiya, avo vanoita zvemimhanzi, vanoti nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19, gore rino vari kucherechedza mwedzi uyu neimwe nzira isiri yekuungana sezvagara zvichiitwa makore ose adarika. VaMasiya, vanove zvakare mudzidzisi, vanoti makore ose adarika vaibatana nevamwe vachiridza mimhanzi yekumusha kucherechedza mwedzi uyu, asi gore rino vachange vachiridza vari kumba kwavo sevamwe vose vachizongoonekwa pamadandemutande. No media source currently available

headline: Mitumbi yeVanhu Gumi Vakafa neHutsi Yoongororwa kuUBH kuBulawayo
text: Mapurisa aburitsa mazita evanhu gumi vakafa mushure mekutadza kufema nehutsi hwemoto wavaiyedza kudzima uchipisa sora papurazi rinonzi Rodrose kuEsigodini nezuro. Mitumbi yevanhu ava yakaendeswa kuchipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals kuti inovhenekwa navanamazvikokota. Mumashoko padandemutande reTwitter, mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vati vanhu vakashaya vanoti VaKessary Sibanda vane makore makumi mashanu nematau-53, VaIan Mudimba vane makore gumi nematatu nemasere 38, VaSimon Mdlongwa vane makore makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe, 39, VaNelisingwane Dlamini vane makre makumi mana nemanomwe-47, VaLuzibo Tshuma vane makore asina kuziviswa, VaOliver Mudimba vane makore makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe, VaBafana Moyo, vane makore makumi mashanu nematatu, 53, VaEngland Moyo vane makore makumi maviri 20, VaThabani Mpofu vane makore makumi mana nematanhatu, uye VaMenelisi Ngwenya vane makore makumi maviri-20 zvekare. Mapurisa atiwo achasunga vanhu vari kupisa masango izvi zviri kukonzera kufa kwevanhu.

headline: Hurumende Yotadza Kubhadhara Mabhonasi a2016
text: Makurukota ehurumende anosanganisira rezvevashandi, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, nere zvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, pamwe nagavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe VaJohn Mangudya, vasangana nemasangano evashandi vehurumende kuti vazeye nyaya yemabhonasi egore rapera.. Asi vapinda mumusangano uyu vati zvabuda pachena kuti hurumende haina mari yacho. Mukuru wesangano reZIMTA, VaSifiso Ndlovu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane zvinhu zvitatu zvaunzwa nehurumende zvikarambwa nevashandi. Chekutanga hurumende yange yati inoda kupa vashandi mastands semuripo. Chechipiri hurumende yati inoda kupa vashandi ma bonds anopihwa vemabhizimisi asi pasina kujeka kuti zvinofamba sei. Chekupedzisira vazoti vanokwanisa kupa vashandi zvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana asi ichibhadharwa kwenguva yakareba. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakambozivisa kuti mari iyi hapana. Asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakati vanoda kuti mari iyi itsvagwe. Nenyaya yekusawirirana uku, rimwe sangano revarairidzi reRural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rati rave kuronga kuratidzira. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vachinamasa kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi sachigaro wesangano revashandi, reAPEX Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander vati mumwe musangano uchaitwa musi wa 20 Kukadzi asi havasi kufara nezviri kurongwa nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Hama neShamwari dzaVaItai Dzamara Dzoratidzira
text: Munin’ina waVaItai Dzamara, mutori wenhau anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akapambwa gore rapera, VaPatson Dzamara neshamwari dzavo kusanganisa VaKumbirai Mafunda vanova sachigaro wesangano reMISA-Zimbabwe vachishandawo nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vakaratidzira murunyararo neChitatu muAfrica Unity Square muHarare. VaPatson Dzamara vakasvika makore makumi matatu ekuberekwa nemusi weChitatu asi vakabva vatora mukana uyu kuti varatidzire. VaPatson Dzamara vakanyora paFacebook peji yavo kuti vaipemberera zuva ravo rekuberekwa asi vasina mufaro mumoyo. “Nhasi ndasvitsa makore makumi matatu uye ndinoda kutenda Mwari nechipo chehupenyu. Apo ndinenge ndichipemberera zuva rekuzvarwa kwangu, mufaro wangu uri kukundwa nekudzimbikana kwekutsakatika kwakaita Itai Dzamara. Asi ndine chivimbo chekuti Mwari vachandipa mukana wekusangana nemukoma wangu pasi pano. Ndinovimbisa kuita zvose zvandinogona kuzadzikisa zvido zvemusiki, zvenyika yangu uye zvepasi rino kubatsira vamwe. Ndokunzwisisa kwangu kuda nyika yako nehutungamiri.” VaDzamara vakapambwa muna Kurume kuGlen View apo vaigerwa. Mapurisa akanzi nedare repamusoro atsvage VaDzamara asi kusvika parizvino vanoti hapana humbowo hwekuti aripi. Asi magweta nehama dzavo vanoti mapurisa haasi kutsvaga VaDzamara nemwoyo wose. VaDzamara nevamwe vavo vairatidzira muAfrica Unity Square vachikurudzira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kuti vaende pamudyandigere nekuti vainge vakundikana basa.

headline: Mumwe Mudzimai Osiya Murume neVana Achinochengeta Vabereki Vainge Vabatwa neCovid-19
text: Mumwe mudzimai akaratidza hushing muHarare apo akasiya vana nemurume achienda kunochengeta vabereki vake vainge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Amai Constance Duchess Makoni, vanoti vakanogara kuKuwadzana 6 nevabereki vavo pamwe naambuya vavo, sezvo pakanga pasina munhu aikwanisa kuvachengeta panguva iyo zvinhu zvainge zvisina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara. Amai Makoni, avo vakamboshanda semutori wenhau, vanoti mushure mekuona kuti vatatu aiva vainge vakabatwa nedzihwa rakasimba vakaronga kuvaendesa kuti vanovhenekwa kana vaine chirwere cheCovid-19, asi baba vavo vakaramba kuita izvi sezvo vaiita sevari nani. Asi vakazobatwa nehurwere zvakasimba. Vanoti vakaedza kuendesa vatatu ava kuzvipatara, asi hapana chipatara chakada kuvatora. Vakayedzawo kutsvaga kutsvaga vakoti vanochengeta varwere vachigara navo pamba pavo, asi pavaingoziva kuti hurwere uhwu hwaiva hweCovid 19 vaibva varamba . Mushure mekushaya vanhu vangabatsira vabereki vavo vanoti vakatora danho guru rokusiya murume wavo nevana kumba vachimocheneta vabereki vavo. Vanoti pavaichengeta vatatu ava, havana kurara kwemazuva matatu aitevedzana, vachiita zvose zvavaiudzwa kuti vape varwere ava, zvaisanganisira kufashaidza mvura yokunatira nezvimwe, uye ivo vachigara kugara vakageza maoko avo nguva dzose, ukuwo vakapfeka mamasiki nguva dzose. Amai Makoni vanoti mbuya vavo, avo vaiva nemakore makumi masere nerimwe ekuberekwa, vakazoshaya mushure memazuva manomwe, chinova chinhu chakavarwadza zvikuru. Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano kwemakore akawanda, Dr David Parirenyatwa, vanoti vanoyemura zvikuru hushingi hwaAmai Makoni vachiti vashoma vanhu vanokwanisa kuzvipira kubatsira varwere veCovid 19. Dr Parirenyatwa vanoti sezvo Covid 19 ichinyanya kubata mapapu, kunatira kunofanirwa kuitwa katatu pazuva kuitira kuti dzihwa rinobva kumhino, risadzike zvokunovhara tsinga dzinofamba nemweya unoenda kumapapu. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nazvematenda asingatapuriranwe mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Justice Mudavanhu, vanoti vari kunyanya kufa pasi rose nechirwere ichi, vanhu vakwegura vane matenda eshuga nezvirwere zvemoyo. Dr Mudavanhu vanoti Covid 19 hairapike uye vakapa muenzaniso wezvinhu zvekutarisira kumunhu anenge abatwa nechirwere cheCovid 19 zvinenge kupisa muviri, chikosoro chakaoma nekutadza kufema zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Madhokotera neVakoti Voshanda Hana Dzichirova Vachityira Kubatwa neCovid-19
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 hwava kupa kuti vashandi vanobatsira vanhu vanenge vachirwara nedenda iri, vapindwe nekutya, vachityira kuti vanogona kupinzwawo munjodzi nechirwere ichi, icho chava kuita chamurambamhuru munyika. Vashandi vezvehutano vanoti vave kusangana nevanhu vane chirwere ichi nguva dzose pavanenhge varipabasa sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vanenge vachibatwa nechirwere ichi huru kuramba huchikwira Mumwe mushandi wezvehutano, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMD Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati vari kusiririswa zvikuru nehuwandu hweavo vari kufa nechirwere cheCovid-19. VaMadzorera vati vashandi vezvehutano vanotoda kubatsirwa mukugadzikana kwepfungwa nekuti zvavari kuona vari pabasa zvinotyisa. VaMadzorera, avo vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, vatiwo apo vashandi vezvehutano vanenge vodzokera kumba, vanenge vakutyirawo kutapurira mhuri dzavo kana vachinge vabatwa nedenda iri asi risati rabuda pachena. Asi VaMadzorera vati sevashandi vezvehutano varikutorawo matanho ekuderedza njodzi iyi sezvo riri basa ravo rekubetsera vanenge vachirwara Mumwe mukoti anoshanda muguta reHarare, VaSimbarashe James Tafirenyika, avo vanotungamira Zimbabwe Urban and Rural Council Nurse Worker’s Union, vati zvinhu zvinotyisa zvakanyanya kuenda kubasa. Asi vati kubaiwa kwavakaitwa nhomba kwakadzikamisa hana yavo. VaTafirenyika vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vezvehutano vapiwe zvekushandisa zvakakwana kuitira kuti vasabatwe neCovid-19 apo vanenge vachibetsera veruzhinji. VaTafirenyika vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vezvehutano vese vapiwe zvekufambisa kuitira kuti vasasangane neveruzhinji. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaGodknows Homwe, vati vashandi vezvehutano vanofanirwa kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro sezvo vari kubata basa rakakosha huye rinotyisa. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu makumi matanhatu nevaviri vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi pazviuru zviviri nemazana masere nevapfumbamwe 2809. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vave zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe nezana nemakumi maviri,91,120 , zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe nevashanu 2705 nezuro wakare. Kusvika nezuro, hurumende inoti vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vakange vave miriyoni imwechete nezviuru mazana maviri makumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mana nevaviri, 1 292, 642 Vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nezvitanhatunemazana maserenemakumi matatu, 656 830. Huwandu uhwu hunogona kukwira apo hurumende ichazivisa zvabuda muongororo dzanhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhutu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vochema Zvichitevera Kunyoresa kwaVaChiyangwa Kuti Vakwikwidze Chigaro cheZifa
text: Veruzhinji vanotevera mutambo wenhabvu havasi kufara nekuti nhengo yeZanu PF, VaPhillip Chiyangwa, vatore chinzvimbo chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Football Association. No media source currently available Asi zviripo ndezvekuti veruzhinji vacho havasi ivo vanosarudza vatungamiri venhabvu asi kuti izvi zvinoitwa neZifa Council, iyo inozivikanwa zvikuru nemhaka yehuori. Mamiriro akaita zvinhu pari zvino ari kuratidza kuti VaChiyangwa vangangotora chigaro ichi sezvo vari kufarirwa neZifa Council mushure memisangano yavakaita navo kubvira musi uyo vakati vari kuda kutungamira sangano renhabvu iri. Asi vakawanda vari kuti VaChiyangwa havakodzeri kutora basa iri sezvo vari kuda kuti papinde munhu akambotamba nhabvu kana ane nhorondo yekutungamira mutambo uyu. Asi VaChiyangwa vari kuti vane mari yekukwanisa kusandura zviri kuitika munhabvu muZimbabwe. Asi vaimbove murairidzi wemaWarriors, VaMisheck Chidzambwa, vanoti kunofanira kusatariswa zvemari asi kuti munhu ane ruzivo rwenhabvu here uye kutungamira zvinhu zvinobudirira munyika. Nhengo yeZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association, VaStanford Makwiro, vanoti hakudiwe munhu anoti anobuditsa mari yake yemohumwe yekuburitsa Zifa mumadhaka airi, asi kuti munhu anokwanisa kuti Zifa ishande zvisina huori mukati. Muteveri weDynamos, VaPeter Mukweva, vanoti nhabvu muAfrica iri kufa nemhaka yekuisa pazvinzvimbo vanhu vasingazive zvemutambo uyu. Vachitaura nevamwe vavo pane imwe nzvimbo yavanga vachitandara, VaMukweva vakati zviri kuda kuitwa munhabvu muZimbabwe zvakafanana nezviri kuitwa muAfrica umo vanoti nhabvu yawira pasi vachitarisa kubudirira kwayo kuEurope neku South America. VaJosiah Munetsi, avo vanove nhengo yerimwe sangano revatsigiri vemaWarriors, reWarriors Fan Club, vanoti munhabvu hamudiwe munhu anonzi ane mari sezvo Zifa iine mari yayo kudhara. Pari zvino vaimbotambira maWarriors, VaJames Takavada, naVa Alexander Maseko, ndivo chete vabuda pachena kuti vari kuda kukwikwidzana naVa Chiyangwa. Benjani Mwaruwari, uyo anga achitarisirwawo kukwikwidza chinzvimbo ichi, anonzi ari kuzvipira kuve mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenhabvu muZimbabwe. Vanga vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZifa, VaOmega Sibanda, vanotiwo vari kukwikwidza chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZifa. Vese vari kuda kukwikwidza vanofanira kuve vanyoresa mazita avo 12 dzemanheru eChina dzisati dzadarika. Vaendesa magwaro ayo kusvika pari zvino ndiVaChiyangwa, VaSibanda, vaimbove nhengo ye Zifa Board, Va Trevor Carlise pamwe nemutauriri weguta reHarare, Va Leslie Gwindi. Hazvisati zvazivikanwa kana VaMaseko naMwaruwari vasvitsawo magwaro avo. Sarudzo yemutunganiri weZifa iri kuitwa musi wa 5 Zvita.

headline: Nakamba Otarisana neNguva Yakaoma muEPL
text: Mutambi weZimbabwe ane mukurumbira Marvelous Nakamba atarisana nemasvondo mashanu akaomesesa muhupenyu hwake munhabvu, panguva iyo Knowledge Musona ar ikutsvagawo basa. Nakamba uyo anotambira Aston Villa muEnglish Premier League atarisana nemutoro mukuru wekuedza kupunyutsa chikwata chake icho chatarisana nehondo yekuti chisabude muEPL. Hupenyu hweAston Villa mugungano iri huri patambo sezvo chikwata ichi chiri pachinhanho chegumi nepfumbamwe, mugungano rine zvikwata makumi maviri. Zvikwata zvitatu zvepasi ndizvo zvichabuda muEPL pachapera mitambo iyo ichatambwa kubva musi wa 17 Chikumi kusvika 25 Chikunguru. Aston Villa ine mitambo neLiverpool, Chelsea, Man U, Arsenal, Sheffield United neWolves, idzo dzirikurwira zvinzvimbo zvekumiririra England muEurope gore rinouya. Mune mimwe mitambo, Aston Villa irikusangana neNewcastle, Everton, West Ham ne Crystal Palace, idzo dzisinganyanyo vhundutsa. Stewart Murisa uyo akambotambira, Caps United, Dynamos neHighlanders, anoti ane chivimbo chekuti Aston Villa inorarama sezvo isina kunyanyosiyana pamapoinzi nezvikwata zvakati wandei. Bournemouth, Watford neWest Ham, dzine mapoinzi makumi maviri nemanomwe, mapoinzi maviri chete pamusoro peAston Villa. Norwich iyo iri pasi pasi ine mapoinzi makumi maviri nerimwechete. Asi Nakamba haasiriye ega ari panguva yakaoma sezvo kaputeni wemaWarriors, Knowledge Musona asati awana chikwata chekutambira. Chikwata chake cheAnderlecht chazivisa kuti Musona haasisina nzvimbo muchikwata ichi vachiti ivo ngaatsvage basa kune imwe kambani. Anderlecht yanga yamboendesa Musona kuAS Eupen uko akanwisa zvibodzwa zviviri asi chibvumirano chavo chakapera. Mashoko arikufamba anoti Eupen yacho, pamwe neKaiser Chiefs neMamelodi Sundowns dzekuSouth Africa, dzirikumudawo, asi zvichienderana nekuti Anderlecht yacho irikuda marii pakumutengesa. Musona naNakamba varikudiwa vaine pfungwa dzakagadzikana, apo Zimbabwe iri kusimudzira rwendo rwe 2021 Africa Cup of Nations ne 2022 World Cup. MuWorld Cup, Zimbabwe iri mugungano rimwechete neGhana, Ethiopia neSouth Africa umo muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaTakudzwa Mushinga vanofunga kuti Zimbabwe ikakunda mumitambo yese yepamusha inobudirira. Asi mutsigiri weCaps United VaPhillip Regede vanoti makundano maviri aya arikuda gadziriro yakasimba. Zifa yave nemari kubva kuFIFA yekurongera maWarriors mitambo yekuedzana masimba ine mitsindo nedzimwe nyika Mumakwikwi eNations Cup Zimbabwe irikusangana neBotswana, Zambia neAlgeria, iyo ine mukombe uyu. Parizvino, Zimbabwe iri pachinho chechipi nemapoinzi mana, mapoinzi maviri pasi peAlgeria iyo irikutungamira gungano iri. Botswana ine poindi imwechete asi Zambia haina kana poindi imwechete zvayo. Asi mitambo iyi yakambomiswa pari zvino nekuda kwechirwere checoronavirus kunyangwe dzimwe nyika dzatanga kutamba nhabvu dzakaita seGermany. No media source currently available

headline: VaJuly Moyo Votarisirwa Kupa Rekupedzisira Pakuti Harare Yokwereta Here Mari Inodarika Bhiriyoni yemuNyika
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vave kutarisirwa kupa rekupedzisira pachikumbiro chekanzuru yeHarare chekuti ikwanise kupihwa mukana wekukwereta mari inodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana emunyika. Nyaya iyi yaunza kusawirirana pakati pekanzuru nemasangano anomirira vagari. Vakafanobata chigaro chameya wemuHarare VaStewart Mtizwa vebato reMDC- Alliance vaudza Studio 7 kuti sezvinodiwa pamutemo vakaendesa kuhofisi yaVaMoyo chikumbiro chavo pamwe nezvakataurwa nevagari. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMoyo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. VaMtizwa vaatti kanzuru yavo haikwanise kuita mabasa makuru kana vakasapihwa mvumo yekukwereta mari iyi. Vagari vainge vapihwa kusvika musi wa 7 Kubvumbi kuti vape pfungwa dzavo uye vakawanda vari kutsika madziro. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revagari reHarare Residents Trust vaPrecious Shumba varamba zviri kutaurwa naVaMtizwa. Asi mutauriri weguta reHarare vaMichael Chideme vatiwo zvakakosha kuti kanzuru ikwereteswe mari iyi.nekuti izvi ndizvo zvinoiutwawo nemakanzuru ose pasi rino kana vachida kuita mabasa makuru. Izvi zvapikiswa nevanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mune rimwe sangano rinomiririra vagari reCombined Harare Residents Association VaReuben Akili vati kanzuru haibude pachena kuti yawana marii pazvirongwa zvakafanana nekubhadhariswa kwevanhu mari dzekumbosiya motokari muguta reHarare. Pamutemo, kana kanzuru ichida kukwereta mari inofanira kutanga yagara yobuda nechisungo chinozotambirwa nameya. Kanzuru inozozivisa vanhu kuburikidza nekushambadzira mumapepanhau uye vanhu vane mazuva makumi maviri nerimwe kuti vapindure. Kana izvi zvapera chikumburo uye zvinenge zvataurwa nevanhu zvinozoendeswa kugurukota rezvematunhu kuti rione kuti kanzuru yebvumidzwa here kana kuti kwete kukwereta mari. No media source currently available

headline: Mutori weNhau Akarohwa kuBulawayo neVamwe Vopihwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
text:
Mejastiriti wemuBulawayo Amai Evelyn Mashavakure nemusi weChishanu vakatura mutongo wekuti vanhu vashanu pavanomwe vakasungwa nemusi weChitatu muguta iri vatongwe vachibva kumba. Mutongi uyu akatiwo mumwe wechitanhatu uye ari mutori wenhau VaCrispen Ndlovu uyo ari muchipatara pari zvino aende hake kumba kana apora ozodeedzwa nemasamanisi kana ave kudiwa. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira vanhu ava rakumbira dare kuti paitwe ongororo yekurohwa kwakaipisisa kunonzi kwakaitwa vanhu ava vari muhusungwa.

Amai Mashavakure vakabvuma chikumbiro chemagweta chekuti vanhu ava, avo vakasungwa nemusi weChitatu muBulawayo apo mapurisa akamisa kuratidzira kwaida kuitwa nevame vechidiki vesangano reBulawayo Youth Arise kana kuti BUYA, vatongwe vachibva kumba uye vasina kubhadhariswa chibatiso. VaNdlovu uyo aivepowo pavanomwe ava, ari muchipatara pari zvino uye dare rabvuma kuti aende zvake kumba kana apora, ozoita zvekudeedzwa namasamanisi kana ave kudiwa kudare. Mhosva yange ichipomerwa mumwe wechinomwe yaraswa sezvo ari munhu asati abva zera.

Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira vanhu ava vachishanda vari pasi peZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vaLizwe Jamela vabudira dare pachena kuti havazi kufara nekurohwa kunonzi kwakaitwa vasungwa ava nemapurisa pamwe nekusabvumidzwa kuti vaonekwe naanachiremba, vakapa chikumbiro kudare chekuti nyaya iyi iongororwe. VaJamela vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vanoshushikana nemaitiro emapurisa ekuramba achityora kodzero dzevanhu. VaAlfred Dzirutwe vanove mutauriri weBUYA uye variwo mumwe wevakasungwa nemusi weChitatu uyu vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vari kunzwa muviri wavo uchirwadza nekuzvindikitwa kwavakaitwa uye vashorawo maitiro emapurisa aya vachiti anoratidza kusaremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Mune imwewo nyaya, dare repamusoro reHigh Court rakatambira chikumbiro chemagweta ange achimirira bato reMDC T chekuti mapurisa asavhiringidza kuratidzira kwange kuchida kuitwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika ari pasi peNational Election Reform Agenda muBulawayo nemusi weChishanu. Gweta VaKholwani Ngwenya vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutongi wedare reHigh Court amai Nokuthula Moyo vabvuma chikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi chavange vaita. Asi kuratidzira uku kwange kwabvumirwa kuti kutange panguva dzekuma12 masikati kusvika na3 masikati hakuna kuzobudirira sezvo pange pagara pabuda mashoko ekuti mapato ari pasi peNERA ange ati kuratidzira uku kwange kwave kuzoitwa rimwe zuva. Mukupeta nyaya dzemuBulawayo, mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reZAPU VaIphithule Maphosa vaudza Studio 7 kuti chikwata chemapurisa ange akapakatira zvombo chakasvika pamahofisi ebato iri panguva dzekuma11 mangwanani eChishanu chikadzinga vashandi nevamwe vatsigiri vebato iri vashoma vange varipo. VaMaphosa vati mapurisa aya aramba kupa chikonzero chekudzinga vanhu pamahofisi avo asi vanofungidzira kuti izvi zvange zvine chekuita nehurongwa hwekuti mutungamiri webato reZapu VaDumiso Dabengwa vange vari mumwe wevatungamiri vange vachitarisirwa kuve pakuratidzira kwange kuchida kuitwa nemapato ari pasi peNERA. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Mapato ezvematongerwo enyika ari pasi peNERA anoti ari kuda kuti mitemo yesarudzo munyika ivandudzwe. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Mnangagwa Voyambira Vanoroora Kana Kuroodza Vanasikana Vasati Vabva Zera
text: Mudzimai wemutungamiriri wenyika, Amai Auxilia Mnangagwa, vashoropodza zvikuru varume vanoroora vanasikana vasati vabva zera pamwechete nemhuri dzinoroodza vana vakadai, vachiti nyaya dzakadai dziri kukwira zvakanyanya munyika uye vayambira vari kuita izvi kuti vari kuzvisikira moto muziso. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nemadzimai pamwe neshirikadzi muMasvingo, Amai Mnangagwa vati varume pamwe nemhuri dziri kutyora kodzero dzevanasikana vachiroora nekuvaroodza nguva isati yakwana vanofanira kurangwa zvakaomarara kuitira kuti dambudziko iri ripere. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemadzimai ange ari pamusangano uyu, vamwe vavo vachiti vanotyora mutemo nekutyora kodzero dzevana ngavatongerwe rufu kana zvichibvira. Amai Mnangagwa vati vanhu vanoroora kana kuroodza vana vadiki vari kuva torera hupenyu hwavo uye vanoisa vana ava parumananzombe rwerufu kana vachinge vavapa nhumbu. Amai Mnangagwa vanoti nyaya dzekuroorwa kwevana vasati vabvazera munyika yose dziri kukwira zvakanyanya, dunhu reMashonaland Central richinzi ndiro riri pamusoro, dunhu reMasvingo riri pachinhanho cheChina. Vamwe vevana ava vanonzi vari kuguma vatapurirwa zvirwere zvepabonde zvakaita seHIV/AIDS. Amai Florence Chiwera, vemumusha weMucheke, naAmai Enia Gwara vatiwo vane muonero mumwe chete vachitsigira Amai Mnangagwa pakuomesera vanotyora kodzero dzevanasikana.
