Vanorwira kodzero dzevechidiki vanoti kuroorwa kwevanasikana vasati vabvazera munyika kuri kukwirawo nekuti vanhu vari kuomerwa nehupenyu munyika uye vamwe vanotevedzera zvezvitendero zvakaita sezvimwe zvita zvechipositori netsika dzechinyakare. Murwiri wekodzero dzevechidiki muMasvingo, VaThomas Mbetu, vatenda kuti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi kwapa kuti zvinhu zviipire vanasikana. Amai Mnangagwa vati vachasvitsa zvichemo zvamadzimai aya kuhurumende kuti mutemo uvandudzwe nedare reparamende kuitira kuomesera vanoroodza vana vasati vabva zera. Bumbiro remutemo rinoti mwana anofanira kuroorwa asvitsa makore gumi nemasere ekuberekwa. Vachitaurawo pamusangano mumwechetewo, gurukota redunhu reMasvingo, VaEzra Chadzamira vakurudzira varume mudunhu remaMasvingo kuti vakoshese kodzero dzevanasikana nemadzimai. Sangano revana pasi rose reUNICEF rinoti zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvevanasikana vane makore ari pasi pegumi nemasere munyika zviri kuroorwa zvisati zvabva zera. No media source currently available

headline: Tiri mumadhaka: Mutasa
text: FC – “Lloyd Samaita” Mutasa – anoti pavamire parizvino semaGlamour Boys palog table hapafadze, handipo pavo chaipo uye zvakafanana nekuve mu “madhaka” nekudaro vari mushishi yekugadzirisa mamiriro ezvinhu aya.   Mwaka uno zvinhu hazvisi kunyatsofamba zvakanaka kuchikwata ichi icho chinove chikuru munyaya dzenhabvu muZimbabwe uye parizvino chiri panhamba 10 palog table.   Mamiriro ezvinhu kuDeMbare nguva yadarika akambenge aita manyama amire nerongo izvo zvakamboona Samaita achibviswa pachigaro chekurairidza ndokutsiviwa naBiggie Zuze aive mutevedzeri wake asi ndokuzodzorwa zvakare pasina chinguva zvichitevera kudzingwa kwakaitwa Zuze basa.   Paakadzoka kuzorairidza chikwata ichi zvakare, Samaita akatsidza kuti anoda kushandura zvinhu.   “Sekuziva kwemunhu wese kubva kuvatsigiri kusvika kuvatungamiri vechikwata chino, patiri handipo patinofanirwa kuve tiri, ichi ndicho chokwadi.   “Dynamos inozivikanwa iri chikwata chekumusoro chichirwira mukombe kwete zviri kuitika gore rino.   “Tiri kufanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti tidzorere chikwata pachinofanirwa kuve chiri, pachakakodzera kugara,” anodaro Mutasa.   Apo mwaka wenhabvu wave kumboenda pamid-season break, Mutasa anoti chikwata chake chichagara pasi choongorora kuti chingazvisimbisa sei.   “Tichagara pasi toongorora mafambiro atange tichiita uye toronga kuti togadzirisa sei kuti mwaka wedu utinakire tibve mumadhaka atange tiri kuende kumusoro.   “Chikwata chinoda kusimbiswa asi zvinoda kutanga tagara pasi nevakuru toronga kuti tochisimbisa sei,” anodaro.   Kudzoka kwaMutasa kwakaita mutauro kuvatsigiri vazhinji avo vaida kuziva kuti akambenge abvisirwei pekutanga uye kuti kudzoka kwake kuchashandura zvinhu here kuchikwata ichi?   Zvisinei, Mutasa anoti, “Hatifanirwe kutarira zvakawanda, chikuru kuti tiri kufambisa basa here nemazvo. Chatiri kuda kuhwinisa chikwata chedu kuti chidzokere pachinofanirwa kugara chete, kwete kufunga zvakawanda.”   Zvichitevera kukunda kwakaita chikwata chake Nichrut 2-1 svondo radarika, Mutasa anoti ari kutarisira kuti mumitambo 17 inotevera kuti mwaka wegore rino uchipera, DeMbare inge yahwina mitambo 14 yosimukira kuenda pakanaka.   “Tichitarisa matambiro atakaita mimwe mitambo yedu yadarika, zvaisafadza chose icho ndicho chokwadi.   “Takarasa zvibodzwa zvakawanda saka tiri kutarisira kuti mumitambo inotevera tikahwina 13 kana 14 tinosimuka chaizvo kuenda kumusoro. Saka zvave kuda kuti tishande nesimba sechikwata,” anodaro.

headline: NAC Yotsutsumwa neKurambidzwa kweMakondomu muMahotera
text: Vesangano reNational AIDS Council (NAC) vanoti vari kutsutsumwa nenyaya yekuti vemahotera havachabvumidzwa kupa makondomu pachena kuvanhu vanopinda mumahotera avo senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweHIV. Izvi zvakamiswa zvichitevera zvichemo zvakapihwa nevanoshanya kubva kunyika dzechitendero chechiMoslem. Mumahotera senzvimbo dzinowanzosasanirwa nevakawanda manga muchiiswa makondomu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwemukondombera. Asi izvi zvakamiswa nguva pfupi yapfuura mushure mekunge vechitendero chechiMuslim vatsutsumwa nazvo. Mumwe mukuru muNAC, VaAmen Mpofu, vanoti izvi zvave kukanganisa mabasa avo ekurwisana neHIV/AIDS. Sachigaro veSupreme Council on Islamic Affairs in Zimbabwe, Sheik Ishmael Duwa, vanoti ichokwadi kuti vechitendero chechiMuslim havafarire zvekuti makondomu aiswe mumahotera vachiti izvi zvange zvave kuitwa nemamwe mahotera muZimbabwe. Vanoti kukurudzira kushandiswa kwemakondumu kukurudzira hupombwe. Sheik Duwa vanoti chitendero chavo chinosungira kuti vanhu vasaite zvechipfambi, vamire nemudiwa mumwe chete uye vasapinda pinda vachiti izvi ndizvo zvaita kuti HIV isapararire zvakanyaya munyika dzechiMuslim. Vanoti kunyange hazvo mahotera mazhinji asisina makondomu, pachine zvekwanda zviri kuitika maari zvisingafadze. Vanotiwo vanozwisiziva basa reNAC asi zvakakosha kuti NAC pamwe nevemahotera vashande nezvitendero zvose pazvirongwa zvavo mubasa ravo kuitira kuti vanhu vese vafare. Asi munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Dr. Gerald Gwinji, vanoti zvirongwa zveNAC kusanganisira chekupa vanhu makondomu zvakakosha chose mukurwisana neHIV uye zvinofanira kuremekedzwa nevanhu vese. Dr Gwinji vanoti hausi mutemo wehurumende wekuti mahotera asave nemakondomu. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo vanhu vachisungirwa kushandisa makondomu, makondomu aya haafaniri kuve pose pose mumahotera. Zvichakadai mukuru weZimbabwe Council for Tourism iyo inomirira vane makambani anoona nezvevashandi kusanganisra mahotera, VaTich Hwingwiri, vati sangano ravo rinotsigira zvikuru basa reNational Aids Council uye vakazvipira kuita zvese zvinoita kuti nyika ifambire mberi mukudzivirira zvirwere. Vati handinyaya yevanhu vanobva kunze chete iri kuita kuti vemahotera vasaise makondoimu vachiti mahotera inzvimbo dzinopindwa nemhuri nekudaro haafaniri kuonekwa pese pese. VaHwingwiri vatiwo vanhu havarambidzwe kushandisa makondomu uye mamwe mahotera anotori nezvitoro zvinotengeswa makondomu nezvimwe. Patainda pamhepo tange tisati tanzwa kubva kubazi rezvekushanyirwa kwwenyika kuti Zimbabwe inowana vashanyi vangani kubva kumaMuslim countries pagore. Humbowo kubva kuUNAIDS hunoratidza kuti nyika idzi dzine vanhu vashomanana vanHIV kana zvichienzaniswa nenyika dzemuSub Sahara Africa dzakaita seZimbabwe uko vanhu zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvevanhu vese vaine HIV. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMTA Inoti Covid-19 Yava Kupararira Kubva Muzvikoro Ichienda Kumisha
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, reZimbabwe Teachers’ Association (ZIMTA) rinoti kunyange haro richirumbidza basa riri kuitwa nehurumende mukurwisa kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19 muzvikoro, zvikwanisiro zvishoma uye mari yezvikoro yekuti zvirwisane nedenda iri pamwe nekuchengetedza hutano hwevana vechikoro nevadzidzisi haisi kusvika kuzvikoro. Mutungamiri weZIMTA, VaRichard Gundani, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana vechikoro vanofanirwa kupiwa zvikamu zvavo zvemushonga wenhomba uye zvikoro zvinofanirwa kupiwa zvikwanisiro zvose zvinodikanwa, vachiti chirwere ichi chavakupararira kubva muzvikoro chichiendeswa kumisha nevana vechikoro. VaGundani vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti panovhurwa zvikoro gore rinouya, vana vasazonzi vadzidze vari kudzimba dzavo, vachiti hurumende inogonawo kuchitanga kugadzirisa zvose zvinodiwa kana vana vechikoro vakazonzi vadzidze pamadandemutande vari kudzimba dzavo. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo, VaTaungana Ndoro, vauza Studio 7 kuti hurumende iri kuzvirova dundundu nekuti irikugona kurwisa denda reCovid-19 muzvikoro. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Votaura kuMusangano weUnited Nations nezveMinda neKuvandudza IMF
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weChishanu vakataura pamusangano weUnited Nations wechishanu muchikamu chechimakumi manomwe kana kuti 5th Plenary meeting, 70th Session, Sustainable Development Summit 2015. VaMugabe vakaudza musangano uyu kuti muZimbabwe hurumende yavo yakapa vanhu minda kuri kuyedza kuvaburitsa munhamo. VaMugabe vakati izvi vakazviita kunyangwe hazvo paine vamwe vaishora chirongwa ichi zvikuru kubva kunyika dzakabudirira. VaMugabe vakati chirongwa chekugovera minda patsva change chabatsira vanhu vakawanda. VaMugabe vakakurudzira nyika dzose dzepasi rino kuti dzibatane kuti dzikwanise kuzadzikisa zviga zveUnited Nations zvekubatsira varombo. VaMugabe vakatiwo mabhanga akaita sereInternational Moneteray Fund neWorld Bank anofanira kuvandudzwa mashandiro avo. VaMugabe vanoti izvi zvingadai zvakaitwa kare kare. Vanoti kuita izvi kunobatsira kubatsira nyika dzevarombo. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu riri kumusangano uyu Amai Nyaradzayi Gumbonzvanda vakakurudzira vatungamiri venyika dzepasi rino kuti vaendese mari yakawanda kuzvirongwa zvekubatsira vanhu kwete mukurwisana. No media source currently available

headline: Kambani yeEconet Group Yotungamira Mukubatsira Vakawirwa neTsaona yeCyclone Idai
text: Kambani yenharembozha, yeEconet Group, inoti yatumirawo michina yechizvinozvino, yema drone, pamwe nezvikopokopo nezvikepe kuti zvibatsire mukutsvagwa kwevanhu vakashaya mutsaona yedutumupengo Cyclone Idai pamwe nevachiri vapenyu kuManicaland. Mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muEconet Group, VaFungai Mandiveyi, vanoti kambani yavo yakakwanisawo zvakare kubatsira nemabhokisi ekuvigisa vafi anosvika makumi mashanu, pamusoro pezvimwe zvakawanda zvairi kubatsira nazvo mutsaona yemafashamu iyi, zvinosanganisira mari. "Ma drone tagara tichiashandisa mubasa redu kuona kuti michina yedu yakamira zvakanaka here kana kuti yave kuda kugadziriswa. Asi takaona kuti tinogona kuashandisawo mukutsvaga vakapona mutsaona iyi. Ma drone ari nani pane zvikopokopo nedzimwe nguva nekuti anogona kupinda pasingakwanisi kupindwa nechikopokopo, uye anogona kubhururuka ari pasi chaizvo." VaMandiveyi vanoti kambani yavo iri kurwisawo kuti masaisai awanikwe munzvimbo idzi kuburikidza nekugadzira michina yavo yakarohwa nedutumupengo iri. Vanoti vari kubatsirawo nekupa makadhi ekufonesa kana kuti air time kuvanhu vari mumapoka akasiyanasiyana vari kushanda mukubatsira kutsvagwa kwevanhu, kuvhura migwagwa, nemamwe mabasa. Econet ine vanhu vari kubatsira vakawanda, uye yakatovhura muzinda wayo wekusvikira rubatsiro uyo uri maMutare. Vamwe vevari kubatsira ndavanachiremba. Kambani iyi yazivisawo kuti yabatana neAir Zimbabwe mukutakurwa kwerubatsiro kubva kuvanhu vari kuVictoria Falls neBulawayo kuenda kuHarare uko rubatsiro urwu rwunozorongedzwa rwusati rwananga kwaMutare kwarwunozosusukidzwa kuenda kunzvimbo dzine dambudziko. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa neVamwe Vakapidugura Hurumende Havana Kukokwa kuMusangano naVaBiden Uri Kutanga neChipiri
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden nemusi weChipiri muWashington DC vari kuparura musangano wekudyidzana nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica kana kuti US-Africa leaders’ summit. Kunyangwe hazvo vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vakawanda vakakokwa kumusangano uyu, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemutevedzeri wavo VaConstantino Chiwenga havana kukokwa nenyaya dzezvirango zvavakatemerwa vachipomerwa mhosva dzekutonga nedemo. Vamwe vatungamiri vasina kukokwa nekuda kwekupidigura hurumende nechisimba vanosanganisira veSudan, Mali, Burkina Faso neGuinea avo vakambomiswa kuva nhengo dzesangano reAfrican Union. Vatungamiri makumi mana nevashanu ndivo vakakokwa kumusangano uyu. Zimbabwe inenge yakamirirwa negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe VaFrederick Shava.  Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa vainge vakokwa vanonzi havachakwanise kuenda kuAmerica. VaRamaphosa vakatarisana nemhosva huru yavari kupomerwa yekuita zvehuwori vamwe vachiti vanofanira kumanikidzwa kusiya basa. Pane kukandirana makobvu nematete pakati peAmerica neZimbabwe nenyaya yezvirango iyi. Zimbabwe inoti zvapa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hugwadame. Asi America inoti huwori nekutadza kutungamira ndiko kwapa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hunange kumawere. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimbotungamira sangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Commerce, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti musangano uyu wakakosha kuAmerica iyo yave kusaririra munyaya dzezvekudyidzana neAfrica zvapa mukana wakakura kuRussia neChina. Asi hurumende yeAmerica inoramba kuti kuda kukwikwidzana neChina neRussia ndicho chinangwa chikuru chemusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: PSL yotanga August
text: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League iro rinoronga mitambo yeCastle Premiership rinoti riri kuronga kuti kutanga mwaka unotevera nhabvu yemuno igotanga kutambwa kubva munaNyamavhuvhu ichizopera Chivabvu wegore rinenge richitevera ra2020.   Kubva kare, nhabvu yemuno inotambwa kutanga munaKurume ichizopera munaMbudzi asi kuuya kwasachigaro mutsva wePSL Farai Jere kwakaona pachisimuka nyaya iyi yekuti karenda yenhabvu yemuno ishandurwe igotanga munaNyamavhuvhu yofambirana neyekunze kwenyika, kunyanya yekuEurope iyo inotanga munaNyamavhuvhu ichizopera munaChivabvu wegore rinotevera.   Mukushi wemashoko wePSL, Kudzai Bare anoti sangano ravo rakanyorera kuZimbabwe Football Association richivazivisa kuti kutanga gore rinotevera vanoda kushandura mwaka wenhabvu kuti utange munaNyamavhuvhu uye vakamirira kunzwa kwavari kuti vofamba nenzira ipi.   “Kutaura kuno tinotevedzera zvatinenge tarairwa neZifa, takanyorera tichivazivisa kuti tave kuda kushandura mwaka wedu.   “Saka kana vati zvakanaka tiendere mberi ndipo patichashandura karenda yedu yenhabvu kutanga gore rinotevera,” anodaro Bare.   Mukushi wemashoko weZifa Xolisani Gwesela anoti sangano ravo riri kuziva nezvenyaya iyi uye richazeya nezvayo apo richaita congress yaro svondo rino.   Anoti parizvino hapana zvizhinji zvaanokwanisa kutaura pamusoro penyaya iyi.   “Iyi nyaya tiri kuiziva, tangomirira congress yedu ndipo tichaizeya toona kuti tofamba nenzira ipi.   “Congress yedu iriko musi wa15 Zvita saka kana zuva iri radarika ndipo tichazivisa kuti zvichafambiswa sei,” anodaro Gwesela.   Kana zvikanzi zvashanduka kutanga gore rinotevera mwaka wenhabvu wave kutambwa kubva Nyamavhuvhu uchipera munaChivabvu, pane mibvunzo yakwanda iri pamiromo yevatsigiri venhabvu iyo inoda mhinduro.   Mubvunzo wekutanga ndewekuti panguva iyi mvura inenge ichinaya saka PSL iri kuronga zvipi kugadzirisa dambudziko iri remvura kuitira kuti zvikwata zvitambe zvakasununguka uye vatsigiri vasanaiwe nemvura?   Mumwe mubvunzo ndewekuti sezvo panguva iyi zvakare ndipo panenge pachitambwa nhabvu kuEurope saka PSL  haizotorerwa vatsigiri vayo here vachiona zvikwata zvavanofarira paterevhizheni votadza kuenda kunhandare?   Bare anoti mibvunzo yose iyi vachazoipundura hunge kana vanzwa zvichabva kuZifa pamusoro penyaya iyi.

headline: Vamwe Vashandi veMuzvipatara Vozengurira Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-189 neKuda kweKushaya Ruzivo Rwakakwana
text: Huwandu hwevashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vari kubayiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina huchiri hushoma zvakanyanya. Kusvika nemusi weMugovera kwange kwabayiwa nhomba vanoshanda muzvipatara zviuru gumi nezvishanu zvine mazana manomwe nevashanu kana kuti 15, 706. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 Dr Agness Mahomva vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti vamwe vave kutya kubaiwa nhomba nekuda kwemashoko enhema ari kutenderera pamadandemutande akasiyana siyana achikurudzira vanhu kuti vasatambire nhomba iyi. Asi mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti hapana dzidziso yakakwana nezvenhomba iyi kubva kuhurumende zvopa kuti vamwe vazengurire kubayiwa nhomba. No media source currently available

headline: Argentina Yomirira Morocco Kana France
text: Mutambi ane mukurumbira pasi rose, Lionel Messi nezuro akatungamira nyika yake yeArgentina kurova Croatia 3-0 mumasemifainari emutambo weWorld Cup kuQatar. Argentina yamirira kuona kuti ichatama nenyika ipi pakati peMorocco neFrance idzo dziri kutamba nhasi, Chitatu. Messi akanwisa chibodzwa chekutanga mushure mekunge nyika yake yapihwa penalty kwapera maminetsi makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe-39" mins. Zvimwe zvibodzwa zviviri zvakanwiswa naJulian Alvarez mushure memaminetsi makumi matatu nemana-34" mins uye muchikamu chechipiri kwapera maminetsi makumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe-69' mins. Nyika inenge yakuandwa ichatamba neCroatia pakuona kuti ndechipi chikwata chinotora chinzvimbo chechitatu mumakundano aya. Mutambo uyu uriko musi weMugovera nengubva dza5 manheru. Mutambo wekupedzisir weWorld cup uri kutambwa nemusi weSvondo nenguva dza5 manheru.

headline: Masangano eVashandi Opindura Zvakataurwa naVaMnangagwa muPolitburo yeZanu PF
text: Masangano anomirira vashandi anoti haasi kufara nemashoko mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avakataura nemusi weChishanu mudare re Politburo yebato ravo. Vachitaura pamusangano wePolitburo uyu semutungamiri weZanu PF, VaMnangagwa vakayambira masangano evashandi, machechi, pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira, kuti anangane nemabasa awo ari pamutemo, kwete kupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika sezvaari kuita. VaMnangagwa vakatiwo vanozviziva kuti masangano aya ari kushanda nemapato anopikisa mukuda kuvhiringidza mashandiro ehurumende yavo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata sangano re Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, kuti tinzwe parimire sezvo munyori mukuru wesangano iri, VaJaphet Moyo, vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo . Asi mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti sevashandi vane kodzero dziri mumbiro remitemo yenyika, vanoshushikana zvikuru nemashoko aVaMnangagwa. VaMasaraure vanoti vashandi havasi kuzofa vakanyarara kana hurumende ichitadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro yavo, uye vacharamba vachitaura zvinyunyuto zvavo. VaMasaraure vanoti masangano evashandi haasi kuita zvematongerwo enyika, asi kuti anoburitsa nhunha dzawo kana hupfumi hwenyika huchiiswa mumadhaka nehurumende nokuti mari dzavo dzinobva muhupfumi hwenyika. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti ichokwadi kuti masangano akazvimirira aya ava kuita zvematongerwo enyika achisiya basa rekuchengetedza kodzero dzevashandi. VaMugwadi vanoti hurumende inozviziva kuti masangano aya ari kuda kuratidzira zvisiri pamutemo, uye mapurisa achange achiita basa rawo nemazvo mukuona kuti hapana anobvumidzwa kutyora mitemo. VaMugwadi vatiwo mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vakamboyedza kuyananisa vatungamiri veMDC vari kunetsana, izvo zvinoburitsa pachena kuti sangano iri rinodyidzana nemapato anopikisa hurumende. Asi VaMasaraure vanoti chavanoziva ndechete vanomirira vashandi vasina bato ravanotsigira, uye varamba kuti vanotsigirwa nehurumende dzekunze. "Chatinoziva isu ndechekuti hurumende ndiyo inodyidzana zvakanyanya nenyika dzairi kutaura dzekunze idzi. Isu sevashandi tinodyidzanawo nemasangano evashandi vedzimwe nyika," vadaro VaMasaraure. No media source currently available

headline: VaJob Sikhala Votanga Kutongwa Muna Ndira Gore Rinouya
text: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro veMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaJob Sikhala, vaudzwa nedare redzimhosva kuMasvingo kuti nyaya yavari kupomerwa inofanirwa kuenda kunotongwa nedare repamusoro, sezvo vari kupomerwa mhosva huru ine chekuita nekuda kubvisa hurumende zvisiri pamutemo. VaSikhala vakasungwa muna Chikunguru vachipomerwa mhosva yekutaura mashoko anonzi nehurumende aive akanangana nekuda kubvisa hurumende zvisiri pamutemo. Munyori anoona nezvemitemo muMDC, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti havana kufara nedanho iri sezvo zvose zviri kuitwa zviriine chinangwa chekushungurudza VaSikhala, avo vanove nhengo inomirira Zengeza West mudare reNational Assembly. VaGonese vanoti vachaenda kudare iri panotanga kunzwikwa nyaya yaVaSikhala vachivatsigira sezvo VaSikhala vasina mhosva yavakapara. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Oshora Mhirizhonga Yakaitika Sarudzo Dzisati Dzaitwa
text: Masangano anga achiongorora sarudzo pamwe nevamwe vakakwikwidza musarudzo dze by elections neChitatu vanoti sarudzo idzi hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka, kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe Electoral Commission iri kuti Zanu PF yakakunda musarudzo idzi. No media source currently available Vamwe vevakakwikwidza musarudzo idzi vakazvimirira vakaita saVa Albert Mukaratirwa, avo vakakwikwidza ku Headlands, vanoti sarudzo idzi hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Mukuru wesangano rinoongorora mafambisirwo esarudzo re Zimbabwe Election Support Network, Amai Rindai Chipfunde Vava, vanoti pane zvakawanda zvavakawona zvisina kufambiswa zvakanaka musarudzo idzi zivo zvinosanganisira kutyisidzirwa kwevavhoti. Amai Vava vanoti sangano ravo riri kushushikana nekuwanda kwakanga kwakaita mapurisa munzvimbo dzaivhoterwa pamwe nekutengwa kwavanoti kwakaitwa vanhu pamberi pesarudzo. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Peace Project, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, vatiwo sangano ravo riri kushishikana zvikuru nekuwanda kwanga kwakaita nyaya dzemhirizhonga kune dzimwe nzvimbo zvikurusei ku Hurungwe West uko kwaikwikwidzana Va Temba Mliswa, avo vakakundwa naVa Keith Guzah veZanu PF. Zvichakadai, MDC-T inoti iri kufara zvikuru kuti vanhu vakawanda havana kubuda kunovhota sekukurudzira kwakaitwa nebato iri, iro rinoti harisi kuzopinda muneipi zvayo sarudzo kana pasina kuvandudzwa mitemo yose inobata mafambisirwo esarudzo. Munyori mukuru we MDC-T, Va Douglas Mwonzora, varamba kuti bato ravo rakagovera Zanu PF zvigaro zvemuparamende nekusapinda musarudzo idzi. Va Mwonzora vanoti vari kushanda zvakasimba kuti zvose zvavari kuda kuti zvigadziiriswe zviitwe sarudzo dzemuna 2018 dzisati dzaitwa vachiti haisi Zanu PF chete inofanira kugadzirisa izvi. Kukunda kwakaita Zanu PF munzvimbo dzose gumi nenhanhatu dzakaitwa sarudzo kwave kureva kuti MDC yave nevanhu vashomanana muparamende. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti sarudzo idzi dzinoratidza kuti kurudziro yekuti vanhu vasapinde musarudzo yakatambirwa sezvo vanhu vashoma vakavhota mumatunhu anga ari pasi peMDC-T

headline: Meya weBulawayo Okurudzira Vanotengesa Kuita Hutsanana
text: Vanoita mabasa ekutengesa muguta reBulawayo vaita musangano wekuonesana nekunzwana pfungwa nameya weguta iri, uye vari kanzura weWard 3, VaMartin Moyo. Nyaya dzakurukurwa mumusangano uyu dzinosanganisira dzekutorerwa kunoitwa vanotengesa zvinhu ava nemapurisa, mitero, nzvimbo dzekutengesera, mitemo mitsva inonzi iri kuda kudzikwa pamwe nehwaro hungatungamira vanotengesa ava huri kuronga kuumbwa. Asi vamwe vapinda mumusangano uyu vanonzi vakurudzirawo kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo kuti ikoshese raramo yevanhu, kwete kukoshesa kuchengetedzwa kwezvivakwa pamwe nemigwagwa vachikanganwa vanhu. Asi VaMoyo vanoti kanzuru yavo yanzwisisa zvose zvataurwa mumusangano uyu, asiwo vati zvakakosha zvikuru kuti vanorarama nekutengesa zvinhu ava vakoshesewo nzvimbo dzavanoshandira kuburikidza nekudzichenesa. Meya Moyo vanoti guta ravo harisati zvaro rasangana nedambudziko revanotengesera mukati meguta zvisina mvumo, sezvo vanotengesa zvinhu ava vachitengesera munzvimbo dzavakapiwa dziri kumucheto kweguta. Musangano uyu wapindwawo nevamiriri vemasangano anosanganisira reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Association, pamwe neBulawayo Agenda. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMASCO Yodzinga Mhuri Mudzimba Pamusaka Perendi
text: Mhuri mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu dziri kudzingwa mudzimba dzekambani yezvicherwa yeZIMASCO dzadziri kugara nekuda kwetadza kubhadhara mari dzerendi. Kambani yeZIMASCO yakapa vagari ava magwaro ekuvazivisa kuti vabude mudzimba idzi musi wa31 Zvita gore rapera usati wasvika kana kuti vabhadhare mari dzezvikwereti zverendi dzose. Asi vagari ava vanoti vakakundikana kubhadhara mari dziri kudiwa nekambani iyi nekuti vazhinji vavo havasevenzi, sezvo vakagumurwa pamabasa nekambani iyi kare. Vakawanda vevanhu ava vane zvikwereti zverendi zviri pakati pemadhora mazana matanhatu kusvika pachiuru chemadhora. Vagari ava vanobhadhara madhora makumi matatu nemanomwe pamwedzi. Chiri kushamisa nekurwadza vagari ava ndechekuti mapurisa ekambani yeZIMASCO haasi kuburitsa midziyo yavo panze asi kuti vari kuvharira midziyo iyi mudzimba vachiisa svumbunuro dzavo. Mumwe wevavharirwa imba ndiAmai Stella Ngandu avo vanoti vakagara paimba yavharwa iyi kwemakore makumi maviri apfuura sezvo murume wavo asina kupihwa mari dzake dzose nekambani yeZIMASCO. Amai Ngandu vanoti havarambi kuti vane chikwereti cherendi chinosvika mazana masere emadhora asi vanoti havana kwekuenda. Sachigaro wemadzimai mubato reZanu PF munzvimbo iyi, Amai Edna Chimwanza, vanoti vanzi vabudewo mumba kana vakasabhadhara mari inoita madhora mazana mana sezvo chikwereti chavo chiri chiuru chemadhora. Asi Amai Chimwanza vanoona ruoko rwezvematongerwa enyika mukudzingwa mudzimba idzi. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nasachigaro wedunhu reMutorashanga muZanu PF, VaMaricosi Mapuraganda, avo vanoti vanhu vanodzingwa gore rese rinenge riine sarudzo munyika. VaMuparaganda vanotyira kuti nhengo dzavo dzichatadza kuvhota dzadzingwa. Asi patabvunza VaMuparaganda kuti sei vachifunga izvozvo sezvo kanzura wenzvimbo iyi iri nhengo yeZanu PF, vati kanzura Amai Ellen Mwachirimba vari kushanda nekambani yeZIMASCO. Vatiwo Amai Mwachirimba vaitsigira chikwata cheLacoste icho chairwisana neG40 kuti vatore masimba apo vaimbove mukuru wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakanga vasati vabviswa pachigaro gore rapera muna Mbudzi. Asi Kanzura Amai Mwachirimba vanoti vanhu vanga vajaira kugara mahara mudzimba dzeZIMASCO vachishandisa zita reZanu PF vachiramba kubhadhara. Amai Mwachimbira vanoti munhu anofanirwa kubhadhara mari yerendi kana kunotaurirana nevaridzi vedzimba kuti anobhadhara sei. Mukuru wekambani yeZIMASCO kuMutorashanga, Amai Fadzai Gono, varamba kutaura nevatori venhau vachiti havabvumirwe nemutemo webasa. Havasi vashandi veZIMASCO chete vari kutarisana nedambudziko iri, sezvo vashandi vemumigodhi vakawanda vari kudzingwa mudzimba dzavaigara vasati varasikirwa nemabasa avo. No media source currently available

headline: MaChevrons ofara
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chigere mudenga rechinomwe zvichitevera kukunda kwachakaita cheBangladesh mumitambo yeTwenty20 International Series (T20) pamwe chete neyeOne Day International (ODI).   MaChevrons ange aine makore anodarika mapfumbamwe asati ambokunda Bangladesh mumitambo yeODI, izvo akazoita svondo radarika apo akahwina mitambo miviri yavakatamba ndokuhwina series iyi vaine mumwe mutambo usati watambwa.   Mumitambo mitatu yeT20 yakatambwa nezvikwata zviviri izvi, maChevrons akahwina miviri, Bangladesh ndokuhwina mumwe chete kuchiti yeODI yatambwa kusvika pari zvino, maChevrons ahwina miviri (wechitatu wakatambwa bepa rino richitodhindwa).   Pamitambo iyi, mutambi wemaChevrons, Sikandar Raza ange achitamba seakasvikirwa izvo zvakamuona achitamba cricket inonwisa mvura ndokubatsira maChevrons kuhwina. Anotungamira maChevrons, Regis Chakabva anoti kuhwina kwavakaita kwakaunza mufaro mukuru kuchikwata chavo pamwe nevatsigiri sezvo nguva yange yareba vasati vambokunda Bangladesh.   Anoti kushandura kwavakaita matambiro chimwe chezvikonzero zvakabatsira kuti vahwine mutambo uyu. “Nguva yange yareba tichitatarika kukunda Bangladesh asi tadzoka, ndinoona kunge kushandura matambiro kwatakaita ndiko kumwe kwakabatsira kuti tinge tiri patiri nhasi, tichitamba mhando yecricket yepamusoro.   “Asi nguva pfupi yadarika tange tichibata mhando yecricket yepamusoro, uye Sikandar Raza semitambo yadarika, ange achitamba cricket zvinonwisa mvura. “Tinovimba kuti tikaramba takadaro tinoenda mberi tichisimukira sechikwata,” akadaro Chakabva.   Vatsigiri vecricket vamwe vange vachiti kudzorwa kwakaita Dave Houghton kuzorairidza maChevrons ndiko kumwe kwakabatsira kushandura matambiro emaChevrons ayo ange achingohwina mitambo yose yaange achitamba kunze kwemumwe weT20i uyo vakakundwa neBangladesh asi vakazohwina mutambo wose sezvo pamitambo mitatu maChevrons akakunda pamiviri.

headline: Kanzuru yeHarareYoronga Kuwanisa Vanhu Mvura Munguva Dzakasiyana
text: Kanzuru yeHarare yazivisa kuti ichatanga kugovera mvura nguva dzakasiyana nekuda kwekuderera kwemvura pamwe nekuwanda kwetsvina munyanza yeLake Chivero. Kanzuru yeHarare inoti yatarisana nematambudziko akawanda munyanza iyi zvekuti ichatanga kugovera vanhu mvura mwedzi uno sezvo isisakwanise kuti mugari wese muguta awane mvura yakachena. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa pachigayo chemvura cheMorton Jaffrey Water Works, VaPaul Chabata, vati mvura iri mudhamu yasviba zvakaipisisa nekuda kwetsvina inobva kuHarare nezvimbo dzakatenderedza guta iri izvo zvave kuita kuti kanzuru ishandise mari yakawanda pakuchenesa mvura iyi. Vatiwo tsvina iyi inokonzerwawo nevanhu vanoredza hove zvisina mvumo mudhamu yave kukanganisa kanzuru pakupomba mvura. Mabharani mukuru wekanzuru, Engineer Hosiah Chisangno, vati vari kukurudzira vagari kuchengetedza mvura uye kanzuru yavo ichatanga kugovera vanhu mvura kutanga mwedzi uno. Vatiwo kunzuru ichavhara chigayo cheMorton Jaffrey mukupera kwesvondo kuitira kuti vabvise tsvina irimo uye izvi zvichawedzera huwandu hwemvura kubva pa 360 mega litres kusvika pa 450 mega litres pazuva. Vagari vemuHarare vanoshandisa 800 mega litres muchando ne1200 mega litres panguva yezhizha pazuva rega rega. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano reCommunity Water Alliance, VaHardlife Mudzingwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti havabvumirani nematanho ari kuda kutorwa nekanzuru ekugovera mvura vachiti zvichaita kuti vagari vabatwe nezvirwere. VaMudzingwa vati kanzuru inofanira kutora mvura kubva kune mamwe madhamu akaita seDarwendale kuti mvura ikwanire munhu wese. Muzvina bhizimisi vashanda padhamu iri kwenguva yakareba, VaGarry Stafford, vaudza Studio7 kuti kuzara kwejecha mudhamu kuri kukonzerwa nekurimwa kuri kuitwa mumatoro nedzimwe nzvimbo muHarare nenzvimbo dzakatenderedza guta uye zvakakosha kuti zvisaitwe kuti dhamu reChivero risaparare. Vati dhamu iri range rakadzika mamita makumi maviri nemasere asi pari zvino rakadzika mamita gumi nemasere chete sezvo razara jecha. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemvura dzinoti tsvina yakawanda iri kupinda muLake Chivero iri kukonzerwa nekanzuru yeHarare iyo iri kutadza kugadzirisa mapombi anotakura tsvina. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti kuendeswa kwetsvina isina kuiswa mishonga inodzora hukasha hwetsvina munzizi dzakaita seMukuvisi neManyame kuri kuwedzerawo kuipa kwemvura yemuLake Chivero. Muna Kurume 2015 kanzuru yeHarare yakawanikwa nematare edzimhosva iine mhosva yekudira siweji muna Mukuvisi isina kucheneswa sezvinodiwa nemutemo ikafaindiswa zviuru zana zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Kanzuru yeHarare yakabatwa nemhosva yekutyora mutemo weEnvironmental Management Act kuburikidza nekudira tsvina munzizi dzinoti Mukuvisi, Marimba, Ruwa neNyatsime, nzizi dzine mvura inopedzisira yapinda muLake Chivero. Nyanzvi mukuvakwa kwemaguta dzinoti guta reHarare rakavakirwa panzvimbo isina kunaka sezvo riri munzvimbo inofamba nemvura inopinda muLake Chivero, izvo zvinoita kuti mvura iyi isvibe zvakanyanya. Pari zvino guta reHarare rinoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni matatu emadhora semari yekutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura pamwedzi wega wega. No media source currently available

headline: Murairidzi weHighlanders Ochema Chema neMamiriro eNhandare yeRufaro Stadium
text: Murairidzi wechikwata cheHighlanders Henrik Pieter de Jongh anoti nhandare yenhabvu ine mukurumbira yeRufaro Stadium haikodzere kutambirwa nhabvu yepamusoro soro yeCastle Lager Premieer Soccer League. Izvi zvinotevera mangange e1-1 akaita chikwata chake neDynamos muRufaro Stadium nezuro. Vakanwisa zvibodzwa izvi ndiTinashe Mukande kuHighlanders kuchizoti Evans katema weDynamos. Asi De Jongh ari kuchema nenhandare yeRufaro Stadium. Mangange aya asiya Highlanders iri pachidanho chechinomwe nemapoinzi makumi mana yakaenzana neDynamos iyo iri pachinhanho chechisere kwasara mitambo mishanu chete kuti makundano aya asvike kwamvura yacheka makumbo. Zvikwata zvine mukurumbira izvi zviri mapoinzi gumi nerimwechete pasi peCaps United iyo irikutungamira makwikwi aya kunyange hazvo yakarohwa 2-0 neTelOne muAscot Stadium nezuro zvekare. Murairidzi weDynamos Tonderai Ndiraya anoti vatambi vake vachiri vadiki asi vadzidza zvakawanda mwaka uno zvekuti avekutarisira kuzotsvaga vamwe vatambi vashoma kubva kune zvimwe zvikwata achisimbisa chikwata ichi kuti chizokwanisa kurwira mukombe gore rinouya. Mangange ne Highlanders ave echipfumbamwe akateverana asi Ndiraya ari kuyemura vatambi vake kuti havasati vakundwa kana mumutambo mumwechete pamitambo yeligi gumi neminomwe yapfuura. Asi mumwe mutsigiri mukuru weDembare VaMichael Chindowa avo vanozivikanwa kunzi "Chuchu" vanoti chikwata chavo chinoda kugadziriswa zvakasimba. FC Platinum iri kuramba iri pachidanho chechipiri nemapoinzi makumi mana nemapfumbamwe mushure mekurohwa pamusha zvaive zvisingafungirwe 1-0 neBulawayo Chiefs. Chicken Inn iyo iri pachinhanho cheechitatu haina kutamba sezvo yaifanira kusangana neTrinagle iyo yaive nemutambo weCaf Confederation Cup ne FC Madhibou iyo vakakunda 3-2 asi ndokubuda mumakwikwi aya 4-3 mushure mekurohwa 2-0 mumutambo wekutanga.  Mimwe mitambo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League yakapera seizvi…  Yadah 1 Chapungu 0 ZPC Kariba 1 Black Rhinos 0 Hwange 1 Mushowani 0 Ngezi Platinum 1 Manica Diamonds 0 Herentals 0 Harare City 0  Zvikwata zvina zviri pamusoro soro ndeizvi Caps United 51 points FC Platinum 49 points Chicken Inn 46 points ZPC Kariba 45 points  Zvikwata zvina zviri pasi petafura ndeizvi…  Herentals 31 points Hwange 31 points Mushowani 30 points Yadah 28 points  Zvichakadaro, vePremier Soccer League nhasi vatora nguva ino kuita mubatanidzwa wezvikwata wemasemi fainari eChibuku Super Cup iyo yamira seizvi…  ZPC Kariba v Highlanders Harare City or Triangle v Ngezi Platinum Stars  Rugby Mhemberero ichiri kuenderera mberi muZimbabwe mushure mekunge chikwata cheSouth Africa chemaSpringboks chakatora mukombe we 2019 World Cup varova England 32-12. Kune veruzhinji munyika, kukunda kweSouth Africa kukundawo kweZimbabwe sezvo mutambi Tendai ‘The beast’ Mtawarira akaberekerwa muZimbabwe. Muhurukuro yaakamboita neStudio 7 Mtawarira akati chaive chido chake kusimudza mukombe uyu asati aenda pamudyandigere. Mumwe muteveri wemutambo uyu Muzvare Jestina Mushore vanoti vari kufara nezvakaitika izvi vachiti chishuwiro chavo chave chekuti Zimbabwe ibudirirewo kuenda kuWorld Cup inotevera iyo ichaitwa muna 2023. Muongorori wezvemitambo VaFarai Kambamura vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kudzidza kubva kune zvakaitika izvi kuti rimwe gore isvikewo pachidanho chakadai. VaKambamura vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kurongeka kuti isarasikirwe nevatambi vakaita saMtawarira nevamwe vakaita saKennedy Tsimba uyo akapedzisirawo ave kutambira maSpringboks zvekare panzvimbo yemaSables. Aimbotambira Old Hararians Tendai ‘The Bulldog’ Chaza anoti kukunda kweSouth Africa kunosimudzirawo mutambo uyu muZimbabwe sezvo vatambi vemuno vachada kunotambira zvikwata zvekuSouth Africa, izvo zvinokwanisa kuzobatsira maSables. Aka kave kechipiri South Africa ichitora mukombe weWorld Cup uyu mushure mekuita zvimwe chetezvo muna 1995 apo makundano aya akaitirwa munyika yavo. Zimbabwe yakapedzisira kuenda kuRugby World Cup muna 1991 apo mushakabvu Richard Tsimba akaita mukurumbira unotyisa. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Yave Kumbomira Kupa Vanhu Marezinesi eKutepfenyura
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko nekutepfenyura, Dr Chris Mushowe, vanoti hurumende inogona kumbomira kupa marezenezi ekutepfenyura kumaredhiyo zvichitevera kutadza kuenda pamhepo kwemarhedhiyo matanhatu pamaredhioyo masere akapihwa marezeni muna 2013. VaMushowe vakaudza nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mudare reparamende nemusi weChina kuti zvinhu zvakaoma munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye zviri kubatawo vemaredhiyo uye vanofunga kuti zvingave nane kuzotanga kupa marezenisi kana zvinhu zvagadzikana munyaya dzeehupfumi. VaMushowe vati pane vemaredhiyo masere vakapihwa marezenisi muna 2013, maviri chete anoti Diamond FM yekwaMutare yeZimpapers ne Ya FM yeRay of Hope yekuZvishavane ndidzo dzega dzakakwanisa kuenda pamhepo. Mutemo unosungira kuti redhiyo ienda pamhepo mukati megore nemwedzi misere yapihwa rezenesi. Kana izvi zvikasaitika rezensi rinobva ratorwa. Maredhiyo station anoti Faya FM yekuGweru ne Gogogoi FM yekuMasvingo eAB Communications, Breeze FM yeku Victoria Falls neSkyz Metro FM yekuBulawayo ekambani yeFairtalk Communications pamwe ne Nyaminyami FM yekuKariba neKE100.4E yemuHarare ekambani yeKingston ndiwo asati aenda pamhepo uye VaMushowe vati achatorerwa marezenisi mwedzi miviri inotevera kana akasaenda pamhepo. Vanoona nezvekutepfenyura musangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa Zimbabwe Chapter muzvare Kholiwe Nyoni Majama vanoiti zviri kuda kuitwa nehurumende hazvina kunaka uye uye Zimbabwe Broadcasting Authority ingadai yakaongorora kuti makambani aya ane mari here isati yaapa marezenesi. Vanotiwo mari yakabhadhariswa makambani neveBAZ yemadhora zviuru zvinomwe kuti apihwe marezenisi yakawandisa zvikuru. Mukuru weMediaCentre, VaEnerst Mudzengi vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti izvi zvinoratidza pachena kuti vanhu kana kuti makambani akapihwa marezenisi ange asingakodzeri. Kana nhengo dzeparamende dzatiwo dzakashamiswa kuti kambani yakaita seKingstons ingapihwe rezenesi rekutepfenyura asi iyo ichitoomerwa nebasa rekutengesa mabhuku. Zvichakadai VaMushowe vati hurumende ichapa marezenisi emaredhiyo ekumatunhu kana kuti macommunity radido stations kana chirongwa cheDigitilisation chichinge chapera. Chirongwa ichi chaifanirwa kunge chakapera muna Kurume gore rino uye chakatadza kupera nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemari. Gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaPatrick Chinamasa vakaudzawo komiti iyi kuti hurumende haina mari yekuita chirongwa ichi uye havazivi kuti mari yacho vachaiwana rini. Vati pari zvino hurumende ine chikwereti chemamiriyoni makumi maviri kukambani iri kuita chirongwa ichi uye iri kutsvaga mari yekubhadhara kambani iyi. Muzvare Majama Nyoni vanoti mashoko aVaMushowe anoratidza pachena kuti hurumende haisikuda kupa marezensi enhepfenyuro dzematunhu. Chirongwa cheDigitilisation chinoita kuti nyika ikwanise kuva nhenhepfenyuro dzemaredhiro neterevhizheni dzakawanda. Zimbabwe inoda mamiriyoni mazana maviri emadhora kuita chirongwa ichi asi nyanzvi dzinoti mari yacho ichawedzera kana chirongwa ichi chikasaitwa nekukasika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vofa Munjodzi Dziri Kuitika Husiku paZororo reKisimusi
text: Mutauriri wemapurisa Chief Supritendant Paul Nyathi vari kukurudzira vatyairi kuti vafambe kwakachena nekuti husiku kwave kuitika njodzi dzakawandisa mumigwagwa pazororo rino rekisimusi izvo zvapa kuti vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vashaye. Mapurisa anoti vatyairi pachezvavo ndivo vari kukonzerawo njodzi nekusatevedzera mitemo yemumigwagwa. Dunhu reMasvingo ndiro rine vanhu vakawanda vashaya avo vari kusvika gumi nevashanu, kuchitevera Matebelalnd South ine gumi, kwouya Harare ne Mashonaland East dzine vanhu vasere vashaya. Mashonaland Central ine munhu mumwe chete. Vanhu vafa pazororo rekisimusi gore rino vakawandisa kudarika gore rapera apo pakafa vanhu makumi mashanu nevatanhatu. Vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mana nevatatu vashaya zvichienzaniswa nevanhu mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana gore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Mabhindauko Oraramisa Vamwe Vari Kunze kweNyika
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvakabuda munyika zvichinotsvaga mafuro manyoro munyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe, zviine tarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvichakasika kunaka kumusha zvodzokera. Asi tarisiro iyi inenge yaramba chave chiroto chisingabatiki, izvo zvoita kuti vamwe vakaita saVaLovejoy Chinhema, avo vari kuMaputo, kuMozambique, vatange mabhindauko anopa raramo. VaChinhema vanoti vakabatana nevamwe vana veZimbabwe vakavhura zvitoro zvinotengesa zvinhu zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira mbatya nemagumbeze. VaChinhema vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo vatanhatu vanotenga zvinhu kuSouth Africa neSwaziland zvavanozotengesa kuMozambique. VaChiinhema vanoti vane vashandi vavakatopinzawo mabasa vanove zvakare vana veZimbabwe. Asi VaChinhema vanoti kudhonha kwemari yekuSouth Africa kwakambozunguza bhizimusi ravo zvishoma sezvo vakanga vasisakwanisi kunotenga zvinhu zvemuzvitoro zvavo kuZimbabwe nekuti mari yekuAmerica inonzi ndiyo iri kunyanyodiwa muZimbabwe yakange yave nesimba rakanyanya. Asi vanoti vari kukwanisa zvavo kuraramisa mhuri dzavo zvichienzaniswa nekunge dai vari kumusha. “Tinonyanyohodha ma duvet nembatya zvinozotengeswa mumarukisheni nevanhu vatakapawo mabasa,” VaChinhema vanodaro. Vanoti madzimai avo kumusha akasara achiitawo mabhindauko ekusona mbatya dzekutengesa. Asi vanoti chishuvo chavo chikuru ndechekuti dai zvinhu zvakasika kunaka kuitira kuti vadzokere kumusha. No media source currently available

headline: Bazi rezveKucherwa kweZviwanikwa Rotadza Kuudza Paramende Kuti Mari yeMangoda Iri Kufamba Sei
text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvezviwanikwa muzvinafundo Francis Ngudyanga nemumwe mukuru munyaya yekucherwa kwemangoda kwaMarange nemusi weMuvhuro vakakundikana kutsanangura kuti mari iri kucherwa mangoda imarii uye iri kuenda kupi. Muzvinafundo vainge vadaidzwa kuzopa humboro kukomiti inooona nezvezviwanikwa iri kuongorora mashandiro ekambani yeZimbabwe Consolidated Diamond Mining Company kana kuti ZCDC. Kambani iyi yakaumbwa mushure mekunge makambani ange achichera mangoda kwaMarange atorerwa marezinesi nehurumende nenyaya dzehuwori nezvimwe zvikonzero. Makambani aya anosanganisa Marange, Anjin Investments, Diamond Mining Company, Jinan, Kusena, Marange Resources ne Mbada Diamond. Komiti yeparamende iyi yakatanga nekubvunzurudza vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wekambani iyi VaRidge Nyashanu uye munyori mukuru mubazi Muzvinafundo Gudyanga. Nhengo dzedare reparamende dzakaratidza kusafara nekutsamwa kwakanyanya nemampindurirwo aiitwa mibvunzo nevarume vaviri ava. Paramende yakatiwo ongororo yayo yakaratidza kuti kambani iyi iri kuitawo zvinhu zvisiri pamutemo. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende iyi, VaDaniel Shumba vakati apo nyika iri kunetseka nekushaya mari, veruzhinji munyika vanotarisira kuti kutengesewa kwemangoda kungadai kuchiiunza mari munyika. Asi vati zviri pachena kuti zvichiteverwa kumiswa kwemakambani aichere mangoda kwaMarange, kambani yakaumbwa nehurumende kutora basa iri yeZCDC inenge isina kuumbwa zviri pamutemo uye kusvika pari zvino nyika iri kutowana mari shomanana kubva kumangoda izvo zvisingabatsiri nyika. Komiti yati VaNyashanu varatidza kuti havana kana chavari kuziva pane zviri kuitika mukambani iyi ikati vanenge vakapinzwa basa nechikiribidi. VaNyashanu vati hapana chakanyanya chiri kubuda kubva kwaMarange uye kusvika pari zvino kambani iyi yakwanisa kupa hurumende miriyoni yemadhora chete. Asi mushure mekutadza kupindura mibvunzo yakawanda komiki iyi yati VaNyashanu vazodzoke zvekare vagadziririra. Komiti iyi yazobvunzurudzawo VaGudyanga avo vanove sachigaro wekambani iyi, zvakare vari sachigaro wekambani yeMinerals Marketing Corporation of Zimbabwe. Zviri kuitwa naVaGundyanga zvekutora zvigaro zvose izvi zvinonzi nemagweta hazvisi pamutemo. VaGundyanga vatadza kutsangurawo mashandiro ekambani iyi izvo zvisina kufadza nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzikavaudza kuti vari kutamba nebasa uye kuzvidza dare reparamende. VaProsper Mutseyami imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi vari nhengo dzeMDC-T vasina kufara nekutadza kupindura mibvunzo kwange kuchiitwa naVaGudyanga pamwe naVaNyashanu. VaMutseyami vaenderera mberi vachiti zvinyadzisa kuti VaGudyanga vanotadza kupindura mibvunzo asi ivo vaive munyori mukuru webazi rezvicherwa panguva inonzi nemutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe pakashaikwa mari inodarika mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu yemangoda kwaMarange. Asi vagudyanga vati hurumende yave kutoongorora nyaya yekutsakatika kwemari iyi. VaGudyanga vati vanofunga kuti kubatanidzwa kwemakambani anochera mangoda kuchabatsira nyika uye vati vasingafairiri izvi ndivo vari kuzvipikisa. Vatiwo kambani yeZCDC haisati yave kunyatsoshanda sezvo pane mamwe makambani aichera mangod akaita seMbada neAnijn akaenda kumatare edzimhosva. VaGudyanga vati kambani iyi iri kuchera mangoda kubva kumugodhi waicherwa neMarange Resources pamwe neMDC. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi VaTendai Biti negurukota rezvehupfumi parizvino VaPatrick Chinamasa vakagara vachichema chema kuti hapana mari yakawanda iri kubva mukutengeswa kwemangoda aya. No media source currently available

headline: VaDabengwa Voradzikwa kuNtabazinduna neMugovera
text: Zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvaungana muWhite City Stadium muBulawayo zvichionekana nemutumbi wegamba renyika, VaDumiso Dabengwa, avo vachavingwa kuNtabazinduma neMugovera. Vanhu vakawanda kubva kumapato ezvematongerwo enyika akasiyana siyana, kusanganisira mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vaungana muBulawayo vachirangarira mabasa akaitwa naVaDabengwa vachiri vapenyu. Hama neshamwari dzaVaDabengwa, kusanganisirawo vakuru vezvematongerwo enyika kubva kuSouth Africa, vanosanganisira VaJacob Zuma, vataura pagungano iri vachirumbidza mufi serimwe ramagamba makuru akarwira kuti nyika iwane kuzvitonga. Vanhu ava vatsanangura VaDabengwa vemunhu akaramba akazvipira mukurwira muhutongi hwejekerere kusvika mukufa. Asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, havana kuenda kugungano iri. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, kuti seyi vanga vasipo sezvo vanga vasingabatike parunhare rwavo. Munin’ina waVaDabengwa, VaSijabuliso Dabengwa, vati mukoma wavo aive munhu aisadududza pane zvinhu zvaavnenge azvipira kuita zvisinei nekuti izvi zvaigona kuzomupinza munjodzi. Imwe yeshamwari dzaVaDabengwa, Muzvinafundo Regis Austin vatsinhira zvimwe chetezvo vakatiwo VaDabengwa vaive munhu aisatya kutaura paanenge awona kuti pakanganiswa chero nevakuru vakuru mune zvematongerwo enyika. Vati vanoyeuka kuti VaDabengwa ndiye mumwe wevanhu vekutanga kupokana nedanho rekuda kuunza hutongi hwebato rimwe chete munyika kana kuti one-party state. Mumwe wevaive varwiri vehondo yerusununguko pasi pemauto eZipra, VaJeremy Brickhill, vati VaDabengwa vakapira hupenyu hwavo kurwira rusununguko nehutongi hwejekerere vachiri vadiki. Vati mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika pari zvino anoratidza kuti hamusati mave nerusunguko ruzere vakakurudzira vechidiki kuti vatore muenzaniso waVaDabengwa vaenderere mberi nehondo iyi. Vachitaurawo pagungano iri, mumwe murwiri wehondo yerusununguko, VaBaster Magwizi, vati kudomwa kwakaita hurumende VaDabengwa segamba renyika, kungozadzisa chirevo sezvo zviri pachena kune veruzhinji kuti VaDabengwa nderimwe remagamba makuru enyika. VaMagwizi vati VaDabebgwa vanga vari mushishi yekuedza kuti midziyo kusanganisira zvivakwa pamwe nemagwaro enhoroondo yehondo zvebato reZapu zvakatorwa nehurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe zvidzorwe kubato iri. Vatiwo VaDabengwa vange vaine shungu yekuti nyaya yeGukurahundi igadziriswe nemazvo vakati VaDabengwa vangazorora murugare kana hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa ikagadzirisa zvose izvi nekukasika. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZapu, VaIsaac Mabuka, vashora zvakaitwa nevamwe vamiriri veparamende vebato reZanu PF vakaramba kupa ruremekedzo kuna VaDabengwa vachiti vakawanda vevavnhu ava vanofanirwa kutenda vanhu vakaita saVaDabengwa nebasa guru ravakaita kurwira rusununguko. Vaimbove nhengo yepolitburo yebato reZanu PF, avo vakadzingwa mubato iri, VaRugare Gumbo, vati nhoroondo yehondo yerusununguko haingave yakakwana kana kusina kutaurwa nebasa guru rakaitwa naVaDabengwa. VaGumbo vati zvinorwadza kuti VaDabengwa vakafira kunze kwenyika nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu muzvipatara zvemunyika. VaDabengwa, avo vaizivikanwa nerekuti The Black Russian, vakashaya nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera muNairobi guta guru reKenya vachibva kuIndia uko kwavairapwa. VaDabengwa vari kuvigwa neMugovera kumusha kwavo kuNtabazinduna kunze kweBulawayo muri mudunhu reMatabeleland North. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo Pfumbamwe dzeWar Veterans Pressure Group Dzorara Dzakachengetedzwa kuHarare Central.
text: Sachigaro vesangano rakazvimirira rinomirira kodzero dzevaive varwiri vehondo yerusununguko re War Veterans Pressure Group, Va Amos Sigauke, vanoti vari kushushikana nekusungwa kwakaitwa nhengo dzavo pfumbamwe nezuro uye dzichiri dzakachengetedzwa kuHarare Central pari zvino dzisina mhosva yadzapomerwa. VaSigauke vaudza Studio7 kuti nhengo dzavo idzi dzakange dzaenda kumahofisi ebazi rezve mari nezuro vachida kutaura nezve kusafara kwavo nemari dzavari kuphihwa pamwedzi wega wega dzavanoti ishoma sezvo dziri mumadhora emabhondi ayo asina huremu. VaSigauke vanoti nengo idzi dzakaenda kumahofisi uku neMuvhuro vakanzi vadzoke neChitatu asi pavakasvika pamahofisi aya nezuro vakabva vasungwa uye vachiri vakachengetedzwa pari zvino. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa munyaya iyi. "Nhengo dzedu dzichiri dzakachengetedzwa kuHarare Central uye mapurisa ari kurama kuti tidzipe mishonga nezvimwe zvikwanisiro izvo zviri kuti shungurudza zvikuru," vadaro VaSigauke. Vaenderera mberi vachiti nhengo dzavo dzange dzisati dzapomerwa mhosva uye dziri kutarisirwa kurara muchizarira dzozo miswa pamberi pedare mangwana.  "Tiri kushaya kuti mhosva yaparwa nenhengo dzedu ndeyeyi sezvo parizvino kodzero dzavo munyaya yezve hutano hwavo dziri kutyorwa nekuti hatisi kubvumidzwa kuvapa mishonga yavo. Vazhinji vane miviri inorwa kubva kune zvavakasangana nazvo kuhondo," VaSigauke vatsinhira. No media source currently available

headline: Vana veChikoro Mazana Matatanhatu neMakumi Mashanu neVasere (658) Vobatwa neChirwere cheCovid-19 Kubva Zvavhurwa Zvikoro
text: Vana vechikoro mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevasere vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 mumazuva mapfumbamwe adarika chete. Nemusi weChitatu pavanhu pavanhu mazana matanhatu nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, zana nemakumi manomwe nevashanu vacho vana vechikoro. Izvi zvasiya vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vavezviuru mazana maviri zvine makumi matatu nemana nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 234 589. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro hakuna munhu akafa zvichireva kuti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira muna 2020 vachiri zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi masere nevasere.

headline: Kudzoka kwenhabvu kworumbidzwa
text: VARAIRIDZI venhabvu nevatsigiri vemutambo uyu svondo rino vakatambira nemufaro mukuru kudzoswa kwakaita bhora zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose munyika muno kubvira munaKurume gore rapera senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Izvi zvinotevera kuziviswa kwakaitwa neHurumende nemusi weChipiri svondo rino kuti mitambo yose yave kutenderwa kuti ichidzoka asi pachitevedzerwa mitemo yeWorld Health Organization (WHO) uye neyemunyika ino panyaya yekurwisa Covid-19.   Murairidzi weDynamos FC — Tonderai ‘Stanza’ Ndiraya — anoti kudzoka kwenhabvu kunofadza zvikuru sezvo vatambi vange vanzwa nekungogara.   Anoti iye zvino amirira kuti vachiudzwa kuti vanotanga rinhi kuita gadziriro dzekuti mitambo ichitanga kutambwa.   “Kudzoka kwenhabvu tinokutambira zvikuru nekuti mutambo uyu ndiwo kudya kwedu. Tange tanzwa nekugara, vamwe vakasvika pakurasikirwa nemabasa asi iye zvino tine mufaro nekuti chishuwo chedu chave kuzadzikiswa.   “Saka tinoda kutenda Hurumende yedu yakanzwa zvichemo zvedu, iye zvino tatenderwa kuti mutambo wedu uchidzoka.   “Tave kumirira kuziviswa kuti tochitanga rinhi kuita gadziriro, ipapo tinoda nguva nekuti vatambi vedu vange vave nenguva yakareba vakangogara saka tinofanira kushanda navo zvakasimba kuti vanyatsobikwa vagodzokera padanho ravaive kare,” anodaro Ndiraya.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa nemurairidzi weChicken Inn — Joey ‘Mafero’ Antipas — achiti ave kutogadzirira kutanga basa rake sezvo ange anzwa nekungogara.   Anoti semunhu wenhabvu, kungogara pasina mutambo uyu kunomuremera.   “Zvinhu zvinofadza zvatange tichichemera kwegore rese kuti mutambo ngaudzoke, iye zvino wadzoka manje. Vakomana vedu vave kukwanisa kutamba mutambo uyu uye vokwanisa kuwana raramo muhupenyu hwavo.   “Iye zvino tamirira kunzwa kuti tofamba negwara ripi sezvo pane zvakawanda zviri kudiwa kuitwa nesu varairidzi, vatambi vedu uyezve nevamwe vari mune zvemutambo kuti tinge takachengetedzeka mitambo painozotambwa,” anodaro Mafero.   Mutungamiri wesangano reFriends of the Warriors — Edward Chimedza — anoti sevatsigiri vanotambira nemaoko maviri kudzoka kwemutambo uyu.   Anokurudzira hutungamiri hweZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) nePremier Soccer League (PSL) kuti vatore matanho ekuona kuti mitambo iyi inge ichiburitswa paterevhizheni sezvo vatsigiri vachange vachiona nhabvu vari kudzimba dzavo kana dzimwe nzvimbo kusiri kunhandare.   “Vakomana vedu vedu vatinofarira manje-manje tichange tave kuvaona vachitamba nhabvu mutambo uyu wadzoka.   “Asi tongochema kuZifa nePSL kuti ngavagadzirise vaone kuti mutambo uyu uri kubuda paTV nekuti kunhandare hatisi kuenda nekuda kwekuti zvinokonzera kuti tiungane izvo zvisiri kutenderwa. Saka toda kuona nhabvu paTV tichitsigira zvikwata zvedu,” anodaro Chimedza.

headline: Argentina Yosimudza Mukombe weWorld Cup keChitatu
text: Argentina yasimudza mukombe weFIFA World Cup kechitatu munhoroondo yenyika iyi mushure mekurova France 4-2 mumapenalties kuQatar. Argentina yakasimudza mukombe uyu kekutanga muna 1978 pawakatambirwa munyika iyi ichi ichitungamirwa nakaputeni wayo Daniel Passarella. Yakarova Netherlands 3-1. Yakazosimudza mukombe uyu zvekare muna 1986 ichitungamirirwa naDiego Maradona. Argentina yakarova West Germany 3-2 kumakwikwi akatambirwa kuMexico. Mumutambo wanhasi wange uchinakidza zvikuru, France neArgentina dzaita mangange 3-3 dzisati dzaenda kumapenalties. Argentina ndiyo yatanga kutungamira 2-0 muchikamu chekutanga mushure mekunge Lionel Messi anwisa penalty papera mamaminitsi makumi matatu nerimwe, (31’ mins), Angel Di Maria akanwisa chechipiri mushure memaminetsi makumi matatu nematanhatu, (36’mins).  Asi muchikamu chechipiri, Kylian Mbappe anwisa mushure memaminetsi makumi masere uye makumi masere nerimwe, (80’ ne 81’). Mutambo uyu wazoenda munguva yemuwedzeredzwa kana kuti extra time. Messi anwisa mushure memaminetsi zana nemasere (108’), Mbappe achizonwisa mushure nemaminetsi zana negumi nemasere (118’) . Nezvibodzwa zvitatu izvi, Mbappe ndiye anwisa zvibodzwa zvakawanda kudarika vamwe vatambi vose kuWorld Cip aine zvibodzwa zvisere achiteverwa naMessi ane zvinomwe. Mbappe apihwa mukombe wekurova mambure kakawanda kana kuti Golden Boot. Messi ndiye apihwa mukombe wekukunda vamwe vose kumakwikwi aya kana kuti Golden Ball.  Emiliano Martinez wekuArgentina ndiye akunda vamwe vabati vepagedhi vose kana kuti Golden Glove Award. Akunda vamwe vatambi vechidiki vose kana kuti Best youngster mutambi weArgentina zvekare Enzo Fernandez. Ane makore makumi maviri nerimwe.

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzinoti Dambudziko reMbereko Rinokonzerwa neZvakawanda
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti vanhu vazhinji vanofunga kuti kushaya mbereko munyama, kana kuti kutukwa naMwari, izvo zvinoita kuti vagare vasina mufaro munyika. Nyanzvi dzehutano dzinoti pane zvikonzero zvakawanda zvinoita kuti vanhu vaviri vatadze kuita vana sokuronga kwavanenge vakaita pavanenge varoorana. Mumwe mudzimai akasangana nedambudziko rekutadza kuita mbereko, Amai Sencia Maponga, vanoti vakaroorwa mugore 1989, asi vakapedza gore vasina kubata pamuviri, vachingoti zvichazongoita chete. Amai Maponga vanoti murume wavo hapana zvaaimbotaura nezvenyaya yokuita vana asi zvakazochinja nenzira yavasina kumbofungira vakasvika pokuzorambana. Amai Maponga vanoti vasati vatombofunga kuti vaitove nedambiko rekushaya mbereko, tezvara vavo vakauya mumba mavairara nemurume wavo vakawaranyurwa kuti vabude mumagumbeze vasina kana kumbopfeka vachitukwa nemashoko asinganyoreke. Amai Maponga vanoti nyaya iyo yakavarwadza uye vakajekeserwa kuti kana usina mwana hama nevanhu vemunharaunda vanokuona semunhu asina basa kana chiremerera. Amai Maponga vanoti vanosarurwa nekutarisirwa pasi zvokuti vakatombopindwa nepfungwa yokuda kuzviuraya. Mumwe mudzimai, Amai Tracy Sanudi vekuKambuzuma, vanoti vakaroorwa mugore 1977 vakashaya mbereko zvokuti vakamboedza kutsvaga rubatsiro kuzvipatara, maporofita nekun’anga, asi zvakaramba. Asi Amai Sanudi vanoti vakaita rombo rakanaka rokuti murume wavo haana kuvaramba zvokuti vagere zvakanaka chero zvazvo hama dzemurume dzichitaura mashoko anorwadza nenyaya yavo yekushaya mbereko. No media source currently available  Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekuita mbereko, uye vachishanda mubazi rehutano, Dr Robert Madzima, vanoti kushaya mbereko mudzimba rave dambudziko guru riri kusangana nevanhu vakawanda munyika izvo zvakapa kuti hurumende iparure chirongwa chitsva chakanangana nevanhu vanoshaya mbereko. Dr Madzima vanoti bazi ravo harina chirongwa chekuongorora vanhu kuti vanokwanisa here kuita mbereko muzvipatara zvaro, izvo zvinoita kuti pasave nezvinyorwa zvinoratidza kuti vanhu vangani vane dambudziko irori sezvo donzvo rebazi rehutano raiva rakanyanya kunangana nechirongwa chekuronga mhuri chete. Dr Madzima vanoti kunyange hazvo kuine vamwe vanhu vanozvarwa vasingakwanise kuita mbereko, vazhinji vanoshaya mbereko nemhosva yezvirwere zvepabonde. Dr Madzima vanoti havasi vakadzi chete vanotadza kuita mbereko. Dr Mudzima vanoti varume vanokwanisa kuita dambudziko iri zvakanyanya, asi vazhinji vavo havade kubuda pachena. Kubudikidza nekubuda pachena kwakaita Amai Maponga nezvedambudziko rekushaya mbereko, vanoti zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvakavachaira runhare musi wavakabuda panhepfenyuro vachitaura nyaya yavo, izvo zvakazoita kuti vatange sangano rinonzi "Hannah’s Tears", iro rinonyaradza vakadzi vanenge vasangana nedambudziko rokushaya mbereko. Senzira yekugadzirisa dambudziko iri, gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obediah Moyo, vanoti pane chikwata chevanachiremba vakatumwa nehurumende mhiri kwemakungwa kunodzidzira zvokuuchika vana kuitira kuti vazobatsira vanoshaya mbereko muZimbabwe kuitira kuti vakwanisewo kuita vana vavo.

headline: Hurumende Yovandudza Mitemo Kuti Matunhu Awane Imwe yeMari yeZvicherwa Zvawo
text: Hurumende inoti iri kunyora mitemo mitsva inozoona kuti nzvimbo dzine zvicherwa dzigovane nehurumende mari inobva muzvicherwa zvemunzvimbo idzodzo. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti hurumende yavo inoona kuti nzvimbo zhinji dzine zvicherwa hadzina mari yadzinowana saka vanoda kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Mukuru weCenter For Natural Resources Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti zvingave zvakanaka chose kana hurumende ikaita izvi asi vanotizve matunhu anofanira kupiwa simba rekusarudza zvinoda kuitwa munzvimbo dzawo uye kuti matunhu asarudze vanhu kana makambani anozoita zvemabhizimisi mudunhu iroro. "Nyaya yekunyorwa kwemitemo iyi yakagara ichitaurwa kubva VaMnangagwa vari gurukota rezvemitemo. Kubva kuna 2006, Zimbabwe yatadza kuti inyore mitemo mitsva yezvezvicherwa. Vanga vachiramba vachingoita zvigamba zvigamba. Saka handizivi kuti vave nemaonero matsva here," VaMaguwu vakaudza Studio 7. "Chinhu chekutanga chatinoda kuona, kupa matunhu ese masimba ekuzvitonga, kana kuti 'devolution of power'. Dunhu rimwe nerimwe rinofanira kusarudza vanoita bhizimisi mudunhu raro." No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vononga Svosve neMuromo kuMasvingo
text: Vagari vakawanda vekuMasvingo vanoti vari kunonga svosve nemuromo kuti vararame nepamusana pekushaikwa kwemabasa muguta ravo. Vamwe vevanhu ava vari kunhonga marara kunzvimbo inorasirwa marara nekanzuru yeguta ravo vachizonogeza zvinhu zvavanenge vawana kuitira kuti vazozvitengesa. Vagari ava vanosanganisira vechidiki, vakuru pamwe nemadzimai anenge akatakura vana kumusana, vari kuenda kunonhonga zvinhu zvinenge zvaraswa. Studio7 yashanyira nvzimbo inorasirwa marara nekanzuru, iyo iri kumavirira kwemusha weRunyararo West, ikawana vanhu vari mubishi kunonga zvinhu vasina zvipfeko zvinokodzera zvakaita semanjombo, magirovhisi pamwe nema mask. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Amai Sylivia Makurwe, avo vane vana vatatu, vanoti vanomukira kunonga zvinhu izvi kuti vakwanise kuchengeta mhuri yavo uye vaendese mumwe wevana vavo kuchikoro uyo ari kumba nenyaya yekutadza kubhadara mari yechikoro. Mumwe wevanoita basa rakadai, Ambuya Tatenda Murambiwa, vanoti dambudziko ravo riri kukonzerwa nehurumende yeZanu PF iyo iri kutadza kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika nepamusana pekutadza kutonga zvine jechetere mukati. Mukomana wechidiki, Oswald Mupambiwa, anotiwo inyaya yenhamo zvayo asi hutano hwavo huri panguva yakaoma sezvo kumarara uku kuchirasirwa zvinhu zvakasiya-siyana izvo zvinokonzera zvirwere zvakawanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti vanhu vanononga zvinhu kunorasirwa marara vane njodzi yekubata zvirwere zvakasiyana siyana, ndokana vachiita basa ravo vasina kupfeka shangu dzinokodzera, uye zvipfeko zvemumaoko, kana kuti magirovhosi. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo vanhu ava vanofanirwa kunge vaine ma mask kuitira kuti vasafeme mweya ine tsvina uyu. Gurukota rinoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMasvingo, Amai Shuvai Mahofa, varamba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti vari mumusangano. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti hurumende inofanirwa kuita hurongwa hwekumutsiridza maindasitiri ayo akavharwa nepamusana pekutadza kwehurumende kuronga zvine hungwaru. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo hurumende inofanirwa kudzika mitemo iche chekuita nehupfumi kuitira kuti mitemo iyi ikwezve vekunze vanoda kutanga mabhizinesi munyika, izvo zvinozoita kuti mabasa awanikwe munyika. Payaitsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo muna 2013, Zanu PF yakati yaizoita kuti munyika muve nemabasa matsva anosvika mamiriyoni maviri. Asi izvi hazvina kuitika sezvo zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nezvishanu kubva muzana zvevashandi zvisina mabasa munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inonzi Haisati Yapindura Magwaro Akakwidzwa Mudare rePamusoro naVana Chiremba
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, nemunyori mukuru mubazi ravo, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vanonzi havasati vapindura magwaro ari kudare repamusoro akaendeswa navanachiremba vachiti danho ravakatora rekuvabvisira mari dzemihoro mushure mekuratidzira rainge risiri pamutemo. Kuratidzira uku kwakapfuura mavhiki maviri uye kwakatanga muna Gumiguru kukazopera muna Mbudzi. Vanachiremba vainge vakanda mapadza pasi vachiti havasi kufara nemari dzavaitambiriswa uye kushaya zvikwanisiro zvekushandisa. Sangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association rinoti vanachiremba vakabatirwa mari dzinopfuura mazana mashanu emadhora. Gweta ravanachiremba ava, VaEmmanuel Samundombe, vanoti zvakaitwa nehurumende zvekubvisira vanachiremba mari kutyora bumbiro remitemo. No media source currently available Asi hurumende mutsamba yakanyorwa naDr Gwinji yakaudza vanachiremba ava kuti kuratidzira kwavo kwainge kusiri pamutemo nekudaro vaizobatirwa mari sezvinoitirwa vanenge vaenda havo pazororo risiri pamutemo. Hurumende yave nemakore ichinetsana navanachiremba nenyaya yemari dzavanotambira asi dambudziko iri harisi kupera.

headline: Zvikwata zviri kundichemera: Wenger
text: anoti zvikwata zvakawanda zvauya kwaari zvichida kumutenga apo ari kugadzirira kubva kuArsenal iyo yaarairidza kwemakore anodarika 22.   Wenger acharairidza mutambo wake wekupedzisira apo chikwata chake chichasangana neHuddewrsfield musi weSvondo.   Paakabvunzwa kuti pane zvimwe zvikwata here zviri kuuya kwaari zvichida kumutenga kuti agozvirairidze, Wenger anoti, “Hongu, zvakawandisa chaizvo. Asi handisi kumbofunga nezvazvo kana kuzvitarisa. Ndinoda kuramba ndichishanda kuno kusvika zuva rekupedzisira rekondirakiti yangu.   “Zveshuwa ndicharamba ndichishanda. Njere dzangu dzinoda chaizvo kuti ndirambe ndichishanda. Asi chokwadi chaicho handizive. Ndinofanirwa kufunga nezvazvo. Ndinofarira huswa hunyoro uye ndinoda kufamba pahuri mazuva ose. Handizive kana ndikaramba ndichizviita mazuva anotevera, zvinogoneka.   “Ndine ruzivo rwakanyanya munyaya dzenhabvu. Saka ndicharamba ndichishanda, ndichiitei, handizive.”   Achibvunzwa kuti achazoshanda nechimwe chikwata chemuEngland here, Wenger anoti, “Panguva ino zvichiri kundiremera. Handitarise nguva iyoyo. Handidi kufunga nezvazvo panguva ino kana kutaura nezvazvo.” – SportsMail Football

headline: VaChamisa Vanoti VaMnangagwa Vakundikana Kugadzira Nyaya Dzekupambwa kweVanhu muNyika
text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa havasi kuratidza hutungamiri panyaya iri kupomerwa mapurisa nevasori yekuva nechekuita nekupambwa kwenhengo dzevechidiki nhatu dzebato ravo vachidzokorora kuti zvave kuda kuti United Nations ipindire. Vati vakatonyorera tsamba kuUnited Nations kuti munyika mapindwa naPongwe nekudaro inofanira kuongorora nyaya dzekupambwa kwevanhu. VaChamisa vati VaMnangagwa vawana mikana miviri yekutaura nenyika nezuro kumarinda eHeroes Acre uye neMugovera panyaya yelockdown asi havana kana kutaura nezvekupambwa nekushungurudzwa kwenhengo yeparamende inomiririra Harare West mudare reparamende Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, nemutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC Youth Assembly Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri uye mutevedzeri wemurongi wemabasa musangano revechidiki iri, Muzvare Netsai Marova. Vatatu ava vanonzi vakapambwa kuWarren Park vakazowanikwa kuBindura. Gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe vanoti vakakumbira mukuru wemapurisa VaGodwin Matanga kuti vaongorore nyaya iyi. Vanotiwo vanhu vanofanira kumirira ongororo iyi kwete kutaura zvisina humbowo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri Asi VaChamisa vanoti havana chivimbo nezviri kuitwa izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weKuzeya Matambudziko eNyika weZimbabwe National Agreement Platfrom Unoitwa muHarare
text: Musangano wekuzeya matambudziko akatarisana nenyika wanga uchiunganidza mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anopikisa, vedzisvondo, vashandi pamwe nevadzidzi wanga uchifanirwa kuitwa muHarare mangwanani eChishanu wakazononoka zvikuru mushure mekunge mapurisa ambourambidza achiti haana vanhu vakakwana vanokwanisa kuchengetedza runyararo. Musangano uyu wanga wakarongwa pasi pegungano reZimbabwe National Agreement Platform uchitungamirwa naBishop Ancelimo Magaya. Bishop Magaya vanoti vazoenda kumatare edzimhosva kuti vakwanise kupiwa gwaro rinovapa mvumo yekuita musangano uyu vasingambunyikidzw nemapurisa, inove kodzero yavo pasi pebumbiro remitemo idzva, iro rinopa munhu wese kodzero yekutaura zvaanoda kana kuungana. Mapato apinda musangano uyu, anosanganisira reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, pamwe nechikwata chePeople First icho chinonzi chinotungamirwa naAmai Joice Mujuru, iro svondo rapera vakabatana nevamwe vose ava mukusaina gwaro reNational Electoral Reform Agreement. Asi chikwata chePeople First hachina kuzopinda musangano uyu nezvikonzero zvisati zvazivikanwa. Gwaro iri rinomanikidza hurumende kuti itange yavandudza mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo, sarudzo dza 2018 dzisati dzaitwa. Bishop Magaya vanoti mapurisa akavapawo chimwe chikonzero chekuti vakanga vasina kuzivisa huwandu hwevanhu vachapinda musangano uyu. Vanoti vanhu vazopinda musangano uyu vanogona kudarika chiuru, sezvo vamwe vanga vatoparara panguva yavazopiwa gwaro rekumatare edzimhosva. No media source currently available

headline: CHRA Inoti Harare Iri Kusiya Madzimai Akazvitakura Asina Rubatsiro paGlen View Polyclinic
text: Sangano revagari vemuguta guru reHarare, reCombined Harare Residents Association kana kuti CHRA, rinoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka paGlen View Poly Clinic apo panonzi pane vakoti vashoma. Mukuru wezvirongwa muCHRA, VaReuben Akili, vanoti paGlen View Polyclinic panobatsirwa madzimai anenge akazvitakura, uye vanhu vari kubayiwawo nhomba yeCovid-19 pachipatara ichi. VaAkili vanoti chipatara ichi hachina mvura yekushandisa, izvo zvave kuisa hupenyu hwemadzimai akazvitakura panjodzi. VaAkili vanoti matambudziko akatarisana neGlevn View Polyclinic akabuda pachena pamusangano wakaitirwa padandemutande nguva pfupi yapfuura uyo waizeya matambudziko ari kusangana nemadzimai munzvimbo iyi. Musangano uyu wakanzwawo kuti vamwe varwere vave kuendeswa kuBudiriro 1 kuti vanorapwa. Kubudiro 1 kunonzi kwakamanikidzanawo zvekuti madzimai akazvitakura anogona kuguma atapurirwa chirwere ccheCovid-19. CHRA inoti vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mukanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vakati kanzuru ine vakoti vashoma sezvo vakawanda vari kuenda kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro. Studio 7 yatumira mibvunzo kuna VaChideme asi vange vasati vapindura pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

headline: Mayweather oyambira Nurmagomedov
text: oyambira Khabib Nurmagomedov apo akatarisana nemutambo wake naConor McGregor weUFC 229.   Chizvarwa chekuRussia ichi chicharwa kuchengetedza bhande rake relightweight kubva kuna McGregor muIrish uyo ari kudzoka mumutambo uyu, mumutambo uchatambirwa kuT-Mobile Arena kuLas Vegas musi waGumiguru 6.   Mayweather – uyo akakunda McGregor mumutambo wakaburitsa mari zhinji wetsiva gore radarika – anoyambira Nurmagomedov uyo asati ambokundwa mumutambo weMMA kuti munhu waacharwa naye haana waanotya.   “Conor haadzokere shure uye haambotye kana munhu zvachose, kuhwina kana kukundwa kana kuita mangange,” Mayweather akaudza mutori wenhau weTMZ Adam Glynn kuHard Rock Hotel and Casino kuAtlantic City svondo rino.   “Conor ari kuzorwa mutambo uyu.   “Handingakwanise kutaura kuti achahwina ndiani nekuti munhu ari kusangana naConor McGregor handisati ndambomuona hangu achirwa, asi kubva pane zvandakanzwa pamusoro pake, mutambi anorwa zveshuwa uye anogona kuparadza munhu, chipo chiripo.   “Asi, vatsigiri vanoda kukuona uchisimuka uchirwa. Ndizvo vatambi vanoda kuona chete.   “Conor McGregor, mutambi anonetsa kurwa naye nekuti mutambi wepamusoro.   “Sekutaura kwandamboita kare, Conor McGregor haasi kuzotya kupinda mumutambo uyu, haatye,                         murwi chaiye.” – SportsMail MMA

headline: Chin'ono Oramba Ari Mutirongo Kusvika Musi wa 7 Nyamavhuvhu
text: Mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira, Hopewell Chin’ono, anyimwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti atongwe achibva kumba kwake. Chin’ono, uyo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira vanhu kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga musi wa31 Chikunguru, anzi adzoke kudare musi wa7 Nyamavhuvhu. Vachipa mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chaChin’ono, mutongi wedare, VaNgoni Nduna, vati kana Chin’ono akapihwa mukana wekubhara mari yechibatiso anogona kuramba achikurudzira vanhu kuti varatidzire nechisimba achishandisa dandemutande rake reTwitter. Vati veruzhinji havazovimbinematare kana akamuburitsa kuti atongwe achibva kumba nekuti izvi zvinogona kuisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji munjodzi sezvo zuva rekuratidzira racho risati rasvika. Vati padandemutande rake reTwitter, Chin’ono akanyora kuti sarudzo pamwe nematare hazviunze shanduko munyika uye akaisa mashoko pa Twitter yake ekukurudzira kuti veruzhinji varatidzire nechisimba. Gweta guru raChin’ono, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vanga vaudza dare kuti Chin’ono munhu ane kodzero yekupihwa wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso, asi VaNduna varamba kuzvitambira vakapa mutongo wanga wakurudzirwa nevachuchisi vwhurumende. Rimwe remagweta aChin’ono, VaDoug Coltart, vanyora paTwitter yavo kuti vachapikisa mudare repamusoro mutongo wapihwa Chin’ono wekunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso Chin’ono ari kuramba nyaya yaari kupomerwa achiti iye chake akangoburitsa mashoko ari kutaurwa nevarongi vekuratidzira kwemusi wa31 Chikunguru, veTransform Zimbabwe. Chin’ono akasungwa pamwe chete nemutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume. VaNgarivhume, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva imwe chete naChin’ono, vakanyimwawo mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nemusi weChina uye nyaya yavo ichaenderera mberi musi wa14 Nyamavhuvhu. Mune imwewo nyaya, meya veHarare, VaHebert Gomba, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekushandisa hosifi yavo zvisiri pamutemo apo vanonzi vakanyora tsamba vachiti vamwe vanhu vapihwe masitendi, vanyimwawo mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuitirakuti nyaya yavo itongwe vachibva kumba. Mutongi wedare, Amai Bianca Makwande, vati vanobvumirana nevachuchusi kuti kana vakabatwa nemhosva, VaGomba vanogona kukandwa mujeri kwenguva yakareba. Rimwe remagweta aVaGomba, VaHarrision Nkomo, vati chimwe chikonzero chaita kuti VaGomba vanyimwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso inyaya yekuti vanzi vanogona kukanganisa vafakazi. VaNkomo vati vave kuenda kudare repamusoro kunotsvaga mutongo wekuti VaGomba vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Bato raVaGomba reMDC Alliance raratidza kusafara nemabatirwo akaitwa VaGomba pavakasungwa. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Advocate Fadzai Mahere, vati havasi kufara zvachose nemasungirwo akaitwa VaGomba. Vatiwo havakwanisi kutaura zvakawanda sezvo nyaya ichiri mumatare. VaGomba vakasungwa nemusi weMuvhuro vakazounzwa kudare neChina. No media source currently available

headline: Ndiri kuenda kuAfcon: Chigova
text: MUBATI wepagedhi wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors nePolokwane City yekuSouth Africa, George Chigova, anoti akarwadziwa zvikuru nekutadza kuenda kwaakaita kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) gore rakadarika nekudaro ari kushanda nesimba kuti agoenda kumakwishu aya gore rinotevera kuCameroon.   Mumutambo weAfcon 2017 uyo wakaitirwa kuGabon, Tatenda Mkuruva ndiye akasarudzwa kubatira maWarriors naKalisto Pasuwa uyo aive murairidzi wechikwata chenyika ichi panguva iyi. Asi kuzobva kwaPasuwa kuchiuya Norman Mapeza, Chigova ndiye akabva ashevedzwa kuzobatira maWarriors uye Sunday Chidzambwa – uyo akazotsiva Mapeza – akauya ndokuvimbawo naChigova.   Saka mutambi uyu ane mukana mukuru wekuve mubati wepagedhi wemaWarriors gore rinotevera kuCameroon asi hunge chikwata chenyika ichi chakabudirira kuenda kumutambo uyu.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rapera apo maWarriors akaita mangange 1-1 neDemocratic Republic of Congo kuNational Sports Stadium, Chigova anoti, “Handizvivanze, Afcon yekupedzisira ndakarwadziwa kusashevedzwa kuti ndiende kunomiririra nyika yangu, asi zvakadarika. Iye zvino ndine mukana wekuenda gore rinotevera asi hunge ndikaramba ndichishanda nesimba. Hatizive zvichaitika kubva iye zvino nepachapera mwaka, pamwe murairidzi anogona kusarudza mumwe mubati wepagedhi kuti aende saka ini ndinofanirwa kuramba ndichishanda nesimba,” anodaro.   Anoti iye zvino ari kufanirwa kuramba achishanda nesimba.   “Hazvizivikanwe kuti achange ari panyanga ndiani, chandinofanirwa kuita chete kushanda nesimba kuti ndisarudzwe. Mutambi unogona kutamba mitambo yekurwira kuenda kumakwishu aya asi wozobatiswa pasi pachikwata chinosarudzwa kuenda kunokwikwidza. Saka ndiri kufanirwa kuramba ndichishanda nesimba kuti ndishevedzwe ndigoenda kumutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Mutambi uyu – uyo ave nemakore akawanda achigara kuSouth Africa uko atambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira SuperSport United nePolokwane City – anoti hupenyu kunyika iyi hwakamunakira.  Anoti kuSouth Africa kungori kubasa chete kwaari kushanda kuti awane hupenyu hwakanaka sezvo hapana imwe nyika inodarika Zimbabwe.   “Hongu kuSouth Africa tinoenda, kubasa uye tiri kugara hupenyu hwakanaka asi chokwadi ndangariro dzedu dzinogara dziri kumusha kwedu kwatakabva.   “Zvakakosha kuti tiende kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa kunoshanda ikoko uye zvese zvatinenge tashanda todzoka kuzosimudzira hama dzedu muno,” anodaro.

headline: Ndiyani Achatora Mukombe waSoccer Star Gore Rino
text: Vasarudzi veCastle Soccer Star of the Year vaungana muHarare vachisarudza vatambi gumi nemumwe chete vari kurwira kutora mukombe mukuru uyu. Vatambi Ocean Mushure naChristian Epoupa veDynamos, Dominic Chungwa we Caps United, Rodwell Chinyengetere weFC Platinum naClement Matawu weChicken Inn - vapinda pavatambi gumi nemumwechete vari kurwira kutora mukombe weCastle Soccer Star of the Year wemwaka uno. NgezI Platinum Stars ndiyo ine vatambi vakawanda pavatambi vasarudzwa ava vanoti Terence Dzvukamanja, Tichaona Mabvura, na Quadr Amini. Vamwe vakwanisa kupinda pavatambi gumi nemumwechete ava ndiDominic Chungwa naDevon Chafa veCaps United. Chicken Inn ina Moses Jackson naClement Matawu uyo akaita mukurumbira achitambira Motor Action nekutora mukombe waSoccer Star uyu muna 2006. Soccer Stars of the Year pamwe nemurairidzi Coach of the Year, vachaziviswa pamwe nekupihwa mibairo yavo pamabiko ekupera kwegore achaitwa nevePremier Soccer League vakabatana nevanovapa mari veDelta Beverages. Norman Mapeza weFC Platinum,na Lloyd Mutasa weDynamos ndivo vari kutarisirwa kurwira mukombe weCoach of the Year. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kugwinyisa Muviri Kuti Vasarwarisa Vakabatwa neCovid-19
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti vanhu vanofanirwa kugara vakagwinyisa miviri yavo nguva dzose kuitira kuti kana vachinge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vave nemukana mukuru wekupora kubva kuchirwere ichi. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vagare vachiita zvirongwa zvekugwinyisa miviri yavo nguva dzose kuitira kuti vave nehutano hwakanaka. Kugwinyisa muviri uku kunogona kuitwa nenzira dzakawanda, idzo dzinosanganisira kuita zvemitambo, kumhanya, pamwe nekufamba zvinoitakuti vabude, unova mucherechedzo wekuti huwandu hwemafuta ari mumuviri, hunenge huchideredzwa. Mumwe mudzidzisi wepachikoro chemapusoro soro, Doctor Tendai Charity Nhenga, vanoti pavakarwara nedenda reCovid 19 gore rino, vakapiwa mubhedha kwaMutare uko kwavakaona vanhu vaiva vapihwawo mibhedha vakange vaine miviri yakakurisa zvikuru. Doctor Nhenga vanoti pavakaziva nezvedenda iri gore rakapera, vakatanga kuita zvokufamba vachigwinyisa muviri wavo. Vanoti vane chokwadi kuti kusimbisa kwavaiita nyama dzavo kwakabatsira zvikuru mukupora kwavo. Doctor Nhenga vanoti mudzinza ravo mune vanhu vane mhumhu mukuru, pamwe nehuremu husingawirirane nehurefu hwavo. Vanoti vazhinji vevanhu ava vanorwara nezvirwere zveshuga, High Blood Pressure izvo zvinoita kuti vadhererwe nezvirwere zvakawanda, zvinosanganisira Covid-19. Mukuru weDepartment of Chemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe School of Medicine, Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kugara vachigwinyisa miviri yavo kuburikidza nekuita mitambo kana mabasa anoita kuti vabude dikita. Muzvinafundo Matarira vanoti kubudisa dikita mumuviri kunoita kuti tsinga dzinoendesa mweya kumapapu, dzigare dzakavhurika. Muzvinafundo Matarira vanoti paongorora yavakaita kuEpworth nemuHarare, zvakaonekwa kuti vanhu ava vaisaziva kuti denda reCovid 19 rinokwanisa kuparadzirwawo nevanhu vasina zvinoratidza kuti vane denda iri, asi vainaro, izvo vanoti zviri kuita kuti denda iri ripararire zvakanyanyisa. Sangano reDiabetic Association of Zimbabwe rinoti nepamusana pekuti vanhu vakawanda havaongororwi chirwere cheshuga, ndizvo zviri kukwidzawo matenda emoyo, hupofu, nekugurwa kwemakumbo zvokuti Covid 19 ikabata vanhu vakadai vasiri kutora mishonga, inokwanisa kuvauraya. Ongororo yakaitwawo zvakare nebazi rezvehutano inoratidza kuti munhu mumwe chete kubva muvanhu gumi munyika, ane chirwere cheshuga. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nazvematenda asingatapuriranwe mubazi rehutano, Dr Justice Mudavanhu, vanoti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekupinda munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana ichichenjedza veruzhinji pamusoro pechirwre cheshuga nokuti zvakaonekwa kuti vanhu vanonyanya kuvhiringwa nedenda reCovid 19, vanhu vane zvirwere zveshuga, High Blood Pressure, uye nguva zhinji, vari vanhu vanenge vasiri pamishonga. Asi Dr Madavanhu vanoti chirongwa ichi chakambomiswa nekuda kwemitemo yakatarwa nebazi rehutano iyo isingabvumidze kuungana kwevanhu munguva ino yekurwisa Covid 19.

headline: Nhengo dzeParamende Dzonwa Mushonga Unodzivirira Korera
text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzapihwa mishonga yekudzivirira korera senzira yekukurudzira kuti vaparidze kunzvimbo dzavo nyaya yekudzivirira chirwere chekorera. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvekutapurirana mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Portia Manangazira, vaudza Studio7, kuti vafara chose kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzange dzichida kuziva pamusoro pekorera nezvimwe zvirwere zvemudumbu.
