Vatiwo vanovimba kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzichavabatsira kusvitsa mharidzo yavo kumachechi anorambidza nhengo dzawo kuti dzinwe mishonga yekudzivirira zvirwere. Imwe nhengo yeparamende zvakare vari sachigaro weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Muzvare Tabitah Khumalo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vachakurudzira vanhu munharaunda dzavo kuti vaitewo sazvavaita nhasi. Mumiriri weMbizo, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vatiwo vatora mushonga senzira yekukurudzira vanhu vemunzvimbo kuti vazvidzivirire kukorera. Nynzvi munyaya dzehutano dziri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vamwe mushonga wekudzivirira korera, uyo uri kupihwa pachena. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rechirwere chekorera icho chinorapika nyore. Chirwere ichi chakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina muna 2008, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi mapfumamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi.

headline: VaMutasa Vanobvuma Kutongwa neKomiti yeZanu-PF
text: Nyaya yekusawirirana mubato reZanu-PF yatanga zvakare mushure mekudzoka munyika kwemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe. Kudzoka kwavo nesvondo kwava kureva kuti vaive murongi wemabasa mubato, VaDidymus Mutasa, vanenge votongwa nekomiti yakaumbwa iri kutungamirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko. VaMutasa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachaenda kudare iri. No media source currently available Vamwe vari mukomiti iyi vanosanganisira Amai Mugabe semutungamiri weWomens League, vanoona nezvemabasa ematongwerwo enyika mubato, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, munyori wezvemitemo, VaPatrick Chinamasa, munyori wevechidiki, VaPupurai Togarepi, uye nhengo yePolitburo, VaKembo Mohadi. Mutauriri webato, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vakazivisa svondo rapera kuti kutongwa kwaVaMutasa kunotanga chete kana Amai Mugabe vadzoka kubva kunyika dzekumawirira.

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kurawara neCovid-19 muNyika Hwowedzera Zvakanyanya
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika uho hwainge hwamboderera kusvika pazana nemakumi matanhatu nemana kana kuti 164 musi wa12 Gumiguru hwatanga kuwedzerazve zvakanyanya. NeMugovera bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika uye vose havana nhoroondo yekushanya kunze kwenyika. Izvi zviri kureva kuti vanhu vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi vave mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevatatu kana kuti 433. MuBulawayo ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara vanosvika zana negumi nevatanhatu, Harare ine makumi manomwe nemumwe, Matabeleland South ine makumi matanhatu nemumwe, Matabeleland North makumi mashanu nevatanhatu uye dunhu rine vanhu vashoma shoma vari kurwara iMashonaland West ine vanhu vasere. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pazviuru zvisere nemazana manomwe nemakumi masere nematanhatu kana kuti 8, 786. Vanhu vapora kusvika parizvino vave zviuru zvisere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 8, 096 mushure mekupora kwevanhu vasere neMugovera. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizino vave mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 257. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi mana nemasere ane zana nemana kana kuti 47, 104. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1, 6 million. South Africa ine vanhu vave kusvika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 750 000 vabatwa nechirwere icgi ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nemana kana kuti 54 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica chete vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemashanu kana kuti 245, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave kuda kusvika mamiriyoni gumi nechimwe kana kuti 11 miillion. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9. Asi vapora vachida kusvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemashanu kana kuti 35 million. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambova mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza Dr Enoch Mayida vati vanhu vanofanira kugara vakangwarira nekuti vakarivara chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvine hukasha zvochoiita muAmerica, Britain nedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Tunisia Yova Nyika yeKutanga muAfrica Kubuda Mumakwikwi eFIFA World Cup22
text: Tunisia yave nyika yekutanga muAfrica kubuda mumakwikwi eFIFA World Cup 2022 ari kutambirwa kuQatar. Izvi zviri kuitika kunyangwe Tunisia iyo iri muGroup D yaita zvange zvisingafungidzirwe nevakawanda zvekurova France 1-0. Australia iri kuenderera mberi mumakwikwi aya neFrance yarova Denmark 1-0. Panyika dzimwe dzemuAfrica dziri kumakwikwi aya, Senegal kusvika parizvino ndiyo yabudirira kuenderera mberi muGroup A. Dzimwe nyika dzasara iGhana, Cameroon neMorocco.

headline: National Aids Council Yoronga Hurongwa Hunobatsira Matunhu Madiki
text: Sangano reNational Aids Council rinoti hurongwa hwaro hwekuti matunhu madiki kana kuti madhisitirikiti azvirongere oga mashandisirwo emari inobva muhomwe ye AIDS Fund hwave padanho repamusoro soro. Mukuru anoona nezvemari musangano iri, VaAlbert Manenji, vanoti vakaona zvakakosha kuti vatore danho iri sezvo mamwe matunhu anga achichema chema kuti ari kunonoka kana kutotadza kuwana mari idzi nekuda kwezvimhingamipinyi zvinokonzerwa nekugoverwa kwemari kana ichibva kumuzinda. Vanoti pari zvino sangano iri riri kungoita zvirongwa zvakafanana kumatunhu ose, pasina kutariswa kuti zvichemo zvinogona kusiyana dunhu nedunhu. Gore rino sangano iri rakaisa parutivi mari inosvika mamiriyoni mashanu ekushandisa mukurwisa pamwe nekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Matunhu makuru gumi emunyika achawana mazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora iyo anozopa kumatunhu maduku zvichienderana nezvirongwa zvaanenge achiita. Svondo rino misangano yekukwenenzvera hurongwa uhwu iri pakati kuMasvingo uko humiriri hwematunhu madiki ose ari makumi masere nemashanu munoshandira sangano reNational Aids Council huri kudzidziswa. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandirwi Vanoti Mutemo Ngauvandudzwezve Kuti Vakwanise Kudzinga Vashandi Basa Nyore
text: Kunyangwe hazvo mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakaisa ruoko rwavo pamutemo wekuvandudza mitemo yevashandi kana kuti Labour Ammendment Act muna 2015, kusvika parizvino hapana kuwirirana kuti ndiyani chaiye akabatsirwa nemutemo uyu. Vashandirwi vanoti mutemo uyu wakavatsikirira zvimwe chetezvo zviri kutaurwa nevashandi. Mutemo uyu wakadzikwa mushure mekunge dare repamusoro soro ratura mutemo wekuti vashandi vanokwanisa kudzingwa mabasa mushure mekuziviswa pachine mwedzi mitatu chete. Izvi zvakapa kuti vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri nevashanu varasikirwe nemabasa. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce VaChristopher Mugaga vanoti vari kuda kuti mitemo iyi ivandudzwe kuti vakwanise kumisa vashandi basa zviri nyore. VaMugaga varamba mashoko ekuti kusafamba zvakanaka kwemabhizimisi hakunei nekugumura vashandi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries VaCallisto Jokonya avo vati mari yekumisa mushandi basa ichiri yakawanda zvikuru. Asi munyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions VaJaphet Moyo varamba mashoko aya. VaMoyo vati mitemo yemunyika isinei nevashandi ndiyo inopa kuti zvinhu zvisashande munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vapa semuenzaniso mutemo wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Dr Godfrey Kanyenze vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe vatenderana naVaMoyo avo vati nyaya yehuwori iri kupawo kuti zvinhu zvisafambe zvakanaka. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo yevashandi VaRogers Matsikidze vanoti semaonero avo, mutemo wakavandudzwa unotopa vashandirwi simba rakawanda rekudzinga vashandi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi vanhu vanosvika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana havana mabasa. Asi hurumende inoti vanhu vasina mabasa zvikamu gumi kubva muzana nekuti vakawanda vanozviitira mabasa emaoko. Hurumende nemakambani vari kukundikana kubhadhara vashandi zvapa kuti vakawanda vanonge svosve nemuromo. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe kuMhangura Voramba Kubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19 Madzimai Akazvitakura neAri Kuyamwisa
text: Vamwe vari kubaya nhomba kuMhangura, mudunhu reMashonaland West vari kupikisana nekurudziro yehurumende yekuti madzimai akazvitakura kana kuti ari kuyamwisa abayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 kana hutano hwavo hwakamira zvakanaka. Mamwe madzimai audza Studio 7 kuti vari kudzoserwa kumba vasina kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 vachinzi havabaiwe sezvo vakazvitakura kana kuti vachiri kuyamwisa. Amai Emilda Mwala avo vari kuyamwisa mwana wavo ane mwedzi mitanhatu vanoti vakadzoswa paMakonde Christian Hospital. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemumwe mudzimai akazvitakura Amai Rutendo Makwara avo vanoti vakarambirwawo pakiriniki iri pedyo nekuGudubu kuMhangura. Mukuru anoona nezvedzidziso yehutano kana kuti Provincial Health Promotion Officer mudunhu reMashonaland West Dr George Kambondo vaudza Studio 7 kuti dunhu ravo harisi kubaya nhomba madzimai akazvitakura kana vari kuyamwisa. Dr Kambondo vanoti mhando yenhomba iri kushandiswa munyika iri kubva kunyika yeChina haina kuongororwa kuti inoshandiswa pamadzimai aya here pasina dambudziko.\n\nAsi mukuru anoona nezvechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti madzimai akazvitakura kana ari kuyamwisa vabaiwe nhomba. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nevaive mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza Dr Enoch Mayida vati madzimai ari kuyamwisa anokwanisa kubayiwa nhomba uye vakatiwo madzimai akazvitakura asiri kurwarisa nezvirwere zvakaita seBP, shuga kana kunzwa dzungu anokwanisa kubayiwa nhomba. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri webazi rezvehutano vaDonald Mujiri avo vanga vachinzi vari mumusangano. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West Dr Gift Masoja vanoti kusvika parizvino madzimai akazvitakura akabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 anosvika zvikamu makumi maviri nezvitanhatu kubva muzana uye madzimai matatu akazvitakura vakafa nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Huori neMitemo Isina Kujeka Zvodzosera Nyika Kumashure paNyaya yeZvicherwa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti chido chavo ndechekuti zvicherwa zviunze mari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemaviri panosvika gore ra2023. VaMnangagwa vakataura mashoko aya svondo rapera pakunyoreranwa kwechibvumirano chekuchera lithium pakati pekambani yekuChina ye Zhejing Hayou Cobalt neyekuAustralia inonzi Prospect Resources Limited. Kambani yekuChina yakabhadhara mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana mana nemakumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti US422 million. Mugodhi weLithium uyu unonzi Arcadia Mine. Ko Zimbabwe yakakomborerwa nezvicherwa zvakaita segoridhe, Lithium, koromo, mangoda, platinum nezvimwe ingakwanise kuona chouviri sei pazviri uye nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinooona sei chibvumirano chitsva ichi? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti chibvumirano ichi chakakosha asi vanoda kuita zvechioko muhomwe ndivo vanopa kuti vanhu vasade kupinda munyika kuzotanga mabhizimisi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Prosper Chitambara vanoshanda nesangano eeLabour and Economic Development Research Institute avo vatiwo zvinorwadza kuti nyika haina zvakawanda zvairi kuwana mukutengesa zvivanikwa vakati panoda kuumbwa masangano ekuti pasaitwe huori. Vatiwo makambani akawanda anochera zvicherwa ari kunzi ambomira kubhadhara mitero zvopa kuti nyika inyanye kurasikirwa nemari. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reAnti Corruption Trust of Southern Afica VaAlois Chaumba vanoti zvakakosha kuti pazvibvumirano zvakadai, hurumende inyatsobude pachena kuti zvinofamba sei pazvibvumirano zvakadai kumisa nyaya dzehuori. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaVictor Bhoroma vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kukurudzira vekunze kuti vakwenenzvere zvicherwa zvavo munyika kuti nyika iwane mari yakawanda nekuvamba mabasa. Zimbabwe iri kuyedza kuita chibvumirano chakadai nekamabani yeZimplats kuti ikwenenzvere chiwanikwa ichi munyika kuti nyika iwane chouviri. Asi izvi zvave nemakore akawanda zvichiyedza kuitwa kubva mushakabvu Robert Mugabe vachiri mutungamiri wenyika. Sezvo Zimbabwe iri makara asionane nedzimwe nyika dzakabudirira dzakatemera vatungamiri venyika zvirango, makambani ekuChina akawanda ndivo ave kuchera zviwanikwa munyika zvinosanganisira mangoda kwaMarange nezvimwe. No media source currently available

headline: Mishonga yeNhomba yeCovid-19 Yosvika neMuvhuro Ichibva kuChina
text: Zimbabwe ichatanga kugamushira mishonga yenhomba yekudzivirira denda reCovid-19 kubva kuChina nemusi weMuvhuro unouya uye vamwe vashandi vezvehutano vanoti mushonga uyu unofanira kutanga waongororwa usati hwapihwa kwavari pamwe neveruzhinji. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota wekutanga gore rino, gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Seneta Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati mishonga yava kapihwa pachena neChina pamwe nemimwe yakatengwa nehurumende ichatanga kusvika munyika svondo rinouya nemusi weMuvhuro. Vakatiwo mumwe mushonga unotarisirwa kusvika munyika musi wa1 Kurume uye hurumende ine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuvadzirira kuCovid-19 ichitanga nemachiremba, vakoti nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara. Nyanzvi nevashandi vehutano vanoti hurumende iri kutora matanho akanaka pakuunza mishonga iyi asi panofanira kuitwa ongororo yekuti inoshanda zvakanaka here muZimbabwe. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vakoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kufara kuti hurumende iri kuvatungamidza pamberi pakutanga kubaiyiwa nhomba yeCovid-19, panofanira kutangwa paitwa ongororo yekuti mushonga uyu unoshanda muZimbabwe here vasati vabaiwa veruzhinji. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, zvakare vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanotsigirana naVaDongo vachiti zvakosha kuti hurumende iite ongororo yekuti mushonga uyu unoshanda zvakadii muZimbabwe. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vanachiremba, reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners Association, Dr Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuongorora mushonga uyu usati watanga kushandiswa kunodzivirira. Asi Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti hurumende ichatevedza hunyanzvi hwesainzi panyaya dzemishonga yekudzivirira Covid-19. VaDongo vanoti kunyange hazvo vasati vave neruzivo hwekuti hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 huchafamba sei kana kutanga rini, havawoni sekuti zvinganetse kubaya vanhu sezvo vagara vachibaya vanhu nhomba dzezvimwe zvirwere. Kunze kwemishonga iri kubva kuChina, Amai Mutsvangwa, vakazivisawo kuti hurumende ine hurongwa kwekutenga mishonga yeCovid-19 kubva kuIndia neRusssia. Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti Zimbabwe ichatumira ndege kuChina kunotora mishonga yenhomba yeCovid-19 kuitira kuti ipinde munyika musi waKukadzi 15, 2021. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti nhomba dziri kubva kuChina hadzisati dzaitwa ongororo muZimbabwe yekuona kuti inoshanda zvakadii sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika mishonga iyi isati yapihwa veruzhinji munyika. Ongororo idzi dzinotora mwedzi yakati kuti dzichiitwa pachikwata chevanhu mishonga iyi isati yapihwa veruzhinji. Asi munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vanoti zvinhu zvose zviri mugwara. No media source currently available

headline: Hatina chekutaura: Zifa
text: MUTAURIRI weZimbabwe Football Association – Xolisani Gwesela – anoti havana chekutaura zvichitevera kumbomiswa basa kwaitwa vatungamiri veZifa neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) nhasi.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti Zifa inoti kudii nedanho ratorwa neSRC, Gwesela anoti, “Handikwanise kupindura mubvunzo iwoyo, kana muchida kuziva zvakawanda taurai neSRC mubvunze zvose vanokubatsirai.”   Nhasi mangwanani SRC yazivisa nezvekumisa kwayaita basa bhodhi reZifa nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda izvo iri kupomera sangano renhabvu iro rinotungamirirwa naFelton Kamambo.   Zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvamisirwa Zifa basa zvinosanganisira kusashandisa nemazvo mari yeveruzhinji pamwe nekutadza kupa umboo hwekuti mari iyi yakashandiswei, kutumira zvikwata zvenyika kunokwikwidza kumitambo yakasiyana kunze zvisina kupihwa mvumo sezvinodiwa pasi pemutemo wekurwisa denda reCovid-19 uye mashoko ekushungurudzwa kwevaridzi vepembe vechidzimai.   Nyika yamirira kuona kuti sangano reFifa richatora matanho api kuZimbabwe sezvo isingatendere kuti hurumende dzipindire munyaya dzenhabvu.

headline: Dare raMejastiriti Robvumidza Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition Kuratidzira Mushure Mekumborambidzwa neMapurisa
text: Dare ramejasiatiriti muHarare nemusi weMuvhuro rakatura mutongo wekubvumidza sangano reCrisis In Zimbabwe Coalition kuti riratidzire kusafara kwaro nekunonoka kuri kuitwa nehurumende kuvandudza mitemo inobata sarudzo munyika. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti VaLanzini Ncube vakatura mutongo wekuti sangano reCrisis In Zimbabwe Coalition rienderere mberi nehurongwa hwaro hwekuratidzira muHarare neChitatu mushure mekunge sangano iri rarambidzwa nemapurisa kuratidzira richinzi rinozokanganisa runyararo muguta. Mutongi wedare ati kuratidzira uku kuri kuenderere mberi vachiti bumbiro remitemo rinobvumidza vanhu kuratidzira uye mapurisa haafanire kufungidzira kuti vanhu vachapara mhosva ivo vasina chokwadi nazvo. Sangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rakarambidzwa kufora muHarare nemapurisa mushure mekuvazivisa kuti nhengo dzaro dzichazofora dzichiratidza kusafara kwadzo nekunonoka kuri kuita hurumende kuvandudza mitemo inobata sarudzo. Sangano iri rinoti mitemo yesarudzo inofanira kuvandudzwa kuitira kuti iringane nebumbiro idzva renyika pamwe nezviga zvinobata nyaya dzesarudzo zvakatarwa nesangano renyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica re SADC kana kuti SADC Principles Governing the Conduct of Democratic Elections. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaThabani Moyo vanoti vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare. Zvichakadaro, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira VaDavid Nyamanhindi vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa zvekurambidza misangano izvi zvinhu zvagara zvino zivikanwa kuti ndizvo zvavanoita pose panenge pave kuendwa kusarudzo vachiti mapurisa haafanire kuve nedivi raanorerekera. Zvichakadaro, mutongi wedare uyu audza mapurisa kuti achengetedze nhengo dzeCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition padzichange dzichifora muHarare neChitatu. No media source currently available

headline: VaNick Mangwana Vovimbisa Nhepfenyuro Dzakawanda paHurukuro yeVOA neZimbabwe Television Network
text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNdabaningi Nick Mangwana, vanoti hurumende ichavandudza mitemo inombunyikidza vatori venhau uye mashandiro avo zvekuti vari kutarisira kuti mukupera kwegore kunenge kwave nedzimwe nhepfunyuro makumi maviri nena. VaMangwana vakataura mashoko aya pachirongwa che Zimbabwe Television Network ichishanda neVoice of America chinonzi Fourth Estate chaive nedingindira rekuti, Mapping Zimbabwe’ Media Landscape nezuro manheru. Vakatiwo vanoda kuti mabasa ekutapwa nekuburitswa kwenhau avandudzwe kuti pave nemakambani akawanda nemaredhiyo, materevhizheni nemapenhau vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti vana vakawanda vanobva muzvikoro zvepamusoro vawane mabasa. Vakatiwo vanoda kuona nhepfenyuro dzemumatunhu dzichivhurwa vachiti izvi zvichabatsirawo kana vasiri mumabasa enhau. VaMangwana vakatiwo izvi zvinobatsira zvikuru mukushambadza nyika pasi rese. Mupepeti wenhau weZim Fact Platform, VaChris Chinaka, vakatiwo vanotambira mashoko ehurumende aya nemufaro. Vachitaurawo pachirongwa ichi, VaChinaka vakati chimwe chave kunetsa munyika inyaya yekuti munhau mave kufambiswa mashoko asiri echokwandi akawanda. Vakati zvino suwisa kuti vazhinji munyika havachina chivimbo nezvinobuda mumapenhau. VaChinaka vakati chakakosha kuti vatapi venhau vanyore nhau sekutaurwa kwadzinenge dzaitwa kwete kuisa pfungwa dzavo. Mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Muzvare Grace Mutandwa, akatiwo haafari nemashandire ari kuita vatori venhu munyika achiti mihoro yavo iri pasi izvo ati zvinokanganisa mashandire avo. Vamwe vakataurawo pachirongwa ichi, ndiVaJeoff Nyarota, vakamboita mupepeti wemapepanhau akaita seChronicle neDaily News avo vakati vanoona sekuti mabasa ekutapa nhau aderera munyika uye kuti pane kupokana pakati pevatapi venhau vanoshandira mapepanhau ehurumende neavo vanoshanda vakazvimirira. Mumwe mupepeti mukuru mukambani yeZimpapers, varidzi veZTN, VaWilliam Chikoto, vakati mukaha uyu wakawedzera muna2000 zvichitevera kuumbwa kwebato guru rinopikisa reMDC muna 1999 asi vakati kambani yavo inoedza napose painogona kuita basa nemazvo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano reMedia Instutitute of Southern Africa, VaNyasha Nyakunu, vakati chikuru chavakatarisira kuona hurumende ichashandura mitemo inombunyikidza vatapi venhau vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo. Chirongwa ichi chakatepfenyurwawo panhepfuro dzeVoice of America uye VaChinaka vakati mushandirapamwe weVOA neZimpapers wakanaka chose uye unokurudzirwa sezvo uchiratidza pachena kuti Zimbabwe yazvipira kushanda nedzimwe nyika. Aka hakasi kekutanga makambani aya achishanda pamwe sezvo muna Nyamavhuvhu akaita chimwe chirongwa zvakare ichi chakaburitswa pasi rese kusanganisira paVOA nedzimwe nhepfenyuro dzainoshanda nadzo apo pakaitwa gakava rekutanga munyika musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika kunyangwe vamwe vatungamiri vakaita saVaEmmerson Mnangagwa veZanu-PF naVaNelson Chamisa vasina kupinda muhurongwa uhu. No media source currently available

headline: Tichapedzerana neAlgeria: Darikwa
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors neNottingham Forest yekuEngland – Tendayi Darikwa – anoti sechikwata, havasi kutya Algeria iyo yavachasangana nayo mumitambo miviri yekurwira tikiti rekuenda ku2021 Africa Cup of Nations.   MaWarriors nemaDesert Foxes eAlgeria zviri kubandana mumitambo miviri – wekutanga wacho uriko nhasi manheri kuAlgeria kozoti wechipiri uchatambirwa muno kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium nemusi weMuvhuro.   MaWarriors ari kufanirwa kuwana zvibodzwa zvakawanda kubva mumitambo miviri iyi kana achida kuzobudiria kuenda kumakwikwi e2021 AFCON kuCameroon.   Achitaura neKwayedza vatarisana nemutambo wekutanga, Darikwa anoti vanozviziva kuti Algeria ndiyo shasha yemuAfrica, asi havasi kuitya nekuti ivo vakagadzirira.   “Isu tiri kuzvitemba, tine vatambi vepamusoro vanogona uye tinoziva kuti tichakonzeresa kuno.   “Chinangwa chedu kuti tibve kuAlgeria tiine mapoinzi matatu uye kana tikakundikana tidzoke taita mangange hedu tozopedzisa basa tauya kumusha.   “Tinoziva kuti zvichange zvisiri nyore hazvo asi isu ticharwa,” anodaro Darikwa.   Anoti kutamba achimirira nyika yake zvine chiremerera.   “Mitambo yenyika iyi yakakosha chaizvo uye ine chiremerera chikuru. Saka isu tinoikoshesa,” anodaro Darikwa.   Zimbabwe neAlgeria zvose zviri muGroup H rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Botswana neZambia.   Pari zvino maWarriors atamba mitambo miviri izvo zvaona achiita mangange 0-0 neBotswana mumutambo wakatambirwa muno ndokuzokunda Zambia 2-1 kuZambia.

headline: Juventus inotora mukombe: Messi
text: anoti Juventus inogona kuhwina mukombe weChampions League mwaka uno ichitadzisa chikwata chake cheBarcelona zvichitevera kutenga kwayakaita Cristiano Ronaldo uye achiti Real Madrid haichisina mukana.   Achitaura neRadio Catalunya pachirongwa cheTot Costa, Messi anoti, “Real Madrid chimwe chezvikwata chakasimba pasi rese uye ine nevatambi vepamusoro, asi nhau yekuti Ronaldo haasisiko zvichavatadzisa zvakawanda.   “Ronaldo ave kuJuventus saka zvave kutobatsira chikwata ichi kurwira mukombe uyu weChampions League uye nechikwata chavainacho chakasimba zvikuru.”   Messi anobvuma kuti akashamiswa kunzwa kuti Ronaldo aenda kunotambira nhabvu yake kuItaly mwaka uno achiti, “Handina kumbobvira ndazvifunga kuti haachatambire Madrid. Uye handina kumbobvira ndafunga kuti achaenda kuJuventus. Paive nezvikwata zvakwanda zvaimuda asi handina kumbofunga kuti Juventus chingave chimwe chacho. Zvakandishamisa zvikuru.”   Achibvunzwa kuti anogona kufunga kubva achienda kune chimwe chikwata here achisiya Barcelona – shasha iyi iyo yakambonzi inodiwa nezvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Chelsea, Manchester City nemanchester United kare – inoti: “Ndine zvese zvandinoda kuno. Ndaive muchikwata ichi kubvira ndichiri nemakore 13 ekuberekwa chaiwo.   “Ndiri muchikwata chikuru pasi rese, vana vangu vakazvarirwa kuno uye handina chekubvira ndichienda kumwe.” – SportsMail Football

headline: Chikwata cheCommonwealth Chotarisirwa muNyika neMugovera Kuzoona Kana Zimbabwe Yave Kukodzera Kutambirwa Zvakare muSangano iri
text: Chikwata cheCommonwealth Assessment Mission chiri kutarisirwa kusvika munyika Mugovera kuzoongorora kana Zimbabwe yakakwanisa kuzadzisa zviga zvayakatemerwa kuti ikwanise kutambirwa zvakare mugungano iri. Commonwealth igungano renyika makumi mashanu nenhanhatu iri, zhinji dzacho dziri dzaimbove pasi pehutongi hweBritain. Mashoko akaburitswa padandemutande reTwitter nebazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika anoti chikwata ichi chichange chiri munyika mushure mekukokwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti chione nhanho dzafambwa neZimbabwe kubva zvayakanyorera kuti ibvumidzwe kudzoka mugungano iri muna 2018. Bazi iri rinoti chikwata ichi, icho chichange chichitungamirwa nemutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru wesangano iri, Muzvinafundo Luis Franceschi, chichange chiri munyika kwesvondo rose kusvika musi wa 18 mwedzi uno. Chinotarisirwa kusangana nemutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava, mamwe makurukota pamwe nevakuru vakuru muhurumende, uye masangano enhau pamwe nevamwe vane chekuita nenyaya iyi vanoonekwa sevakakodzera kusanganikwa navo nesangano iri. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaShava, kuti tinzwe zvizhinji pamusoro pekushanya kwechikwata ichi. Zimbabwe yakabuda yoga mugungano reCommonwealth muna 2003 munguva yevaive mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe mushure mekunetsana nenyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti hapana zvati zvashanduka, zvikuru panyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu, sezvo hurumende iri kuramba ichimbunyikidza vanhu uye kudzika mitemo inoomesera mashandiro emasangano akasiyanasiyana. VaNgwenya vanotiwo kuti sangano iri rinyatsonzwisisa mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika rinofanirwa kusanganawo nevemapato anopikisa pamwe nevemasangano akazvimirira kuitira kwete kungogumira mukusangana nevehurumende chete. No media source currently available

headline: Dzimwe Mhuri Dzowana Raramo neKugadzira Zvinodzivirira Covid-19
text: Panguva apo vakawanda vari kusiya mabasa vamwe vachienda kumamisha nekuda kwekuvhingidzwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19, dzimwe mhuri dziri kuwana raramo yakanaka nekugadzira mamasiki ayo dzinotengesa. Mumwe mugari wekuSunningdale muHarare, Baba Edson Masoramuvari kugadzira pamwe chete nemudzimai wavo mamasiki avari kutengesera kumakambani pamwe neveruzhinji. Baba Musora, avo vane makore makumi matanhatu nemasere ekuberekwa, vanoti kosi yavakaita yekusona yakavavhurira mukana pakatanga kuvharirwa vanhu mudzimba nekuda kwechirwere cheCOVID-19. Lockdown yauya hatina kusvika pakuitwa lockdown nepfungwa zvese. Takatanga kugadzira ma washable masks taona kuti acho ari kugadzira ari kutengeswa achingoraswa mubhini. VaMasora, avo vane vana vanomwe vanoti bhizimusi ravo riri kufamba zvakanaka nekuda kwemamasiki avo anomhanyirwa neveruzhinji nekuda kwemagadziro akanaka avanoaita pamwe nemutengo wakachipa. Takawana contract yema 100 masks ku Joiner City. Nzira dzekuti zvinhu zvedu zvimhanye ndezvekutsvaga ma orders kubva kuma kambani. Ndizvo zvinoita kuti zvinhu zvedu zvifambe. Mudzimai wavo, Amai Jennifer Masora, vanoti dambudziko ravari kuona nderekuti mamasiki ane ngozi pahutano hwevanhu vane huchapa uye vachifarira akagadzirwa nemicheka ine mavara matema. Ma mask akanaka anotidzivirira COVID asi dambudziko randiri kuona pane vakawanda nderekuti havasati vakuita hutsanana. Unonyatsotarisa oona kuti mask iyi yaane mazuva haizivi kuwachwa. Ndiro dambudziko randiri kuona. Amai Masora vanoti kushingairira pane zvavari kuita kwayambutsa vakawanda. Iye zvino murairidzi chaiye ndinotomukunda kuita mari, kunyanya iyo nguva ino yakaoma kudai. Vese vari mumahofisi ndinovakunda kurarama. Handiende mu queue ku bhanga kunotora mari. Munhu anouya nejira rake ndomusonera, oenda ku bank ouya ondipa mari. Mumwe mudzimai ari kurarama nekutengesa mamaisiki, Amai Naomi Chinhaire, vanoti zvekuzarirwa mumba ne lockdown zvakavapa mazano avakanga vasingambofungiri. Ndinoshandisa ma tailors ekumakambani mahombe vanondipa pfungwa dzekugadzira zvinhu zvakakodzera zvekuti kana uri kunze uku zvinhu zvako zvinotengwa zvakanaka. Ndinoshandisa pattern nyowani yekuti munhu anotenga asingagunun’une. Amai Chinhaire vanoti mhuri yavo yatove neraramo inodarika yavaive nayo kutanga kwegore rino. Handidi kunyepa, zvinhu zvangu zviri kufamba. Dzimwe nguva ndinobuda mumba kuma seven kuseni ndoenda pandinongomira. Panguva diki diki zvinhu zvangu zvinenge zvapera. Pamwe ndinobuda ndine ma masks anosvika 50 asi ndinodzoka ese apera. VaTitus Doyce vanofarira zvigadzirwa zvemamasiki Amai Chinhaire. Ma mask aya tinoada nekuti unonyatsofema zvakanaka, uye kana uri pane vanhu vanenge vachingokubvunza kuti wakaiwana kupi. Kana wakaburitsa mari unofanira kugutsikana nechinhu chaunenge watenga. Pasi pemutemo weZimbabwe munhu wese anofanira kufamba akapfeka masiki kumeso kwake kana ari pane veruzhinji, senzira yekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19. Sangano rehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation rinoti mamasiki chinhu chinofanira kugara chakashambidzika uye haifaniri kuchinjanwa. No media source currently available

headline: Tatarisa caf: Mapeza
text: MURAIRIDZI weFC Platinum, Norman Mapeza, anoti pachine basa guru kuti chikwata chake chibudirire kukunda mumutambo weCAF Champions League sezvo izvi zvichida makore akawanda ekutamba nhabvu yepamusoro.   Mashoko aMapeza anotevera kuhwinha kwakaita FC Platinum mukombe weCastle Premiership kechipiri mwaka uno zvichireva kuti kuti chikwata ichi ndicho chichange chichimirira Zimbabwe kuChampions League.   Pure Platinum Play, sezita remadunhurirwa reFC Platinum, iri kudzokera mumutambo uyu mugore rechipiri rakatevedzana asi mumakwishu egore rino haina kunyatsotamba zvakanaka sezvo yakaburitswa kumapreliminary round nePrimero de Agosto yekuAngola.   Nguva pfupi yadarika, mukushi wemashoko wechikwata ichi – Chido Chizondo – akati shuviro yavo kuve chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru muAfrica panyaya dzenhabvu uye kurongeka pazvese zvavanoita.   Mapeza – uyo achiri akagara mudenga rechinomwe zvichitevera kuhwina kwavakaita mukombe weCastle Premiership – anoti, “Dai pasina Mwari zvisina kumbogoneka, tinomutenda nekumutungamira kwaakatiita.”   Muchina wemajuzi, sezita remadunhurirwa raMapeza, anoti shuviro yechikwata chake kuti chihwine mitambo yese yachinokwikwidza muno kuti chigowana mukana wekumisidzana nezvikwata zvikuru zvemuAfrica.   “Isu chatinoda kuti tihwine mikombe yese inokwikwidzwa muno kuti tigowaniswa mukana wekukwikwidza muAfrica nekuti ndimo mune zvese, vatambi vedu vanokwanisa kuonekwa nezvimwe zvikwata uye zvinounza mari kuchikwata chedu,” anodaro Mapeza.   Kunyangwe hazvo Mapeza achiti anofara nekudzokera kwavari kuitwa kumutambo weChampions League, muchinda uyu anoti pachiri nendima refu inoda kusakurwa kuti FC Platinum ikwanise kuzohwinawo mutambo uyu.   “Hazvingoitike nyore, zvinoda makore akawanda muchitamba nhabvu yepamusoro muchivaka kuti mugoverengwa pane zvimwe zvikwata zvikuru zvemuAfrica,” anodaro.   Munhorowondo yake yekurairidza nhabvu, Mapeza akwanisa kuhwina mikombe mitatu yepremiership ari murairidzi – miviri yacho iyo yaahwina neFC Platinum kozoti umwe waakahwina neMonomotapa mugore ra2008.   Pavarairidzi vese vari kurairidza nhabvu muno parizvino, Mapeza ndiye zvakare ane mikombe yakawanda yePremier League achiteverawa naLloyd Chitembwe naJoey Antipas avo vakahwina kamwe chete nezvikwata zvavo zvinoti CAPS United uye neChicken Inn.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti achakwanisa kuita zvakaitwa naKalisto Pasuwa here paakahwinha mukombe wePremier League makore mana akatevedzana apo airairidza Dynamos, Mapeza anoti, “Isu tinongotenda Mwari nekuhwina kwatakaita chete.”

headline: Britain Inoti Inoshuvira Sarudzo Dzakachena muZimbabwe
text:
Mumiriri weBritain muZimbabwe Amai Catriona Laing vanoti nyika yavo inoshuvira kuti muZimbabwe muve nesarudzo dzakachena dzinotambirwa nevanhu vose vachiti Britain iri kutarisa nemaziso matsvuku kuti hurumende ichawana sei michina yeBiometric Voter Registration. Vati nyika yavo inonzwisisa kuchema-chema kwemapato anopikisa panyaya yekuti michina iyi inofanirwa kuwanikwa nenzira yakajeka.

Vachitaura neStudio 7 parutivi pechiitiko chekukumikidzwa zviri pamutemo kwembatya nemimwe midziyo inoshandiswa pakurwisa moto muBulawayo nemusi weMuvhuro Ambassador Laing vati nyika yavo inoshuvira kuti Zimbabwe itevedzere hwaro hwesarudzo hwenyika dzeSADC uyewo kuti iteerere zvakataurwa nevesangano reAfrican Union kuti zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa kuti munyika muve nesarudzo dzakachena.

Amai Laing vati hururmende yeBritain haingakwanise kupindira padanho rakatorwa nehurumende rekuti ndiyo ichatenga michina inoshandiswa pakuita Biometric Voter Registration asi vati muzinda wavo uri kutevera wakatarisa nemaziso matsvuku kuti izvi zvichaitwa nenzira yakajeka. Amai Laing vange vari munyarikani pachiitiko chekukumikidzwa kwembatya nemichina inoshandiswa pakurwisa moto kukanzuru yeguta reBulawayo nevesangano reOperation Florian rinove sangano rekuBritain rinoshanda rakazvimirira rega mukubatsira vanhu vemunyika dzakasiyana-siyana munya dzekurwisa moto.

Ambaasador Laing vatenda vaShephard Ndlovu vanove chizvarwa cheZimbabwe asi vachishanda vari kuBritain avo vakabatsira kuti hukama pakati pekanzuru yeguta reBulawayo nesangano reoperation Florian huvepo. Vati kunyange hazvo hukama pakati pehurumende yeZimbabwe neyeBritain huchimbonetsa rubatsiro rwakapiwa nesangano reOperation Florian hunoratidza kusimba kunoramba kwakaita hukama pakati pevanhu venyika mbiri idzi.


Kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo yakatanga hukama nesangano reOperation Florian mugore ra2009 uye kubvira muna 2011 kusvika pari zvino, kanzuru iyi yawana motokari gumi dzekurwisa moto uye vashandi vayo vachidzidziswawo nezvekurwisa moto.

VaMartin Moyo meya weguta reBulawayo vati rubatsiro rwavari kuwana kubva kusangano reoperation Florian rwakakosha zvikuru kuchitariswa dambudziko rekushikwa kwemari munyika vachitiwo rubatsiro urwu runoita kuti guta ravo rifambirane nemamwe maguta pasi rose munyaya dzekurwisa moto.

Pasi pehukama hwesangano reOpertaion Florian kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo yave kushanda nemamwe makanzuru emamwe madhorobha uye kwemavhiki maviri apfuura, vamwe vashandi vezvemoto vemakanzuru aya vange vachiita zvidzidzo zvakasiyana-siyana zvine chekuita nekudzivirira moto.

VaKhumbulani Ndlovu avo vanove Leading Fire Officer muguta reBulawayo vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara zvikuru nezvidzidzo zvaawana uye vave neshungu dzekushandisa zvavakadzidza kuti vabatsire vagari vemuBulawayo.

Rubatsiro rwawanikwa nekanzuru yeguta reBulawayo kusvika pari zvino rwakakosha madhora anopfuura mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu. No media source currently available

headline: Musamhanyire kuSA: Bosso
text: VATAMBI venhabvu vemuzvikwata zvakasiyana zvinokwikwidza muno vokurudzirwa kuti vasangomhanye kuenda kunotambira kunze kwenyika vasati vaibva nekuti zvinogona kuzovagozhera sezviri kuitika kune vamwe vavo.   Kurudziro iyi yakapihwa nemutevedzeri wasachigaro weHighlanders FC, Modern Ngwenya, muhurukuro yaakaita neKwayedza achiti kune vamwe vatambi vemuno vari kumhanyira kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa uko vanonotatarika zvikuru.   “Chiri kukuvadza vatambi vedu ndechekuti hongu kuenda kunotambira kunze kunodiwa, unogadzira zita rako uye unowana mari yakawanda worarama hupenyu hwakanaka, asi kunze uko kunopisa.   “Isu muno ndisu tinobika vatambi venhabvu, kuSouth Africa hakubikwe vatambi, uko kunodiwa vatambi vakaibva kare chete. Saka vedu vanoenda ikoko vasati vanyatsoibva vosvika votatarika, wozoona mutambi adzoka muno nekuchimbidza bhora rake raurayiwa, vamwe vanobva vatopera zvachose,” anodaro Ngwenya.   Vamwe vevatambi vakamboenda kunotambira kunze kwenyika vakakurumidza kudzoka vanosanganisira Prince Dube weHighlanders uyo akambobva akanotambira kuSouth Africa uko akatatarika zvikuru ndokuzodzoka.   Milton Ncube – uyo aimbotambira Highlanders zvakare – akaenda kuSouth Africa asi haana kumbogara nguva refu ndokudzoka nekuchimbidza akatanga kutambira zvikwata zvemuno.   Denver Mukamba naRodwell Chinyengetere vakambonozama mhanza zvakare kunze kwenyika asi vakadzoka misoro imire.   Ngwenya anoti vakamboyambira Dube – uyo ari kupisa parizvino mumitambo yeCastle Premiership – kuti asamhanye kuenda kuSouth Africa sezvo akange asati anyatsoibva asi haana kuterera.   Dube mugore ra2017 akabva ndokuenda kuSupersport United yekuSouth Africa uko akanotatarika zvikuru ndokumboendeswa kuBlack Leopards nechikwereti asi hapana chakabudako.   Mugore ra2018, akadzoka kuBosso zvakare akatambirwa nemaoko maviri ndokutanga kubikwa patsva.   “Prince takambomuudza kuti usamhanye kuenda chimbomira umbobikwa futi, asi haana kuterera. Akaenda akadzoka semwana wedu takamutambira uye tiri kumuvaka patsva.   “Iye zvino ndiye mutambi ari kupisa muCastle Premiership. Hakuna mumwe anomukunda parizvino, ari muchikwata chedu totoziva kuti tinohwina chete,” anodaro Ngwenya.   Zvakadai, svondo rino Bosso iri kusangana neZPC Kariba mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup semi-final uyo uchatambirwa kunhandare yeBarbourfields kuBulawayo.

headline: Ko Vanhu Gumi neVanomwe Vabviswa Pazvirango neAmerica Ndivanani?
text: Kunyangwe hazvo America yakatemera zvirango vamwe vanhu vana nezuro kusanganisira mwana wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, Emmerson Mnanngagwa Junior, pane vamwe vanhu kunyanya vaive muhurumende vakabviswa pazvirango. Vanhu ava vanoti Amai Flora Buka, VaIgnatious Morgan Chombo, VaNicholas Tasungunurwa Goche,naVaRugare Aleck Ngidi Gumbo. Vamwe vabviswa vanosanganisira VaJaison Machaya, VaReuben Marumahoko, VaHerbert Murerwa nemudzimai wavo Amai Ruth Chipo Murerwa, VaKenneth Keparadza Mutiwekuzivam VaDavid Chapfika, VaPhineas Chihota, mwana waVaPatrick Chinamasa, Gamuchirai Chinamasa, Amai Abigail Damasane, VaAndrew Langa, mupurisa VaLevy Sibanda, Amai Hellin Mushanyuri Gono, mudzimai waVaGideon Gono, uye VaChenhamo Chakezha Chimutengende.

headline: Mutumbi waVaMugabe Wotarisirwa Munyika neChitatu Masikati
text: Mutumbi wevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, uchasvika muHarare neChitatu masikati uye ndipo pachaziviswa hurongwa kwekuradzikwa kwavo. Izvi zvaziviswa negurukota rezvekuburitswa kwamashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota. Amai Mutsvangwa vati pane makomiti ehurumende ari kugadzirira hurongwa kwekuradzikwa kwaVaMugabe. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei zviri kutora nguva kutaura kucharadzikwa VaMugabe, Amai Mutsvangwa pamwe nekugurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vati hapana chinoshamisa pane zviri kuitika vachiti hurongwa hwekuradzikwa kwavo huchaziviswa mushure mekunge mhuri yaVaMugabe, iyo iri kuSingapore, yasvika munyika. Vati hurumende nemhuri yaVaMugabe zviri kuronga pamwe chete hurongwa uhu. Ukuwo mutauriri wemadzimambo edzinza raVaMugabe, Mambo Katizagombo, avo vanonzi Gibson Jenami, vati hapachisina makakatanwa pamusoro pekuvigwa kwaVaMugabe sezvo hurumende, ichitungamirirwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, yave pamberi pezvose zvichaitwa. Ukowo Major General Trust Mugoba, avo vakashayawo svondo rapfuura, vacharadzikwa neChitatu panzvimbo inovigwa magamba yeHeroes Acre muHarare. Mune imwewo nyaya hurumende inoti pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zana nemakumi manomwe nezvisere zvakabatwa batwa nemhirizhonga iri kuitika kuSouth Africa uye pane vanhu vaviri vekuZimbabwe vakashaya mumhirizhonga iyi. VaMoyo vati hurumende iri kuronga kuunza vanhu ava nemitumbi yevaviri ava kumusha. Hurumende inotiwo vashandi mubazi rezvehutano kusanganisira vana chiremba vakatobhadharwa mari yakawedzerwa neezvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana yekuti vabatsirikane uye nhasi dare remakurukota raita chisungo chekuti bazi rezvehutano nemari zvigare pasi kuona kuti vashandi ava vapihwa mari dzinofadza. Gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, vati vachagara pasi nebazi rezvemari kuona kuti chisungo chedare remakurukota chatevedzwa. Vanachiremba vakatanga kuramwa mabasa svondo rapfuura vachitsutsumwa kuti mari dzavo dzemihoro hadzina zvadzichabatsira. No media source currently available

headline: VaDos Santos Varadzikwa Nhasi Vopinda Muchikwata cheVatungamiri veNyika dzemuAfrica Kusanganisira VaMugabe Vakafira Kunyika Dzakabudirira
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vabatana nhasi kuLuanda, Angola nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica parufu rwevaive mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaJose Eduardo dos Santos avo vakashayikira kuSpain musi wa 8 Chikunguru. VaDos Santos varadzikwa nhasi pazuva ravangadai vasvitsa makore makumi masere. Vamwe vatungamiri vange vari parufu apa vanosanganisira VaCyril Ramaphosa, South Africa, VaFelix Tshisekedi, DRC, uye mutungamiri wePortugal VaMarcelo Rebelo de Sousa. VaDos Santos vari pakati pevatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vakafira kunyika dzekumawirira nekumabudazuva vachirapwa sezvo zvipatara zvakawanda munyika dzavo nemuAfrica zvisina zvikwanisiro. Vamwe vatungamiri vakafira kunze vanosanganisira VaRobert Mugabe vakafira kuSingapore, VaLevy Mwanawasa vekuZambia vakafira kuFrance, VaMichael Sata vekuZambia zvekare vakafira kuBritain, VaMeles Zenawi vekuEthiopia vakafira kuBelgium, VaUmaru Musa Yar’Adua vekuNigeria vakafira kuSaudi Arabia. Ko chii chinopa kuti vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vanorapwa kunze kana vachinge varwara uye dzimwe nguva kufa vari kunyika dzakabudirira? Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorera vaudza Studio 7 kuti vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica havaendese mari kumapazi ezvehutano sezvinosungirwa nechibvumirano chavakanyorerana cheAbuja Declaration. Chibvumirano ichi chinokurudzira hurumende kuti dziendese zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana zvebhajeti kubazi rezvehutano. No media source currently available

headline: China Inoti Hapana Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chati Chabatwa neCoronavirus
text: China inoti hapana zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuChina kusanganisira zvri kudzidza kunyika zvati zvabatwa neCoronavirus. China inotiwo iri kutora matanho kuitira kuti Zimbabwe isaite munhu anobatwa neCoronavirus. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wavaita negurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, mutevedzeri wemumiriri weChina muZimbabwe, VaZhao Baogang, vati pari zvino havasati vawana shoko rekuti pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvawirwa netsaona yeCoronavirus iyi. VaBaogong vati nyika yavo iri kuita zvese zvaingagona kuchengetedza veruzhinji vari munyika yavo. VaBaogang vatiwo mukuedza kuona kuti chirwere cheCoronavirus hachisviki muZinbabwe, vari kukurudzira zvizvarwa zvekunyika yavo kuti zvimbomira kushanyira Zimbabwe. Vatiwo vanenge vauya vari kuvachengetedzwa kwemazuva gumi nemana kuti vasasangana neveruzhinji. VaMoyo vatenda zvikuru matanho ari kutorwa neChina mukuedza kudzivirira kuti Coronavirus isapinde muZimbabwe. VaMoyo vati vari kuwana rubatsiro rwakawanda vakatiwo China yazvipirawo kubatsira Zimbabwe kugadzirisa nzvimbo dzakatarwa kuti vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi, vachengeterwe. Kusvika pari nhasi, vanhu vanosvika mazana matanhatu varasikirwa nehupenyu nekuda kweCoronavirus, uye vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri nezvina vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachaputika muChina gore rapera. Mubati wehomwe musangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Norman Matara, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti zvakakosha kana China ichigadzirira kubatsira Zimbabwe sezvo isina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehutano. VaMoyo vazivisawo kuti hapana munhu ati abatwa nechirwere ichi mZimbabwe kunyange hazvo vanhu vanodarika mazana manomwe vari kuongororwa kana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. VaMoyo vatiwo vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vambomira kuenda kuChina pamwe nekune dzimwe nyika dzakatapurirwa chirwere ichi. Dzimwe dzenyika dzave neCoronavirus dzinosanganisira Malaysia, France, Canada, Belgium, Malaysia, America, Germany, Britain Japan nedzimwewo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Voudza Dzimwe Nyika Zvinoda Kuitwa muNyaya dzeHutano, Asi Vanamukoti muNyika Vachironga Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weMuvhuro vakavhura zviri pamutemo musangano webazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvehutano kana kuti World Health Organization kuVictoria Falls wechimakumi matanhatu nesere kana kuti 67th Session of the WHO Regional Committee for Africa Conference. Asi pabva paita mhute munyika apo vanamukoti vakazivisa kuti vapa hurumende mavhiki maviri ekuti vave kuda kukanda mapadza pasi zvekare nenyaya yekusawirirana panyaya dzemihoro. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu VaMugabe vati nyika dzemuAfrica dzinofanira kutsvaga mari kuendesa mari kumabasa ezvehutano uye vatiwo Zimbabwe yakaedza kuita izvi nekuumba homwe yeAids levy yave kubatsirawo munyaya yekurapa chirwere chegomarara. Nyika dzemuAfrica dziri kukundikanawo chibvumirano chadzakaita kuAbuja, Nigeria muna 2001 chekuona kuti mari inosvika zvikamu gumi neshanu zvebhajeti yenyika zvaenda kunyaya dzezvehutano. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnock Dongo vanoti havasi kufara nenya yekuti vamwe vanamukoti vanoita basa rehumaneja nevanodzidzisa vanotambira mari shoma zvichienzaniswa nevari pasi pavo kana vari pasi ava vakashanda maawa akati wandei pane akatarwa kana kuti e"over time". Vanoti vanamukoti vakatoendesa tsamba kuHealth Services Board, bhodhi rinoona nezvemari dzavo vachitaura nezvekuda kuramwa mabasa kwavo. No media source currently available Asi mukuru weHealth Services Board Dr Lovemore Mbengeranwa vanoti vari kuziva dambudziko iri asi pari zvino hurumende haina mari. No media source currently available

headline: Kurwisana Pakati peMauto eUkraine neRussia Kunonzwikwa muGuta Guru reUkraine reKyiv
text: Kuputika kwemabhambu pamwe nekurira kwepfuti kunonzi kwanga kuchinzwikwa neMugovera muguta guru reUkraine, reKyiv, apo mauto eRussia nemauto eUkraine akanga achirwira kuti guta guru iri rive pasi pavo. Vakuru veguta reKyiv vanonzi vadzika mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu kubva nenguva dza 5 manheru kusvika nenguva dza 8 mangwanani ezuva rinotevera. Vakuru muhurumende yeUkraine vari kukurudzira zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi kuti zvibatsire kudzivirira guta reKyiv kubva kumauto eRussia. Kamba yemauto iri muguta guru iri yarwiswa asi mauto eUkraine anoti kurwiswa uku kwadzivirirwa. Chimwe chivakwa chemuturikidzwa chiri muguta guru iri charwiswawo mambakwedza. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muUkraine rati chivakwa ichi charohwa nechombo cheRussia. Mumwe mushandi anonunura vanhu munjodzi audza sangano renhau Associated Press kuti vanhu vatanhatu vakuvadzwa mukurwiswa nechombo chemuchadenga uku. Mifananidzo yepamavhidhiyo inoratidza kuti chivakwa ichi chaparadzwa zvakanyanya , zvikuru mumipanda yepamusoro. Mutungamiri weUkraine, VaVolodymyr Zelenskyy vakanga vayambira kuti kurwiswa kweKyiv kwaizowedzerwa neMugovera, vakati guta guru iri raida kudzivirirwa vachiti havangarasikirwi naro. VaZelenskyy vanyorawo padandemutande reTwitter kuti vataura nemutungamiri weFrance VaEmmanuel Macron, vachiti zvombo nezvikwanisiro kubva kune vavanodyidzana navo zviri munzira kuenda kuUkraine. Ukuwo, gurukota rezvekudyidana nedzimwe nyika muRussia rati mauto eRussia atora guta riri kuchamhembe kwakadziva kumabvazuva kweUkraine reMelitopol. Vakuru vakuru muAmerica pamwe nenyika dzekumawirira vanoti hurongwa hwemauto eRussia hwekufora achipinda muKyiv nemamwe maguta senzira yekudimura nekuparadza hurumende yeUkraine hunenge hwadzikira mutsindo. MuKyiv, VaZelenskyy vasarudza kukurudzira nyika yavo, vachiramba runyerekupe rwekuti vatiza guta iri vachisimbisa kuti ivo nevamwe vakuru vehurumende vachirimo vose vachidzivirira rusununguko rwavo nenyika yavo.

headline: Dynamos Yokweshana neFC Platinum muCastle Premier Soccer League
text: Kunenge kusingadanwe anonzwa mukupera kwesvondo apo makwikwi enhabvu eCastle Premier Soccer League hwonanga kwamvura yacheka makumbo. Kunhandare yeMandava Stadium neMugovera achange ari makuwerere apo zvikwata zvirikurwira mukombe weCastle Lager Premier Soccer League, FC Platinum neDynamos zvirikutashurana mumutambo wanga uri pamuromo wevakawanda svondo rose. FC Platinum haisati yarohwa mumitambo gumi nemiviri yapfuura asi vanoongorora zvenhabvu vanoti yanga isingatambe nezvikwata zvakasimba vachiti ivo chikwata chese muZimbabwe chinoratidza kugona kwacho nekurova Dembare chete. Murairidzi wechikwata cheDynamos Tonderayi Ndiraya arikubvuma kuti mutambo uyu wakaoma asi anoti seDynamos vanotarisira kukunda mumitambo yese yavanotamba. FC Platinum irikukwikwidza zvine mutsindo mumakundano aya gore rino zvekuti mutambi wavo arikurura Brian Muzondiwa anoti chishuwo chake chekutora mukombe weligi nekunomiririra nyika muCaf Champions League chichazadzikiswa. Asi vanokwanisa kuswedera pedyo nekuita izvi chete kana vakakunda Dynamos sezvo izvi zvinovasiya vave pachinhanho chechipiri nemapoinzi maviri pamusoro peDembare. Asi vakarohwa unenge wave mutoro chaiwo sezvo vanenge vave nemapoinzi mana pasi peDynamos uyezve masere pasi pechikwata chirikutungamira cheChicken Inn icho chirikutarisirwa kudambura ZPC Kariba pamusha. Kugona Kunenge Kudada neDembare dzikaita mangange maGame Cocks (Chicken Inn) akakunda, zvikwata izvi zvinobva zvasara zvakasimba kwasara mitambo misère chete kuti makundano aya asvike kwamvura yacheka makumbo. FC Platinum neDynamos zvirikusangana zvekare svondo rinouya mumakundano eChibuku Super Cup mushure mekubatanidzwa neChina pamabiko akaitirwa kuGweru. Mubati wehomwe weDynamos VaWebster Marechera vanoti Dynamos yatarisana nemari yavanga vachitsvaga kuti vabhadhare zvikwereti zvakawanda zvavakatarisana nazvo. Vanoti varikutarisira kukunda FC Platinum mumitambo yose miviri iyi. Mune muumwe mutambo wakatarisirwa neveruzhinji ndeuyo urimuRufaro Stadium neMugovera zvekare apo Highlanders irikushanyira Harare City. Highlanders yave nemurairidzi mutsva Cosmos ‘Tsano’ Zulu mushure mekudzingwa kwaBongani Mafu. Mutambi Brighton Tuwaya uyo akambotambira Lancashire Steel, Shabanie Mine pamwe neDynamos ane chivimbo naZulu zvekuti anoti Bosso ichasimuka mumitambo yasara. Asi murairidzi weHarare City Taurayi Mangwiro anoti chikwata chake chinofanira kugadzirisa pavarikunyanyo tadza pekupedzisa mikana yavari kuwana kuti varove Bosso.  Mimwi mitambo iriko yakamira seizvi Caps United vs Buffaloes Whawha vs Triangle Dongo vs Chapungu Tsholotsho vs How Mine. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yoyambira Kumwe Kuratidzira Sezvo Mitengo Yoita Chamurambamhuru
text: Rimwe sangano revashandi re Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation zvekuti hazvishamise vashandi vakaratidzira. NeMugovera sangano reZimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats rakazivisa kuti mitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation yakwira kusvika pamazana masere nemakumi matatu nemanomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 837, 53%. Muna Chikumi mitengo yezvinhu yaive pazvikamu mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nemanomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 35, 53%. Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti nhaurirano dzemihoro dziri paviri, kuTripartite Negotiating Forum dzinobata nyika yose, asi dzimwe dzinoitwa kumaindustry nemaNational Employment Councils. No media source currently available Munyori mukuru weZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti mushandi aomerwa nezvinhu zvekuti havashamisike akatanga kuratidzira. No media source currently available Sezvo tisina kusimbira divi rimwe chete setsvimbo, tabatawo mutungamiri wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe kana kuti EMCOZ Doctor Israel Mure avo vati vanoda kuwedzera vashandi mari asi vari kutatarikawo nekushaya mari sezvo makambani asiri kushanda nemazvo nekuda kwechirwere checoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Chirongwa cheKudzidzisa Vachadzidzisa Vamwe Mabayirwo eNhomba yeCovid-19 Chinotanga Munyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti ratanga chirongwa chekudzidzisa vanhu vachadzidzisa vamwe mumatunhu madiki nemakuru (district and provincial trainers) kubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 iyo yakapinda munyika neMuvhuro ichibva kuChina. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubazi iri, VaDonald Mujiri, vanoti chirongwa ichi chafamba zvakanaka, uye vanhu vanosvika mazana mana vabva kumapoka akasiyanasiyana vawana dzidziso pamusoro pemabairwo enhomba iyi. VaMujiri vanoti vanhu vapinda muchirongwa ichi vanosanganisira vezvehutano vabva kumatunhu maduku nematunhu makuru, mapoka akazvimirira, makanzuru, vekumajeri pamwe nemapurisa. Zvimwe zvinonzi zvadzidziswa vanhu ava zvinosanganisira machengeterwo enhomba, mabairwo, marasirwo ainofanirwa kuzoitwa, kufambiswa kwemashoko pamwe nekuongorora vanenge vabaiwa nhomba iyi. VaMujiri vanoti vadzidziswa ava vanenge votarisirwa kuti kutanga neChitatu kana kuti musi weChina vanenge vototangawo kudzidziva vachazobaya nhomba iyi mumatunhu avo. No media source currently available Mukuru wesangano rezvehutano, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti vanotambira chirongwa chedzidziso ichi asi vachiti zvinenge zvakanaka kuti vanezenge vachibaya vanhu nhomba iyi vange vaine ruzivo rwakakwana. VaRusike vanotiwo hurumende yaifanirwa kunge yakatanga kare kushanda nevezvehutano ava kubva pakatangwa mabasa ekutsvaga nhomba idzodzi, uyewo vanoti zvakakoshawozvakare kuti veruzhinji vapiwe mukana wekusarudza nhomba yavanoda pane dzose dzave kuwanikwa, kwete kuti vangopiwa iri kubva kuChina chete. No media source currently available

headline: VaBarack Obama Vanorumbidza Mabasa aMuchakabvu Nelson Mandela
text: Vaimbove mutungamiri weAmerica, Va Barack Obama, vakarumbidza vaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, mushakabvu Nelson Mandela, nebasa guru ravakaita rekurwira kuti munhu wese ave nerusununguko. Vachitaura neChipiri kuvanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvina muJohannesburg muhurongwa hwekurangarira VaMandela, VaObama vakarumbidza mabasa akaitwa naVaMandela, avo vaifanirwa kusvitsa makore zana gore rino, dai vakange vachiri vapenyu. VaObama vakati hondo yerusununguko haisati yapera, uye vanhu vanofanira kudzidza kubva kuhunhu hwairatidzwa naVaMandela. VaObama vakaratidzawo kushushikana nerusarura ganda ruchiripo munyika mavo nemuSouth Africa, zvinhu zvavanoti ndizvo zvakarwirwa naVaMandela kuti zvipere pasi rose. Mashoko akataurwa naVaObama ndeemhando yepamusoro zvichitevera kusiya kwavo basa semutungamiri weAmerica muna 2017, mushure mekunge vashanda muWhite House kwemakore masere. VaObama vakasangana naVaMandela muna 2005, makore matatu vasati vasarudzwa kuva mutungamiri weAmerica. Muna 2013, VaObama vakataura mashoko akadzama pahurongwa hwekurangarira VaMandela. VaMandela vakagara muhusungwa kwemakore makumi maviri nemanomwe, vakazoburitswa mujeri muna 1990, vakazoitwa mutungamiri wechitema wekutanga muSouth Africa muna 1994. VaTrust Masieleala, avo vari kuita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro soro pa University of Johannesburg, vakati kurudziro yaVaObama haina kunangana ne South Africa chete, asi kuti ikurudziro kunyika dzose kuti dziremekedze kodzero dzevanhu. Chipangamazano musangano re Political Economy Southern Africa, VaGideon Chitanga, vakatiwo mashoko aVaObama aburitsa pachena matambudziko ari kunetsa nyika zhinji pasi rose. VaTerrence Chitapi veAfrican Democracy Forum kuchamhembe kweAfrica, vakatiwo mashoko aVa Obama anoratidza kuti hapana munhu akakosha kupfuura mumwe. Mutungamiri weSouth Africa, Va Cyril Ramaphosa, pamwe nemudzimai waVaMandela, Amai Gracia Machel, vakarumbidza VaMandela vakakurudzira munhu wese kuti azadzikise chido chavo chekuda kuona munhu wese akasununguka. VaObama vasati vapinda muSouth Africa, vakashanyira Kenya kwemazuva maviri, uko kwakaberekerwa baba vavo. VaObama vakaita hurukuro nemutungamiri weKenya, VaUhuru Kenyatta, pamwe nemutungamiri webato rinopikisa, VaRaila Odinga nemusi weSvondo. NeMuvhuro VaObama vakaswera vari muguta rakaberekerwa baba vavo re Kogelo kuKenya kwakare, uko vakavhura muzinda wekudzidzira mitambo, uyo wakatangwa nehanzvadzi yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai emuZimbabwe Ari kuBotswana Anoti Haachangomirira VanaBaba Mukushavira Mhuri
text: Madzimai akawanda anobva kuZimbabwe ari muBotswana anoti ave kuzviitira mabasa emaoko vachiti kushandira vamwe vanhu kana makambani hakuna pundutso. Aya mazwi emamwe madzimai anobva kuZimbabwe anorarama nekugadzira musoro muguta reFrancistown muBotswana vari kushambadzira vari kudarika nenzira kuti vanogadzira musoro. Mumwe wemadzimai aya ndiMuzvare Nomalanga Sibanda, avo vanoti vakadzidzira kutauro mutauro unotaurwa munyika iyi weSetswana nekukurumidza, kuitira kuti vakwanise kutsvaga vanoda kurukwa musoro. Muzvare Sibanda, avo vanobva kuGokwe, vanoti kugadzira bvudzi kwavo kuri kuita kuti vakawanise kuchengeta vana vavo vakasara kuZimbabwe pamwe nemumwe mudiki wavagere naye kuBotswana kunyangwe hazvo vachigara vachiita hwakitsi nagonzo nemapurisa enyika iyi. Vabvakure havabvumidzwe kuita basa kana bhizinesi rekugadzira musoro muBotswana sezvo hurumende yenyika iyi ichiti ibasa rezvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinorarama nekutenga nekutengesa hove, muriwo, shangu nehembe, Amai Florence Manzungu vanoti vakaona kuti kugarira maoko hakuna pundutso vachiti varume vanodawo kubatsirwa Amai Justina Ngwenya, avo vane makore makumi mana nerimwe chete uye vachirima muriwo kumapurazi eGlenn Valley ayo ari pedyo neguta reGaborone, vaudza Studio7 kuti kurima vari kurima asi dambudziko ndekwekutengesera. Amai Tendai Chimombe vakazvarirwa kuBuhera ndookukurira kuMvuma vanoita basa rekusona muguta reFrancistown. Vanoti kushaikwa kwemagwaro akakwana kunoita kuti vasabhadharwe mari inogutsa kwavanoshanda. Kuitira kuti vakwanise kuraramisa mhuri yavo, Amai Chimombe vanotengesawo matemba nedovi zvavanohodha muno senzira yekuwedzera mari yavanowana kubasa. Asi Amai Pauline Marembo vanoti kutsvaga mafuro manyoro uku kwakavaparira sezvo vakabva vaparadzana nemurume ainge asara kumusha. Nzara iri kunzi yapfunya chisero munyika ndiyo iri kutizwa nevanhu vazhinji vachiyenda kunyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe dzinosanganisira Botswana, South Africa, Mozambique, Namibia, Zambia nedzimwewo. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda muBulawayo Votambira neMufaro Zvaitwa VaMugabe neMauto
text: No media source currently available Vamwe vevanhu vataura neStudio 7 muBulawayo vanoti vanotambira kutora masimba ehurumende kwaitwa nemauto. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Muzvare Abegale Mupambi, vesangano re#This Constitution Our Constitution, vati sesangano ravo rinokurudzira kukosheswa kwebumbiro remutemo wenyika, uye vanotambira zvaitwa nevechiuto. Kunyange hazvo vati kubvuta masimba chinhu chakaipa, vati mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nevamwe vemubato ravo vange vave kutonga nyikavachiita madiro aJojina. Retired Lieutenant Colonel Brian Mutoti vatiwo havawone pachiitika mhirizhonga kana kudeuka kweropa kuchaitika sezvo vati vanoona vechiuto vari vanhu vakarongeka vanoita basa ravo nemazvo. Mutungamiri weZapu, VaDumiso Dabengwa, vati vaiwona kutorwa kwemasimba nevechiuto chiri chaigona kuitika munyika, uye chichitsigirwa neveruzhinji. Murwi wehondo yerusununguko pasi pevarwi veZipra, VaMax Mkandla, vati vanotsigirawo zvaitwa nevechiuto. Mune imwewo nyaya, dare ramagistrate muBulawayo neChitatu rabvuma kuti VaMagura Charumbira vabhadhare mari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomhera yekukurudzira kukonzerwa kwemhirizhonga pamwe nekutuka kana kuzvidza mukuru wenyika,

headline: Ticharwa semvumba: Siyachitema
text: MURAIRIDZI weGlow Petroleum Queens, Perpetua Siyachitema, otsidza kuti chikwata chake chicharwa semvumba mwaka wegore rino zvichitevera kuhwina kwachakaita mukombe weRainbow Amateur Netball League (RANL).   Svondo radarika, Glow Petroleum Queens yakapihwa mubairo weUS$3 000 nemenduru yegoridhe pamabiko akaitwa muHarare ekupemberera shasha dzakahwina mwaka wadarika weRANL.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Siyachitema anoti chikwata chake chakatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka wadarika izvo zvakachiona chichingokundwa mumutambo mumwe chete murwendo rwavo rwekurwira mukombe weRANL.   Siyachitema, uyo aimbove mutambi wechikwata ichi nechenyika chemaGems, anoti mwaka uno vanoda kurwa semvumba kuti vachengetedze mukombe wavo naizvozvo vanofanirwa kupedza mwaka wose vasina kumbokundwa.   “Sechikwata, tiri kufara nekuhwina kwatakaita mwaka wadarika, zvainge zvakaoma nekuti takazomirira pazuva rekupedzisira kuziviswa kunzi tisu shasha dzeRANL dza2021.   “Saka tichienda mumwaka wegore rino, tinoda kurwa semvumba tihwine mitambo yedu yose uye zvimwe zvikwata zvizive kuti hatisi kuita zvekutamba asi kuti tiri shasha chaidzo. Tikahwina mitambo yedu yose, tinoziva kuti hatizobatire hana dzedu mumaoko sezvatakazoita pazuva rekupedzisira remwaka wadarika apo takange tave kuda kuti ZRP Mambas Queens ikundwe kuitira kuti tizogadzwa humambo hwedu,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Zvichitevera kuhwina kwakaita chikwata chake mukombe weRANL, Siyachitema ndiye akabva asarudzwa kuve murairidzi wemwaka wa2021 (Coach of the Year).   ZRP Mambas, iyo yakapedza iri pechipiri, yakahwiniswawo US$2 000 kuchiti Correctional Queens ikapihwa US$1 500 mushure mekutora nhamba yechitatu. Mutambi weCorrectional Queens, Kudakwashe Mushonge, ndiye akahwina mubairo wePlayer of the Season, Judith Mudekwe weTenax akatora weRookie of the Season uyewo Pauline Jani weZRP Mambas Queens ndiye akahwina weGolden Hand.   Zvakadaro, mwaka weRANL wa2022 uri kutanga svondo rino.

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kugadzirisa Nyaya dzeKodzero dzeVanhu neMitemo yeSarudzo Isati Yadzorwa muCommonwealth
text: Apo chikwata cheCommonwealth changa chiri munyika kuzoona kuti Zimbabwe inokodzera here kudzorerwa mugungano iri chakapeta rwendo rwacho nemusi weChitatu, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine maonero akasiyanasiyana pamusoro pehurongwa uhu. Vamwe vari kuti chinhu chakanaka kuti Zimbabwe idzoserwe mugungano renyika makumi mashanu nenhanhatu, zhinji dzacho dziri dzaive pasi pehutungamiri hweBritain, asi vamwewo vachiti hurumende ichine zvakawanda zvainofanirwa kugadzirisa zvakaita senyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu. Kushanya kwechikwata ichi kwakasanganidzanawo nekupiwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kwenhengo dzebato rinopikisa reCCC gumi neina dzakanga dzave kusvitsa mwedzi mishanu dziri muhusungwa mushure mekusungwa kuNyatsime dzichipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga. Asi vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti chiitiko chekupiwa mukana kwevanopikisa ichi chakaitwa nehurumende kuti iratidze chikwata chaishanya ichi kuti munyika munoteverwa mitemo, asi vamwewo vachiti kumatare kune mitemo inoteverwa zvisineyi nezvematongerwo enyika. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rinopikisa rePeople’s Patriotic Party, VaZvaringeni Samuel Chasi, vanoti zvakanaka kuti Zimbabwe idzoserwe muCommonwealth, asi inofanirwa kupindawo zvakare mugungano reInternational Criminal Court, uye kugadziridza mabatiro ayo nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu. VaChasi vanotiwo pamusoro pekodzero dzevanhu, hurumende inofanirwa zvakare kugadzirisa mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo, uye inofanirwa kuzotariswa zvakare nesangano iri mushure mesarudzo dzegore rinouya isati yadzoserwa mugungano reCommonwealth. Asi mutauriri weNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, VaMadock Chivasa vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kungodzoserwa mugungano iri pasina zviga kana zvirango zvainonzi itange yazadzisa. VaChivasa vanoti kana paine zvinonetsa munyika vana veZimbabwe ndivo vanofanirwa kugara pasi vozvigadzirisa, kwete kuti vekunze kana masangano ekunze vapindire. Chikwata cheCommonwealth ichi chakaita misangano nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, bato riri kutonga reZanu PF, mapato anopikisa anoti reCitizens’ Coalition for Change neMDC inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora, nhengo dzePOLAD, pamwe nevemamwe masangano akazvimirira. Asi mamwe mapato ari kunyunyuta kuti haana kupiwa mukana wekusangana nechikwata ichi achipawo maonero awo panyaya iyi, vachiti vaidawo kupa mamiriro ezvinhu munyika, zvikuru munyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available
